column4: Great food and ambiance. Very welcoming. We arrived an hour before closing and did not feel rushed at all. Excellent service.

Amazing lunch with awesome service, highly recommend. Had the octopus carpaccio followed by the hangar steak with a side of rosemary Parmesan fries and ended with a delicious mango cream coconut tart. Also enjoyed a wonderful Malbec with my meal.

Great lunch - the meat was perfect, very well cooked. Service people were very well informed about the food and drinks they were serving, with very good description. Salad with blue cheese, just fantastic

Our experience almost mirrored a bad review we read on Google. Service here (Stephanie the bartender) is horrible! So rude! As somebody that was a corporate trainer for restaurants, this place needs some serious customer service training.

column3: Great place for a surprise party!
column4: Recently attended a surprise party here and the staff were wonderful and the food was delicious. The menu was limited due to the size of the group but the choices were awesome. Will dine here again.

I was in Chicago for an Industry Convention and decided on a recommendation from a friend to take clients to RPM Steakhouse on Kinzie St. Solid atmosphere and really good steaks, everyone was pleased with their meals, atmosphere and service. Recommend this restaurant.

I must say this restaurant is very nice. Great service, great atmosphere, great food, great presentation, i could continue. It¬¥s not a cheap restaurant but definetely worth it. Can¬¥t wait to go back!

The best steak I have eaten worldwide! Everything is extra: bread, appetizer, sides, and dessert. And it was worth every penny. Excellent service and perfectly appropriate ambiance enhance the entire meal. If you have one dinner in Chicago, this is the place.

column3: Taste is magnificent price is little bit high. Very nice for special days
column4: The steak was very delicious. I ate steak in many places but this one was incomparable with the other. The deserts were very nice with taste and presentation.

column3: Good busy and a bit noisy
column4: Nice restaurant with tasty housemate pasta. I had the scampi in a red sauce. Thought it could use a touch of salt. Friendly bartenders but very busy and noisy.

We hardly booked a table Int je afternoon because the waitress was not interested in taking reservations. When we arrived, we‚Äôve had to wait 30‚Äô before being said that our table won‚Äôt be ready but that we would eat at the bar... Very unpleasant.
Great steak and outstanding service. Wife does not drink champagne but I do and I wanted Dom, was pleased to find out they offered it by the glass. Cotton candy afterward is a nice touch.
I liked the food and ambient however I believe the food and wines were quite overrated. Friendly service and staff.
In town again for the NRA and the crew and I had to stop by. Good time, excellent food and good service. The tomahawk is always my go to here. Amazing!

Fabulous food with friendly, professional waitstaff. We arrived late after the theatre and did not for a second feel rushed. Appetizers were delicious and dinner superb! Pricey but worth it. Highly recommend.

One of Chicago's best. The bone in filet was dry aged and cooked Medium Rare to perfection. Appetizers were very well done, the steak tartar was the best I have ever had. Thank you for a great evening out.
When you go to a high-end steakhouse you expect the best. The service was fantastic, recommendations spot on, drinks and food delicious. Great atmosphere. Very happy with our choice!
The atmosphere was fantastic, and the bar area was spacious and inviting. The food was good and had a nice presentation
Get the bacon Delicious. You can‚Äôt go wrong with RPM anything. First time having steak tartare I will go back time and time again

Decore was lux, food was great and service from Christine was 12/10. She made us feel special on our anniversary and answered our questions about the menu perfectly. Always a great time here. Worth every penny.

We had four diners, every one loved their meals. The Strip Steak, Filets, and fish were all perfectly prepared to order. The sides were family style and equally strong. Service was outstanding as well. All in all a terrific dining experience.

The service is always friendly and attentive. The food was perfectly prepared and presented in courses unrushed for an enjoyable dining experience. Appetizers to dessert were all very good. The selection and preparation of the steaks were flawless in temperature and crust. Delicious.
The steak „ÄÅthe service are amazing good!!!!! The price is high but worth to come again ,I really enjoy .

column3: Small fillet. Drop of Zin. Perfect.
column4: Shared starter. Modest steaks. Excellent wine. Service intelligent. Music quiet enough to talk. Just right,

I was absolutely stunned by every dish we tried. The seafood, the steak, and the desserts were fabulous! My most favor was the baked Alaska! Wow!! Service was top notch and I can not wait to hear next time I am in Chicago!

column3: Great place for dinner with friends.
column4: The atmosphere is light and comfortable. The wait staff is wonderful and friendly and the food was just awesome. Cooked exactly as requested.
Great restaurant. The food was good, my husbands steak was amazing, ny strip - he loved it. I got the filet and I was a little underwhelmed. The service was great, would definitely recommend.
Amazing meal, great service, steak was perfect and seafood tower out of this world. On the louder side of the coin, so with a larger group it can be a challenge.

column3: Ok but at this price point, not good enough
column4: Pleasant staff , but 82$ for a steak Not good enough. If you like a steak full of fat and grizzle Atmosphere is good bu food is over priced . Would I return NO
Went here with a group for dinner. The steak was just ok nothing special. Service was good. I will say that the veggies were great.

After reading reviews I decided to bypass the other normals and try a new one. It sure wasn‚Äôt disappointing. The meat was cooked to perfection. The hassellblad potatoes were a serious hit. I had the drake and it was very good

column3: Delicious food in a swanky downtown place
column4: I would highly recommend RPM Steak for fine dining and special occasions. The atmosphere is elegant, service is top-notch, and above all the food is delicious. As an added bonus, you'll receive cotton candy If you are celebrating a birthday.
Amazing steaks, cooked to perfection. Nice atmosphere inside the restaurant and great service. Pricey but worth it.
My Client chose RPM and very glad they did. Service was impeccable. Food was outstanding. Cool vibe.
RPM Steak is terrific. The setting is nice, with some fairly quiet tables near the bar. The food and drinks are excellent, and so too is the service.

Excellent restaurant with an outstanding service. The food was very well prepared, I tried the Sea Bass, it was great. The wine offer is optimum as well as the restaurant atmosphere. If you are by Chicago, it is a restaurant that must be tried.

column3: Great steak, great service, and delicious chocolate cake
column4: Steak tartare, oyster mushrooms, and 14k chocolate cake are my favorite. I always enjoy dining here and at any Lettuce Entertain You restaurants!

RPM is a snazzy steak place with a nice bar, great bartenders, and really excellent steaks. Modern, subtle lighting, and definitely a buzz to it. Perfectly cooked bone-in filet mignon with a side of black truffle risotto. Excellent service!

Highly recommend for anyone looking for a very nice dinner and setting. The food was fantastic and the service was just a good. The place was nicest place I‚Äôve eaten to place and would be very interested in going back if give the chance.

Overall, very good service and great atmosphere!! Our popovers were cooked a little too much, but other than that, delicious steaks and ala carte side dishes. A nice finishing touch is the cotton candy!! We also had Baked Alaska which was awesome!!

We went to RPM early on the Friday before the theater. It‚Äôs a nice contemporary steakhouse with wonderful service. My husband had a great fillet I had fish. Both were great and our server (Barro?) was wonderful!!

Awesome meal, from start to finish. Don‚Äôt miss the Duke steak, crab was excellent, as was the risotto. Desserts were off the chart that included chocolate cake and an ice cream dish. Great place for a business meeting or dinner with family.
Great atmosphere good services, the steak and foor quality was great. I do wish the had showed special application for the birthday celebration we were having, but overall 5 or 5

It was a really pleasant surprise because I wasn‚Äôt really well dressed for the occasion.. Just feels like a great piece of steak.. and I truly was not disappointed at all.... Great service as well despite the way I was so under dressed

Chic, classy and stylish atmosphere with superb service. We ordered a couple cocktails ‚Äî Spritz & Giggles and Ten Cent Pistol at the bar and split an appetizer of tuna bruschetta‚Äîdelish! We would definitely go back!
We had a room upstairs to have our group event. The service was impeccable. Great drinks and the food was amazing. Try the popovers and the chocolate cake. Wirth it.
First time at RPM Steak. Very professional service and excellent food. I was in a private room on the mezzanine level--noise was a bit of an issue.
Great restaurant, amazing service. Make sure to order the crab appetizer and the doughnuts for dessert. Our family loved and it will be back!

RPM is everything you would expect from a quality Chicago Steakhouse. Fantastic food and service second to none. The decor has a nice mix of modern and traditional high-end dining. Yes, it‚Äôs expensive but a great choice for a special night out.
It was a birthday treat for my brother and everything was perfect! The food, the ambience, and the staff!
We had a business dinner at this place three weeks ago. I promised a good review. Kim is amazing. As you can see I kept my promise! Sea food appetizer is yummy and loabster delicious.

column3: Top notch but you'll pay for it!
column4: The service and food here is second to none however they prices reflect that. The atmosphere is cozy and romantic. The servers are polite, professional and helpful. I recommend but only for special occasions due to the price.

Great place for full service dinner with work team. Would return on my own in the future too! Great steaks and seafood selections and the baked Alaska for dessert was awesome! Great bourbon & wine selection too!
The appetizers are amazing. Meats and Seafood perfectly cooked. Dessert was excellent. Staff was friendly.
Stopped in for a couple of drink after having dinner elsewhere. The Winter Old Fashioned was fantastic.

RPM Steak is one of my faves!! Everything on the menu is delicious. I ordered the sea scallops with broccolini. Absolutely delicious. The bartender, Dion, is the best!! He makes sure you are taken care of.

column3: Classy and fun for couple outings
column4: Service and food was delicious. Great atmosphere for big parties. Service is superb but some dishes are on the pricey side.
The food wasn't fresh because it came out really quickly (like a fast food where prices were not those of a fast food ) and it caused us diarrhea

Very good restaurant with great service, try the carbonara pasta, the stake,the giant shrimp and the cheese cake. We had the feast of the seven fishes and it was good. Overall a good restaurant with good atmosphere.
Take out order was quickly filled accurately, service was professional and food was outstanding...even on a busy night.
Great steak, incredible service, fabulous wine list, tremendous sides. One of the best in chicago. Make sure to finish the evening with the gold brick cake and a rye!
Everything was delicious from the cocktails to the steak to the sides. Bread pudding dessert was excellent. They brought my husband some cotton candy for his birthday.

column3: Birthday Dinner - Great for Nut Allergies
column4: Wonderful night out. My son has a sever peanut / tree nut allergy and they made sure everything was safe for him. He actually got to enjoy dessert for once! His new favorite place! Thank you RPM!
You have to try the roasted crab, amazing - service on point and friendly, love the banquettes, the food was stellar - will be back!
Very nice and busy place,reserve in advance.the filet is amazing, a good wine selection, the ambiance is super nice. I would definitely recommend it.

column3: Great food and vibe for groups
column4: Great selection of meat and fish to satisfy everyone in a group. Leave lots of room for desserts! Very busy place.

column3: Routine Chicago steak house: hunks of meat; rather underwhelming.
column4: Like so many Chicago steak restaurants which pride themselves on great steaks, it serves perfectly acceptable steaks, but nothing out of the ordinary. The salmon was also acceptable. The wine was less so. All in all underwhelming.
A great room with ambiance and a lively atmosphere. My steak was massive and delicious. There are better steaks in Chicago but the room, again, was great, the food terrific and the service wonderful.
We enjoyed here a lot. We took the Fillet steak which was amazing. The risotto was exceptional. Great service.

Celebrated our nephew's 16th birthday here. It was a carnivore's delight. He and his friends, plus parents and grandparents, loved our big round table with pre-printed birthday menus waiting for us. Great vibe, great food.

Awesome steak, precise coordinated staff, no rush, refined deserts... they just do that extra thing that gets your attention i. The right way. Wine list is right on. This will be a staple for me in Chicago.

This is restaurant serves a great lunch menu. You won't be disappointed with the food. Based on the lunchtime menu I can't wait to visit this place for dinner. Great ambience and where else can you round of superb food with baked Alaska!

One of the top ten meals I've ever had. Steak Tartare, thick bacon and roasted crab legs are a must. Lamb chops and steaks were cooked to perfection. Carrot cake and vanilla sugar donuts finished it off
Nice drinks at the bar. Bartenders were very friendly. Some celebrity sightings. FOOD AWESOME! Service was really good, Will go again for sure!!

This place was awesome. Our server Abby was phenomenal. She made sure we got everything perfectly and her suggestions were perfect. We loved this place, there is really not a bad thing I can say it was perfect

I don't eat many steaks away from my house and my Primo grill but at the recommendation from the concierge @ Trump International we ate @ RPM. The steak was cooked to perfection and everyone took great care of us.

Just over the top! Food/service, ambience, wine....all stellar. If you want amazing food and drink done in high style format...this is the place.Steak was awesome, the sushi perfect. Great place..id visit again.

It was an extreme great experience since the entrance, warm and gentle attention, and custom recommendations besides the menu. everyone should try bison options and potato salads. Desserts, from outer space.
Chicago is a city of great steak houses and RPM Steak didn't disappoint. The baked crab starter was wonderful and my steak was worth the visit !
This restaurant had some of the best food I've had. Try the corn special, which is only available in the summer. THE BEST!

From the appetizer to the desert, RPM steaks was amazing. Everyone was extremely pleasant, helpful and friendly. The appetizer was excellent and fresh. The steaks were amazing cooked to perfection. We highly recommend the Baked Alaska it was perfect as well
Excellent assortment of appetizers. The bacon was delicious. And the dry aged rib-eye was top shelf. The 6 oz filets were reasonably priced.
Everything was unbelievable. All plates were outstanding and service was great. Highly recommended..

What you'd expect from an upscale Chop House. Perfectly prepared steaks, excellent side choices, really extensive wine list. Our expectations were met and then some. Staff was very attentive; truthfully we can't wait to go back.

Had a wonderful surprising anniversary dinner at RPM Steak. The food was so good and the staff were very courteous and attentive. I love the portion size of the steak and the overall atmosphere of the restaurant.

We love RPM Steak and try to visit several times a year! The food is amazing, the service impeccable, and they always end every meal with a unique surprise! RPM Steak is a must visit when your n CHICAGO!

If you want pulse, really nice and friendly staff, extremely good steaks, you have to go here, but it is expensive! The visit for us, was worth it, especially our waiter, he was professional and very straight forward! Really big and very nice winelist.
Everything here was absolutely amazing! I don't think you can go wrong with ordering anything. The appetizers were very appetizing. And the seafood tower was absolutely amazing. You can't go wrong.
Wonderful food and great service. Only had one night to eat out in Chicago and so glad this is where we ate!
I don't know where to start from, but this place is soooo goooood. The food was so delicious that I almost didn't wanted our dinner to finish ever:). Thank you for the great food and great service.
Had the centre cut filet and was pleased. Nice portion and cooked perfectly. Wait staff was attentive and the restaurant itself is a nice place to entertain guests. Would definitely go back.
We were a party of 4 on business. Nice selection of seafood & steaks. The filet was tender & full of flavor. The wine selection is extensive. Would highly recommend this restaurant for any occasion.

The steak was delicious. The Parkerhouse rolls melt in your mouth. The Baked Alaska and the chocolate cake with gold flecks were both to die for! Pricey but what a treat, especially for a special occasion.
Lunch with friend. Good and memorable burger with good service. Not sure why it was almost empty but enjoyed the experience
Their matured beefs and outstanding service is a must in chicago!, I have had the beef of my life, perfect cut, perfect temperature, perfect dish

Had a great meal last night. The filet was superb and the truffle butter was heavenly. All of the sides are quality and enough to share. The Caesar salad is outstanding and the fried Dounuts are a real treat.
Celebrated my mothers birthday! Atmosphere and food were amazing! All 6 of us loved our meals. Anywhere from steaks to seafood!!
The food is top notch, the service is even better. I highly recommend the millionaire potato, probably the only thing you REALLY need to order.
Incredible food, and impeccable professional service. Prices make it a place for special occasions only, but wonderful experience.

This is a top end steak house and the food was terrific. I was part of a large group of 20 and even with such a large party the service was excellent and all the food turned out wonderfully. Great place.

We had one of the most amazing dinners of all time. Absolutely amazing steaks I have to give an extra shout out to Luke for the best service and providing us with unforgettable dinning experience. RPM STEAKS ROCKS. Thanks!!!

Curious about the restaurant, we decided to visit for dessert, and we were extremely glad we did! Wall tried different items, and they were all delicious! Servers were extremely friendly yet professional. Beautiful, sophisticated interior. Well worth the time, and we look forward to returning.
Had a great night out with the lady at RPM. Luke took great care of us and even gave us a complimentary cotton candy desert. The sides here are top notch too.
We dined here for my husbands 40th birthday! It was a lovely experience and the food was amazing! We thought the cotton candy was a fun a touch to celebrate his birthday!
Nice restaurant With but tables for menu people Vegetabels meet are very well cooking and Aldo fishes The sweater:cheesecake and chocolat√© cake are delicious Service is rapid and cool
My wife said she has never had a steak this tasty. She is Irish and likes her steaks very, very, very well done. The waiter told her how she should get it and she loved it.
My whole party really enjoyed the food, from the salads to the steaks and sides. My center cut ribeye was cooked perfectly and well seasoned. Great upscale steakhouse in Chicago.

Overall a very good restaurant , if you want to eat steak. The atmosphere is very good , service is excellent. And of course the food (steak) is very well cooked. Perfect Choice!! Reservation is necessary.
Be careful what you order - everything is so good that whatever you order, you'll eat. The steaks, appetizers, and sides are all delicious. Don't think you can go wrong here!
Forget the dark environment, the noise. Rpm offers a really good piece of beef. Incredibly smooth, tasty and perfectly cooked.

Atmosphere is very upscale, perfect place for signing contracts and having a great meal. Relaxed ambiance and since we were with professional athletes, the upstairs part gave privacy while enjoying whole restaurant view.

The atmosphere was excellent and the music subdued and not obtrusive. The food was absolutely top notch. The staff were all friendly and accommodating. Probably one of the best meals I've had in Chicago.

We enjoyed our dinner for our guests birthday at RPM Steak. We started with Thick Cut Bacon, Lobster cocktail, coal roasted King crab. We ordered two of the crab unbelievable !! Filet, Cowboy steak, cauliflower. Drinks were great service was execellent.
We had stopped in for a drink and we stayed and had an appetizer, calamari which was delicious. The bartender was lovely and the service was impecable. We will return.

Great food! The atmosphere is very classy and high end. Service was very attentive & on point. Hubby & I came for dinner recommended by a friend & it didn't disappoint. The wine selection was also great!

Lunch walking down the streets of Chicago. We stopped in and it was great experience. All had some king crab salad, ceviche, power salad, cesar salad and sides of beets and corn. Great experience great ambience.
My friend and I had an excellent steak and the sides were delicious. Had the chocolate cake for dessert, it was to die for. The only disappointment was the crab cake appetizer, it was just ok.

Bill Rancic is an absolute mentor of mine (though he may not know it) so taking to RPM Steak was the highlight of my trip. The ambiance, the food, the wine, and the conversation was regal!!! Would love to visit again.
Very nice high end steak house. Food was really good and our Waiter was awesome. It's not cheap, but what is in Chicago?

column3: Great meal with special dessert treat!
column4: It's call RPM steak so you pretty much know what you're going to be eating. The salad was delicious and the steaks were done to perfection. We had cheesecake for dessert and a surprise serving of cotton candy!!

Arrived early for dinner, had to wait to be seated while staff got together. Staff was professional and efficient. Wine was well chosen. Dinner was excellent as was Guiliana's chopped salad. We were never rushed and enjoyed a very relaxing evening.

The atmosphere, service and attention to detail is superb. The knowledge of the waitress on both the food and cocktails is phenomenal. Do not miss an opportunity for lunch or dinner. The chocolate cake should come with an adult warning...it is that good.

We went to celebrate our anniversary. The drinks, food and service was all terrific. We shared a large steak entree and they were able to split it in the kitchen and cook each portion to our liking. It was absolutely delicious!
Celebrated a family birthday this weekend and RPM didn't disappoint. The service was special and personal. The steak was superb with excellent sides. The best steak house in Chicago.
First time there for lunch - great lunch offerings. The sandwiches were delicious and they had a large menu of choices and specials. Everything was done to perfection. Highly recommend

column3: Phenomenol food and a great experience
column4: The atmosphere, food and service are top notch. From the time you arrive until you leave the restaurant employees don't miss a thing. The food is top notch too.

I always enjoy RPM Steak. Upscale with a comfortable feel. I ordered the Kale and calamari and it was enjoyable. My friend ordered the Steak Frittes and the chocolate cake. She loved it. The complimentary cotton candy is a cute touch.
If you're in downtown Chicago and desire steak (personal or business), RPM Steak would be a great choice. For a high end restaurant, I'd say that the pricing is reasonable for entrees.
We were seated right away in the bar area and the waitstaff were very friendly. The food was very good and the drinks didn't disappoint.

Can't say enough the food was amazing! Chocolate cake with gold leaf, baked Alaska, shrimp that appeared to come out of Chernobyl...they were HUGE!!! And the most perfectly cooked filet!!! Oh yeah and who could forget the bowl of cotton candy...mmmm....110%recommended
Rockstar steakhouse. Movie star ambiance and beautiful presentation. Thick cut bacon was a must try. Highly recommend for a date or business dinner.
the steak was properly prepared and tasty service was good and the waiter made the proper recommendation a little pricy but woth it
Delicious food and the wait staff was very attentive. Truffle risotto was excellent! Baked Alaska was average but the meal and oysters were exceptional.
The curried Brussels sprouts, the roasted corn, the bison ribeye, the lamb chops...the old fashioned...all high quality. very impressive.
Great steak, fantastic service, no regrets only you walk out with a lighter wallet and heavier stomach! Would return and recommend if you want to splurge.

RPM sets the bar for what a dining experience should be, whether you're at the Italian or Steak house. Every dish tasted amazing, the atmosphere is lively and vibrant even on weekdays, and the service is always up to par.

column3: The Duke Ribeye.... Best steak ever!
column4: This dinner was excellent! The barrata tomato salad is a must. Then, the Duke ribeye. A flavorful cut. One of the best steaks I've ever had! Don't forget dessert.... Baked Alaska and homemade doughnuts. Yum! Great wine, great service.
Enjoyed the seafood platter. It was huge and served a number of us. Had the salmon and it was cooked perfectly. Side fries were very good as well.

We had a group of five and we shared a mix of appetizers and veggies, all of which had generous portions. The steaks were everything promised and well complimented with a great wine list. We also shared the desserts which were truly decadent.
Recommended by Langham concierge. Smart man. Ate at bar. Service superb. Simple steak frites with a Pinot then Cab. Can't beat it.
This place is amazing! Love the atmosphere and the service was top notch! Love the cotton candy at the end of the meal! The whole server staff was so accommodating too.

I had a business lunch here and you can actually have a great conversation without shouting. I know it's RPM steak, but I had seafood and it was fantastic. I will go back, a short walk from the River walk. Many restaurants in this area.

Very good service, very nice atmosphere. Steaks were good, crab appetizer was amazing and desserts were amazing. Expensive dinner but a good special occasion place and we wanted to visit a steak house in chicago.
We went here on opening night, and had a really enjoyable time. Great cocktails and even better food. Nothing I tried was mediocre, you can't go wrong!
RPM Steak is an excellent steak restaurant one in Chicago. Great foods, good service and beautiful place. If you come to Chicago that's recommend to try...üëç

column3: Pinch me, I think I'm in heaven
column4: I felt like I was in a movie. The interior was just beautiful, the people were beautiful (don't come underdressed), the service was among the best I've ever had, and the food was stupid good.

Hard to get reservations so had to snag a 5:15p reservation (which allowed us to take in a Second City show for a great Chicago experience)...Overall dinner was great from top to bottom -- service, wine, food and ambiance!
If you can only make it to one steakhouse while in Chicago, make it this one! Dinner was spectacular. The service could not have been any better and the food was simply perfect in every way.
The food at RPM steak is really good. However,bad service kills the experience. It seemed that everybody had an attitude. Definitely will not be back!

The food, decor and wait staff were great. We had the Kansas City steak and the "millionaires potato" and we would have licked the plate if we could have. The steak was cooked perfectly and the potato was amazing. Highly recommend.

Had a late night reservation, seated promptly , knowledgable staff. Had the bone in ribeye and millionaire potatoe with the bacon for appitizers which we entered up ordering a second. Drinks were reasonable price. Steak was cooked perfect. Would repeat.

For the price I thought it was rather average and so did my colleagues I believe they are capable of much more but I unfortunately will rather go to one of the other guarantees greats in Chicago. Sorry guys
Greatest meal at a restaurant I've had in years. Great atmosphere, delicious food, great waiter. Expensive but awesome.

Dined here last night for dinner. The service was great, however the price is a little over the top. Ordered the pulled steak which was the cheapest steak option on the menu (almost $50). Much prefer the rpm Italian restaurant - has a better vibe.
My husband and I had dinner here base on reviews. We really enjoyed it, had great service. Had the privilege of upstairs rail seating. Truly enjoyed our evening.

The service was outstanding in this busy Chicago steakhouse. We were seated within minutes of arriving and our waiter was very helpful and knowledgable. The Duke steaks were prepared perfectly and the venue was busy but not intimidating. I would come again.

The place is very nice designed, great music but still can chat. Appetizers are great, entrees awesome (steaks great), desserts awesome but the very best is the staff. Perfectly trained and take great care of you.
Not the best steak house I've been to, however it is pretty good. The crab appetizer was amazing! The fillet was good, but nothing special.

Appetizer, 2 entrees, 2 glasses of wine, 2 beers, 1 rum and coke. $126.00. Oy! But fabulous!!! Oysters for starters were amaze balls! Risotto with black truffles and French Dip were both incredible. Excellent service at the bar. Will return!
Perfect from start to end. Creative drink menu, stunningly tasty appetizers and succulent steaks in a modern setting coupled with outstanding service. This is great stuff.
Amazing from start to finish. Perfectly sized portions. The iceberg wedge salad was one of the best I've had. Duke steak was delicious and cooked perfectly. Highly recommended!!
Great spot for drinks or a nice dinner. Steak was very good and the service was top notch. Atmosphere was great.
I have eaten at and managed steakhouses around the world. This is one of the top 5 on my list. It is not old school..it is new wave.. and truly modern in its food and service and wines..

I highly recommend. We loved the feel and look of the bar. It was modern, and luxurious yet still cozy. Drinks were great. Wished we had stayed for dinner. It smelled amazing in there. We will go back for sure.

Had apps & drinks here with a friend recently. Plan to go back for dinner soon. The Hasselback potato is pretty much potato perfection. Hen of the woods mushrooms amazing. Great wines by the glass. Lively, trendy atmosphere. Good service.

RPM steak is phenomenal and one of the best in Chicago for steak and seafood. This restaurant is a true dinning experience and all staff are knowledgeable, friendly and experts at what they do. Great quality and value for the price.
Get the millionaire potato. To die for. Overall experience surpassed expectations. Steak, fish, Parker house rolls, salad, dessert. All were fantastic. A must if you are in Chicago.
RPM Steak was great and a must visit. The food was very good, nice atmosphere and decor and the service was terrific. I will definitely visit again.

We arrived early for our reservatio on a Saturday late afternoon. We were greeted and seated immediately. This is a beautiful restaurant, with excellent service and food. The prices are steep, but they deliver on every level! The bathrooms are gorgeous!

My wife had the steak , I had the lobster. Great service and great wine list. Cool looking place. No TVs so don't go there to watch the games... We will try the Italian version next. Don't miss the baked Alaska !!!!

We ate dinner here in early October. What an amazing experience! Everything about this restaurant was perfect. From service to the food. It wasn't cheap, but definitely worth it. If you are in town go here!
We have had the pleasure of dining here and RPM Italian. This was more of a fine dining and the meal was excellent! Super romantic!
This is more of a fine-dining restaurant compared to RPM Italian. Expect to pay a little bit more, but the food and service is well worth it.
Oh Lucy!!! Our server Lucy was great and the sommelier recommended a great bottle of champagne for our celebration. My steak was incredible! 2 thumbs up!!!
Got treated to a fine meal at RPM Steak 2 weeks ago in Chicago and their food is azimg. Top to bottom. From the apps to the cheesecake i highly recommend RPM. And PLEASE order the BACON!!

Went to the restaurant because my wife is a fan of the owners, so did not expect much - and I was truly surprised... I am very critical of steaks, but the steaks were exceptional - and the cheesecake even better.... Highly recommended

I was very impressed. The steak was absolutely perfect. The 14 ct chocolate cake was amazing. The staff was very kind and attentive. We made our reservation online so there was no waiting. Can't wait to go back!

An above average restaurant. Above average food. But with all the Hype, I was expecting something exceptional...RPM Steak...definitely wasn't anything exceptional. There are so many better choices, and soe of them just within a few blocks.
Ok I get it. You offer great food and service so you make your customers wait 25 minutes before getting seated with reservations. You could be the perfect restaurant if you didn't overbook.
Steak is prepared perfectly and has a memorable flavor...nice atmosphere and great service by the staff....bravo!
Two words go far in the place..... Miso lobster, smashed potatoes and filet minion. We absolutely loved our dinner. A little pricy but so worth the money.
Awesome food, great ambiance, great service, mushrooms sides tasty....make a reservation. Hip bar area. $$$$$$
Upscale place with lots of beautiful people. Food and service were both outstanding. Full Bar, excellent menu, and lots of fun. will definitely return to this place.
Amazing food, and a great decor. Best oysters I ever had. Chocolate cake and the loaded potato are to die for.

column3: Never knew steak could taste like this!
column4: RPM has the widest variety of steaks that I have ever seen! From the most expensive cut on the planet to an affordable 8 ou. filet mignon, they have it. And believe me it is served up with flair and a lot of attention!

Beautiful restaurant with a wonderfully eclectic and interesting menu. Fabulous service and great attention to detail. The food was outstanding. We dined in one of the private dining rooms overlooking the restaurant. First rate all the way around. Highly recommended.
We knew it would be pricy but it's comparable to most steakhouses in Chicago. Very well done steak and great customer service

From the moment you step in RPM Steak your expectations are high, and nothing dissapoints! Service, quality of offerings and decor are above expected! With so many steak houses, this place sets bar even higher!

One of my favorite dining experiences I've had in a while. Service was perfect. We had apps, wine, entrees, and dessert. Everything was amazing. Our entire group was blown away. Definitely a not to miss spot in Chicago.

The best cold plate of lobster I have ever had.The main course cod was also well cooked, nicely seasoned. The mac & cheese was ok.The bar staff was good. But the atmosphere was great overall a great place to eat & drink.

Both RPM's are fantastic! The food is unique and absolutely delicious. I would highly recommend either RPM to anyone visiting Chicago. I haven't had a bad meal yet. The prices are a little higher, but it is worth every bite! You won't be disappointed!
Had a great experience here the Sirloin and Scallops were done perfectly. The Kale salad was delicious as well as the desserts were tasty. Good service

column3: One of the newest and best
column4: We had dinner at this top-notch popular newish restaurant in a group dinner setting. The food was great and the service excellent. Not sure about the prices.

column3: Very Good Duke Steak along with great desserts
column4: Another great steak house in Chicago. Hip atmosphere and music. The food at Mastros is one step for the sides and steak but you can't go wrong with this restaurant as well.

column3: A worthy addition to the Chicago steakhouse scene
column4: My wife and I dined here last month, the 2nd week they were open. Therefore we anticipated a few hiccups due to being new and large, but overall our experience was very pleasant. The hosts greeted us warmly and we were seated on time for...More

We actually went to RPM Steak, which is still not featured on Tripadvisor. The atmosphere is great, lots of people at the bar, the decor is simple yet very elegant and the service was outstanding. Two of the steaks that my husband ordered were sold out, which was a little disappointing but the server made sure we got the best service. He recommended two other dishes for us that we're delicious. My husband had "The Duke" prime filet and I had the grilled prime skirt accompanied by fresh squash. Our cocktails were very tasty as well. We enjoyed the 14K chocolate cake, let me tell you, that was delectable! If you are looking for a place with a great atmosphere and you don't mind spending this is a great choice for a special night out.

column3: A worthy addition to the Chicago steakhouse scene
column4: My wife and I dined here last month, the 2nd week they were open. Therefore we anticipated a few hiccups due to being new and large, but overall our experience was very pleasant.  The hosts greeted us warmly and we were seated on time for our reservation. We were seated at a booth in the lounge, as opposed to the main dining room, which is just fine with us since we often dine at restaurant bars.  Our server Emily was very excited to tell us everything about the menu (again, 2nd week open), and we took her recommendations when we didn't already have a set decision. We ordered cocktails (whiskey sour is a winner) and the Parker House rolls to take the edge off our hunger. SO GOOD!  For our meal we went fairly traditional, with a wedge salad, thick-cut bacon (basically pork belly) and crispy shrimp (tempura wrapped with asparagus) for starters. All quite delicious and savory. For the main course we shared the bone-in ribeye from Slagel Farms (grass-fed all the way!) and sides of hand-cut fries, roasted trumpet mushrooms, and saut√©ed spinach. Since we were out on a "date night" in our hometown, we ordered a bit more than typical and had some leftovers for home.  We ordered the chocolate souffl√© for dessert...and since it takes some time, Emily was gracious enough to ask us midway through our main course if we wanted to get it started...good service!  The sommelier Richard helped us find a great red wine for the meal. We told him what styles we liked and he steered us to a Greek red (Xino Mavro) that was both new to us and a perfect match for the ribeye.

We actually went to RPM Steak, which is still not featured on Tripadvisor. The atmosphere is great, lots of people at the bar, the decor is simple yet very elegant and the service was outstanding. Two of the steaks that my husband ordered were sold out, which was a little disappointing but the server made sure we got the best service. He recommended two other dishes for us that we're delicious. My husband had "The Duke" prime filet and I had the grilled prime skirt accompanied by fresh squash. Our cocktails were very tasty as well. We enjoyed the 14K chocolate cake, let me tell you, that was delectable! If you are looking for a place with a great atmosphere and you don't mind spending this is a great choice for a special night out.

Amazing restaurant in the Gold Coast, they have a really good selection of crudo but nothing better than Tuna tartare, agnolotti i think was a little bland but the ribeye is really the best never I had before

We ordered a seafood pro for two people,seafood over cookedÔºå and taste salty, just butter,no other seasonal tasteÔºåkinda disapppinted,there's no wet paper wipe available when you order this kind of entreeÔºåno services at allÔºåI won't go back this restaurant anymore.

Limited take-out menu features excellent burger and tender, perfectly-done ravioli. Very good meatballs. Fries and chicken are good, jacketed roasted sweet potatoes fine (but very plain, maybe not worth the price). Delivery through 3rd party companies.

column3: The place to dine and be seen in Chicago
column4: Faultless service, great food and wine, outstanding vibe. If Al Capone was alive he would dine at Maple & Ash!

My family took me out to dinner to celebrate my 64th birthdate. We had a wonderful meal as we always do at this restaurant. We had steaks, Salmon, mushrooms and Mac and Cheese. Everything was just wonderful, and we will return.

Fantastic experience, great food, service and ambience. High quality and very tasty food complemented by wonderful and attentive service by Lauren and overall a very enjoyable experience. We found it was the best ‚Äúwow‚Äù meal of our whole trip through NYC and Montr√©al and Chicago.
Excellent Service and food. Really loved the contemporary ambiance and will return. The drinks were great & the entire party was pleased with our choice.

column3: This is what dining should be ...
column4: This is what dining should be ... beautiful restaurant, brilliant service, fabulous buzz, and importantly, sensational food. If you are in Chicago, do not miss this place.

This is an exceptional place with a transforming environment. The server was extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Definitely a must in Chicago. If you are trying to impress a client or your significant other, go here.
From them moment you walk in you are greeted with beautiful chandeliers. This place is top notch from the service to the food and drinks. Absolutely stunning!

This restaurant is first class in every aspect. From the complimentary cocktail to the appetizers to the main course to dessert. The service was excellent with knowledgeable waitstaff and professional bartenders.
They are famous for their steaks, but seafood tower was fantastic. The service was excellent.I was with a group and we all ordered different cuts of steak, each of us loved our food!
Really exceptional bar and restaurant - service was excellent and food and wine were truly Devine Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Chicago

We enjoyed a Birthday dinner here. Everything was nice, the service extremely attentive. The food was great too. Very lively place. A touch too loud but it comes with being extremely busy. We will definietly eat here again.

Food was excellent but we felt rushed. Also, the wine recommendation that we accepted seemed only to meet our price point (under 300) but not any of the qualities we requested in the wine. Very disappointed in the 250 bottle when
Everything was great, from our greet,to our food,to our drinks and our server was very pleasent and informative
This was one of our best dinning experiences in the 10 years I‚Äôve known my wife! Great atmosphere, service and food. Highly recommended
We enjoyed an amazing brunch with friends on a Sunday. The pancakes and omelette were some of the best I‚Äôve ever had. Be prepared to pay for the excellence.
Love this restaurant. Stylish and service is impeccable. I have been 3 times now and make sure every time i am in town to go here.

column3: Good food, generous portions, hip, overpriced and rushed
column4: Went on a Thursday afternoon. The food and ambiance was good. Hip place. Generous portions. Definitely overpriced and thought the servers were trying to rotate the tables too fast for this price tag of restaurant. $300+ in less than 50 minutes.
Fantastic food, service and experience. Highly recommend for a night out with friends or a partner. Food is excellent and the place is awesome.
Celebrated my 30th birthday here and it was absolutely lovely! The experience was awesome - wonderful ambiance, super friendly staff and fantastic food. Highly recommend!
Amazing party scene and food at this restaurant. Wine list was awesome and the music playing in the background was loud but not too loud where it ruined conversations. Would recommend.

My wife and I had anniversary dinner here. My aged Wagyu strip was superlative. My wife had the halibut which was great. Service is outstanding. Can be noisy but we had a corner table which was perfect. Expensive but worth it
Good: excellent food including steak and mashed potato. Very tasty old fashioned cocktail. Staff is friendly. Bad: you have to take elevator to different floor to go to bathroom.
This place has the most amazing steak! The Dry aged bone in ribeye was absolutely marvelous. This place is defiantly in my top 5 places for steak. If you are in Chicago, go order a dry aged steak.

Dan was waiter for us at this establishment. It is a great place to eat. Be prepared that its very busy. All food is cooked over open flame as the namesake means. Huge wine list. And the best waiter in the entire city. Go Cubs!

Pricy but food is good. Lunch only serve in the 8 BAR though was told the same food and price. The burrata is really good, charcoal bread, tomatoes are so sweet. Bone in fillet is yummy and the potatoes were super.
Everything was top notch. Quality, flavor, but I give one less star than five as food was a bit tepid. Still good, just tepid. I also thought the candleabras were a nice touch.
If you have the opportunity to enjoy this place please do not miss it!!! Outstanding ambience, exquisite food, great service. 5 stars restaurant.

column3: A wee bit dear but worth it.
column4: On the upper end of affordability for most but service and food were excellent. Fois gras was excellent. Draft beer would have made the night a touch better. Good job overall and a nice (but noisy) space.
Excellent venue, service and food. We had a table of nine early evening and a I would recommend going here.
Went there with 12 friends and the staff was fantastic. The place has a great atmosphere, and it is spaced out well to interact and have conversations.
Supercool atmosphere , perfect service and fabulous food! Will absolutely come back again when in Chicago. Thanks!
Great setting, full bar with good vibe, meat is good, sides are not exciting but fulfilling. Fun atmosphere. Could be family, date or friends gathering place.

We had a group of 8 for brunch. Restauarant ambience is amazing. Our table was cozy. They go over the top to recognize birthdays. The wait staff, to a person, were incredible. The food was delicious. Will definitely be going back.

column3: Perfect mix of ambience and food!
column4: We went with another couple and had our kids join us. Very different feel than most Chicago steakhouses, candle lit tables with candelabra‚Äôs were a nice touch Food was excellent, both the fish and steaks. Recommend the bananas foster for dessert.
The brunch here is lovely. The eggs were cooked to perfection (not overdone), the salad station was excellent and the rest was just sublime. I would love to come back here for dinner.
This place is absolutely amazing, if you are in downtown Chicago, it‚Äôs a must!!! Thank you Raylene (General Manager) for an incredible experience !!!! Best food in town!!!
Great dinner. Complimentary cocktail and salads Complimented our dinner choices. The strawberry shortcake put it over the top!

column3: Place is the BOMB! Love it!
column4: This is one of top restaurants in chicago in my opinion. Great ambiance, service and the food is unreal. I had bone in Ribeye that was a perfect 10/10. My gf had the Halibut which was amazing. Highly recommend

column3: The Meatballs are to Die For!
column4: Great ambiance, delicious wine and the food was outstanding! The meatball appetizer was amazing. I will definitely go back!

column3: Glamorous Romantic Speakeasy type wine and steak bar.
column4: Love the romantic candlelit ambiance of this hidden jewel box restaurant. Exquisite wines, cocktails & steak. This is the perfect romantic date night or special event location while in the windy city.

If you are in Chicago then you must visit Maple & Ash. The appetizers are great and the loaded baked potatoes are out of this world. The steaks were cooked to perfection. Our server Arturo was outstanding and made the evening flawless.

We had reserved a table for 8.00 pm but had to wait over an hour for our table, alongside many others. The maitre D was most attentive however and compensated us for the wait. Food is excellent and worth the wait.

Girls trip landed us in this beautiful, fun, contemporary restaurant. We ordered champagne and many decadent items including caviar, foie gras and king crab. We had a wonderful meal and our server could not have been more accommodating. Great evening!!

column3: Great steak, great wine, great service
column4: Really enjoyed their French onion soup and a wagyu filet ... Great wine selection too and found a perfect one For this price range I think this is one of the better ones .. as opposed to some expensive chains which lack a certain something

This place is incredible! The agnolotti is the most over top. Great people! David Prainito the Maitre D‚Äô is so welcoming and nothing short of a pro. The halibut was incredible as was the steak. Check this place out!

My wife, or toddler, infant, and myself enjoyed an amazing Mother's Day Sunday brunch at Maple & Ash! The food and staff were superb, especially Mel in reservations and our fantastic server, Walker! We will definitely be back soon!

column3: A great place for a great night out
column4: Gorgeous restaurant with excellent food, ambience and service. They know how to make a proper cocktail. Went for a special dinner, followed all the recommendations from the server and was not disappointed.

I go for the brunch- which is amazing. But I've also been for dinner and was just as impressed. The food is rich but tasty. The atmosphere and ambiance are everything here! Richie and Matt are doing a great job!
Stopped at Maple & Ash for brunch. This is with out a doubt the best brunch I've ever been to. From the service to the food it was exceptional.

column3: One if the best meals EVER
column4: This was an awesome experience! All of it, the ambiance was elegant, the food perfectly cooked and very flavorful, the cocktails just right, and the service exquisite. Worth the price!

Brunch on Easter Sunday didn‚Äôt have that many option, but it has enough, salads, omelettes, pancakes, fillet, pork , salmon and desert, what else could you ask for? and everything was excellent, tasty and perfectly cooked. And the service, excellent.

Maple and Ash is a five minute walk from Thompson Chicago - which is how we found this gem of a restaurant. The oysters and steak frites are phenomenal. Drinks: Ma'am I Am Tonight (delivered in a Gatsby style glass, with a flower - WOW)!
Russell our server was excellent! Thank you for a great dinner and a great service. We will be back..

I brought my girlfriend to maple and ash and had a wonderful experience! My old fashion was made perfectly by the bartender and our server, Vivian, was the awesome! She was attentive and friendly and the food was to die for!

The ambience, food and cocktails and staff were just incredible. Absolutely loved the "surprise" shots, Purgatory eggs, Beef butter, and Chocolate chip-blueberry custom pancakes! Oh and the crispy potatoes are unbelievable! David Prainito made us feel so welcome and special! Can't wait to go back!
Service was really attentive here. This was a great place to share lots of interesting things with friends.
This place was fantastic! It was very funky and loud but the food and service was over the top!! Our flight was delayed, we called and they held the res, Absolutely fantastic!!!!

The restaurant was elegant yet very comfortable. Our waitstaff was excellent and took the time to get to know us, especially the Mattre D. Our dinners and dessert were as delicious as promised. A great place to have dinner in the city.
Maple & Ash has great food, a beautiful clientele, great energy, a great location, marvelous management and wait staff and great d√©cor. I highly recommend it.
Food was phenomenal. Although it might seem pricey, portions are huge. Service was very attentive. A real neighborhood gem!

Easily wins my title of best steakhouse in the city. Ordered a bone-in 60-day aged ribeye with the beefed up butter sauce and the angolloti (ravioli style) pasta. My favorite place for both dinner and brunch!!
We where a group of nine -- we had the "Don't give a f*ck" tasting menu! It was really fun -- way too much food -- but the quality was amazing. We really enjoyed our server

Can't say enough about how fantastic our experience was at Maple and Ash. First rate food, elegant atmosphere, creative presentation and service was a 10. We had Gordon as our maitre d and he was right on top of everything. Top notch experience. .
Wonderful food, excellent professional wait staff beautiful dining area. Everyone enjoyed all that was ordered.....lots of seafood. Great salads.
Love the decor of this classic steak house. The bar is a great place for a pre dinner drink. Every thing was cooked to perfection. Service was outstanding.
Fun atmosphere and food was delicious. Especially seafood dish included in the tasting menu experience. A little disappointed with ice cream for.dessert but even that was delicious.

column3: If M&A doesn't get a Michelin Star I'll eat my hat
column4: Several of the items we had there were simply the best thing I ever ate. The service and menu are completely off the hook. I live here and love many other places in town, but this is on a different parallel universe.
Maple and Ash lives up to the hype. Extensive wine list, excellent wood fired seafood, and The Chocolate bomb was the bomb. Pricey but it is worth every penny.

Off of rush st, the restaurant is very hip, great vibe, exciting, it is loud, but very fun. Food was delicious, steaks perfect and fish great. Service was outstanding, would definitely go back. Menu has something for everyone.
The restaurant is absolutely amazing. However, they also have a terrific lounge to relax in if you just want to have drinks.
Elegant restaurant, professional service, excellent food and unforgettable atmosphere. This place must be visited in Chicago

column3: Cool place to eat and enjoy company
column4: Went for in-laws' birthday. Expensive, but expected given the setting and locale. Dishes were excellent, and despite the price, would consider making it 'the' place to go for special occasions. Waitstaff was extremely helpful.
We had a great time eating at the bar upstairs. Brent, our bartender was terrific. Dinner was delicious. I highly recommend this restaurant.

This place will blow your mind! Everything is a little piece of heaven in your mouth, perfectly seasoned, prepared and presented so beautifully on the dish. Don't miss the melting chocolate dessert. One of the best meals I've ever had- thank you!

Waiter was knowledge with recommendations, attentive, friendly and just helped make the night fun. Everything from bread to wine was delicious. Fun music. Reservation at 9:45 and the night was just getting started there. Great for a Friday.
Best filet I've ever had!!!! Dario was awesome!!great service and knowledge about what to eat! Thank you!!
A very exquisite restaurant with well trained staff, fabulous food and an unbelievable ambiance. Had some of the best steaks ever tried, an extensive wine menu and overall great experience.
This place is amazing. They where always asking use on how are we doing vary nice waiters. The food was fenamenol rating of the food 0 out of 10 I give it a 15

column3: Mouth watering food with a fitting bill.
column4: What an amazing food... You even get a 'free' alcoholic cocktail each in beginning of your dinner. The food is stunning, but its definitely not cheap... expect to leave at least 100$ each for a dinner with mid tier selections, avoiding aged steaks.
My wife and I visited Maple and Ash with two other couples. I highly recommend this restaurant as the food and service were fantastic. A bit pricey but well worth it.
First class steak house with great vibe and food. On the second floor. Good fish, beef and pork. Save room for the banana cream pie which is not overly filling.

column3: Fun evening, great food, great staff!
column4: An evening shared with friends began at this restaurant. Our waiter was very attentive and explained the specials, and was happy to explain about the rest of the menu. Food was excellent, we stayed longer than we had planned because of the atmosphere. Recommended!

Maple & Ash is awesome. Upscale fine dining at its best. The seafood appetizer tower rocks. The BC Oysters were fantastic. Then came the bone-in ribeye that was cooked to perfection. The waitstaff is on point. A must visit when in Chicago. Highly recommend.

Mastro's is my favorite steak restaurant in Chicago. The steaks are cooked perfectly each time and taste great. The sides are large enough to share and also very good. You have to get the Butter cake as a dessert - it is amazing!

column3: Great atmosphere in a great city.
column4: Enjoyed Chicago last weekend especially Mastros . It was pricey the music was great really enjoyed my steak . Service was good .My wife and I go to the one in Ft Lauderdale to watch the Boat parade. Definitely try it!!
Went with a large group. Exceptional service. Food was terrific. Seafood tower all very fresh. New York Strip Steak was tender and full of flavor.

Interesting menu for carnivore, steak wasabi starter amazing. Based on this I was excited for main but steak was average at best. Not shocking but not as good as 30 dollar steak yesterday that was half the price. Still red wine was great.

I found the food to be excellent and the service, from the bar to the waitstaff to be outstanding. For the price of the items on the menu I had very high expectations for the food and it did not disappoint me.

We will make Mastro‚Äôs a regular stop. Many thanks to Mastro ‚Äòs for making our anniversary so special. Our waiter, Kyle, was well informed and so helpful with the wines and the meal. Great food, the bone in filet was perfect.
It was an amazing experience. Food was excellent. It is pricey but the portions are large and filling.
Hits the high notes on all the classics. With a hat tip to the modern. A must stop On any trip to Chicago.
Our anniversary. Big one 30 years. Everything was perfect. Pork chop excellent. Waiter was friendly and informative. Live entertainment was not overwhelming. You could still converse quietly.
A bit less fancy than some of the big names, Mastro's serve excellent meat and acceptable service. Recommendation!
Wonderful wine, superb salad, stupendous steak and delicious deserts!! Need I say more? Porterhouse here was worth the visit.

The food here is always so good - consistently so delicious. The lobster bisque is second to none. The steaks are always a 10/10. Can‚Äôt go wrong with any of the sides and the cocktails are always worth having 2! Love this place!!
This restaurant is high end , furniture classic, not very personal style. Service is accurate. Steak excellent. French fries too. Prices on the high level, about 100 usd for 2 courses.
good food....wonderful service.....appetizers were enough of a meal, when your grandchildren try everything offered.

column3: Very good for a large business group
column4: It is not just a steakhouse, although they have an excellent steak selection. You should start with the seafood tower, that you select and set up. The bread and pretzel rolls with butter might be the tastiest thing of all. It's very expensive.

From the service to the food I find Mastro‚Äôs steakhouse one of the best. My wife loves the 22ounce bone in ribeye and I think the double cut pork chop is amazing. Don‚Äôt expect ‚ÄúDenny‚Äôs‚Äù prices; but, the value for the cost is great.

Can I just say ‚ÄúAmazing‚Äù. Best way to sum up my family dinner. From the drinks to apps to Steaks. The nite was in every word perfect. The staff was extremely attentive and every food item was prepared to perfection

Sat at the piano bar before dinner. Enjoyed a cocktail with a great trio who played fabulous music üéº. Moved to dinner, had a lovely steak, salad, sides and bottle of wine. Very upbeat, stylish crowd, wait staff impeccable!! Worth the money!

Steak perfectly prepared and flavorful; sides good; warm butter cake very good. I think I prefer Maple & Ash slightly more as a Chicago steakhouse (steak & sides & atmosphere slightly better), but Mastro‚Äôs is excellent too ‚Äî especially if you want cake.

We had a large group for our business dinner and celebration. Wonderful seafood appetizers , soup, steaks etc ........... with such a large group I heard nothing but compliments on the food and service.

I know craft beer has become pricey as of late, but $20 for a 12 oz bottle. Should have been 1/2 that. $62 for a dry, over done rib eye? This place is a prime example of "you don't always get what you pay for".

The food was excellent with perfect accompaniment that complimented each dish. The Server was very knowledgeable with all the preparations and accommodated special requests without question. We enjoyed the variety of meats and fish. The appetizers were delicious.

column3: When God said "Let There Be Steak" this place appeared
column4: As good as any steakhouse I've ever been to. Great service, great food, great atmosphere. If you're visiting Chicago and want a steak, see if the concierge at your hotel has a relationship with this place and see if they can get you a table.

There are no words to describe how great this restaurant is! The bartender makes incredible drinks, the entertainment in the bar was fantastic and the food is phenomenal. Definitely a must go to place.

The carcass is rotted for an extra 29 days. The Mac and cheese is tasty. The wine and drinks are mega bucks. The butter cake is worth the visit. However a hot fudge sundae would give the same ecstasy. They do love dry ice.
Mastro‚Äôs is one of my fave restaurants. I love the butter cake like most people. The tuna tostada is a must! I love the salads as well.
Superb steak, sides and dessert. Service also very good, but they ran out of our favorite Miller Brewing products at the Phoenix restaurant.

column3: Excellent melt in your mouth filet
column4: Excellent service and ambiance. The staff was wonderful and attentive. The food was excellent and paired nicely with suggested wines. You will not be disappointed

I've experienced Mastro's in Vegas and in Beverly Hills and Chicago did not disappoint! These guys have quality and service mastered for sure. I've never had a disappointing meal at any of their locations and there's a reason I keep going back!
Had a dinner here and our service was fanstastic! I can‚Äôt say enough nice things about our waiter, Matt! If you have a special event eat here and ask for Matt!!!

This steakhouse is in the class of exceptional steakhouses that I have been to in the United States. If you want exceptional food, especially steaks, and service, try this place out. It's not cheap, but it's worth the experience.

What a great place to go for dinner. Had a fabulous time here, great food and appetizers. The bone in ribeye was delicious. Highly recommend going here for dinner out on business or with friends. We will return!!

good location, but we had to wait for a table for quite a long time without hearing anything back from the host. Food was okay, but my steak was undercooked and I felt a little sickly when I got home.

The steaks here are excellent. If they were not this place would not make it in Chicago for very long. What I like here is the live music. The great and lively bar. And the amazing butter cake desert.

Atmosphere was very good but music was too loud. Service was excellent, was disappointed with the $58 dollar ribeye steak. My wife had the filet and she very pleased with it, the butter cake was great.

Food and service was excellent! Atmosphere left a little to be desired. Music was way to loud and the room was so dark I could not even read the menu. Cocktails were very week and should be avoided. Wine selection was excellent.

column3: You get what you pay for!
column4: If you pick that one restaurant to go out and splurge a little pick this one . The service , live music and food will get us back there the next time we are in town. We thoroughly enjoyed our evening and went home stuffed.
Just also ate at the Vegas and Scottdale locations....all fabulous, consistent and Hot Spots!! Delicious steaks and mushrooms. Wonderful decor , great bar.
I really enjoyed my experience here! The steak was mouth wateringly perfect, the drinks on dry ice were delicious, everything was wonderful! Probably the best steakhouse I have ever eaten at!

Great place to celebrate a special day. Many steaks to choose from; our group chose 6 and 8 ounce filets. All cooked perfectly. The sides are ordered separately and ment to be shared. Each side is ample for 2 otherwise it's a generous taste for...More

Many steakhouses to choose from in Chicago but thought we would try this one....heard wonderful things about it. The food and service were incredible and the restaurant had a great vibe. We sat upstairs but downstairs had a great bar and live music! What really clinched my vote was that the restaurant called to THANK US a day after for eating there!!!  Great all around experience!

My husband and I went to Mastro's on our recent trip to Chicago. I chose Mastro's to celebrate his birthday. We really enjoyed the food and ambiance. We had reservations for the dining room and arrive early to grab a drink at the bar. They had a band playing and the entertainment was great! We decided to forgo the main dining room and instead had dinner in the bar area so we could listen to the music. Highly recommend this spot for a date night.

We just had dinner here and I just love how I was immediately greeted by the hostess. The restaurant is nicely designed and dimly lit. The food was really well prepared and our waitress was ok.  I would recommend this restaurant for couples, parties or even your family. It's moderately priced, but the food is worth the cost.

We were taking a quick trip to Chicago to see our daughter who was visiting her boyfriend over her break from med school. We were celebrating her making the Deans honour list and her upcoming birthday. Mastros was recommended to us by my husbands cousin who had her wedding there. It did not disappoint. My husband had the lobster cocktail for an appetizer and it was spectacular!! I had the Heirloom tomato and burrata and it was delicious. My daughter and her boyfriend loved the Caesar salad. For entrees my husband and I shared.....it was actually suggested to share a Waygu steak!!!! Omg it was unbelievable and there was a good portion for take home. We shared a warm butter cake and it was amazing as well. My daughter is gluten free due to an allergy and had no issues ordering at all. This may become our favorite restaurant when visiting our daughter while she does her Chicago clinicals!! Can't wait for a do over!!

column3: Wow. LOVE this place. A standard favorite for high quality food
column4: This place is not inexpensive, but the service is great, the food is outstanding, and the bar/lounge has great live music. I have enjoyed every visit here and usually go early dinner hour and share appetizers with friends. It's a great gathering spot for professionals - you just simply can't go wrong here...
I really enjoyed my experience here! The steak was mouth wateringly perfect, the drinks on dry ice were delicious, everything was wonderful! Probably the best steakhouse I have ever eaten at!

We ate here for dinner with family and friends. As usual, it did not disappoint. Their elderflower martini is unique and delicious. The ahi tuna tartare and beef carpaccio are amazing. The ribeye steak mouthwatering. The sides are always delicious- the mac and cheese being a family favorite.

column3: Best list of appetizers I've seen
column4: My first recollection of Mastro's Steakhouse was when the waiter placed my entree in front of me. It was a fish. A big fish. The whole fish. Head, tail, fins, eyes and all. Not very appetizing. Speaking of appetizers, I've always thought that the mark of a good restaurant was the quality of its appetizers. If that's so, Mastro's is a winner. The list of appetizers includes shrimp cocktail, lobster cocktail, caviar, Oysters Rockefeller, smoked salmon, crab cakes, Oysters on the Half Shell, Steak Sashimi, Dungeness Crab Cocktail, Alaskan Red King Crab Claws and sauteed sea scallops. As it turns out, the rest of the menu is outstanding, too. We started with shrimp cocktail and lobster bisque. For entrees, we had Scottish salmon and creamed spinach and a 16-ounce New York strip with a twice-backed potato. For dessert, we shared an order of profiteroles, a favorite of ours that rarely is found on menus. Located at 520 North Dearborn in downtown Chicago, Mastro's is an outpost of the Arizona-based chain that has locations in Arizona, California, Nevada, New York, Massachusetts and Washington, D.C. The whole fish notwithstanding, what other menu features grilled swordfish, Maine lobster, bone-in Kansas City strip, double cut porterhouse, veal chop, rack of lamb and pecan pie a la mode? Not to mention all those delicious appetizers.

We went to Mastro's last night to celebrate my birthday, we go there frequently to celebrate special occasions. The reason being is it's a very special place. We know it's pricy and we're not on an expense account, we're talking about a special occasion! In a city awash with steak emporiums few match up with Mastro's for an overall Chicago Steakhouse experience. Unapologetically masculine with simple elegant decor. The friendly greeting at the front door, attentive efficient and unobtrusive waitstaff is outdone by the excellent cocktails appetizers and entrees. Seafood, poultry, Chops and of course excellent steak prepared as you wish. Take your time, enjoy their massive cocktails or select something from the extensive wine list, maybe order the Seafood Tower, perhaps sushi, ahi tuna seared to perfection or their superb onion soup to start your evening. Make no mistake this is a steak lovers Paradise as much or as little as you desire, grilled the way you love it. Don't forget the sides, large enough to share, maybe Lobster mashed potatoes, how could you go wrong. By all means linger and savor every morsel. No meal is complete without dessert, their pecan pie is to die for, maybe some coffee or tea, perhaps a vintage port. Whatever you want, this is your time. And this is the special place to spoil you. So stop waiting, call, make a reservation, live a little, hell, live a lot!
Good food, love the seafood dishes, ambiance is great in the piano bar and always excellent service - cocktails are great too
The atmosphere was inviting, though busy. The service was friendly. And the food was extra yummy and a great value. We will definitely be returning.
Fabulous service, 4 stars plus The food is amazing, atmosphere perfect Sometimes there aren't enough words for the wonderful flavor of food Omar our waiter, he's the best
We have been to Mastro's several times and they have never failed to deliver! The meal always needs to be topped off with the Butter Cake; which is awesome!
We love coming here for date night. Our favorite is the steak and lobster mashed potatoes :) Don't be afraid of the $20 cocktails - they're worth it!

column3: Best seafood & teak experience this year
column4: We went as a group of ~20 and had a private room. Absolutely superb, great seafood starters, large varity of steaks, excellent service, good wine selection. Quite expensive overall but well worth it with special guests.

Amazing service, food, and drinks! More on the expensive side but a great atmosphere for dining. The live music in the bar area is great for waiting for your table or enjoying a cocktail before or after dinner!
We had a group of about 50 for a private dinner of business associates. We selected our entree prior and my steak was great.I would certainly recommend this place and will be back.
I liked Mastro's very much, and would happily return. The food and drinks were good, and so too was the setting. Service was quite good also.

What an amazing treat! Superb service, fabulous cocktails and the BEST caesar salad I have ever had...and I have salads daily. Salmon was out of this world. My hubby's bone in filet was incredible (he reports). Would go nightly if wallet could keep upüòÉ

column3: Great Steakhouse in the Near North
column4: Very busy bar with loud music connected to the dining room. Remember dress code for dining room to be seated. Reservations Mandatory on weekends. Great steaks and Drinks. Lots of fun. Very expensive. Great location near north Chicago .
Had a businnes dinner. Food and service was excellent. Would recommend to family and friends for dinner.
A jewel in Downtown Chicago, this is a fabulous night out. Food is always top drawer as is the service. There is entertainment in the bar every night.

6 or seven of us ate here and the quality of the food was just so impressive. We enjoyed the appetisers and main entrees. Steak was done exactly as requested. But the desserts were fantastic. Pricey though.
Had a fantastic steak tonight. The waitress was very helpful finding a good wine pairing with a great steak suggestion.
I was a bit disappointed that our group sat in the dining room as the bar seemed to be where the action was! Food was fantastic as was the service. Quite pricy, though.

Service and food was absolutely great. Only thing I didn't care for too much was where we were seated. Since it was only the two of us we had to sit at a very cramped little table by the entrance of the dining room.
High end steak house. Great service but come prepared to pay. Our dinner for three was over $250 a person and we did not get too crazy on wine

We went here for dinner one night. The atmosphere was great! We sat in the bar area. They had live music, the food was great and the drinks were great! Highly recommend checking this place out if you are looking for a great steakhouse!
My husband and I have tried many of the popular steakhouses in Chicago and we keep coming back to Mastro's, which we believe is the best. The service is good and the food is excellent.
Great place for a light dinner while on business. The bar is always lively and great entertainment. Excellent Martini's!
Quite a noisy restaurant but the food has always been quite good. Always have a shrimp cocktail with the heavy hand on the horseradish I the cocktail sauce

Wonderful atmosphere, great entertainment, worthy portions. AND very expensive but you do get your money's worth. I ordered the BEST lamb Chops I have ever had. Substantial in size and outstanding in presentation.
One of the best steak houses. Very nice and upscale. Service was great as was the waite staff. Our second visit and would recommend to anyone who loves a good steak. Went with family and friends.?

Mstro's is such a unique restaurant with atmosphere and awesome food. I loved being able to go into the lounge after a wonderful and enjoyable dinner for after drinks and great music. The staff was very attentive and accommodating.
Don't miss this spot. Classy and fulfilling. Can't beat Chicago steak houses period but the fillet I had was UNBELIEVABLE and cooked to perfection! Thank you for a great meal and awesome wine.

Although a bit over priced, we had a good experience with top quality steaks and sides with some interesting twists and excellent presentation. The bar is lively, has music and the better dining area if you want a fun experience

High end fine-dining lives up to its hype... The selection of at least 25 different Scotch labels is indicative. The bone-marrow appetizer is amazing and the steaks - all 28 days aged - were incredible. Pricey, but definitely worth it...
Had a dinner at this restaurant with a huge group, we took up the whole place. The food was outstanding and amazing. Service was excellent. Thank you for a great evening.

Marco was our waiter and it was my youngest sister's 21st birthday. He was amazing and awesome at the same time. he did a great job serving us for her big day! I totally recommend this restaurant and ask for Marco!

column3: Love the atmosphere - a special evening destination
column4: The food was all excellent and the portions ample. We had 2 wait persons. It was a nice high end steak and seafood experience

We were there for my buddy's bachelors party. Service was decent, nothing phenomenal. But overall the most I have to say about this place is the food is overpriced for what it's worth. The wines were great though!

Great service, Great food. The steaks were so juicy and delicious. If you want steak and price isn't an issue this is a really good place. Everyone is very helpful. The waitstaff is always around you and helping you.
By far, one pf the best steaks I have had. The 18oz bone in was just amazing. They also had live music, which was great. Service was outstanding.
World class steak, service and ambiance. Truly a great experience that I will remember for a long time- how could anyone eat a 48oz steak?
I cannot say enough good things about Mastro's. From the excellent food to the first class service, this place is just amazing.
good service to get you started , felt left alone after that. rib steak had too much gristle for a $60 steak should have been perfect. sides are adequate, salads small, and overpriced
Great decor. We were seated promptly and provided water and menus, but then left for almost 20 minutes. It was a full house, with it, it was extremely loud. Our waiter was no where around so we left.
Steak was perfect. Be careful starter portions especially the saut√©ed scallops can be quite big (lovely though) Staff very friendly

For the expensive price tag at the end I expected more leading up to the bill. Steaks were good but not great. Too many other fine dining choices in River North area. Not unhappy I went but do not anticipate a return visit.

The food here was good, but very overpriced for what we received. Your more popular steakhouses in Chicago can probably provide better food, for the same price. (And $25 for a chicken salad is ridiculous no matter where you're eating!)
