I'm not a dessert guy, but one in our party had a birthday and I was assured that everyone was in love with the bread pudding-type finale! Wish I would've tried the key lime pie but was sated and satisfied.  Spend the money. Go there on a special occasion. Impress a client. Make it Mastro's.
We picked up a Mother‚Äôs Day meal during the Covid-19 pandemic- and it was great! Warming directions were included. It made for a very memorable Mother‚Äôs Day during difficult circumstances.

Attentive service with a varied American food menu. Lots of choices. An excellent wine selection. Attractive interior. This restaurant seems to continue to improve during the past few years. I just wish the steaks were a little higher quality. Not inexpensive.

We had an unbelievable evening. Our waiter, Scott was so attentive. We had a special decorated table for our anniversary. A thank you note, champagne toast and anniversary dessert. The entire evening was perfect.
Never been much of a fan. Food is good but I'm not crazy about the ala cart menu. Ambiance is great of course but location is by Northwestern Hospital and parking sux!
Extensive menu, good food (though not inexpensive), very attentive service. A quiet place, where you can actually hold a conversation with your companion(s).
Tasty food, great ambiance, friendly staff. Good wine list. Didn't need reservation. It was my nephew's birthday and we had a lovely night.
Food was exceptional and is always consistent. Have never had a bad meal here. Service was outstanding. Dirty martini was delish. A def come back for a great meal

Went with my husband to Capital Grille for my birthday. Steak was perfect. Food and service both very excellent. Of course it is pricey, but a nice night out. Oakbrook location has plenty of free parking and easy access.

Had a great experience at the Capital Grille I'm a New York strip fan it's prepared excellent medium well with mashed potatoes and vegetables the Ambiance was great overall good experience can't wait for my next visit
The Capital Grille is to die for the Steaks are so tender and so tasty we had a great dinner and Gordon was very friendly and polite and gave us good service
Nice restaurant to celebrate any kind of anniversary. They treat you very well. And food is awesome.

column3: Nice steak restaurant, good ambience, more formal than relaxed
column4: Visited here with my Mrs whilst in Chicago and it was good. Waiter was superb and service all night couldn‚Äôt be faulted. The steak, the sides (truffle chips) were outstanding and they had a St Emillion Grand Cru on as a house wine which was...More

column3: Thanksgiving dinner‚Äî great meal, but know before you go
column4: We had a fantastic thanksgiving meal ‚Äî traditional turkey and fixings ‚Äî all was great and we left stuffed. It came on a plate to the table ‚Äî no buffet! You could also order from the regular menu. They had great wine as well. I think this was just because of thanksgiving because people lingered from what they said... but we weren‚Äôt seated until half an hour past our reservation time ‚Äî so with arriving early we waited over forty minutes. The bar was packed but about half that time we were able to sit down. The staff was all wonderful and took care of us well... so while normally that would be a poor rating I can‚Äôt downgrade their rating. If you go on Thanksgiving you might want to reserve on the early side or go earlier in the day before they back up... or just know it may be a slower experience... but I would definitely go there again for Thanksgiving if we where are in town again for Thanksgiving!

All in all it was a nice experience. The service was great and there was no pressure. We were in town for my wife's birthday and thought wed check it out. We both got seafood with lobster/crab cakes for an appetizer. The crab cakes were great however, the entrees fell short of our expectations. We will visit again, next time we will order something other than seafood.

column3: Great example of the upscale steak chain
column4: We visited here for dinner whilst in Chicago, having had good experience at the same chain in Washington DC.  The food is well sourced and fresh, including great steaks, fish and seafood choices. We chose a tuna tartare sharer, wagyu 22oz tomahawk steak to share.  The tuna was silky and tender, the steak cooked to perfection and the sides of creamy mash and green beans also good.  We ended the meal with signature desserts of coconut cream pie and cheesecake, these did not disappoint.  Wine list is extensive and we chose a good Californian cabernet sauvignon.  Our server Ralph was helpful and friendly. We recommend and will return.

Went with my husband to Capital Grille for my birthday. Steak was perfect. Food and service both very excellent. Of course it is pricey, but a nice night out. Oakbrook location has plenty of free parking and easy access.

Had a great experience at the Capital Grille I'm a New York strip fan it's prepared excellent medium well with mashed potatoes and vegetables the Ambiance was great overall good experience can't wait for my next visit
The Capital Grille is to die for the Steaks are so tender and so tasty we had a great dinner and Gordon was very friendly and polite and gave us good service

We love Capital Grille and this one meets or exceeds the high standard. Service was incredible. Up there with the best service we have experienced. The drinks were excellent as was the food. The butternut Squash soup was incredible. The Lamb Chops equally great as were the steaks the rest of our group had. All cooked perfectly as requested. 5 stars all around.

column3: Great service on a special occasion.
column4: From the moment we walked in the door the staff was courteous, attentive and eager to serve. We celebrated an anniversary and when I made the reservation I mentioned this. To our surprise we had a card waiting for us along with heart shaped confetti sprinkled on the table. We didn't notice waiters hovering but even after a sip the water glasses were always filled. The food was extraordinary.
Nice restaurant to celebrate any kind of anniversary. They treat you very well. And food is awesome.

column3: Wonderful place to have a great meal
column4: My husband and I enjoyed an amazing meal. Ralph our waiter was very attentive and courteous. The steak we had was cooked to perfection and the caramel cream pie topped off a wonderfully satisfying meal.
We know the Capital Grille from NYC, that's why we decided to dine here. The service was excellent and the food superb. On the pricier side though.

Diego was an excellent waiter. Very attentive and enjoyed our conversation with him.The food was terrific! We were celebrating our birthdays and they brought us a desert which was really nice. Would definitely return if we go back to Chicago.

My wife and I did a "share" evening. We shared a salad; shared a porterhouse steak and shared sides. Service and advice on wine selection was first class. We will definitely reserve thru/with Scott, if/when we return.
Very nice restaurant in a good location. The food is great and I can definitely recommend the sirloin. Staff is friendly and accommodating.
One of the excellent grill places in Chicago, great wine list, excellent service. I had the fish and my wife the T-Bone both were great
I enjoyed everything that was brought to the parry. I will recommend this restaurant to anyone who likes great food.

We had an unbelievable meal with outstanding service. While I would guess a Sunday evening at 7pm is not a very busy time, I think they would provide great service anytime. Very helpful wait staff to guide you in decisions.

Beautiful old world Chicago steak house. Super polite staff and a very comfortable and smart restaurant. Food was amazing and out performs the other high end steak restaurants in Chicago. 100% would go back!

column3: Great Steakhouse now out in the suburbs
column4: Excellent food and service. Good wine list. Pricey but expected with this quality. Not overpriced for the quality don't misunderstand. High marks in all areas. Great kitchen and the wait staff and exceptional
Wonderful meal. Great service. Very nice upscale restaurant. Worth a visit. Make sure to try the calamari.
Outstanding service, first quality food, nice ambiance, consistently enjoyable...highly recommended - tried several of their locations and never disappointed

I am still dreaming with the cheesecake... The staff of this restaurant is amazing, we have had a spectacular dinner here. Everything was delicious, mainly the meat dishes. It is the perfect restaurant to have dinner in the center of Chicago.

The decor is classic, the service impeccable -- friendly without being obsequious -- and the food is good and reasonably priced. For anyone in the Streeterville area or visiting the medical center, this is a quiet, unhurried place to have a pleasant meal.
This restaurant does it right from the way you are greeted, shown to your table, excellent wait staff, superb service and the food is delicious. Wine prices are fair. Job well done.
Good reliable steak house. pricey but good value. Fresh salads, good desert offerings. Friendly service.
Perfectly cooked MR steak (not trivial in the US) with a delicious wedge lettuce salad and a delightful service on the bar
Lot;s of busisness men go here.Locals also come here as well as northwestern hospital people.Food and service always consinsent. A bit pricey. Conservitive atomephere.

Have been to many locations of the brand. Can't say enough good things about this location. Food and service always excellent. Did not dissappoint. I wish the one in Indy was as good as this one. Great job Capital Grille Chicago.

We decided to have a birthday lunch, something more relaxing. The Capital Grille is always a favorite with us and the person, that waits on us is excellent,she makes dining so enjoyable, and we appreciate the high level of service. Service,food and staff was great.

column3: Steaks are very good and sides are outstanding, better than the main course
column4: We dined here as a group and had a private room. The food was excellent and a great choice for dinner in the City. I would love to come back someday and just devour this food!

It is a national chain, but still one of our favorites. The Chicago location is excellent. We have eaten here many times over many years and it has never disappointed. Our vegetarian daughter loves the excellent side dishes, bread and salads.

It is a chain so you know what you are going to get. The food is very good, nice fresh salads, juicy steaks. The service at this location is excellent!! Located just a couple of blocks off Michigan Ave.

column3: Good service, nicely aged steaks, one gets what one paysfor
column4: Stopped by this restaurant which is located proximal to Northwestern Memorial Hospital. Subdued atmosphere was much appreciated, facilitating both conversation as well as digestion... Valet parking is desirable, but not inexpensive.. I may gain more experience at their other ‚ÄòCapital Grill in western Suburbs...
This is a great restaurant. The cost is a little high however the food is exceptional, the service and atmosphere is also great.
Standard Capital Grille, same as in any location which is a good thing as the service and quality is impeccable. Food pretty good too

We tried several restaurants who were involved in Chicago Restaurant Week 2019. This was, by far, our favorite! The restaurant is beautiful, the meals were outstanding and the value was extraordinary. We will be back!!
The food was delicious and the service was impeccable. We enjoyed this fine dining experience while on a quick trip to Chicago and will definitely return.

column3: The best meat I've had in the area!
column4: Very formal, high end experience with very excellent fare. Service was exceptional and the staff was very informed aobut the menu items and wine selections.
This is a chain restaurant that is designed to look like an old man's club with dark wood and overstuffed furniture. The steaks are very good and the service is excellent.

column3: Usual Steak House - exceptional cheese board
column4: On Business Trip usual Steak house recommendation, cheese board excellent. This and few drinks should do. I had a rib eye that was to charred for my like, but if charred is your thing this is a good location
typical steak house--- good food and good atmosphere. Small bar so get there early.Food servers are very nice.
Excellent menu. Delicious food. Attentive service. A colleague enjoyed the bone in filet and I enjoyed the salmon. Terrific list of wines by the glass.
Me and my wife visited last month, we reserved a table and glad we did as it was busy but we‚Äôre not surprised as the food was amazing! Would highly recommend.
Great steaks, filet medium rare with truffle fries!! Ask Paul he knows it all and won‚Äôt steer you wrong. Coconut cream pie for dessert.
i have traveled for business to chicago. this was a really good upscale steakhouses in the city. i loved their food BONE-IN WAGYU NY STRIP is what i loved there. also, their cocktail was so good.

column3: AGAIN! What an amazing place to have a dinner to remember!
column4: My wife and I have eaten at a number of Capitol grille restaurants and this one is just as great as any other. Again, if you like excellence in service, and don't mind paying for it, I suggest visiting this restaurant! Top Notch!!

What a beautiful dinner with all the ‚Äúfeels‚Äù thanks to our waitress, Blair! Dinner was delicious! And a special anniversary dessert plate compliments of the house was fabulous! Thank you Blair and the Capital Grille!! Fabulous!

We booked a private room for a business dinner for 18, the service from ‚ÄòJoe‚Äô was exceptional, and the food quality all round was excellent, if you are wanting a quality restaurant and a great environment this is a very good choice.

If you have to eat at one place before you go this is the place. Great menu going far beond steaks. From the craft cocktails and starters to the well executed enyrees and rich desserts. All served with pride. Yummy. Great experience.

column3: Service was professional and attentive. Food was excellent in upscale surroundings.
column4: Outstanding in all categories. Perhaps just a bit loud and seating seems to be just a bit aggressive in this unit.
This is one of the best and most consistent steakhouses in America. Great atmosphere, delicious food and outstanding service.
I was expecting a delicious meal - and received a good meal, but nothing beyond "good." It was fine, but not worth the price with so many other restaurant options available.
I was lucky enough to be taken to dinner by a business contact. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough. The ladies behind the bar are so good, the food just as good. Don‚Äôt be put off by the price!
We celebrated a family birthday and had an enjoyable evening. Our table had a birthday card already placed and our meal was delicious. The sides were plentiful and could be shared.

Great meal. Top 5 of all meals. Dave is an amazing server, all of the staff is spot on. I had the oysters, with the porterhouse and asparagus. Just what the doctor ordered. The ‚ÄòGenerous Pour‚Äô is an event not to be missed.
Always good , food is excellent, with outstanding service and excellent cocktails with a good wine list
Everything was really good . The service impeccable. I will definitely visit again when i return to Chicago

Celebrated daughters birthday and our anniversary. Diego Ojeda was server and did an excellent job. Even though restaurant was full, he seemed to be always there for whatever we needed. CG does an outstanding job with special celebrations.

column3: Business dinner next door to the Hyatt Magnificent Mile Hotel
column4: They have great steaks and seafood cooked perfectly! The service we received was exceptional. The food and service was so good, we came back for lunch the next day!
Went to this location to celebrate with friends and had a good time. Of course the prices are high, but the service was great and made sure we were taken care of.
Overall the food is very good. We had a later meal so just got appetizers and salads, but the portions were large and very filling. We ordered the calamari - YUMMMMM. Delicious
We were a large party so had a private room. Food was great and service was great. Seafood and steak dishes were all very good, the side dishes delicious and terrific desserts.
Dinner with friends. I wasn‚Äôt real hungry so I had French onion soup and Halibut. Both were delicious. Restaurant busy so it was noisy and hard to hear at times is the only down fall.
It was a fabolous dinner with a great taste of steak. Wine ( Merlot) was perfect. Deserts were adorable. Service was superior. Excellent at all.

The service was excellent. We had the Burrata with balsamic glazed pears and it was exceedlingly tasty. The sliced filet with Cippollini onions, wild mushrooms and fig essence was truly divine. Dessert of Creme Brulee cheescake was delicious. Will be back.

column3: BEST BEST BEST bone-in filet ever had
column4: Without question, the very best of the best--awesome food, awesome wine and great atmosphere. Clean as can be. Waiter was attentive and efficient. Will go back without doubt.
Just finished up a fabulous meal @ The Capital Grill. The food was incredible but even more so was the service we received from Diego. If only every server were this incredible...
We came to celebrate a family dinner as a group of 12. Quality of food was excellent, service was very attentive.
The Capital Grill will not disappoint. Service is top notch & very attentive. It is what you should expect from a top tier national steakhouse chain.
Exceptional personable service, warmth, hospitality and of course, outstanding food. Will definitely return for a repeat performance and dining experience.
The food was delicious I got a NY strip steak and it was to died for the wine menu was everything and the service was immaculate

Recently had dinner at this site and as always was not disappointed by Capitol Grill. The staff here was very professional and friendly. Food was great and a great atmosphere on a cold Chicago night. Always worth the price when the experience is great.
Excellent service. Great food even bread basket was warm and delicious. We had cream pie house made was very good

column3: We wanted a Pre-NYE Dining option in Downtown Chicago
column4: It Was Perfect! Great ambiance, steak, wine, and Service. Ask for.Valerie's section. She is remarkable!!! Walked in without a reservation, and they were perfectly accommodating for us! Thank You!
The atmosphere is very warming and welcoming. Along with the very fresh and rich food, the wine selection is vast as well. We will be visiting again!
Incredible food--oysters, shrimp, lobster all excellent--steak was amazing. Entire staff was polished, knowledgeable and super attentive. I could find nothing wrong here whatsoever! Will return.
This a great place for lunch. It‚Äôs a blockoff North Michigan Avenue and a good place for a break while shopping. The lobster salad is good and their burgers are a good choice, too.
Ate here as part of an organised dinner whilst at a conference. The filet mignon steak I had was fantastic and the vegetable and mash that came with the steak were just gorgeous.
After a day at Northwestern group. We went over to the capital Grille, to have a superb meal. Or steaks were prepared for us the way we requested them to be cooked. Service was great
Located just east of Michigan Ave next to NW Hospital. Great service and good quality of food. Reliable menu. Wish there were more choices for people who do not eat red meat.
For sure it is one of the best steaks in Chicago. The service is really good. The location is next to Magnificient Mile. Dry aged is highly recommended.
Went here with a mixed group for lunch and conversation. Pleasant atmosphere the staff left us alone apart from when they needed to interrupt. The food was generally good.
Celebrated a birthday there last weekend and they decorated the table and had a nice handwritten note wishing the birthday girl a happy birthday. Food and wine were excellent as well as the service.

I‚Äôve been there many times, and never thought of reviewing. But they deserve a good review because they keep a high level at all times. The food is always good, the service always professional and courteous. Ready to go again.
Love the aged steak. Superb, have to try and you will no ne disappointed. Very consistent and attentive.
Fancy and beautiful place in Chicago and fore sure the best stake in town. The staff is friendly and food is delicious. For sure I will visit again!
The Capital Grille knows how to host a special occasion. We were treated like royalty, including a private room, introduction to the chef, and outstanding food and service.
It's a given that the food here will be fantastic. The restaurant itself has a classic feel to it. Servers are extremely professional and move with hustle. Well worth the money.

We went a party of 50 people to have dinner, he experienced a good one, great food and good service. Its a pitty that the kitchen closed so early, all the restaurants should do an extra effort for all the 50,000 thousand runners.

column3: Impeccable service anywhere in the country
column4: This is a chain but have service second to no other place. I have been to CG all over the country; Chicago, Naples, Troy, Vegas. They have a template for service that isn't copied anywhere
Servers wonderful.. Food was hot and tasty. Oak brook area near many walking stores. Open late on weekend bar area great wine!

This is one of our GO TO places for special occasions. The food is excellent, the staff is top notch, the drinks are strong and the lobster tails are to die for. The a la carte sides are enough to share!

We went on a Monday night for dinner. My mother liked her steak and dad liked his fish. I ordered the Maine Lobster steamed and it was still over cooked and not sweet. Creme Br√ªl√©e for dessert was below average.
We were there last Saturday night. Great service from Derrick, great food and great ambience. This restaurant is one of the best in America.
Highly recommended. Food was fantastic and service by Scott and team was superb. My guests and I had a good time there.

column3: Celebrated my wifes birthday with a couple of friends.
column4: There was a signed Birthday card and decorations at our table! Food was all wonderful. We especially enjoyed the steaks! First time at the Capital grill - will not be the last!
I had tried Capital Grill in different cities around the US, but this one of Chicago won by far over the rest in service, quality overall and taste
Excellent service and food in this beautiful restaurant. I go for lunch every now and then for my steak fix. I never miss Restaurant Week - great value at $33 dinner special.

column3: Perfect Place for cocktail and a steak
column4: Pretty ambiance, delicious food, nice cocktails, service was pretty decent. Location is OK but so congested in that area especially with traffic, hospital, and construction! Food is consistent.
Food was wonderful, service was great. The staff was very accommodating. It made a special occasion even better.
Our appetizer was a seafood tower which was very good. The steaks were good but I like them better at other steak places. Service and ambiance was very good.
We have weekly meetings at an office around the corner from the grille We love the food and staff They are most accommodating Can't miss place for great reliable food Steaks great !!

column3: Excellent venue, wonderful service, and delicious food
column4: We had the pleasure of holding a funeral luncheon with a group of family and friends in a private room. Could not have asked for a better place to hold it.
There are more steak houses in Chicago than I can count. This one is very good but not my go to place
My son and I were visiting Chicago. We had previously eaten at Michael Jordans Steakhouse. This was a better steak and experience. Highly recommend the dry aged porterhouse.

The Capital Grille ranks in my top restaurants in Chicago. Everything was delicious, appetizers, each course, etc. It is pricey, but for the right event (special occasion), you will not be disappointed!
I was invited for a business meeting. First time at this place. I was impressed at everything. Service, Food, Decoration. Typical classy steakhouse. Loved It.

We had the BEST meal and anniversary dinner here! The food was perfect and delicious. The staff made sure we never had an empty glass or any complaints. We plan to visit every year for as long as can!

It was so fabulous to eat food that was beautifully cooked, clean flavours, proper portions, (not huge)not smothered in cheese. The steak was simply mouthwatering, the chicken and pesto dish was full of flavour. A lovely meal, with attentive staff.

column3: Dinners was great I have been too Chicago many time And would have never know that that my best restaurants was r
column4: Thank u Ralph for a wonderful time Best steak I have had so far I been to a few restaurants on dis visit but sis has been the best so far Ralph my sere was on que great job Ralph

Another fantastic trip to Capital Grille. Once again, I ate at the bar. Evan is just incredible. Over the top with drink and food recommendations. He hit the mark on everything. You cannot go wrong with a trip to the Capital Grille Chicago.

Everything was perfect from start to finish. Service, food, atmosphere... all wonderful. We had the filet Oscar, caprese salad, creamed spinach, and au gratin potatoes and everything was exceptionally delicious. Would go again in a heartbeat. Highly recommended.
Very decent appearance of the restaurant. Everything was good. Until the main dish, out of our expectation the portion of steak is sooooo Hugh! Big enough for 2 pax ! But very tasty! üëçüëçüëç

We had a super table for our group. Service was prompt and competent. Food was well prepared and tasty. I actually had the fish of the day and was very happy with my choice. Good quality no matter what town you find a Capital Grille.
Had two evening meals here whilst attending a conference in Chicago. Classic steakhouse. Polished service and well cooked/presented steaks. You might struggle here if you're not into red meat.
Eateb here 3 times. Every time outstanding. Steaks exactly as you ordered them. Excellent side dishes too. Expensive.
My experience is always wonderful at Capital Grille. They also have great bar food, so stop in when you can.

column3: Fabulous restaurant for a large group!
column4: We had our conference dinner here. We had 18 people for dinner and the service was OUTSTANDING! The food was delicious!
With and I both ended up in Chicago on a business trip. Had a great dinner and a great evening. Service was excellent and the steak was incrediable
Absolutely fabulous French onion soup!!!! Tomato and mozzarella salad off the chart! Great for people watching, lovely rich decor. Shrimp special was amazing!!

column3: Great place incredible macaroni and lobster dish.
column4: Went to the capital Grille and had a great time with friends. The macaroni and lobster dish is to die for. Also the salmon was very good! The wine selection with the pairing adds to the ambience of the restaurant.
Steak and seafood. Good wine. Nice atomosphere. Entrees are a la carte. Expect $75 to $125 per person.

Dined at The Capital Grille with friends during Chicago Restaurant Week for a birthday celebration. Food, drinks, service, & atmosphere were all outstanding. They made our birthday dinner very special with a beautiful dessert plate. We look forward to going back.
Great high end restaurant that does excellent steak with friendly service. The fillet steak is up there with the best I've ever tasted. A really nice place to sit in and treat yourself.

Great service. Great wine. Great server. Amazing food. You need the truffle fries!!! I ordered a petite filet which is not on the menu btw and it was one of the best I have had. I can't wait to come back. Everything was perfect.

Absolutely wonderful experience with some of the most incredible food and service in the city! The bone-in ribeye is phenomenal and a must for a steak lover! Signature cocktail, in fashion, simply scrumptious!

I was here for a business dinner. The appetizers were great, but the steak I had was one of the best I've ever tasted. I had a Gorgonzola crusted filet and it just melted in my mouth. The service was excellent.
Worst wedge salad and worst steak tartar that I have ever had...insult to energy, my waitress acted like I was a bother to her as I don't like being rushed...Many much better steak houses in Chicago
The turkey dinner was ok, but was really not like a home cooked Thanksgiving dinner which was what I expected. The T-bone steak was great and the Lump Crab Cocktail was very tasty.

column3: I wish I could go everyday
column4: Wonderful menu, attentive staff, my only wish is that my appetite was larger so I could order more items. The food is a little pricey, $60.00 for as steak. But it was fine steak and done to perfection.
my wife and I had a birthday dinner at the capital grille and it didn't disappoint. food, drinks and service was great, it's also in a great location next to everything.
This place is awesome. Follows the tradition of outstanding food served by the chain. No mistake, one of the best in town. Always one of my favorites places to experience flavors and top services.
A business dinner with a business partner who shares my interest in great food and great wine in a great experience. And we both got what we wanted. The food quality is excellent, service great.
This was such a great evening! The food, service and atmosphere was very well executed. It was for a Company Party and we had a fabulous evening,thanks to the professionals that worked here.

Our server/ waiter, Ralph, was excellent and the food (steaks, lamb chops, swordfish, salads, sides) also excellent. The staff went the extra mile to provide a welcome for six of us as we celebrated three family birthdays.
One of the most amazing meals we have ever had. The wait staff treated us like we were the only people in the restaurant. The filet and sea bass were incredible. Very extensive wine list.
Fine dining, fantastic food service and wine. Love this place. Pricy but you get what you pay for, and it is worth every penny!
In Chicago for one evening, the service and attention in the bar area was top notch. Bartenders were will informed and provide excellent recommendations and service.

There are many new or relatively new steak houses in town. I tend to stick to my favourites so this was an adventure for me. But for the number and quality of other similar restaurants I would have upped my rating.

I visited with my sister. This was a spur of the moment trip. They seated us without reservations. I can tell anyone without reservations the food, the staff, the ambiance of the restaurant was amazing. Yes, the food was delicious. Try the lamb chop lollipops.
These are great places for everything from a family lunch to a business meeting. They have private dining rooms for company meetings and the service is almost always good.

My boyfriend took me to Capital Grille two years ago for my birthday. Service was great. They took good care of us and made my birthday extra special. I can recommend the dry aged steak - GOOD STUFF!! Food was delicious!!!
Capital Grill in Chicago is a great place. Excellent location, great service, excellent presentation and the taste makes you want more.
We had apps and drinks at the bar, Melissa was our bartender/server and she was fantastic at her job! Made our time there very pleasant.

This is a very nice steak house. I just popped in for lunch in a sweatshirt and I felt very underdressed but the staff treated me very well. Great lunch, excellent steak, excellent service. You can't go wrong here.
Good atmosphere with old school restaurant ambience. Original restaurant was at Rhode Island and has kept the old style delicate service and well prepared food.
I had a fantastic Porterhouse steak! Very friendly bartender made certain all was perfect. The steak was cooked medium rare, served hot and juicy.
Very good dinner! Everything was delicious! Service by Heather (I think that was her name) was excellent. Highly recommend the place.

Restaurant is slightly upscale but were able to accommodate an impromptu group of 7 women attending a conference nearby. Even though we weren't dressed up were welcomed warmly and seated at a nice table Food was great and service exceptional
The prix fixe menu for Easter Sunday was superb and had many execellent choices. The service and attention and ambiance at this restaurant are outstanding. Great value for your money.

we celebrated my son's birthday there sat night. service, food and ambience were all quite good. overall value was good too for a fine dining restaurant. we did, multiple drinks/apps, entrees, salads, total with tip $600 for 5 people.
Excellent fresh salmon salad, great service. I go here from work for lunch and I can always guarantee that I will be in and out in a timely manner, yet never feel rushed.
Whether having lunch or dinner, this is a great place to sit, relax, have a drink and enjoy the most fantastic meal!
Our steaks were cooked to perfection as usual! This place is always a grand slam. Food, atmosphere, service... Always spot on!
This was my second time to the Capital Grille and it was a good as the first. Impeccable service, great steaks, sides, salads and desserts. I will be back and my friends loved it!
Very good steak, others enjoyed their salmon. I shared au gratin potatoes but would opt for mashed next time. The apple cobbler was odd very thin. We spent $100 each.

Everything we had here was amazing! Lobster bisque, lobster mac & cheese, and surf and turf. We were here for a holiday party and sampled almost every appetizer and they were all fantastic! Flourless chocolate cake was a wonderful desert also!
One of my all time favorites! Great food, spectacular wine list, very attentive staff! The steaks are mouthwatering!
what a nice and elegent thanksgiving day dinner we had. Service was impeccable and food delicious. Had drinks at bar first and very cozy. The table was ready at exactly the time we reserved it for.

Had the iceberg wedge salad, crunchy fresh lettuce with blue cheese dressing. For mains, steak sandwich. Cooked perfectly medium rare with fresh side of green beans. Order the Arnold Palmer to drink if you like iced tea.

In town for a conference and friends wanted to go here....amazing! The food was delicious! It is quite pricey, but if you want delicious food, treat yourself to this place once in awhile. We will be back!
The "Bone in filet with Cajun rub" and the house Cheesecake were exceptional, just like the service! The lobster bisq, the onion soup and even the bread were fresh and perfect
The food, the service and entire experience was wonderful. You truly get what you pay for! Matthew our waiter was awesome and we had a very nice evening.

Wonderful service, delicious food, and reasonable prices. We highly recommend this restaurant. My porterhouse was prepared perfectly and was absolutely delicious. My husband had the Maine lobster and described it as 'as good or better than the lobster we had in Maine'.
We have been to CG in Boston before and loved both of them. The food was amazing and the service very attentive. We cant wait to go again.
Visited the Capital Grille during our current visit to Chicago and we were very pleased with the delicious food and the tasty cocktails.

The steak here was very good, but I was not impressed with the wine selection - reds were ok, but the whites were terrible. Chicago has a lot of options when it comes to fine dining. You can do better at another venue.

I have been to the Capital Grille many times and it is always enjoyable. Staff is great and the food seasonal and fresh. Obviously they are particularly good at steak but lunch salads are also yummy (as much as a salad can be).
The service is always very good and the piece is very nice for an elegant sit down dinner. The porterhouse is just fantastic as is the filet. It definitely is a pricey meal, but well worth it.
Another perfect, romantic birthday dinner at Capital Grille. Food and service was perfect again. Try the lump crabmeat cocktail for an appetizer. Steaks and seafood were cooked great.

I usually stop in at least one time for dinner when I travel to Chicago..Although a bit pricey the food quality and service are excellent...If you have the budget you will not be disappointed one bit..

column3: Awesome fun experience in an "old school type steak house
column4: Pre- dinner cocktails at the bar were fabulous. hand shaken and top notch in an atmosphere that reminded me of old gangsta days. Wall paintings everywhere. Service was impeccable.

My husband loves the lobster bisque - it's not always listed on the menu, but ask for it! Steaks never disappoint and my personal favorite it their side of scalloped potatoes, it's huge, so order to share. Quiet and sophisticated atmosphere. Lovely all around.
Awesome bar, food and drinks. Came in late for dinner and grabbed dinner and drinks at the bar. The bartenders were great and make some great drinks!

column3: Bone-In filet Special was worth coming for!!
column4: Both my wife and I had the special bone-in filet with Asparagus. Both were excellent as was the ice cream for dessert.

My son had just proposed to his girlfriend at Cloud Gate so the Capital Grille was the perfect place to go. They helped us celebrate the occasion and made the newly-engaged couple feel as though they were the most important customers they had that night.
Best steak house in Chicago. The food is great, the service impeccable. I love the dark wood and pictures of prominent Chicagoans. One of my favorite restaurants.
Always consistent awesome food! I don't know if I go to this place because the food or the Stolli Dollies. Great evening with friends, you are never going to get a bad meal here.

This is a best treat ever. The food is the best taste to your buds. The atmosphere is very nice. The service provided by the staff is very outstanding. Yummiest food with great service. Definitely Recommended!!

These restaurants have it all...great atmosphere, outstanding food, attentive service. We've been to a few of them around the country and Chicago does not disappoint! Not the cheapest place to eat, but by far the best from our week in the Windy City.
As always a good to restaurant with the best of the best. Service and food quality. $$$$ but it will always win over clients.

There are several locations but it is not what I would consider a 'chain' restaurant. It is more fine dine. Fantastic wine menu Wonderful cocktails and appetizers. Huge salads and yes, wonderful steaks and chops. Great desserts. Fantastic service.
This is a consistently great place to go especially if your expense account is paying the bill. It is not only great for dinner, but also snacks and drinks at the bar. free valet.

column3: Excellent as usual, great place for great dining.
column4: We stopped in here to visit our friend, Robert, one of the managers. It was a great experience. The food was awesome, and the service was impeccable. Highly recommend if you are in Chicago!
This visit was the first time that I did not have steak and I was not disappointed. I tried the Chilean sea bass and it was awesome!!
Great wine list with a good selection for all types of budgets. Portions are huge - and my steak and lobster was cooked to perfection!
We have to visit our favorite steakhouse when staying in Chicago. Food and service is always top notch. Online reservations make it simple to get a reservation too.

I went with friends to the Capital Grille in Chicago while attending a conference. We had gone to the Capital Grille in Washington, DC the previous year. This was NOT disappointing. The food and our waiter was exceptional. It was a delightful dinner experience.
100/ person should buy perfection. It was just another great steak. Nor tons does the cool little touches better same price. Everything was just right though
No loud music, nice seating options and professional staff. Lunch prices surprisingly affordable and good.
Had an excellent dinner here with some business associates. The service was good, the food was great. Have a good wine list. You will spend a lot for diner but the steaks are worth it.
Make a reservation or wait at the bar. I sampled their pineapple infused vodka. Yum! The line is out the door waiting to come in. You will not regret your experience.

column3: Typical Capital Grille restaurant, good steaks, but quite pricy
column4: Centrally located in Chicago, you'll find the typical steakhouse of the Capital Grille chain. Same menu as everywhere, good service. No surprises. Steaks are good, but quite expensive as is the rest of the menu.
This place had a good steak which is tough to compete in a city like Chicago. Great side to go with the steaks and also good desserts would recommend this place to anyone visiting Chicago

column3: Good choice of steak house in Chicago !
column4: I was there once for the diner and the meat is delicious. Very good quality and the decoration inside is beautiful. Still you may have to make a reservation, to avoid 20 minutes of waiting. Staff is very professional.
Everytime we travel to Chicago this is a must. Great ambiance excellent service and the steaks one of the best we have had. Deffinetely a must in Chicago

Three words. Lobster. Mac. ,Cheese. I had doubts when I was invited here and read that it was a chain owned by Darden Restaurants. Totally blown away. Not the best steak I've ever eaten but easily up in the top 90%.
Went to Capital Grille after appoinment at Northwestern Hospital. Food was awsome, calamare, scallops with risotto, ribeye steak sandwich . excellant ! Well be back Thanks Zac! Ken

The lobster bisque had a large chuck of lobster, the crab 'n lobster cakes were full of just that and little fillers. My house red was perfect. My server was gracious, obviously passionate about his work and highly professional. Not cheap, but grrreat value!

they have great burgers for lunch though it is a little stuffy atmosphere inside! the food is very good. the service is good the only thing that I did not like was that they did not have fountain beverages
I love the lobster bisque here. I like to order an appetizer, a salad and a cup of the bisque when I am in town on business. I am never disappointed.
Had the entire place, unlimited food & bev, not a bad way to party xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Love to go to this restaurant even when traveling solo. Food is good and prices I found to be very reasonable. Wine was good too!
Lobster bisque is amazing. Staff is very helpful. The d√©cor is very nice. It is a pricey restaurant.
Snobby,2 of 3 steaks ordered medium came out raw,prices high for value,loud,wine list very lacking,soup good quality,

I'm a returning guest. Previously in Wyndham now in Hyatt, this place reflects an old British club. The steak I ate was perfect and served with asparagus it was a huge serving. The Matilda bear tasted excellent. The mixed fruit dessert could have been better.
Nothing to say, Just go, take a martini and enjoy a great steak. It is not a cheap restaurant, $$$. service and food amazing.
It was our first experience at the Capital.We had reservations for 8 on a Friday night and were seated promptly. Out waiter, Phil, was very attentive and we enjoyed our steak dinners and dessert too!

column3: The best place for a business lunch or dinner
column4: If you need a place to discuss business where you can hear what the other person has to say this is the place. Fine food is a given and impeccable service is as well. You will be back time after time

Wonderful restaurant. Great downtown location. Menu and specials take a long time to decide due to amount of choice. I had the Ribeye on bone, wonderful and big portion. Lobster soup starter was excellent. Service was top notch.

column3: Exceeded the High Expectations of a Great Steak House
column4: Capital Grille in Chicago lived up to its reputation and then some. World class service, food, and the overall dining experience is one that is hard to top at this Capital Grille. Steaks were unbelievable, house wine excellent, service excellent!

Our party had the pleasure of eating the best steaks we have ever had. The Pepper Steak is especially recommended! Superb service, wonderful atmosphere make this restaurant one of the very best Chicago has to offer.
The capital grill is one of our favorite places for dinner. The food is great. Matthew was attentive without being intrusive. A wonderful celebration.
admittedly, the food and service was excellent. HOWEVER, the cost was outrageous. If I win the lottery, I may go there again to celebrate.
The service is EXCELLENT! The food delicious. The bar can make almost anything you can image with a very ice wine list. Do be warned - it can be expensive, but well worth the money.

We had the most lovely dinner here. The waiter was terrific and provided excellent information and was extremely helpful. I had seared tuna with three sauces....the sauces were amazing. The bread basket is equally yummy as were the au gratin potatoes. Would go there again.

Had a private room for a small business lunch there this week and they nailed it. Service, pre-set menu, food, timing, everything was great. Nothing but enjoyable and impressive. Will be back for sure! Ask for Lara - great server!

We had a really good meal. The service was fantastic. My steak was cooked just right and was very flavorful. Pretty much what you would expect from a Capital Grille. Although I still don't think it is as good as Jeff Ruby's in Cincinnati.
We wait at the bar FOR more than one hour with empty tables. Hostess so rude with no explanation. A place like this do not deserve workers like that.
Great food and great service, good suggestions on the food from the waiter. It was a bit pricey but the experience was worth the price.
Truly a great steak house. I have been a patron countless times. Impecable, attentive service. Quieter than most given the layout and design.

Absolutely amazing place. Super nice Waiter with a sense of humor, very strong knowledge of wine and related pairings. We had fish and steak and both meals where super delicous. Not a cheap place but worth every dollar.
a bit pricey but really good, business dinner and spacious enough that we didnt have to yell to hear one another even though it was a really busy night.
Food was actually great, but a bit expensive. There was a good offer on wine tasting, didn't take it. Waitress messed up the orders.

Highly recommend the steak trio!! Delicious! Everything I had was wonderful, the bread, the wine, the sides, the dessert! We were in one of the private rooms for a business function but I think the menu was the same. Service was excellent as well.

column3: After a long day of traveling!
column4: With a large convention in town, seating was hard to come by, but the food was worth the wait. It had been a long time since I had been to the Grille, but I enjoyed every bite.
Great place the steaks are incredible, what a service, the place is really good, i would say this is a must if you're in town

Crowded, loud, expensive. Famous coconut dessert is really nothing special. 10 dollar clam chowder is super small and mostly potatoes. Skip. Loved Eddie V's (where we went the night before) much more for example.
I can recommend this restaurant. It has a great atmosphere, very competent staff and friendly service. Walk ins are quite unwelcome though. You definitely need a table reservation.

Excellent restaurant. Great Atmosphere. Location is very good. Food is top notch as well as the wine selection. We had a waiter that knew every detail and provided us with the incredible service overall. Will be back soon.
A group of colleagues had a night at dinner. Great steaks. Sides to share. A really good meal. Relaxed nice atmosphere.
We had excellent food and really great service. It was a really nice dining experience and we didn't feel at all rushed.
I dine all over the country and this is by far the best one I have been to. The food always great and one of the best steaks in Chicago. Great place to visit when you are in town!

From the time we entered the place til we left, they treated us like gold. Phil our waiter was extremely knowledgable, and courteous. Food was excellent, but be prepared to spent $100 per person on avg. For a special event it was well worth it.

Dry aged steaks were perfect. The service was excellent. This was an expensive place for a family. With dessert(made in house) two sides of wonderful mashed potatoes and four drinks our meal was over $300.00. My teenage granddaughters loved it and want to go back.
Food was typical Capital Grille fare - nothing special. Bill was almost $400 including tip for 3 people ($89 bottle of wine). Delmonico steak was fabulous.

column3: Good food, great service, high prices
column4: Had dinner with family member on a Friday. Food is very good, service was outstanding but prices are very high. Avoid if you are on a budget!
Great, attentive, knowledgable service. I had the Filet and King Crab, both were close to the best I've had.

Went with husband and his clients for lunch. Everyone enjoyed their meal. My husband had the scallops and I had the lobster and crab burger. Beautiful restaurant and service was exceptional. Highly recommend.
Try the Ahi Tuna instead of a steak!! Mine was sushi rare and fantastic!! Lobster Mac & Cheese!! WOW!! Home run, I always have dinner here when I am in Chicago.

column3: Great for Steak and other Good Food
column4: Excellent atmosphere and very good steaks. Service was very good and friendly. Nice place to meet with friends or business relations.
If you are on an expense account and looking for a safe place to take a client who likes meat, this is the place to go. Good central location. Good quality steak. Everything slightly over-priced.

column3: Worst restaurant experience in last 8 years.
column4: Terrible service - seated 1 hour after reservation and got worse from there. Food average to bad - and that is being generous. No redeeming features in a town with too many other good options.

A great place for a special treat or celebration. Outstanding service and nicely appointed atmosphere. Steak reigns at the Grill and they do it right every time. Pricey but worth it for that special occasion.
You can always rely on outstanding food and service at the Capital Grille and the Chicago location is no exception.

column3: Made our whole trip to ChiTown
column4: Great food and lots of it. Had a great waiter( Winston). Suggested we try the " Generous Pour". Great deal if you usually have 2+ glasses with dinner. Nice atmosphere and roomy booths.

This restaurant is In the middle of the city of Chicago and is one of the best steak grill I have ever visited. Try the 24oz Porterhouse (T-bone). Next to the beef also have look in wine cellar there is an amazing sellection.
Wonderful food prepared perfectly and an amazing waiter with spot on recommendation. Recieved complimentary dessert and champaign with a card from the restaurant for our anniversary! Just wonderful!

My husband took me there for my birthday dinner! Excellent steak, appetizers were great as well. Our server was very attentive and gave us a complimentary coupon for calamari when we go back! We had a wonderful dinner, can't wait to go back!

column3: The Quality Control From City To City is GREAT!
column4: A great steak, they accommodated a large party on a busy night ...totally professional. The service was stellar, just like the one in D.C. and Baltimore. This is one of the few chains that delivers wherever you go in the Nation.
Beautifull stake marined in 15 year old balsamici vinegar, really special. Entrees are allso great. Nice staf. Good winelist, allso a 6 liter bottle opus one!
The steaks are prime,the service attentive,without smothering,and the wine list is quite acceptable.a party of six,ages 30 to 85, and everyone was pleased.A great place to celebrate.

We are blessed by living close by the Lombard location where we frequent regularly. Have visiting numerous Capital Grills and this is by far our most favorite. Evo makes a mean martini and the food and service always exceeds our expectations!!
As always the food was great and the atmosphere was perfect. The Clam Chowder and Calamarie were yummy.

Great service, fabulous food and just a plain wonderful experience. My only complaint was that I choose this restaurant based on their web menu; stuffed shrimp. However, they no longer offer this dish:(
service for breakfast and dinner was very good. the food was excellent. The Staff were very nice. We had two small kids join us and the staff took good care of them.
Great food and large portions. We had soup, shared a salad and shared an entree. With no drinks, bill was about $80. Highly recommend this restaurant, just off magnificent mile.
had dinner with business people and the selection was great, and quality very high. Had shrimp cocktail and tenderloin Oscar. Both were well prepared and tasted great.
Ya, it's $16.00. You get what you pay for and this is that good. Service was right on and even though we were in the dining room, a burger was no problem. My wife loved the swordfish.

column3: Best place close to the ORD Airport
column4: The Capital Grille is excellent in regard to ambience, food and service. It is always a pleasure to go back for a great meal.
What a wonderful dinner with superb service, food, and wine. You won't be disappointed. This is a place for those who appreciate a great meal.
We eat at the Capital Grille in Chicago every time we're there. You can't beat their porcini rubbed ribeye. Services is impeccable and the food is always delicious
Well worth the visit. Great staff, very friendly, helpful, attentive, and knowledgeable about their wine and food - all of which was absolutely delicious - I would most certainly eat here again.

column3: Tenderloin Sliders Can Not be Beat
column4: Went in for a snack and shared the sliders. We ate in the bar..service was wonderful. Be sure to try their drink made with pineapple soaked in vodka. Perfect!
What an awesome time we had. Here for a friends birthday celebration. Service was great. Food was amazing. I will go again and again. Great place to go if you're looking to leave a good impression.

Capital Grille is a chain and this was just like the one in Las Vegas. It was excellent food and service. I had the plain grilled salmon and it was delivered just as I wanted. It was good. The bread is great Too.

I have been to other Capital Grille's and the food is always excellent. However, the service at this restaurant set it apart. Very busy night and the restaurant was packed; however, our waiter made us feel like the only customers he had.
The food and service here at Capital Grille was great. We would recommend for families and special occasions, and would definitely come back!

A totally enjoyable evening with good food and friendly attentive service was spoilt by the astronomical bill. The place looks the business but you can get similar food for a much more reasonable price elsewhere.
If you don't mind paying too much for a cocktail and your meal, then definitely go here. Although the food is good, it isn't worth the cost. There are so many other restaurants to choose from.
The best meat I ever had. Really expensive but in a way affordable. Ask the employees what You shold eat and drink. They really know what is best for the evening. GO THERE!
I have dined at 5 different locations and each one is consistantly good. The Chicago location did not let me down. Our steaks were cooked perfectly.

column3: It's another chain but great steak
column4: Ok, the food is excellent but Capital Grille is everywhere. I would say go to the Chicago Chop House or a steakhouse unique to Chicago. Food and service is excellent and expensive

Top quality ribeye. Best I remember having ever! My wife had the Tuna which was equally great. Four of us shared sides of Lobster Mac & cheese and asparagus. Both were excellent. Chicago steakhouse expensive but worth it.
We can't say enough about this downtown restaurant everything was excellent would rate this at the top of my list.
This is how steak should taste! So good. Sides were awesome as well. This place makes the keg look like mcdonalds. Loved it!
This place has been advised by portier in the hotel. We wait near 45 minut to get the table.
$25 for chicken with no sides! Yeah, way overpriced! I've had better chicken at The Patio.
The ambiance beautiful. The steak was the best I've ever had. The service superior. It's expensive but well worth the money.
The food was ok, nothing outstanding. There are far better meat restaurants in Chicago
We have dined here several times and have always had a great dining experience. Six were in our party and everyone's meals were delicious!
The Stoli Dole, pineapple vodka that they have at the bar...get it with Malibu rum! and the calamari, so spicy and so so good!!
World class delmanico rub! Porcini mushroom rubbed rib eye cooked to perfection. I couldn't decode which wine to have so I was offered tastes of 2. Couldn't ask for more.

column3: Excellent "coffee" steak, great service, great atmosphere
column4: The cona coffee steak , medium-rare , was great !! Excellent Pinot ! Appetizers - try special sea food appetizer, it's great. Also desert - strawberry with ice cream is very light and nice.
Perfect meal... steaks, wine and a birthday dessert for my daughter! would highly recommend it to others

I had a great NY strip at the Capital Grille. Perfectly prepared (medium). The service and atmosphere were also excellent. A little pricey if on an expense account - I believe that my meal without alcohol was in the $55 range.
Significantly better food quality compared to the Capital Grille next to Grand Central NY. Excellent, efficient, friendly and attentive service. Perfect meat and sidedishes.
This is a more formal, business atmosphere. The food and service are some of the best in Chicago. They have a great wine collection, along with a very knowledgable, and well trained staff.

column3: Fine dining, great atmosphere, big menu
column4: Very diverse menu, not inexpensive, but thought it was an excelent value. Wonderful wine list. Have enjoyed the seafood several times. Definitely upscale. Reallt need reservations unless you are eating very early.
Great Food!! Great Restaurant! Great Decor! Excellent Service!
Having been to several Capital Grilles' I always find them to have really good food and an excellent wait staff. Never disappoints.
Great Food and comfortable atmosphere! Great place to relax and enjoy

column3: For a chain, this is a very good steak house
column4: We have so many great steak places in Chicago, but I really liked Capital Grille. The service was friendly and the Kona Steak was really amazing. Wines are expensive, but what you expect.
Everything was first class. We had a great time and this reaturant should not be missed.

This is one of my favorite restuarants in Chicago. I go there a few times for lunch. They have a $15 prix fix 3 course lunch special that adds great value for a high end place. Service is always excellent too!
Full day of shopping and stopped in for a filling $15.00 lunch. Service was great and the hostesses were attentive. Great job!

column3: One of the Best Chain Restaurants
column4: Attentive service with a varied American food menu. Lots of choices. An excellent wine selection. Attractive interior. This restaurant seems to have improved during the past few years.
Great atmosphere! Food is rich in flavors, perfectly paired, and undeniably satisfying. From appetizers to dessert you cannot go wrong.
We like the American steakhouses, this restaurant is what we are looking for ! Good martini's, really good steaks cooked to perfection, good wine selection and the service was outstanding!

Great atmosphere! Great service even though they were slammed (I would always make a reservation). The steak was soooo good! We also recommend the corn which was so fresh and the lobster Mac-n-cheese. We would definitely go again!
Great food, great service, great wine! Outstanding dining.
Service - Top notch Main course- excellent ‚Äì steaks were cooked to perfection Desert ‚Äì superb ‚Äì flourless chocolate cake and creme brulee
Superb steaks, amazing service and great atmosphere, not cheap :-)

Went for lunch. Food was very good (not spectacular); fast friendly service. The place was packed however, but a fun bustling envrionment. Good for families; if you're looking for a quite romantic diner, this is NOT the place for you. Certainly worth a visit however
it is a chain and having visited other cities that capital grill is in it ticks all the boxes
Everything was amazing! Hats of to the chef!
Overall, a typical Capital Grille with excellent food and service. Highly recommend!!
Love the Lombard location

From beginning to end the meal was excellent. The porcini-rubbed ribeye was cooked masterfully. The appetizers and caesar salad (they actually offered anchovies) were terrific. The desert was tasty, and they had a great selection of aperitifs, wines, and digestifs. The service was excellent.

column3: Great Place, Nice bar, Great steak, & Excellent wine list.
column4: Great Place, Nice bar, Great steak, & Excellent wine list.
The ambiance was beautiful, the food was delciious, and the service was prompt and courteous. I would go here again in a moment.
good crab cakes

column3: one of the better steakhouses in the city
column4: one of the better steakhouses in the city
Kona crusted sirloin and au gratin potatoes are awesome.

column3: It's a chain place but they do a consistently nice job. It's probably not my favorite steak restaurant but I think it...
column4: It's a chain place but they do a consistently nice job. It's probably not my favorite steak restaurant but I think it is the best steak.

column3: great for business lunch, always good food
column4: great for business lunch, always good food

column3: This is my favorite steakhouse in Chicago. They just seem to do everything right. You have to check it out!
column4: This is my favorite steakhouse in Chicago. They just seem to do everything right. You have to check it out!
Great food and atmosphere

column3: Order the steak salad. Not on the menu, but they always have it. Amazing
column4: Order the steak salad. Not on the menu, but they always have it. Amazing

Aged porterhouse. There may be a better steak in Chicago (I hear The Chop House is great) but of the steaks I've been fortunate to consume, The Capital Grille's aged porterhouse was at the top of the list. Make someone else pay.
Second only to Nine for Steak

column3: Great pineapple martinis! Oh, and good steak too. ;-)
column4: Great pineapple martinis! Oh, and good steak too. ;-)

column3: Huge servings of everything. I have had the burger, which is really quite good. The lobster roll is actualy pretty...
column4: Huge servings of everything. I have had the burger, which is really quite good. The lobster roll is actualy pretty yummy too.

column3: Excellent service and superb quality of food. I know this is a steakhouse, but the lobster tasted better than most...
column4: Excellent service and superb quality of food. I know this is a steakhouse, but the lobster tasted better than most fine seafood restaurants.

column3: Great food, service, atmosphere. All locations are great.
column4: Great food, service, atmosphere. All locations are great.

Book early because this place is so nice that it's often hard to get a table! Very, very nice wait staff. Excellent food, especially steaks. Try the tomato and mozzarella salad ........ mmmmmmmmm! Ever had lobster with mac and cheese. Great! Desserts are delicious. Although...More

We had dinner here for my husband's birthday and could not have been more pleased with this restaurant. We were promptly seated for our 5 oclock reservation. Everyone was very friendly and attentive. When our bread basket arrived it was piping hot with the best bread I have ever tasted and whipped butter instead of those ice cold hard squares of butter. I had a wonderful spinach salad and my husband ordered lump crab with avocado appetizer. The crab was very sweet and fresh. For entrees my husband chose the porcini rub delmonico with balsamic vinagrette and I chose the slice filet with mushroom and onions. Both were house specials and perfectly cooked as requested. The 22 oz for my husband and 10 oz for my self allowed us to have some room for dessert. We were going to share a coconut cream pie(shortbread pie crust with mounds of whipped cream and fluffy coconut filling) but suprisingly they also brought out a heavenly flourless chocolate espresso cake unlike anything I have ever tasted. (no flour no mousse no icing). The waiter did not charge us for either one of the desserts which was very generous. We really enjoyed this dinner and would return again for a special occasion. The decor is definitely gentleman's club and would not recommend bringing young children.bn

Book early because this place is so nice that it's often hard to get a table! Very, very nice wait staff. Excellent food, especially steaks. Try the tomato and mozzarella salad ........ mmmmmmmmm! Ever had lobster with mac and cheese. Great! Desserts are delicious. Although this is an expensive restaurant, it's well worth the price.

The decor is definitely gentleman's club and would not recommend bringing young children.bn

My wife and I are just finishing up lunch. The food was wonderful. The service was excellent. We ate oysters, sesame seared tuna and the spicy lobster cocktail in an artichoke. All three were fabulous.
I had the best steak i ever had in my life! The word that describes this Steakhouse the best is: OMG. I recomend it
+ Whether sitting outside or balcony, really nice! + Excellent food, biggest meat cut I ever had - Good quality meat can be pricey

Classic place for locals and tourist wanting downtown chophouse options. Profesional servers, outstanding cocktails and full compliment of steaks/seafood. The downtown Gipson‚Äôs is worthily one all regards.
Gibson‚Äôs needs to get off their high horse for the best milkshakes and stick to that only. Poor food quality, steaks were bad and overpriced Food.

column3: Rip off central in viagra triangle
column4: Food is excellent as well as service. It‚Äôs soft drink policy says it all. Order any soft drink and you will get a small bottle. Instead of refills from a fountain you will receive another small bottle at it‚Äôs inflated price.

Enjoyed a wonderful, alfresco meal tonight. The shrimp cocktail was the freshest and most delicious I have ever eaten. I enjoyed the planked whitefish platter with yummy grilled onion and tomato on the side. A must revisit.

Had a delicious baby kale & avocado salad. It was large and filling. Great location. Only reason for 4 stars is the service was slow, but it was the first week they opened for Restore Illinois Phase 3.
Great setting, good service and great food. I went there with friends and had a great evening. Get there early to enjoy a great lively bar first
Crowded steakhouse with piano player in the bar area. Good wine list, decent bread, good burger, bland/over-whipped mashed potatoes, average carrot cake (colossally-sized & overpriced).

column3: Good food - but tables are on top on each other
column4: We went for lunch on New Year's Eve. The food was good - but the tables were jammed in on top of each other. Too close for comfort.

This was one of the best steaks I've had. Three of us had the 7 oz filet and thought it was really good. The mashed potatoes were great. The brocollini was disappointing. The service was very good and efficient. The cocktails were also well made.
Slow service took 15 minutes between main dish prime rib very poorly prepared and on the tough side very sad mora fame than quality
Professional wait staff, old school Chicago steak house. Huge portions. Split the dessert they are huge.

Went here for dinner with my family. We received absolutely fantastic service, our waiter was very knowledgeable about the different meats on offer. Great atmosphere and the food is absolutely delicious! And the dessert is to die for!!

column3: I saw this place had steak
column4: Someone told me that this place had the best steaks. Charles Mulligan's Steakhouse closed down leaving a void needing to be filled with meat. This place has a very good steak.

column3: Always a pleasure for the taste and experience .
column4: Always a pleasure for the customer service experience of it all. So old school cool and the best steaks and sides (double baked potato is the BEST) anywhere I‚Äôve eaten
Classic Chicago Steakhouse. Well executed drinks, fun bar, solid food. Nothing exceptional - but a good safe choice

column3: Gibson Steakhouse, very nice... You've got to eat this, it's a great experience.
column4: I visited Chicago this year for my 40th birthday and this place did not disappoint. My wife and I enjoyed our meal and we would definately eat here again. The steaks are awesome and so is the service. 2nd to none...

Have dined here on previous trips to Chicago. This steakhouse is consistent, the service, food and ambiance are excellent. From appetizers to the steaks everything was phenomenally. I also really enjoyed doing the ambiance. Enjoy
One of the best steakhouses we have ever visited. Even though the restaurant was full and very busy our service was exceptional.

Can't beat Gibsons for "old school" steakhouse dining. Drinks, food and service were excellent. People watching was also a plus with middle-aged "gentlemen" with open shirts hitting on young women (who were mildly amused and somewhat put off.)

We went hear for dinner after my son and daughter-in-law finished the Chicago marathon. This place was beyond wonderful for such a celebration. My husband ordered their bone-in filet mignon and he was thrilled with his choice. I ordered their boneless filet mignon without

column3: Great steak and salmon, quality service
column4: Great steak with pepper added and the salmon was on point. Had a great white wine of sauvignon blanc. Avocado crabmeat was delicious as well! Service was great as well as they show the meats prior to serving.

column3: One of the Top Steakhouses in the World
column4: The steaks at Gibson‚Äôs rivals or surpasses Capital Grille. Highly recommend Gibson‚Äôs while visiting Chicago. Excellent filet mignon and large deserts.
Gibson's delivers what you expect from a high end steak house, great food, great service delicious cocktails. Plan on spending some money, but it is well worth it
The ambiance, food and attentive service makes Gibsons ne of the best places for an excellent steak dinner. Popularity makes it essential to have reservations.
My husband and I went as recommended by a friend who has visited Chicago multiple times. Everything was delicious!

Great place to people watch and grab a drink inside or on the side patio. The service and food are always consistently above average, though the price is also above average. A fun place to meet friends.

Experienced a wonderful evening and fund raiser for a great cause of helping others. We enjoyed the appetizers and beverages that were served including the carving station along with delicious dessert table.

Yes I've reviewed it before but great restaurants need to be acknowledged and celebrated. Yes it's crowded and a bit loud but the food, service and decades of great meals are what keeps me coming back to this killer steakhouse and great martini's.
The service was amazing! Everything we ate was on point! And did I mention the service? Excellent place and highly recommended.
First off ... history here! Always a staple! Great bar scene ... and the food is wonderful! If you haven't been here ... it's been open since 1989. Join us for a martini and steak. Cheers!
One of the best steak resturants in a steak loving town. Great meals, even better service, and some of the biggest and best deserts in town.

column3: Did not Disappoint! Excellent food and Service
column4: We ate here for my son‚Äôs 25th birthday. The food was very good with awesome steaks. Our waiter was Mo and he was a delight.
We recommend going only for the meat. The service was good, nothing out of the extraordinary. The meat was amazing
We sat outside on Rush street. The weather was perfect. I had the 14 ounce fillet. Incredible. Service was amazing even though they were packed.
We go to Gibson whenever we want a great dinner, especially steak! My wife prefers seafood, and says Gibson's is one of he favorites as well.

A really great place in a great part of the city. We got there early and enjoyed an early dinner in the corner table of the bar. Excellent food, fun atmosphere and a cool vibe for sure. Our waitress was fantastic as well.
We had a delicious dinner with friends at Gibsons. The steaks were high quality and cooked to perfection. The staff was so accomodating! Also they do take reservations which was nice.
Excellent evening. Food and service were outstanding. We were with a private party upstairs. We will definitely return!
I love this place The waitress was so nice, the food was amazing The meat divine Very old school style i enjoyed every minute Thanks
Steak was delicious and service was good. Atmosphere is really good! Free soup with the mains. We loved the food so much that we went to Hugo Frog's which share the same kitchen!

What a night! The food was incredible and our server, Cucile (?), was attentive and informative. The steaks were fabulous but the prime rib was melt in your mouth. The crime br√ªl√©e is unbelievable and one of the best cosmos ever

column3: Best Steak and Martini in Chicago!
column4: Gibson's without a doubt is the Best Steakhouse in Chicago! There are many 4 Star Steak Houses but this is 5 Star. if you like Martini's they make a mean one!

column3: One of the best steakhouses I have known so far
column4: Sharing a 14 ounce fillet steak with my wife was a wonderful experience. The potato puree was massive. I look forward to returning there on my next trip to Chicago. The service was friendly, fast and very professional.

From the moment we were seated at the most perfect table, we were met by our server, Karl, who provided us with an exceptional dining experience that we won‚Äôt soon forget from amazing cocktails to a mountainous dessert, it was outstanding
The lunch hamburger is one of the best in the city. They have the perfect blend of meat, cheese and bread. The people watching is always fun too.
Awesome prime steaks. Definitely have a reservation otherwise you probably won't get a table. Staff was wonderful

Just a regular restaurant with regular food and decent prices in a very nice location. Service was mediocre until was time for the check: then the waiter was fast and courteous. The only thing to recommend was the dessert. Huge and delicious.

column3: Too expensive for what you get
column4: Our order of Broiled Faroe Island Salmon was very disappointing. The fish was dry and didn't have much of a taste. Sweet potato was fine but very ordinary and the French fries were very greasy. However, service was fantastic.

Gibson‚Äôs is so good we went three times during our stay in Chicago! The service is impeccable . We had Jennie our first night....she was fantastic. I wish I could remember our other servers but they were all amazing.

Love the outdoor dining atmosphere. Our server and entrees were delicious. I had the filet sliders with fries. The desserts looked outrageous. We came back later in the night for cake, but unfortunately they were sold out. They make a limited amount fresh every day.
I'm glad we had reservations as it was very busy on a Saturday night. The service was beyond amazing. The food is delicious. It was a very memorable meal at Gibsons!
Great Piano Player in Bar Area , Excellent Martinis and Shrimp Cocktail in Lounge Filet Cooked perfect, Nice Dessert Selection
A trip to Chicago wouldn't be complete without eating at Gibson's. Everything from the foo to the atmosphere to the service is second to none.
Ordered a 10oz Filet Mignon and my Friend ordered the ribeye. Steaks were done the way we like it, and probably the best steak I have had in Chicago so far! Not disappointed at all.
Make your reservation well in advance! The steak was fantastic and everyone was friendly. Comfortable seating. Restaurant was easy to get to - a short walk from the bus.
So good. I had forgotten haw great everything is at Gibson‚Äôs. From the bread to the steaks this place rocks it‚Äôs food. I think it‚Äôs the best of all the Chicago steakhouses.
we ate at the bar like we normally do very busy bar good vibe great bartender Paul very helpful with advise of what to see in Chicago

The 7 oz Filet melted like butter in my mouth and it was the perfect size.The most amazing thing was dessert: 'The Meaning of Life" cake. Huge piece of cake to feed 7 people and we still couldn't finish it. Wow! Saturday night was busy!

column3: First restaurant during my Chicago trip
column4: Great restaurant I was exposed to a great Chicago cut ribeye steak The fries are great The whole atmosphere was very relaxing and cool

column3: Great Lobster tail, very good steak. Ask for a window seat on second floor.
column4: Might be the best Lobster tail I have ever had. Was it worth $90? .... Nope.........Ribeye with a small bone is good, not best ribeye I have had. Enjoy ! Go ! good service, good wine list...very expensive. Nice location.

column3: Good food but in and out in less than an hour!
column4: The food is as good as other top steakhouses but, for the amount of money that I spend here, I'd expect to spend more time here. Each course comes out quickly on the heels of the prior one. Wasn't an enjoyable evening.
We were lucky that Tommy was taking care of us. He made great suggestions, he was very quick and also remembered it was our anniversary. Thanks for making it more special than it already was.

Piano man is a real radio station... 3 hours no repeat song, and never stop the good music the play. Food is very good, also martinis; and with the friendship environment you will enjoy a great time with friends.
Service and food is excellent. A large variety of steaks and fish wish are are all served perfectly. Staff is wel informed and very kind.

In a city with many steakhouses Gibson‚Äôs stands out. Excellent steaks and seafood, all prepared correctly as ordered. Attentive and helpful staff. Make sure you have room for the desserts especially the key lime pie and chocolate mousse cake.
Had a great steak, wine and service at this old time steakhouse. Gibson's choices of steak and lobster tail are amazing. Waiter service friendly and knowledgeable about the meats.

Went 2 times - one to get the macadamia nut dessert & again for the steak dinner. Both trips were very enjoyable. Food was delicious and made to perfection. Staff was knowledgeable and friendly. Wish we were here longer to go again!
We chose to have a drink at the bar area before sitting for lunch! Perfect... perfect drinks and perfect service after we sat for a perfect Chicago Steak!!! With a great Californian Wine....
