You want a classic steakhouse with history and great food and a side of classic steakhouse waiters‚Äîthis place never disappoints! Timeless perfection‚Äîthey get it right every time.
Great food! The steaks are wonderful! The service was very good The bar id reslly nice Will certainly be back
Great atmosphere and people watching. Excellent staff. Super steak and winelist....what's not to love? Highly recommend.

An excellent example of a classic American steak restaurant. Delicious food, huge portions and the chicken noodle soup at the start was lovely. We had the ribs and a filet. Desserts were enormous but the key lime pie was stunning.

column3: One of the best Steakhouses I have been to
column4: Gibsons was outstanding. Steak was perfectly done, it's hard to get medium well just right and they did it. Service was top notch. Pricey but worth every penny!

One word for Gibson's FABULOUS!!!!! Our experience was delightful!!!!! Never seen shrimp cocktail so BIG!!!!! And delicious!!!!! The filet was magnificent!!!!! If i could give 10 ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ i most certainly would!!!!
Great food and service. Interesting people and you'll never know who you will meet. "In place" to be sharing

I just LOVE this place! you can never go wrong here! food is just fantastic! the steaks are perfectly executed time after time! Even the bread they serve you is delicious!! Its a definite must if you visit Chicago and love meat!
Wow. I had two separate Lyft drivers recommend this place. Definitely need recommendations. I went on a Sunday night and could only get reservations after 9p. Prime rib was fantastic.
I love Gibson‚Äôs, it‚Äôs just the best steak I‚Äôve had, anywhere. There are plenty of prime steak houses in Chicago, but in my opinion, Gibson‚Äôs is No. 1

column3: Excellent food but loud and crowded especially on weekends.
column4: Excellent service and food. Shrimp cocktail are huge! Steaks and prime rib are the best. You won‚Äôt leave hungry! Not a place for a quiet intimate dinner due to crowds, but definitely a favorite for quality food!
The service was good, the food was great, but be prepared to pay because it is not cheep. The view over the river is also a plus.
Ask for some frog legs from the place next door, they are fabulous. Typical steak place, great sides, steaks cooked to perfection and an excellent wine list. Our server was super friendly.

This place is one of the best restaurants in Chicago. We visit it always when in town. Steaks are perfectly done and the Chocolate Cake is awesome! We always take it to go cause is huge. We can keep eating it all week afterwards.
We all had a great time at Gibson's. The staff, service, and food we're all outstanding. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great place to eat in Chicago.
Best steak ever; servers were top notch...while we spent over $200 for two of us, worth every penny!!

column3: our favorite steak house in chicago!
column4: The best of the best. Been going here since day 1, love everyone in there and the food is delicious whether you get steak, fish or salad or vegetables, always consistent and a fun friendly place/scene :)
This is such a delicious and iconic restaurant! Our rib eyes were amazing and the atmosphere was fun and lively with wonderful service. Definitely a perfect pick!

Perfect. Steak cooked to perfection. Large portions. Beautiful decor. Waiter very attentive. Def a positive recommendation. Def will go back next time I‚Äôm there. Awesome dining experience but not cheap.
What a wonderful place to dine! Very generous portions and friendly staff await you at Gibson's. Steaks are the way to go for dining choice.
Go to place to eat while visiting Chicago. Bar scene is vibrant and excellent food. Enjoyed a great prime burger, salads are huge.
Great steak always busy and very expensive. Everything is sold separate. Dress well there very upscale...‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.
Amazing fillet steak cooked to perfection. Great chips and sides. Really good apple strudel. Brilliant piano playing and atmosphere had s great night.

This place is across from Carmine s on a corner with lots of action. We ate on the patio it was the place to be. Our Server was excellent that's why they are getting 4 stars. The steak was very ordinary. He saved the meal

Was back in Chicago and took some first timers to Gibsons last week. It never disappoints and is always a great experience. The food was awesome, get a bottle of the seasoning salt and try the carrot cake.
This place was my dining highlight of Chicago trip Great steaks Tasty starters Nice intimate interior
This is the place for a steak cooked to perfection. Don‚Äôt expect a quiet dinner alone. Every table was packed and the booming with voices on a Monday night.
The porterhouse, baby. Expertly prepared, Gibson's always fires up a great steak. My lone complaint is that I don't love the potatoes here, hence 4 stars. But, the steaks are perfection.

Great ambience, great food, reasonable prices. Have been here for dinner several times but lunched there today. Excellent crab cake, delicious fries, good bloody Mary‚Äôs and good service. What‚Äôs not to like?

column3: This is a must for a visit to Chicago
column4: We have dined here previously and have been very positive. This visit we dined upstairs for a private party, which was a delightful experience. This is one of the great steak restaurants in Chicago, of which there are many.
One of my favorites restaurants in Chicago, every time I go is my first stop with a drink at the piano bar and then dinner, nice bone in rib-eye, fries and cream spinach.
Great restaurant...service and food. Steaks outrageous! Dessert something to behold. Since this was a private event we did not order from the full menu, but what we had was wonderful!!!
I've never been to the actual restaurant, but their filet mignon sliders at the United Center are AMAZING!

column3: The BEST service I've ever had!
column4: This was definitely on of my favorite restaurants in the city of Chicago! The food was amazing! You couldn't have asked for a better service, or better food! I'll be back as soon as possible!üç¥üçªüòÑ Give it a try! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Don't miss this one. Steaks are excellent. This is the original location but all locations are great.

column3: Are too much but so worth it
column4: Such a great meal (apart from the free soup - get the salad option). Delicious prawn cocktail and then a fillet steak cooked to perfection with brilliant mash. Book well ahead if you want to get
Very disappointed and very overpriced. The steak had no flavor at all...I would have expected much more...
Top notch steakhouse with non steak entrees as well. Friendly staff who are personable and attentive.generous portions of delicious fare. Well worth a stop on a busy trip.
Food was amazing! Servers were very attentive...would recommend over and over again. Had dinner on the patio...MAKE RESERVATIONS!

Fabulous steaks. We got the 7 oz steaks. They were big & delicious! We had the chocolate mousse pe and it was beyond fabulous! It would feed 6 easily but so worth the calories. Service was very good. Casual dining.
Great service. Generous cocktails. Large steaks perfectly cooked. Servers a great cross between perfunctory and entertaining

column3: The steakhouse that was Sinatra‚Äôs favorite
column4: Had a great dinner and bottle of wine at Gibsons on our trip to Chicago. Lots of history on the walls.
Food & service were excellent, we dined outside, nice atmosphere & it‚Äôs a great people watching place. Very generous portions all cooked perfectly. Staff were very welcoming,friendly & efficient.

This is a great Chicago Steakhouse. Had the NY Strip and it was cooked to perfection and even tasted better. Veggies were fresh and also cooked to perfection. Wait staff were very professional and efficient....
Some friends of mine hosted a wine tasting event at My all time favorite restaurant in the US. Then we followed up with another amazing meal at Gibson‚Äôs.

I had high expectations and I order the dry aged tomahawk, the most expensive steak in the menu. I order it rare, but it was very cold and almost raw. I ask to warm it up, but it came burnt. I was very dissatisfied.
Where else can you dine next to a major sports franchise owner and have the filet mignon of a lifetime? Nothing more need be said.
Food was good without being great. Few of my ribs were clearly burnt crisp. Environment is cool. Service was ok but not overly warm / welcoming
Very good great steaks awesome drinks and service. Prime rib is excellent along with there strip and filets. Sides are large and can definitely be shared.
Went there as a party of four. Sat in bar area for pre-dinner cocktails. Service as friendly and prompt. Excellent bar scene ! Dinner was also excellent but a bit pricey

We thought this was an Italian restaurant but discovered it was a steak house. We didn't order steak, and our meals were okay. I suppose their specialty is steak only. Service was okay as well. Overall experience for the value wasn't exceptional.

Enjoyed the warm hospitality, impeccable service and good food. It is a classic steakhouse with all the good traits of the past. Don‚Äôt expect modern ingredients that will challenge your language skills :) Loved it!
Was told it was a most but other than good service the meat was charred and a bit tough. I am sure there are better expensive steakhouses.

Everything was excellent inside the restaurant, unfortunately at the end the valet (young bold guy) was very rude and mean . Please Gibson contact me for details because I think this kind of behavior is unacceptable :-(

column3: Avoid the Aussie grass fed fillet
column4: Had the 60 buck fillet from Australia grass fed . 12oz . Well allow for the bone 3oz , allow for the fat 4oz , you end up with not a lot Disappointing
Had a very good experience having lunch at Gibson Bar and Steakhouse. The location is extremely convenient the food is excellent and service is good.
Fine dining with my family. Great steak, meatloaf, and huge desserts. Please make Gibsons part of your Chicago dining experience.
Great service but food very poor quality. Steak advertised as prime aged is at best choice. Salad subpar as was the creamed spinach. Would never go back

The service was excellent as was the food!! My son has quite a few life threatening food allergies and his allergies were handled extremely well. My son said the filet he ordered was one of the best he has ever had. We will definitely return.
I was here with a large group and we had a limited menu. Everyone enjoyed their entrees. I had a fantastic steak. The desserts were humongous!
We had a very nice meal, the sirloin and Tomahawk are recommended. Good service and we will be back next year!

The quality of the beef, wine and service are tops! The waiter was super knowledgeable about the source of their steaks and other food. It was interesting to me that Gibson has its own farms to raise the highest quality beef.
Excellent steaks and Burgers. Martinis are some of the best I have ever had. Staff were excellent, service top notch. only down side was no draft beer,bottled only.

column3: At best, Average Lunch for Price
column4: I live in the neighborhood and was hungry for a lobster roll so came here for lunch. Lots of lobster though too much mayo made for a soggy roll. My husband ordered the spicy lobster salad which arrived with no lobster.
wonderful steaks, attentive staff, huge desserts and an excellent piano bar. good times good peeople
Amongst the best steak available! I love their rib eye! Also you can rely on the waiters suggestions. Tasty desert if you have room
Food excellent Great sides and appetizers Nice White fish entree to complement the awesome steak selection Carrot cake wedge the size of your head Complementary valet parking Easy to get to
Came here for a hamburger. Not very tasty. The ambiance is nice. Good pianist. Fell off the stool there too at the piano bar. The bartender made good drinks. Otherwise very average.

We love Gibson‚Äôs we come here every time we are in town They have the best soup, wedge salad, martini, filet sliders and the cheeseburger with peppers and special mayo. We always sit in the bar or outside great atmosphere and people watching

Big, busy and brash!! Great experience here. Huge portions. Couldn‚Äôt eat half of my meal! The service was fantastic. Waiter has been working here for 23 years. Cocktails in the bar are excellent. Do visit!!
This place has some of the best steaks ever. I love come in here great wine great beer great bartender. It is worth the money. Great location. You may run into anyone here. It‚Äôs
Gibsons is my favorite restaurant for a reason-it's simply the best. The best servers, food, ambiance and people watching!!
This is a must go when you are at Chicago. The Filet Mignon was superb!! Try the bookbinders soup. I could have only this. I will be back soon! The service excellent

I was able to attend it late on Sunday, around 8:30 pm. It was crowded but very nice. The steak was spectacular but to big for me. It as good as expected. If in Chicago is a must. Service is nice and very fast.
it was ok great sizes portions etc... but im teling you if you make it to los alamitos ca. try maderas it will change your whole world when it comes to steak

The atmosphere is great..eating outside and watching the world go by is great. Very nice staff, and the food was great..although the Bookbinders soup was not as good as I remembered it to be...but love the whole atmosphere.

column3: Gregory made our evening quite the experience
column4: Another amazing meal at Gibsons. It is our go to place every visit to Chicago. Wonderful wine list (great bottle of Nickel and Nickel) and our favorite steaks. Gregory is very attentive, made our anniversary dinner very special. Well done!!
This is another place I end up at every time I‚Äôm in Chicago. Accommodates large parties well. Great bar. Consistent and excellent service and to me, its the best steak in the city.
Absolutely phenomenal visit. Steaks cooked to perfection, baked potato that was steaming hot, excellent cocktails‚Äîwe enjoyed every bite of our meal, as did our children.
Excellent service, decent prices but overall a perfect experience. Highly recommend the "Marinated Skirt Steak"
One of my favourite places for a steak! Me and my friends loved it. Delicious food and attentive, lovely staff! What else can you ask for?
This is a great steakhouse with excellent service and magnificent steaks !! We both had the filet and they were cooked perfectly ! You will not be disappointed by coming here for your steaks!
The service and hospitality were the best. I know they are known for steaks but I enjoyed the seafood. Scallops were perfect. Desserts are perfect. I wish I had taken pictures.

column3: Great place for a great steak
column4: We were looking for a high-end steakhouse with Chicago flair, and we most certainly found it. Excellent service (not at all pretentious), excellent food. This was a fantastic meal. The W.R.'s Chicago Cut was fabulous. I would highly recommend this place.
Our porterhouse steak was awesome, deserts was huge and the service was outstanding. Highly recommend as we eat here any time we are in Chicago!

column3: You can't go wrong if you like steak......
column4: ........and a traditional dining experience with professional waiters. To me, it's a classic steak and potato place. I'm not a dessert person but the cake slices were HUGE. One of the best bar atmospheres too. If you don't want red meat, select another place.
Went for a birthday lunch the day we arrived. Absolutely wonderful. It is worth every penny. From the drinks, apps, to the unbelievable steak, to the dessert. It was top notch.
Great place. Left off a star bc the bartender poured my Whiskey Sour, which was so-so, realized it was short and stuffed it with ice. Really? Food was great... Miso Sea Bass. Yum.

Another great meal at Gibsons. The atmosphere is perfect and the service is impeccable. Wonderful selection of wines and steak. Had the bone in rib eye. The perfect place show your dominion over the beast.

column3: One of the nice steak places
column4: Unfortunately the seating is very tight and somewhat uncomfortable. The food is very good the service average.
Great birthday dinner. The service and presentations were excellent. The food was superb and gigantic portions. Let me just say save room for desert. The banana cream pie was amazing.
Booked a reservation at Gibson's and glad we did ! The steak was great ! The service and atmosphere were fantastic! My family loved it, also. Will return to Gibson's the next time we are in Chicago.

column3: A great place to have dinner and a nice date!!!
column4: Awesome food, awesome service... sizes are good and you have a great variety of dishes. Would come back for sure!!!
Stopped in for lunch and sat in the bar area. had a couple of sandwiches and drinks. The service was very good for a very busy place. I would go back
Great night spot not just for a delicious dinner but also a happening bar scene. Great food - great atmosphere. Very attentive waiters.
We took our kids to Gibsons as a treat after the holiday. The food was delicious! Our kids were treated very well and they all enjoyed their meals.

Gibson's is always busy and somewhat loud but also an overall special evening. Food presentation is good, steaks are excellent. Deserts are enormous and the service that I have received at four different occasions has always been attentive and entertaining.
We ate here on our anniversary trip, the steaks and atmosphere were amazing. Make sure you share the sides they are huge as are the steak portions!
Great Service, Huge portions especially the deserts! Food was amazing. Will be going back on my next trip to Chicago!

column3: So good that came back again
column4: If you like Steaks, this is the place to go to. One of the best rib-eyes that I have eaten! Be careful not to eat too much of the tasty bread, save the room for the steak

I have always wanted to go to Gibsons, but never had the time. I was not disappointed. Food and service were both absolutely amazing! We lucked out and got a table by the window too! Can't wait to go back!
Great place, great atmosphere, great dining. Location is very close to O‚ÄôHare International Airport, which is very interesting if one needs to catch a flight.
Gibson‚Äôs is good but I have had better steaks in other restaurants. The service was very good. It was a little crowded and noisy but I guess that‚Äôs because it is popular.
Excellent experience with great food, extensive wine list, friendly service and a vibrant atmosphere!

column3: Saturday Night Dinner during a Conference Weekend
column4: Great Atmosphere! Long wait but we got a table in the Bar Area right away. Service was a little slow but they were packed. Friendly and courteous Service. My highlight was an Appetizer of Crab and Avocado. Food was prompt and filling.
Prepare to mortgage your house and live the dream, they serve the best steak I have ever had a fortune of eating !
if you are looking for a power lunch spot then Gibson's is the place to go. great steaks, good extras and entertaining and attentive service are yours to be had. enjoyed this alot

Beef outstanding, We have several different choices and no one complain about. Oysters as appetizers was great and fresh. Service was very good, we didn't have room for the dessert, huge by the way. Reservations highly recommended.

The best steak this side of the Hudson!! The service and atmosphere were amazing and we would highly recommend coming here for any occasion!! P.S. The Brussels sprouts and steak were the best we ever had!! Watch out Peter Luger!
We were on our way to South Bend and stopped for an authentic Chicago experience. This is it. Hustle and bustle with great atmosphere and excellent steaks. A must visit if you‚Äôre there

A table in the bar, martinis, good steaks ...a memorable evening ... the staff were attentive as ever and the martinis simply sublime and very large. The NY Strip was cooked perfectly washed down with a fine Merlot. Can‚Äôt wait to return
I liked, but it was not super special. Maybe I am just being too picky. The soup and coleslaw were delicious, the meat as well.

Went there by myself without a reservation on a Sunday evening. It was the best steak I've ever had. Ordered the filet mignon with asparagus. It was simply fantastic. Great service and a great location near my Hilton Hotel. Would go again any time!
Make sure you book a table in advance. This is a truly good, vibrant and crowded spot with extensive wine list, great coctails and high quality food
Great service and food, as expected. This was our first trip to Chicago and was a must. Go to go if you like good steaks!
We went there with a lot of expectations because everyone recommended this place, so it was great... feels very local and cozy... french fries were just ok though
Wow! where to begin! This is our absolute favorite restaurant in Chicago! dinner in the bar area is awesome! The best bartenders around!
Excellent food and professional staff. They know heir steak that‚Äôs for sure! We enjoyed everything we ate. The portions are huge so bring your appetite.
Gibson‚Äôs on a rainy afternoon is an old favorite. Glass of wine and snack sit in the window people watch

Great steaks, cooked to perfection, seasoned so that the flavors come alive. Tasty sides, wonderful wine list, and deserts that'll kill you with calories and quantity. Still right there, among the best in the country.

column3: Great Food Great Location Great People Watching
column4: Location, Location and Location oh and good food. People are great looking and food is really good. Fun place to grab drinks, apps or full meal. It's for mingling and checking out good looking people. Networking and great food so you can't go wrong.
The steak was pretty good and the atmosphere was pretty good. Unfortunately, for over $250 I would expect a hell of a lot more than "pretty good". We went to Joe's last year and it was far superior.
So good. Definitely, one to visit if you are in Chicago. The steak and everything else is great. There is no way you will leave hungry. the portions are huge
Arrived to late but it was no problem at all. Service was absolutely excellent besides the guy who was constantly pooring the water. The steak was delisious.

We had the best Experience; Atmosphere fantastic; The Manager Scott Sciriha and the Waitress Elvis created the best ambience four our celebration. They are very professional; make sure to request Elvis !!!!!
If was a wonderful meal to end our trip on. Appetizers were delicious, good steak and lobster, double baked potato is a must as a side. Desserts must be sharedüòÅ.
Went this week to see if it was as good as I remembered and bar and Restraunt were amazing You cannot go wrong with any of their steaks It is expensive but lives up to the reputation

column3: Special occasions are well done!! Excellent!!
column4: I hosted a business dinner here and the service was fantastic. They accommodated us in every way. The food was top notch.

Outstanding service from 'veteran', experienced servers. Outstanding quality of beef. Outstanding oysters. Great wine list. Need I say more? $550 for 3 people for a business dinner including tip. Pricey but to be expected at this level.

column3: Great hospitality and food, no minimum spending for big group
column4: Having a big group of guests, Gibsons is the only restaurant that I've booked and did not specify a minimum spending. Nevertheless, food and service did not compromise.
Full on a Monday night. Service was good and good was equally good. Had the WR's rib eye steak which was a 22oz steak for $57. Sides were also very good.
Went with the traditional Eggs Benedict and Bloody Mary. Bisque was divine! Server was wonderful. Helpful with other restaurant suggestions. Highly recommend!!

I always enjoy a visit to Gibson's while in downtown Chicago. Starting with a fantastic old fashioned and ending with the 22oz bone-in USDA prime ribeye aged 40 days. Perfectly cooked to medium rare. Amazing!!!
I'm a connoisseur of beef. I will eat and finish only the finest tastiest cuts of beef. I highly recommended this steakhouse.
Great place for a business dinner! The food and the service was amazing. The prime rib, steak, and lobster was excellent. Prompt fast and friendly service. Definitely worth the visit.
Gibson's is known for steak, but also has very good food for lunch. Had the Turkey Club and it was excellent. Also recommend the shoe string potatoes.
This was a recommendation to come from a friend. First time visit and totally impressed. The food was great and the service as well. I will definitely be back!

Great service. Good soup. I had ribeye and it was cooked perfectly. Top 10 steak. Good fries. Wife and son had filet. Hers was ok. Not a ton of taste. His was cooked less and was better. Overall a good experience
The food is exceptional, the service is outstanding, the atmosphere is terrific. What more is there to say. Had a great time in the bar after dinner. We will definitely be back.
We lucked out getting an outdoor table on a very busy night. Our server was top notch and very helpful with the wine list. High prices, but high quality.

column3: No better pace for a steak
column4: A wonderful surprise awaits you. The atmosphere, the service and the steak are second to none. Leave room for the ridiculously large deserts.

The food was great and the service was top notch. I had the 22 oz ribeye and it was cooked to perfection. The baked potato was also delicious. This place is not exactly cheap but you definitely get what you pay for here.
Can't complain about anything. We had a terrific waiter in Dan, delicious filets, perfectly paired wine, and a stellar time. Get the Brussels Sprouts! They're cooked with bourbon and bacon.
What a memorable dinner. Richard was fantastic as was the rest of the staff. The food was amazing. Had the Chicago Cut (the ribeye) and it was awesome. Thanks for an amazing dinner!

We liked the place even though there are too many tables for the size of the property and, everyone seems to celebrate birthdays... The steaks are simply amazing and there is a very good wine selection and service.
Was in town for lollapalooza and this place is always a predictable stop on my trips to Chicago. I always enjoy my dinners at Gibson's a classic.
The location is great right in front of the mariano park. The place is old but with luxury. The servers are friendly, corteous and they know the menu from heart.
The steak is sensationally good, the wine selection is terrific and the martinis are....generous. Friendly, efficient service. Be sure to book.

This place is an experience. You basically choose your steak and then a side, and the sides are huge, best for sharing. I enjoyed my dinner but my steak was too charred, although it was still tasty. I would go back for sure!

Dont go there if. You don't like pretty girls. Don't like amazing food. Don't like the best bar scene in Chicago. Don't like spending money. Don't like tipping for great service. Don't like enjoying yourself!
As long as you what you are in for, then this is a great place for steaks. Crowded? Yes! Expensive? Yes indeed. But delicious.

Been coming here for 25 years always the best always fresh and cooked to perfection. I love this place and would reconnect it to anyone who loves a great steak incredible atmosphere and a real taste of Chicago ...

Pricey but worth it! The steaks are incredible, good wine list, incredible service. We'll be back on our next visit....NOTE: Make sure to make your reservation in advance, this was our 3rd visit and no matter the day of the week, Gibson's is ALWAYS crowded!!

Carl was our server and was excellent. He gave recommendation of adding Cajun seasoning and it was unbelievable. Great atmosphere and service. Portions are very generous and you will not leave hungry.

Recommended to us as the best place to eat steaks in Chicago. Absolutely superb filet mignon .As my wife does not eat meat she ordered shrimp cocktail which was also fresh and delicious. Faultless service and the whole dining experience was outstanding.

Ordered shrimp cocktail.. was the largest shrimp I have ever seen. Very fresh and delicious. Also has muscles followed by the largest slice of chocolate cake I have ever seen! Had to take it to go. Took me three days to finish.

first time in chicago...first stop...Gibson's Bar & Steakhouse!!! A Chicago MUST...not only the ambience and food are crazy off the hook...Zach at the bar rings the bell with hospitality and knowledge of Chicago's best of the best...of course only second to Gibson's.

We booked this restaurant 2 weeks prior to our visit to beautiful Chicago, and we are so grateful we did! What an awesome evening on the patio. Definitely go hungry! The meal was my favourite during our stay. Highly recommend this restaurant!!
We continue to come back everytime we visit Chicago. Great steaks accomanied by a great staff. Very friendly & always accommodating! Try the ginourmous desserts!!! Enough for the whole family!
nice staff. relaxed atmosphere. best steaks & the most insane desserts. make sure you arrive hungry!!!
Great food accompanied by equally good service. Good place to hang and people watch. Great bar with very good appetizers.
Loved! Sat outside with a view of Rush! Swanky inside! David was our waiter and he was the best ever for the sheer fact he didn't rush us! Best burger ever!

column3: Old school steak house with piano bar.
column4: A Chicago classic with a traditional menu and great cocktails. The piano bar (requests taken) was a blast!
Dined here in a private room for a pre-board meeting dinner., Excellent service and quality food, drinks and dessert ! All pro and no cons to this place.

column3: Filet was great but salads not so great
column4: I went here on vacation. The filet was perfect. It was cooked to my liking and request. The salads were average. I thought they were bland for a steakhouse with these prices. Service was a excellent. Very attentive.
There is a good reason this is a Chicago landmark... It's really that good... the food was awesome and the service was perfect.

column3: Very good steakhouse to discover in Chicago !
column4: If you like steak and good meat , it's a place to discover . Choice of meat and Level of cooking is explained before to order ! And in the Plate it's really delicious . It's prefered to have a r√©servation .
One of our favorite restaurants when visiting Chicago! The food and service are excellent and reminds me of the old school chop houses. We will be back again and again with our family.
The atmosphere is good. Wait staff are nice and helpful. One of my favorite steak places in Chicago. Steak is Amazing and the desserts are huge!! Highly recommend!!
If you want a traditional steak house setting with great steak, this is it. Flavourful, tender steaks cooked very well. Side dishes are huge!!!

Ordered the 22 oz WR cut steak. It tasted quite well, although it was quite bot of a mouthful. The ice cream desert was a bit over the top, and quite heavy to finish with. Would have preferred without the desert.

Great Steakhouse and the sides are special as well. Fun atmosphere, the waiters are old school and very attentive. Be careful......the portions are large like the price but the experience is worth the adventure. The location is close to the Handcock.
I had a light lunch and enjoyed the Bookbinder soup and the kale, avocado and artichoke salad. Three types of bread accompanied my order and they were all fresh and tasty. Service is outstanding.
PROs- -great menu selection -reasonable prices -good wine selection -great service (Andy) Cons- -tables too close to each other -very noisy- should consider some noise abatement

column3: Gibsons Service Leaves You Feeling Special
column4: If you live in the neighborhood, you know there are plenty of reasons why Gibsons is always busy. They treat you like family and the food is phenomenal! Consistency is key, I've never had a bad time there! LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!

Gibsons is a great steakhouse, the food is very good here, and the steaks are cooked perfectly. Every dish was well cooked. It is busy, tables are close together. Leave space for desert ! 1 cake slice can feed the whole table of 4 !
A steakhouse winner with fabulous service. Doesn't get any better than that. Roasted cauliflower is a "wow" side. And the Jerry Cherry pie dessert is to die for.
Everything is very tasty here at gibson's Came for dinner with friends and superb meal..oysters..salads, fish&steaks. Every dish was excellant Great service
Love the steaks here they are really tender and juicy that melt in your mouth. Love the sauces. We got great service from the staff here some of the best I have every experienced.

This is The happening spot, great bourbon selection, sit at the piano with Lloyd, he's fabuous! Valet parking available just off Michigan ave. Service was great, didn't have a chance to try it but the desserts looked amazing!

column3: Business related dining did not disappoint.
column4: Outstanding place for a private business dinner. Fabulous food and quick and efficient presentation and service. The steaks and seafood are amazing, as are the desserts here...
Excellent steaks, knowledgeable and friendly staff. The bar area gets very crowded. Sadly, the mashed potatoes tasted more boxed than fresh.

column3: The absolute best steak I have ever had
column4: This is the place where I had the best steak, ever. Not a lie, not an exaggeration it was the best. I have had steak in NY, Florida, Houston and Dallas and a half dozen other top steak places but Gibson is the best.

column3: Perfect for Red Wine and Red Meat
column4: While Gibson's can offer great seafood, the selections of meat are incredible.... Knowledgeable servers make the experience perfect!
Always a great place to be, from the food, to the people, you cannot go wrong here, must stop staple in Chicago
Service was outstanding by all! Food was amazing! Everything was timely. Menu was authentic and grande. Food portions were ample. Blew me away!

column3: Best Steak in a long Time
column4: One of the traditional amazing steak houses of Chicago, in bone rib eye or a mignon are spectacular. Great wine selection. Must have a reservation days before.

Whenever we are in Chicago we have to stop by Gibson's. We love everything about this place. From the atmosphere, to the service and the food. If you are in Chicago and looking for a great steak experience, then you must go here!

column3: One of the best restaurants in Chicago
column4: Always have the best meal with the best service. I can honestly say the steak is better then any other I have ever had

We went here for an early dinner on a Thursday night and it was excellent! We loved the food and shared the bone in porterhouse! Service was awesome as well. Plus we're fans of the show "The League" and loved seeing the sign outside!
Our meal at Gibsons was fantastic. We had amazing service by our waiter, Zach. The steak, sides and wine were delicious.

The filet, twice baked potato & salad were ALL very good! Our waiter was super informative & gave us some good suggestions. Full house that night, but it didn't take a long time for our meal. Will definitely return on my next trip to Chicago!
I just went in for a glass of wine but the wine and cocktails at this restaurant were highly overpriced.

Famous for sure, but a little touristy, They turned our table, which was interesting. The food is really good but not world class. The prices are certainly a level above the food. Staff was attentive.

A real special occasion spot. Food is excellent and service is superlative. Steaks are among the best in the the city. Ask for the porch for a quieter setting and views of the Viagra Triangle (Rush Street).
Food is fantastic Even catered for our off menu request Couldn't fit in dessert but they looked yummy A must!
Service. Outstanding. Ambience. Outstanding. Food. Outstanding. Combine those three and you have a great experience. Brought kids for first upscale meal. We all loved every minute. Well done!

Wonderful in every way!!! Service, food and wine were the best ever!! Service was very attentive and the food was to die for. From the salad to the dessert everything was beyond delicious. Will definitely go back on my next visit to Chicago.
Elegant and refined, you will not enjoy a better steak anywhere. Met Sidney Poitier there but I wouldn't trade meeting hem for the steak I had.
I will go to Gibson's just about any time! Great food, atmosphere, service and bar service. Some of the best steaks in town. Everything is good and I never had a bad meal there.
When ever we go to Chicago,our grandson loves to go here. The steaks and sides are large and good and he gets two meals out of dinner. The staff is also very good.
Truly great steakhouse, lobster Mac to die for. I actually got their burger this time. Unreal. Worth it to side step their steaks for this one. And the desserts ,,, just save room.
It is a very nice lunch location. The atmosphere winks at old Chicago and has stellar service. The potions were good size and it was easy to have a steak sliced and served family style.
I visited this place several times and I always enjoyed it. Rockefeller oysters are my favorite entree, but place is known for its steaks which are splendid. Well done

Great lively atmosphere. Need to be patient while waiting for table because it is well worth the wait. Steaks are so delicious and salad was outstanding. MAKE SURE you leave room for the dessert it has to be the best in Chicago!
Perfect Steak and sides. Good location, nice bar. The Chicago steak is absolutely a good choice. You can share, 22 oz. Good price, better than Weber grill and others.
Excellent lobster, and bone in filet was awesome. Service was great. It was slightly less then $100 per person on the bill, and that was with 2 shared apitizers. We will be back, it is well worth it.

I got the Prime Rib and it was fantastic. Our server was Mohamed. He made the evening with his help with the incredible selection of steaks. He explained everything on the menu with just enough humor. He is worth your request as a server.
Never had a bad meal or bad service here. Crabmeat avacado app. is awesome. French Dip . GREAT. Bar gets jammed but staff is very attentitive

Nice atmosphere, very good meat and desserts, the gumbo not as good as the rest of the food but it was ok. Mi wife enjoyed the salad very much, prices are average high as any other restaurant of its kind, Gladly would come back again.
This is the best steakhouse, and we always go here when in Chicago. The prices are expensive, but food and drinks are high quality. Always excellent service!

column3: Not to be missed if you're in Chicago
column4: This is a lively, boisterous restaurant with amazing food, terrific service, and a wonderful atmosphere. I've eaten here at least 10 times over the last 10 years and always had a great meal.

We took our two teenage sons to Chicago on our way to visit family for Thanksgiving and wanted them to experience a real mid-western steakhouse. Gibson's did not disappoint. It's infinitely hard to impress teenagers and our meals did the trick.. especially the desserts! Fantastic!

We were about to sit outside on the patio for brunch in November in Chicago! The food was typical Gibson quality. Brunch offerings are plentiful and delicious. We always try to stop at a Gibson's when we in the Chicago area.
One of the top steak places in Chicago. If you love steaks, you will love Gibsons, at least until the check is brought out.

Went to Gibsons for lunch before heading out of town. As always, the hostess was friendly, we were seated at a nice table in the enclosed room by the street, and the food was perfect! Can't wait to come back!
Went here with family and friends. Cool atmosphere, fun drinks, food amount was huge! Potatoes where yummy! Dessert was delcious. Very different!

A friend of mine who went to college in Chicago "sometime ago" took me to Gibson. Fell in love with it warm friendly and I'm guessing traditional Chicago bar. Food was good Drink selection wide Piano player accomplished Felt right at home
Great food and venue. Extremely busy and best book early to ensure a table. Beat steaks I have ever tasted

Amazing steaks and sides with great service. Our waiter explained about the various meats on offer and the sizes of the sides and how many we would need. Reasonably priced wine in a city where it can be pretty expensive

column3: Great Steak - Not a Fancy Location
column4: Our hotel concierge recommended this place. The steaks were really incredible. Our server was awesome. You could tell he loved his job and knew it well - very nice and professional. The facility was a little run-down, but I think that's part of the nostalgia.
Asked waitress for reco and she suggested salmon over salad, It was awesome.Lite and tasty. My only regret is that I didn't have a steak.
Very busy buzzy popular restaurant. Tables are crammed together. A bit like fast food rather than a quality dining experience. Food was good but not great. Wouldn't go back.
We had an amazing lunch at the bar with Rich the bartender. Fantastic Bloody Mary and Filet sliders. Great service. We had many great meals in Chicago but this was the best!
Where do I start. The minute I got my filet steak I wanted to drool. The soup and their salad amazing. By far best place. I can't wait to go back to chicago to eat there.
Great place for a steak but even better for a martini in the bar. Great atmosphere and live piano music... knows all the tunes and plays requests. Be ready to break out the wallet but worth it!
The beef barley soup was excellent. One of our steaks was not cooked enough. The steak was good however, we have had better. Service was excellent.
The food is great and the atmosphere is always festive. The staff in the bar is the best in the country!!
Large portions and great food. A little more upscale than I originally though but was pleased all the same. If you are wanting great meal out either as a couple or group this place is great.
Make sure and arrive Hungry, the steaks are huge and very good. The service is good. Its a busy place .

everything about Gibsons was perfect ! the was amazing, the service ok good had a greeat dinner with my family ! we recomended the filet mignon , the mashed potatoe and the sauteed spinach ! fresh food :) filet mignon was very good
The food was good but not great. Actually, after all I had read about this place it just didn't meet my expectations. Maybe as a Texan a Chicago aged beef steak isn't so special.
I was excited to eat here because so many people talked about it. I had this fish soup that was pretty good. I love the vibe and would return. Packed every night.
Looks like old-style Chicago although it's only 28 years old. Excellent steaks cooked to perfection! Friendly service.
WOW. Awesome in all regards. Hosted business meal for 125 folks. The service and food was top notch. I had steak and Lobster. But many had the Sea Bass and said it was fantastice

The steaks at Gibson's are always perfectly aged and prepared. The Chicago cut bone in ribeye is the choice. Well marbled and textured. The outside is seared to give a sweet crust and texture. I normally ordered medium rare and the temperature was perfect.
Great night at Gibsons steakhouse. Had a great dinner with friends. Steak was very good, service was ok hence the 4 stars. It is an icon in Chicago and worth the visit.
We loved this place! Piano bar and great food and drinks! Can't wait to go back! Give it a try, I'm sure you'll enjoy it!
Went here with our son for his birthday celebration . Staff very good and food was superb definitely recommend.

column3: Popular Named Restaurant but Not worth the Cost
column4: The service was good and the Atmosphere was classic. The food was average at best. The meat was not very tender even though I ordered the best cut of meat on the menu.
I have been going to Gibsons for years. The food is spectacular as is the service . Portions are huge . I always dine in the bar area. It can be difficult to get a table but I always manage .
Excellent meal. Fabulous steaks and seafood cooked to perfection . Excellent chocolate cake for desert . Great lively atmosphere. Very energetic bar. Will definitely return

column3: My favorite steakhouse in the city
column4: I've eaten here many times. Great steaks and fish. Always crowded so make a reservation. If you decide to go at the last minute , no problem, relax at the bar and people watch.

If you're in Chicago you can't miss this place. The food, the wine, the atmosphere, the history, and of course the incredible steaks! -seasoned and cooked to perfection- along with good company, all contribute to a very special dining experience.
We ate with our traveling folks for dinner here, the food was oh my gosh good!!! the service was great, you can tell they have old time employees. Very busy recommend reservations only.

Great place to visit. We enjoyed a patio seat. The steak was outstanding. We enjoyed outstanding service from Emilee. The wait is often long but the bar area and patio are first come first serve. Great spot if you are looking for Chicago classic steak.
A wonderful experience, both food and service excellent! The portion sizes were more than fair and a good recommendation to all

I was taken to Gibsons for my birthday while in on a business trip to Chicago this past week. Great experience all around from being greeted at the hostess stand to meeting the manager during dinner. The food was spectacular.
Delightful busy place with great staff and the most delicious steaks. There is a good choice of other dishes too. Always packed so do book ahead.

Is there private parking available? I want to take my wife out this weekend, and we stay quite a distance from the restaurant. So taking public transportation is out of the ?. If anyone knows please fill me in.

column3: The best steak in the USA
column4: Everytime I book a trip to Chicago, first I book airfare then I make a reservation at Gibsons. I have been a dozen time and I always got fantastic service, amazing ambiance and of course great food and wine.

The service was impecable and food was great. My husband had the Prime Rib and I had the filet Mignon. We ordered a Wedge Salad and two side dishes. The cauliflower with Gouda cheese and spinach. Be aware the portions are big.
We went for lunch and split the ribeye with hollandaise sauce and a twice baked potato. Everything was wonderful.
Located off Michigan ave in downtown Chicago Steak was just OK, other dishes were OK service was good

column3: A king of King's ! Fantastic food and service!
column4: What a great place! I had the garbage salad and the T-bone super fantastic to say the least! Gibsons is a Chicago Icon that remains one of the. Best! Adam the outside manager was the best, great food and a great time!
Awesome place and amazing meats here, some of the best I have ever had before. Frequented by many celebrities, it¬¥s easy to understand why. We had great service from the table staff.
Service sets Gibson's apart from the rest. Great place to eat. Steaks are top quality. Lobster roll was great with large chunks of lobster. Made sure everything was perfect. Cannot go wrong here

Talk about old-time Chicago. Oh, yeah...Gibson's is the place. Of course the food is impeccable but the real draw for my daughter and me are the waiters....what lady doesn't like to be flirted with? Charming charmers are what they are. Have the grape martini....yum yum.

column3: Great food but a little pricey!
column4: We didn't have a reservation so we had to settle for a not so great table location but the staff was very attentive. We enjoyed the food but felt the pricing was a little high. Over $ 50 for any steak
Ordered scallops, filet mignon, salads & soups, creamed spinach and blue cheese potatoes. Fabulous meal. Outstanding wine list. A must do

Great location, good food and people watching at this Chicago dining institution. Arrived at the end of lunch, but waiter was extremely accommodating and managed to get me a delicious Lobster Cobb Salad. Perfect, dry martini with bleu cheese olives.
Had the surf and turf. Lobster was mouth watering. Pepper coated filet was cooked perfectly. The mashed potatoes and mushrooms as sides were great too.

I just recently went to this location last Friday. The service from the staff was amazing. The dishes were amazing. I actually tried oysters for the first time. They are so delicious! :-) Overall, I will definitely be back again. Five stars
Good restaurant I have good steak And staff very nice too Nice restaurant Little princess Still ok $$$$

had supper here , great experience staff friendly and attentive during the whole meal, steaks were cooked to perfection and great choices, sides as well were good, great wine list as well, I wouldn't normally pay this much for a steak but wow good experience

column3: What can you say ? Chicago and steaks !
column4: Place is awesome ! Steaks like nowhere else ! Super service and award winning meats ! Excellent location for any business or dinner with friends and family !
Great service; amazing desserts and really good steaks and salads. Atmosphere is cool. Excellent wine list and great vibe.
A great restaurant, we went twice. Excellent steaks, very good side dishes (good portions to share) and great desserts (huge). Excellent service!
suc a nice bar and restaurant, they served Stella Artois beer ! and the steak was delicious. we did order to many side orders, but the mushrooms were so good

column3: What a fun rerstaurant and great food
column4: Absolutely the best steakhouse for food and fun. Everyone delivers world class service. The bone in filet mignon was awesome and the ambience friendly and lively

column3: Great steaks, burgers and fun for people watching
column4: Great choices for steaks and burgers as well as specialty items. If you have kids, a good choice if you sit outdoors. A little noise won't make a difference.
A group of us had a great meal at Gibson's. Steaks were cooked perfectly. The martinis were excellent. The wait staff, especially Mohammed, were friendly and helpful. We had a great time.
Stopped in for a couple martinis (pear) and to see our favorite server Sally (She's the best part of Gibsons) in the bar area Always a great spot to stop when in the arush street area
Expensive but very good. Very very busy, you have to book if you want an indoor table. We booked for 8 pm and didn't get our table till nearly 9 pm.
We stopped for lunch and sat at the terrace outside, to enjoy the nice weather. We had mainly salads and a few main dishes (party of 7). Everything was very good. My BABY BACK RIBS were excellent.

We only had drinks at the bar at Gibson's on Friday (early afternoon). The bartender was a lovely man who took great care of us. Wonderful drinks and atmosphere. I ended up buying a gift certificate for a relative to enjoy a lunch on me.

Wow! What a place. Food was fantastic! My husband had the steak, I had the sea bass and my son had the crab dinner. Everything was sooooo good. Definitely a gold mine. Thanks to Yvonne Alton at the Swissotel for requesting this reataurant.
Dinner for 4. Top notch from start to finish. Great service, excellent food and dessert. We would come back in anytime. Great place for all types of dinners. Business or romantic.

I recommend trying the restaurant at lunchtime. There is outside seating in warm weather, with great people watching. The filet sliders on the lunch menu are amazing - and an amazing value; I highly recommend.

column3: Birthday dinner. Totally amazing. We were here over 2 hours,every minute treated like royalty. David is a superb server.
column4: Steak was sooooo good. I got 10 oz. Filet, brother and sister other cuts,and equally pleased. Carrot cake would have served 9. We split top layer three ways and took rest to go. Highly recommended but very expensive. $100 plus each, but so worth it.

column3: Best service in a very long time
column4: I enjoyed Gibsons amazing fabulous service top notch I have received in such a very long time and food was outstanding it something you have to eat at if your ever in Chicago
This is a happening place. Reservations are a must. Very lively, but old fashioned steak house. Side dishes are extra and carrot cake is a must!!
We went for a late lunch and not Dissapointed. The food overall was good. Service was ok but meat quality was excellent.
This was our 2nd time to gibsons in chicago. Trust me if you love steak and great friendly service, there's no better place. I'll return again,again, and again.

Great food with the most amazing desserts. Must share one with multiple friends. Lobster was great. Steak was really good. We had a party of 8 and shared two desserts and had leftovers! We had the turtle and the carrot cake.
We had 5 30 reservations on a Thursday and the restaurant was full. Always a good sign. We had a great dinner. The service was terrific and food was delicious. Would absolutely go again.
The price is quite high, but the quality of the food and the portion of the dishes let you not to think about it
My wife and I ate dinner here four our anniversary. The service was excellent and the food was very good as well. The sides are huge and best shared. Not cheap, but very good.
Really good and selected restaurant with an outstanding high quality service. The restaurant is basically specialised in different types of meat. All of them superb. Also a very good wine offer.
A reservation is a must, since we still had a bit of wait. Well worth it. Excellent food and service. Quite noisy and crowded, but worth the experience!
Ambiance, atmosphere and staff made for a fantastic evening. The food is unforgettable - well crafted, served with flare and top notch delicious.

Traveling with my sons and husband, a restaurant serving steak is always a no-brainer. But Gibson's was even better. The best steak they had EVER had. And they had two different cuts. I had the salmon which was also to die for.
This lived up to its reputation. A classic American steakhouse has kept the old time feel with great food and service.
I have been to many steakhouses across the USA and Canada. This is #1 on my list. The menu has numerous choices of cuts. My favorite is the W cut. The service is very good.

column3: Great place for a business dinner w/ clients
column4: Classy, great atmosphere, excellent steaks and wine selection. Other menu choices also are fantastic. Perfect spot to take clients!

Fantastic atmosphere, busy busy busy busy, the staff just new there thing, worked like clockwork, the desserts are to share huge serves. Could have been a scene in any old time movie, and great steak!

The most delicious crab and avocado salad ive ever had, served with warm bread!! super efficient service and a buzzing atmosphere. i could have sat there all night listening to the piano man, his music created the atmosphere! 10/10 for gibsons!

This is one of the best steakhouses in the mid-west! It is a real power joint on M-SA nights; more families/couples on Sundays. Love the food and I would recommend this for anyone who wants the best Chicago beef experience!

Great restaurant, great food, great service, great attitude. A great dining experience. Always make their guest feel like a million dollars. They fully understand what it takes to operate a successful restaurant!
This is a fantastic steakhouse! The entrees are plentiful and the sides are enough to share with others. The wait staff is very attentive to the customers needs.
My husband and I had a good time at this bar. We had the Bookbinders soup which has still left a good taste in my mouth. The blue cheese dressing was also excellent.

It's a great steak, great place, great enviroment.. I recommend you reserve if you want to sit outside or upstairs .. Bar area is open with no reservation.. The Chicago cut steak and salads are great.. It is pricy but super

Great steak, massive servings, twice baked potatoes were fantastic. The waitress was kind and fun, making suggestions and supplying information. Drinks were really good "shes peachy" (think that was the name) was really good. Overall great atmosphere and staff.
The experts in doing steak. They catered for our party of 16 in an amazing way. Would strongly recommend and hope to go again. Great appetisers and desserts to as others have mentioned.
Classic Chicago steakhouse. Great reviews weren't wrong. Great service, knowledgeable wait staff, perfect bone-in ribeye. Large portions. Get reservations WAY ahead!
Been 20 years since I was last there and it hasn't changed a bit. Everything was fantastic. You want a good steak, go here. Will definitely be back!
Very enjoyable dining experience. Sat outside. Server couldn't have been any more attentive. I had the beef barley soup which was fantastic. Chicago Rib Eye is highly recommended.

column3: Best Steaks and Amazing Carrot Cake
column4: Always top notch service, always quality meat and fish. Yes i said Fish at the top Steakhouse in Chicago, the Halibut and Lobster rival some f the top fish houses. Prices for what you get are fairly reasonable. Who gives you soup or salad downtown...More

We were in Chicago for a friend's wedding and four of us decided we wanted an old fashioned Chicago steak. This restaurant was within walking distance from our downtown hotel. It definitely fit the bill! The steak was cooked perfectly for each of us. The waitress was so helpful. She suggested that each couple split salads and sides as they were more than generous and she was correct. We had an after dinner drink in the bar where a pianist was playing songs and the crowd was singing along. It was a really lovely evening.
Classic Chicago steakhouse. Great reviews weren't wrong. Great service, knowledgeable wait staff, perfect bone-in ribeye. Large portions. Get reservations WAY ahead!

First night in Chicago, Gibson's for dinner. It came highly recommend and it lived up to it reviews. Zach our waiter made it even more special. He was personable and helpful. He took the time to ask where we were from and write us a list of must sees/dos/eats/drinks- he was an amazing guy all around. Plus the food was delicious and so were the drinks. A bit pricey, but we expected that.
Been 20 years since I was last there and it hasn't changed a bit. Everything was fantastic. You want a good steak, go here. Will definitely be back!
Very enjoyable dining experience. Sat outside. Server couldn't have been any more attentive. I had the beef barley soup which was fantastic. Chicago Rib Eye is highly recommended.

My daughter and I always enjoy sitting outside when weather permits. You are given a generous plates of assorted breads and butter almost immediately after siting down. Even the staff in the ladies lounge are courteous and prompt. The cocktails are great! Very generous and "packed with a delicious punch" so it makes the price point worth it. Our severs have always been wonderful! One of our favorites spots to go to. We try to go later in the afternoon to miss the "after work" crowd. The place is famous and packed!

column3: Best Steak in a Steak Town
column4: They have a lot on their menu including a great Book Binder Soup and the Garbage Salad but the steaks are unbelievable. Their aging process and the 800 degree searing to trap in the juices makes for special eating. A little bleu cheese on top and it's heaven. Even the pepper steak salad is terrific.Service is impeccable and the people and car watching from the patio is a plus. It seems like every exotic car in the city drives down Rush St. Make a reservation.

A very nice and busy restaurant in Chicago. My steak was made to perfection as I wanted. Hardly any good restaurant can make a good baked potato but Gibson made it to as it suppose to be soft and the colour was perfect.  A must visit if in Chicago area.

I would have given a higher score but unfortunately even though we had a booking, which they had co firm d we still had a 45 minute wait.  Great restaurant and we were given complimentary starters which were excellent. Wonderful atmosphere and we really enjoyed the food, excellent  Just slightly marred by the waiting period and perhaps if we had 't just flown seven hours that day it wouldn't have been as big of an issue  So, I definitely recommend the restaurant and of course make sure you have a booking.
Great steaks with nice presentation. The service was very good and the ambiance was pleasant. I would return and recommend this restaurant for carnivores!

column3: Food good, sizes huge, service ok, place to "be seen"
column4: So the food is average as far as fine dining is concerned. Thee portions are very very large! Especially their desserts! THeir bread basket is really really good! Service is ok. People go here to be seen. It is slightly too crowded and loud.

It's a Chicago institution in the Gold Coast, close to Michigan Avenue. You gotta go with the steak; my personnel favorite is the porterhouse or the bone in rib eye. Garlic mashed potatoes are a must as well. One of the best in Chicago.
Had a wonderful casual lunch with my wife this past Sunday afternoon. The people watching can't be better on Rush but the food is actually very good here. Service is excellent and attentive.
If you want a great piece of meat this is the place. Located in one of the rtrendiest localitons. Highly recommend it.

Food was excellent! Staff very attentive, pleasant and helpful! The shrimp appetizer had the largest shrimp...and tasted great! Steak was exceptional...Would definitely recommend this as a place to find great food and service!

Gibson's is ones of Chicago's top steakhouse and does not disappoint. Tried extremely delicious oysters and then the filet mignon was melting into your mouth. Don't miss the double baked potatoe. Great for both business and family meetings.
The food was good! Atmosphere was nice! I had the peppercorn on my steak which made it too spicy and I normally like this added to my steak but this was too much.
Went all out and got the Tomahawk. It was a great cut of meat, expertly cooked and well served. The sides were great as well and the service was top notch.
We attended a private party in the upstairs room. Cocktails, appetizers and a complete buffet with hand carved Beef Tenderloin. Everything was very good. Have a very friendly staff.
We went here recently for my birthday, Elvis was our server and honestly he made our experience so great! He was very knowledgeable and friendly. The meal was outstanding the portions were huge!

The Boardroom is available for parties of 15-20. We had a wonderful dinner with 16 for our daughter's graduation celebration. Two dedicated waiters served us with great flair and suggestions. It was delightful!

Great steakhouse in Chicago. Enjoyed oysters, shrimp and a great dinner. Make sure you make a reservation as its gets busy. It's in a very trendy area with lots of dinning options but Gibsons is one of the best.

We were able to pop in and sit out on the patio for dinner. The food was excellent, great wine choices too. The service was on spot. The streak was very good and cooked to perfection. Great location to the hustle and bustle night life!
Very nice restaurant located at a very lively area. Excellent wine menu, very tasty stakes and delicious starters. Recommended.

column3: Delicious steak, friendly staff, upbeat ambiance
column4: Delicious steak cooked to perfection. The server was friendly and funny, gave us great advice on portion sizes. Service was fast and efficient, meal was great, topped with an old fashioned ice cream sundae.

Excellent ribeye boneless, perfectly cooked, good side dishes, broccoli was steamed to perfection. They do not have butter knives for your butter, only steak knives what ch I think is wrong due to the category of the restaurant.
To be honest we went for the photo opp (The League shows an image from another location not this one) but we really enjoyed our cocktails and food at lunch.
If you can afford the heafty prices, this restaurant is THE place for the best steak around. You might even see a celebrity or two, as this is most frequented by the rich and famous.
Went in a group for dinner midweek. Lots of other groups. Busy, loud and bustling. Be prepared to wait for service. Steaks are good but there are better to be had in Chicago.
I go here every time I visit Chicago and it never disappoints. Steaks are the best. Fun, exciting atmosphere. Great people watching. Just a great place.

column3: Great Night w Big Kids for 20th Bday
column4: So nice with older kids. The atmosphere was hopping and happy and so ChiTown! Loved the waiters, very impressed the passion and commitment they bring to the table!

column3: One of the best steaks I've had for years
column4: This was an awesome meal. We shared a crab and avocado appetizer and then shared a 14 oz steak with fries and salad. It was all delicious and we suggest you try the place.
Lovely place Smily ppl The area around significant The food tastes good Little bid late on serving food

Outstanding meals with excellent service. Gibsons is a Chicago institution; hard to get in to and busy but a great atmosphere with everyone well looked after. Excellent wine list too! Watch out for the desserts - they are enormous and have to be shared.

This is a must go to for a lovely dinner that will easily become memorable. The staff were so professional and efficient, the steaks were mouth watering, the ambiance was comforting. Do not miss when visiting Chicago!
One of the best steakhouses in the Midwest . Freak selections and a fine wine list.. Staff us all very well trained. Very close to O'Hare, the Rosemont Convention Center and many hotels.
This place is amazing. The food is wonderful & they serve large portions. If you go, ask for Joe! We've never had better service in our life!!!

My husband and I stopped in last Friday for a quick drink, while we waited for dinner reservations elsewhere. What should have been one drink turned into a couple drinks and awesome beef carpaccio! I'd highly recommend it!

Gibson's has some of the best beef in the city - always cooked perfectly. The service is top notch, too! It's not the least expensive place to eat, by any means, but it's worth every penny. Simply delicious; a classic!
Would definitely recommend this steakhouse. And our server Michael did an excellent job making our experience wonderful.
Great food. Great service. Electric atmosphere in bar area, but quieter in dining area. Always crowded, which is a testament to the popularity. Always look forward to going here when I am in town.

Turned up with no reservation at 730 on a Saturday and was seated outside within a few minutes even though it looked so busy inside and out. Amazing fillet steak cooked perfectly. Great evening all round.
The good and staff were outstanding. Shared a giant lobster. It's definitely with every penny. So good
We were disappointed. Steaks are steaks in Chicago's best steak houses..they are all good except the in bone sirloin which was very gristly. Not really that great for all the positive reviews

column3: Gibson's is as good as it gets
column4: "Whatever you want" will be the answer to virtually any question asked of your waiter. Extraordinary food and service in an electric environment. Gibson's is simply a classic among restaurants on the planet. Whether in jeans or formal attire, you will be pampered and pleasured.

column3: Best place for steak and lobster
column4: They have more than one location, last time I was at their location near the airport. food is always fantastic, I usually get the Filet and Lobster. The deserts are HUGE, don't try to eat it yourself.

column3: Amazing a must go, great steaks!
column4: A must stop for great steaks! Dinner was amazing, service was very good and loved the lobster bisque as well. Pricey but worth it.
You pay for large portions with just ok flavors in my opinion. Steak is comparable to any chain steakhouse. Better choices in Chicago for Steak. Carrot cake was huge and my wife love it.
I had an excellent dinner experience with business comrades. Service was top notch and the steaks were tender. Staff kept us well supplied with great service. Dessert of carrot cake was delicious.

column3: Great Dinning Spot in the west loop area
column4: I was there for a Business meeting and had experienced the different types of food they offered.....great vintage vibe with a classy service.....

Always a great meal with tremendous service. Had the bone in filet Pittsburg. Awesome. Creamed spinach and shrooms. All excellent. Then the chocolate mousse cake. Heaven on a spoon. A must visit when in town.
To paraphrase a UK advert, it does exactly what it says on the tin. Really excellent steaks, chops and seafood. The desserts are something as well.
Filets were fabulous! Reports from other members of our group thought the Chilean Sea Bass and lobster was equally great! Desserts are ridiculously huge. Best meal we had on our 4 day excursion.
This restaurant is really good. The servers are helpful and efficient. The lobster bisque is delicious and their french fries are a must with any steak.

Was planning on hitting Gibson's for a long-awaited steak feast but decided to sneak in a lunch before a colleague headed back to the airport. Might be my best idea ever. Same great food, lower prices, quieter and more relaxing. Service impeccable as always.
Love the atmosphere great customer service and sure to get full off the food And such great friendly people
Went with my wife, great steaks, but better service. Reserve space for desserts. One of the best Steakhouse in Chicago

column3: Delicious Steak and Lobster and DESSERT! WOW
column4: Excellent steak and lobster, great atmosphere fantastic staff. We were a huge cooperate party and they handled us perfectly! The lobster was amazing and the steak was great too! The desserts were incredible! Just Wow! One of the best meals ever!!!!

Super busy popular spot! It was happening. The bar service was fast and courteous even though they were packed. The service at dinner was top notch - I mean spectacular. The food was great but the service impeccable.
Always great food and service. Great steaks, appetizers and wine list. They welcome all and casual enough to take your kids.
First trip to Chicago. Had reservations walked right in had a great waiter, Michael. Food was great and they bring you so much to eat. Will return!
Took wife out for dinner. Amazing food and steak cooked right they way u like it. Service was awesome. Karl our server kept it fun and great all night. Two thumbs up on Karl & food.

Took my bride here for our first steak in Chicago. Wow! What a great place, in an awesome location. The service was just as good as the food, and for the price, you are treated right! We will be back often. Enjoy!
Beautiful room. Meat cooked to perfection. We had a plane to catch, so I asked to rush our order. Everything went perfectly!

Crowded but with a great atmosphere. My jaw dropped when I seen a waiter carrying a huge slice of cake. The dessert looked heavenly. Next time I go I will be ordering light on the dinner just so I can have room for dessert.

Well worth the money! Wait staff does a nice job explaining the cuts of meat and how they are cooked (charred). We ended up going back another night. The hollandaise is worth the calories! Avocado and crab salad is enough for two and quite good!
Nothing bad to say about this place, steaks are amazing. Only offered soups with seafood that day but they found something else to replace that for me.

We went there for my husbands birthday and It was truly wonderful. From the service to the atmosphere to the fantastic food! Put this on your list to visit when in Chicago. It is pricey but worth every bite.
I love steakhouses, and the fact that there are a ton in Chicago is awesome! This was a perfect one. Fun bar, great service, and amazing food!

Visited here for lunch and found ourselves in the cocktail scene seated at a somewhat high table. The decor is somewhat busy but this was more than offset by the fabulous salad and wonderful service. A great place to eat when you are out shopping
A must-go if you're visiting Chicago and want a classic dinner. Very classy and the food has always been spot-on.

Dinner on Saturday night was buzzing. Make sure you make a reservation otherwise almost impossible to get a table. Waiter was very helpful with menu choice. Must try the burger which is a 2013 peoples choice award winner and lived upto to 100%.
Great Steak house ! The portions are huge, so be prepared for left overs ! the food and service are great ! This is a classic american , old Chicago place ! Loved it !

Chicago is such a great food city. Gibson's exceeds expectations every visit to the city. Old school charm and a fantastic meal. It's the place where you can spend time eating and talking with friends. Great wine list as well.
The place was very noisy. The tables were on top of each other. The steak was just average. Maybe it was an off Friday night.
Enjoyed an early dinner in early March. The waiter named Joe was knowledgeable about the various cuts and menu items.
Celebrating my fiance's birthday dinner the food was outstanding the waiting staff was outstanding and it was just a very romantic night.
My steak was delicious cooked to perfection, and our sides were out of this world. My guests are still raving about that night. I shall return there to enjoy in their other delights.
As expected, it was pricey, but totally lived up to the hype! My steak was delicious and our sides were ridiculous. Highly recommend the bleu cheese scallop potatoes and Brussels sprouts.

Whenever we are in downtown Chicago, we try to go here. Our most recent visit was just after Christmas, and it did not disappoint. Food was cooked to perfection, service was attentive, and menu superb. This place is well worth any wait you might have!
I would definitely recommend this place. The service, food and drinks were all excellent! A must visit while in Chicago!
The food was very good, A little pricey but worth it to me. Very crowded. Make sure to make reservations or you will have a long wait.

column3: Fabulous meal! Expensive but worth it!!
column4: Great starters! Great service! Great location! Great food! Great drinks! Very clean! Valet! Best steak in the city! Huge deserts! You're welcome......all waiters are excellent but we had a truly special waiter, Elvis. Thank you man.

column3: Great for casual stop in for drinks - service was a bit off for waht I normally expect
column4: Stopped in to order some rum and appetizers and it just took too long to get served. Drinks were good, but we skipped apps as a result.
Athough a chain restaurant, this place is probably among the best places for a steak in Chicago. Extensive wine list and large large portions of food :) 5-star service

Very very nice!! Service outstanding! Steak was absolutely Fantastic!! Atmosphere very nice! The staff are there to take care of your every need ! If you come to Chicago Gibsons Bar and Steakhouse is a must!!!
great place, service, quality of the food, a little bit crowded but no problem. the steaks are great quality and perfectly done

column3: OK steakhouse, bring your expense account
column4: Hard to fathom why Gibson's is such an institution. Very average steaks at premium prices. Morton's and the Palm do it better.
Worth going there. You need to make reservations as there is a big demand for their US grade A rating.
Sat at a bar table had two separate meetings waiter and waitress both were great and accommodating. Appetizers were ok. Nothing to write home about.

column3: Great Food but unless you're "somebody" skip it
column4: They have the greatest steaks but unless the staff recognizes you as "somebody" you can't even get a drink at the bar while you wait 30 minutes past your reservation time to have someone get around to seating you, Skip it.
For the last few years my father and I always come here. Steak is awesome, huge wine list. Sides abd dessert portions unbelievable but not over priced for Chicago standards. Make reservations.
Was absolutely hands down outstanding! If you want the best steak ever!! Staff very professional and very friendly! Atmosphere was really cool. Just loved it!!

column3: A must for Chicago business dining
column4: Exceptional steaks. Shares kitchen w Hugo's Frog Bar, so order seafood if that's preferred. Call ahead for reservations.

column3: On business, but recommend for special occasions
column4: Top notch service. One of the most flavored filets I have had. Ever. Got mushrooms and brocolli on the side. No room for dessert. Will come again.
I love traveling and exploring the city and food, the people. Chicago is one of the best cities with great food. Gibsons is outstanding in all aspects! Will definitely go back!
Great food and great service. The neighbor restaurant "Hugo's Frog and Seafood place¬®is part of the restaurant and a great place just for a bite.
The steaks were cooked to perfection and juicy. The bread, twice baked potato and creme br√ªl√©e rocked. Also, the moscow mule was on par with everything else.

Had martinis, oysters, wine,steaks, double baked potato, brussel sprouts, and cherry pie. A fantastic meal for three. Steak cooked to perfection! The service is friendly and attentive. You really feel appreciated and welcomed. This is the steak house you want to visit when downtown Chicago.
If you don't care about money, come to this restaurant. Expensive but the meat is the best. Cooked perfect too just like I asked
Great food, atmosphere, and service. Highly recommend the filet sliders and the open face ribeye sandwich. Great burger also.

column3: Great Chicago Ambiance and Amazing Food!
column4: Gibson's is our Favorite Steakhouse in Chicago, with amazing steaks, delicious sides, and out of this world desserts! We love having staff who have been there for 20+ years that we see year after year! A can't miss when visiting Chicago!
We stopped here because we are fans of the show The League. Had some apps and a bottle of wine in the bar. Great service and very nice atmosphere. The dinner menu was pricey but looked delicious!

column3: Fun time in the Big City
column4: Extremely fun bar to hang out in. Great noise level, outstanding waitresses, good drinks and we love to eat in the Bar area and just feel the city around you. Food is excellent in both the Bar and Dining Room.

Gibson's is a very popular and fun place in the heart of the Viagra Triangle. The food is superb and the people watching is always incredible. If you're middle age and single Gibson's is the place to be.
The steak was excellent; however, the service was very curt, abrasive and hurried. Considering the high prices, I would have expected a kinder service staff.
Although pricey, one the best meals I've ever had. Our bartender and waiter were awesome. Very friendly and great with our little ones! Highly recommend them!

column3: Some classics are better left untouched
column4: This may be a Chicago classic but it's certainly not famous for its food. Very mediocre steak. Good atmosphere in the heart of the viagra triangle but id skip dinner here. Get a drink at the bar and move on.
If it's possible to get drunk on meat, this is the place. Great steak, great service, nice atmosphere.
