column3: first and last meal when in Chicago..
column4: It's not only about the food.The environment , the service , the location..everything makes this place one of the best steakhouses in the country..
Their shrimp and MASSIVE desserts are out of this world. The service is always on point. Any time dine at any of their locations I find i am treated like family.

Have been hearing about how amazing this place is and I thought it was overpriced for the quality of the food. There are much better places for fine dining n Chicago. Was here years ago and it was fabulous it has changed quite a bit.
Bustling, noisy and expensive dining. Food is excellent and well cooked. Recommend a reservation. Bar seating is an option.
Average drinks. Great service. No happy hour. Crowded bar. Vibrant. Loud. Steak was average at best. Was recommended on trip advisor. Won't go back. 2700 restaurants in Chicago to visit.
Steaks that melt in your mouth! I attended an appetizer reception and it was fantastic. Great service and kind staff.

This was my first trip to Chicago and first time to Gibsons. Food is great and wait staff is top notch. A must for anyone interested in a good steak dinner. I'm looking forward to going back to Gibsons the next time I'm in town.
Never a disappointment, great service and food. I probably go twice a week. The petite filet is perfect for lunch and the pork chop rocks!!

Always a pleasure, consistent food, excellent service. Good for a date, for a family gathering as well as business dinners. Especially for people from out of town, welcome to Chicago steaks, do not miss out!
Great service & great food! Went with my sister for a bday dinner while we were in Chicago and received a free dessert! Great time. üòÅ

My wife and I always make our way to Gibson's for dinner when visiting Chicago. We ordered shrimp cocktail (big and delicious) wedge salad and New York strip steaks (melt in your mouth). Highly recommended for anyone visiting Chicago!!!
I have been to this restaurant several times. The steaks are big and the portions of sides are huge. The drinks are the best, but look out for the desserts. It takes four people to eat them!

column3: Fantastic Service and Excellent People watching
column4: This is probably my 4th or 5th visit, as I never miss this stop when I'm in Chicago. The food is great and the service is impeccable. Also, if the weather is cooperating, the people watching is excellent if you can sit outside.
We had a business dinner with about 28 of us upstairs in a private room and the service was awesome. There were several appetizer's and a hosted bar. The appetizer's were very good.

Came for lunch with my senior aged mother. Classic steakhouse lunch. I enjoyed a delicious open-faced steak sandwich. She had filet sliders, which we both thought were amazing. I would definitely recommend Gibsons. They still put out a nice spread!
Terrific prime rib, excellent service. Ribeye was perfect! Cake is decadent and enough for four people. Formal but comfortable atmosphere.
We enjoyed an amazing steak dinner at this quality Chicago steakhouse. Will certainly return and recommend gibsons to others.

Steak was the BEST... Loved everything about this place. Baked potatoe was awesome too, Large portions. Don't be a pig like me and order a starter and overeat on the bread! I'll be back March 2016... Ready, waiting and hungry!!!!
The food is excellent the service is great . Seafood and steaks you can choose either one and you will not be disappointed .I have eaten here several times and I have found everything is good .
Very expensive but wonderful meal. Wait staff was amazing. Was right across street from our hotel, the Thompson Chicago.
Outstanding meat quality, kind service and huge deserts... Prices above average but in line with the quality... Hygienic aspects must be reviewed...
A truly memorable experience. Fantastic food from an expansive menu. Top top notch service. We had a brilliant time.

Excellent steal at Gibson's. Three of us went over for dinner and all had steaks, they even catered for our 'British' tastes and got the chef to make us some saut√©ed mushrooms with them. Recommended for the food, service and ambience.
Great service, menu selections and fantastic steaks. We had a wonderful evening and will be going back the next time we visit Chicago.
This is well known for their steaks, and for good reason, they are delicious. Do not miss the desserts!
Sit at the bar on a Saturday afternoon for a cheeseburger and a martini every time we visit. Can't imagine a better way to kill a couple of hours while the wife shops.
Gibsons is an old standby and its my go to place each time I visit Chicago. The staff and food are excellent. I love the energy and ambiance.

I received a gift card to Gibson's Steakhouse and it was fabulous. The place has an old-timey Chicago feel- very dark, dark wood. You can almost imagine the mobsters sitting in the deep boothes talking business. The food and service was great!

From the service to the food it was excellent. We had a fantastic waiter! The food was fabulous! We had their filet mignon and my husband and I split the big steak. I ordered a bowl of their seafood gumbo. Everything we had was wonderful.
I love going to Gibson's! Food, service, atmosphere, location, value, all at the top of my list. Always enjoy the opportunity of going back.
Staff was not friendly and food was not that good. Our waiter was rude and we did not enjoy our evening there.

Dinner in the bar is great people watching. Dinner outside in the summer is even better. Everything is solid at Gibson's. If you are a first timer, have them bring the meat tray around. Don't miss desert - each dessert is 1/4 of a cake!

Incredible food. Home made appetizers and fresh bread. Steaks bigger than your eyes. I opted to share and was still FULL!!!! If you can it is romantic out on the patio. Staff are friendly and very professional. Must place to eat.
one of the best steakhouse I have been, a must in chicago, excellent service and food was great, please visit and make reservation
One of the best places to see and be seen! Always a good meal and great ambiance. Steaks dont get any better than this!
We were here for a business dinner. They were serving passed hors d'oeuvres, and had these mini lobster rolls on a buttered toasted bun. Oh yea.
We would absolutely love to go back, the service was FANTASTIC!!!. The meal was DELICIOUS!!! Perfect evening out in Chicago. The portions are quite large!
This is one of our favorite steakhouses in Chicago. The service, drinks, dry-aged meats, seafood, and desserts are all wonderful. Highly recommended.
We had the filet. It was perfect. The service was great. I had heard it was famous and now I know why. You can't go wrong if you like steak.

column3: Over cooked Yellow Fin Tuna. Sushi grade
column4: Not edible. I asked for my sushi rare. The cook, so called chef turned a beautiful piece of fish to jerky meat. Spent the night at the hotel, the room was nice comfortable. The staff of the hotel friendly and very informative.
THE steakhouse to see and be seen. High powered folks eat here and the prices reflect that. If you don't mind overspending to eat at a trendy place, this is for you.
Friendly, professional service, perfect steaks and lamb chops, wonderful outdoor scene on a beautiful summer night, topped off with a lovely piano bar entertainer.

The weather was good a mild september day it was.We took atable at the patio.Nice location.Staff was nice and helpful.We ordered three different types of steak and shared the taste..Ask for medium cooked.It was delicious..

column3: It's the best steak that I've ever had.
column4: It's not cheap, but it's the best. The only negative I can really give is that I can't eat steak anymore because the one I had at Gibson's was the best.
For the price, there are better steaks. Atmosphere is great; if you're willing to pay $50 for atmosphere and an average piece of beef, this is it.
Amazing food, amazing service, glorious venue and a lot of fun. I cannot recommend Gibsons enough. An absolute must visit venue in Chicago. I hope I'll be able to move again soon as I am very full!
Best service ever!! We only had drinks, but they were amazing! The service was impeccable! The most polite waitress we came across!!
The location and the service where great. The meal was wonderful. The Chokalate mouse cake was so big that we, four, couldnot finish it but made packaged. Delicious! Must be tried.

The ambiance is energizing. Martinis were just perfect. I had the small porterhouse steak cooked to perfection. Wine selection excellent. We finished, well we tried, with the 17$ carrot cake. What a delight.

column3: Great dinner after day at Lincoln Park Zoo
column4: Wife and I took four of our grandchildren to have an upscale meal after spending the day at the Zoo. Early dinner. Great place.
I had a filet that was out of this world and prepared to perfection. Wine selection was great. Sides were just right. I hope to be back very soon!
We had a business dinner here and the food was excellent. It was very crowded as I'm sure it always is. If you want a great steak, look no further.
Everything was outstanding! Great service! Fabulous food! A must have is their Australian cold-water lobster.....the best I've ever tasted!! It's a little pricey but worth every penny!
Highlights: steaks good steaks, delicious banana cream pie Just a really good traditional steakhouse. I would go back again.
Just wonderful, simply perfect in every way. Love their fish place next door as well. If you are visiting Chicago, this is a must.

Been here 3 times and its always excellent if you able to secure a reservation. Portions are very large and steaks are highest quality. Service is always top notch. It is located in a great area of the city as well. Will def be back.
My husband and I enjoyed an excellent lunch here. I had the open faced steak sandwich, my husband the marinated skirt steak....both were incredible. Would absolutely visit again!
Two of us had steaks and two had the Chilean sea Bass. All four meals were fabulous and the wait staff was very friendly and responsive.

The staff at Gibsons is superb. Raul or Carol always greet the regulars and make sure that everything is top notch. The drinks, the food, and selection of food at various price points , and the entire staff make this a MUST go to restaurant.
Very busy and crowded, Carl was a great waiter, they are on point and serve quickly and efficiently. Pretty pricey. Not a restaurant to relax. Food was very good.
Love this place. Was able to walk into the bar and get a great table immediately. The dining room was Fully booked. Our server was great. The food good as always.

column3: Best Steak House in the City
column4: Juicy Steaks from happy cattle done to perfection no toppings needed. Two fisted drinks and professional friendly wait staff all cant be beat. Try to save some room for the Best Carrot cake you ever tasted. We go there weekly and are always 100% satisfied.
This place is amazing here in the Chicago area and if you looking for a good steak this is the place. Great service great food
A must stop every visit to Chicago! The filet mignon sliders for lunch to a luxurious Ribeye for dinner, this is the place for steak!
Went here with group for business for the second time and this place is great. Unbelievable steaks, lobster, and crab cakes. Will happily eat here anytime I'm in Chicago. Great service.

Went here for a business dinner while in town and the food and service were top notch. I had the New York steak and it was cooked perfectly-sides were also great-highly recommend the double baked potato. For dessert-the chocolate cake was HUGE!

We had no reservations but had no problem walking in at about 6 pm on a Thursday. The food and service were truly outstanding. Salads and desserts were also not-to-be-missed. Our waiter was fun and informative. Wonderful experience all around

Definitely a busy street in Rush. Service was awesome, nice personable waiters. I had a steak and it was cooked perfectly and delicious. Prices were fair. It can be a bit loud as their tables are very close to each other.

Excellent service and even better steaks, Gibson's never disappoints is always a treat enjoying dinner with the family we all have the chicago cut and it was perfect Joey had the sliders and he said they were perfect. Good job Gibson's !!!!
This is the classic steakhouse in a town full of good steakhouses. Great service by seasoned staff! Order one course at a time or you'll be rushed through dinner in 45 minutes.

column3: The best of the best dining
column4: Definitely for very special occasions. My mother-in-law was in town so we had to treat her to something amazing
I love the history of this place. I had a hankering for a burger and the Sandwich King was mouth watering. Excellent service.
A white tablecloth experience. Wonderfull food and service. I had the skirt steak which was perfectly prepared. Expensive, but good for a special night out.

I don't always go here when I'm in Chicago, but you can count on a great steak and consistent service. This past visit was no exception. We were celebrating friends' anniversary, and they had a blast!
Starting with refreshing wine we opted for the shrimp cocktail to begin. Amazing! We then lunched on chicken Caesar salads . The bread bad,et was deicious

Best steakhouse in Chicago. Steaks are always perfect and juicy. Large portions with great service. Sides are huge. Desserts are huge and very good. Highly recommend Gibsons for great steaks. Also nice ambiance.
I went to have brunch before leaving for the airport. The food was tasty and the service was attentive and efficient. Dogs are not allowed on the patio, unless they are service dogs with tags.
Very overrated. Service was terrible. Loud. Cramped seating. Steaks were marginal. Desert serving size was rediculous
Wonderful garbage salad. Enough to share. The bread is out of this world! Anxious to go back and have just dessert and coffee. Bring plenty of friends to share the portion. Service was outstanding.
Great steak and good atmosphere, Expensive but a very good steak for all four of us will certainly go back.

column3: Wonderful service and very good food.
column4: We had both lunch and an early dinner at Gibsons. Service was wonderful and the food was very good. Both meals our waiters went out of the way to make us have a very special dining experience. Outside patio was delightful!

column3: A great start to the day with Filet Sliders!
column4: We were recommended to stop by and try the filet sliders. The bartender was great and engaging, and the food and drinks were perfect. We had a great time starting our day at Gibsons.
Came here for lunch. Great service on a very hot day- wonderful a/c! The meal was really good - excellent steaks and good wines. Would definitely go again albeit it is quite expensive.
Best steak- cooked perfectly. Best service. Own farms. Knowledgeable staff. If you know steak, you still will be amazed.

We were there last June having dinner and everything we had was delicious. The steak (the recommended one was enough for the two of us) was simply great. Uf you go, you have to try the double baked potato...
You can never go wrong eating here. Gibsons is a staple in Chicago. Their service is always outstanding. The food even better!!!
We ate there earlier this week. Great atmosphere, fabulous martinis, great appetizers, great service, but disappointed in our steaks.
Fabulous place Need reservations It was a fun atmosphere Superb service Great location We ordered the wedge salad Crab avocado appetizer Ribeye steak Asparagus

This place is amazing ! Definitely would recommend. Our reservations were for 8 . We were seated with drinks and were done with dinner by 9 including desert . Everything was seemless from start to finish . Steak melted in your mouth like butter !
Both piano men we sat near were engaging rather than aloof, all clientele was friendly and classy, never had to wait on a drink.

column3: Best steak I have ever had
column4: Simply put, best steak ever. Staff were great, food was amazing. You have to go!. It's not the cheapest place in the world but worth every penny!

We went for appetizers and drinks in the Bar..what a surprise! Great food and friendly staff! The drinks were great and the food outstanding. Even though the restaurant is crowded...go to the bar! It was worth it!
I ordered a plain old cheeseburger, it was delish, done just right and hugh, with the fries, it was a plateful! Service was good, no complaints.
Best restaurant in Chicago! You HAVE to go there! Has been a tradition to go there with my family every Chicago visit!!!!
Such a fabulous restaurant. Loved everything. Amazing service. Very accommodating. The most delicious steak. I can not wait to return to Chicago to eat here again. 5+ stars all around!

This steaks are ridiculously awesome! So worth the price. Great environment to eat with family or friends. Our wait staff was amazing, especially Elvis. Don't miss this place when you come to Chicago!
The food was excellent, the celebrities we saw made it fun, but our waiter really made it special - they know their stuff and made our night. Gotta get the porterhouse.
The atmosphere is classic. The food is great! A fun place to go for lunch and sit in the bar area. The area is also a great for shopping.
I had the biggest porterhouse that I've had in a long time here. The wait staff was excellent and our table was great for the awesome pedestrian traffic. This place is a must do!!!

kinda classy, piano restaurant with the best rosheredish shripms, I like the spot in the bar because sometimes its so packed its hard to get a table, I like the barman they have a patience to serve me with sthg I relay want

column3: Old Chicago Steakhouse, the way Chicago used to be!
column4: Best baked potato ever, huge! Wine list is large and diverse. Cuts of meat are the best! The Chicago cut is worth a try. Had wonderful server who I feel awful I forgot his name. He had a table who thought his name was Elvis....
What a great meal! Everything was delicious and prepared perfectly! We had steak and lobster, and the macadamia ice cream pie!!! The service was impeccable as well!

This is one of my favorite restaurants in the U.S. They have great service and excellent food. Be sure to book a reservation before your visit. Also go early and get a drink the in the bar area with a grand piano.

column3: Steak is good - it's a fancy place
column4: Steak here is good; that's what I'd come here for. The salad was pretty fresh, so that would be a good side. We didn't have seafood, but I think Steak is the main pull here
very friendly waiter very nice atmosphere excellent entree choices nice presentation perfectly prepared beef one of my favorite chicago steakhouses
What a great place to have a Steak! I truly enjoyed are meal here. The steak was done to perfection. I have eaten here a few times and it is still a great place for a Steak!
Love this place! Best filet mignon I've ever had. Delicious mixed drinks. Possible celebrity sightings and one of a kind experience.
Best steak i have eaten in a long time, The service was beyound imagination, I would highly recomment this great restaurant
They were booked a month out - but due to rain they were able to seat us immediately- food was great- burger great.- wish I'd gotten the steak but it was $50 plus sides...
I hit the bar of this place and have to say the steak was great! Service and meal was perfect. For ambiance, if you like piano bar style place, you will like this spot.
The best and largest slice of carrot cake in the world. It would be difficult for 4 people to eat it in one sitting. The bartenders are very good.
Words cannot describe the food at Gibson's!! Service was impeccable!! Steaks are melt in your mouth, sides are huge, shrimp cocktail best I've had, and the desserts are HUGE!!
Had the filet mignon, baked stuffed potato, and wedge salad. Definitely one of the best I've ever eaten! NONE better! Service was TOPS!
Of course the steaks are amazing - but so are the salads & the sides...Great Martini's as well. It has outdoor seating - and is located in a very happening area. Much Recommended!
We came in for appetizers and drinks prior to dining at another restaurant. We definitely would return. Bartender was a pro. Appetizers where delicious.......especially the lobster in artichoke
Again a fabulous restaurant, this time the steaks are the main event. You must book as it is heaving. Steaks enormous , I only gave it a 4 as not quite as good as it sister restaurant.
It was a great cut off steak, not much fat at all, cooked to perfection. I left with no complaints and a smile on my face.

column3: This is the apex steakhouse in chicago
column4: Look no further than Gibsons. Plan ahead, make a reservation and enjoy the experience all other steakhouses mimic. It simply cannot be compared to any others.
I used to love upstairs and frequent here often. It is amazing every time. Favorite place to relax and eat outdoors when the weather is nice.

column3: Great business dinner, steak was fantastic
column4: A group of 8 of us went for dinner. Drinks, appetizers and the steak was fantastic. Service is top notch here. Expensive but worth it
In town for a few days. Food was cooked to perfection. Reservations are a must Atmosphere was lively and fun. A can't miss
I highly recommend Gibsons if you are looking for a great steak in Chicago. The service is great, place is beautiful and the food is amazing! The Bonein ribeye is one of best I have ever had.

Almost feel like I don't need to rate Gibson's as it's an institution. Greatest steaks in the city, the deserts are outrageous and the staff has always been top notch. Lots of great options in the city of this is my favorite place for steak.
One of the best T-bone steaks I ate ever, followed by yummy French fries. Our server was nice and friendly, and the wine she recommended, Malbec, was perfect for the food ordered. A bit pricy.
First time at Gibson's and it won't be the last! Perfectly cooked steaks and huge sides. Waiter was very helpful and knowledgeable about Chicago too. Don't leave Chicago without eating there!

After visiting many steakhouses around The Globe, this was an absolute "Best ever experience" In addition to all The impressive comments here in tripadvisor, i can Only say: perfectly cooked, High Class service, excellent wine selection. Thanks
The steaks melt in your mouth. Desserts and appetizers are excellent. The servers are pros. Private rooms available. Make reservations!
Excellent restaurant, service was awesome , Delicious food, what else you can ask for !! I had a prime rib? Oh my God üòã We definitely coming back next year!

column3: Truly an experience you won't forget
column4: The food is outstanding. The steaks are so tender. The staff are friendly. 5 star all the way. Excellent place for a first date. Very impressive dining room and great ambiance. Very clean and well kept. I highly recommend this place for any occasion.

Had a business dinner there and it was great, It took a while to get seated, but well worth the wait. I have eaten at other locations and all were very busy and somewhat loud inside. Overall 4 out of 5 stars from me.

This was a great clasic steakhouse in downtown Chicago. Pictures of celebreties dining there line the walls and the service was excellent. Was there with a group of 10 and we had a private room. No one in the group didn't really enjoy their meal.
Excellent Service! Excellent Food! Excellent Atmosphere! Excellent Desserts ( BEST CARROT CAKE ON THE PLANET) Like Jay Z says "What more can I say?"

In the very centre of Chicago, a tipical mix of american tradition and american feeling. Meat is wonderful; pefectly cooked and with amazing flavour. Everything perfect exept for bill. Too expensive!!! More than 100 dollars is a crazy price for steak and salad. Corrado F.
Great steak in a wonderful atmosphere.This spot is a go to destination on every trip to Chicago.Wonderful food and service.

I've been there last summer while I was in Chicago with my family on holiday. There are no words to describe this restaurant,it's perfect, the meat is incredibile and the service is excellent. If you visit Chicago you must eat there

Very nice bar, excellent staeks, monster size deserts. It is one of the best steak houses in Chicago, a place to see, and to be seen. Caution: The cheapest steak is 50 Us dollars. Very extensive wine list to choose from, good service.
stopped by for a quick lunch at the bar. Food was very good. It was St. Patrick's day so the place was hopping. I had steak sliders and my wife had a steak salad. Would definitely go back.

column3: Excellent Food and Service. Don't miss this one!
column4: Great service, very attentive. Excellent food, amazing wine list. I look forward to returning. We had the lamb and the Lake perch. Both excellent.
Beautiful meat. Great staff. Excellent service. Fantastic atmosphere. No wonder it's a successful institution in Chicago! It deserves it.
Wonderful casual lunch in the bar with old friends with a delicious Lobster Salad and a superb Martini. Top rate service and an enjoyable experience.

column3: Great steaks and service to match
column4: Really top-notch food and service. Good variety of steaks and seafood to choose from. Could use some more varied starches on the menu but everything we had was superb.
The best steak anywhere! Great food, great service, great atmosphere. When your in Chicago, Don't miss it.
Gibson's is a great place with outstanding food and service. Consistently 1 of my goto places in the Windy city for a great meal and a great time. KC Strip or Filet is where it's at!
Gibson's is a classic old school steal ask house. The differentiator is the quality and the service. I have eaten here many times.
Food is A+++++++. Service is A++++++++. This is a must go to, when visiting Chicago! Expect a lively talkative crowd when dining. This is NOT the place for a quiet romantic dinner for two.

column3: OOOOH love the oysters.. great meal
column4: The service is always extraordinary here! Super fresh oysters, generous appetizer portions and perfect steaks!! Ambiance is admirable... love the piano! Always enjoy evenings here!

Always delicious. Always consistent. Always an experience. The steaks are top grade and perfectly prepared. The seafood is incredible. The jacketed servers and white linen tables make this an event every time you come.

column3: Great food, very good wait staff.
column4: Very enjoyable dinner. Go there very hungry, and try to save room for dessert. We had a great time at both locations.

column3: Don't overlook this place for lunch!
column4: Great lunch fare from the steak salad, to the chicken pot pie to Mom's meatloaf. Large portions, great service and primo location and ambiance.
Excellent service! I recommend you to all my friend. Efficient and good value for money. Awesome service, Thank you very much.

Gibson's is one of the finest steak restaurants in the US. Period. The steak selection is abundant and the steaks are first class. The atmosphere is traditional, old school like. Everything is top notch. A Chicago gem.
Great steaks and I love it that you could have it past 10 pm. The restaurant is classic in decor, very elegant. Waiters are super attentive.
This place has been so consistent for so long. Fantastic service, environment and food. Staff has a lot of experience and is very knowledgeable. One of my favorites.

Great filet at this place. It was very busy and didnt have to wait to long. Different sizes of filets and great sides to go with them. Steak was done perfectly. Make this a must stop if ever in Chicago

You must visit Gibson's if you go to Chicago. It is a stylish steakhouse that has fantastic service and very high quality food. Everything on the menu is excellent. We have been there several times over the years and have never been disappointed.
We visited on a family celebration and it couldn't have been better. Our meals were cooked to perfection and the service was overwhelming.
This place is great. The steak and the lobster were delicious. A must stop for those who have never been there. You won't be disappointed. Make a reservation though!
Gibson's was an excellent place to din. Very upscale. Classy place. Service was great. I recommend making reservations in advance. Steak was excellent.

column3: Solid steaks in the Viagra Triangle
column4: The meal here was a good one. Excellent service from start to finish. Steak was very good and perfectly cooked. Wine stems could be better, a bit too thick. Fun place for a dinner no doubt.

column3: A great taste of Chicago's best
column4: This is a Chicago landmark, in my opinion. They specialize in meat, so go big or go home. The portions are enormous. We fed 12 people from just 2 desserts! The steak is great. The service is impeccable. Gibson's really does Chicago proud.
Everything was great! The food and the service were fantastic. I would for sure visit again when in town and highly recommend. Wait until you see the desserts.
First of all the wait staff is well trained and attentive. Then the steaks are the best on the planet. It a must go to if you're in Chicago. Great food, service and staff.

We ate at lunch time. Excellent good...very attentive service...ample size servings, even at lunch. Wanted to try one of the delicious desserts offered but was too full. Highly recommend...definitely make reservations for dinner.
Top steak restaurant, amazing service and great food. Portions are insane so order carefully. Huge wine list. Quite expensive but you get what you pay for; it's worth it. Go.
I love Gibsons. It consistently serves quality steaks every single visit. Service is great. Food is great. Atmosphere is energetic and fun.
The steaks, sides and service are always great. One of our favorite restaurants in Chicago for food and fun!
Always a nice and tipical atmosphere. Great beef. I'd like a warm plate as I like it rare. Nevertheless it's a place you have to come once in your trip to Chicago
Perfect service big city elegance wonderful art work the steak a rib eye was a 8 out of 10 the attended in the restroom added a touch of class
from the valet to the waiter service was very good I came in on a Friday night no reservation was seated quickly I got the filet which was excellent as always
Large portions, all around excellant, great service, I guess it's a good thing when the staff remembers what you like to drink?
Hard to get a reservation, not sure why. Steak was good by certainly not great. The fries were OK but nothing at all special. Ambiance was middling too.

We were told that it would be a several hour wait but it ended up being one hour. The staff was pleasant and the food was delicious! We got the fish and meatloaf dinners with a bottle of wine so even our bill was pleasant!

Service and food were exceptional. The melt-in-your-mouth steaks were large and seniors sharing was not an issue. The side dishes were family style and enough for 5 ladies to share. Definitely, the best steak restaurant I've been to in a very long time.
Best steakhouse I've been to in Chicago so far. Great friendly service. Reasonable prices. Worth the trip. Great bar atmosphere as well.
This is a Must visit if in Chicago, I cant wait to go back some day. The whole experience is great, the service and food are top notch, just make sure and leave room for Desert.

column3: Best French Dip I've ever had...
column4: Was here for lunch last week and ordered the prime rib french dip. Oh... My... Goodness... What a delight! The lobster bisque was also excellent. Great service and very friendly staff. I'll be dreaming of that sandwich for while! Thanks guys!
Third visit and never disappoints. The steak is awesome and the sides are excellent. Good wine selection and good service.
While the tables are a little close together the meal was excellent! The service was wonderful! The beer is all in bottles but a great selection! Had a wonderful evening!

We returned to Gibson's for the second night in a row because of the outstanding food and service. Steaks were perfect the first night and the 1.5 lb lobster tail was spectacular. We just wish we lived closer so we could go back more often.
Great location, we usually go in the summer when you can enjoy a nice meal sitting outside in one of the best looking corners of Chicago. The food is 4 stars the location 5 stars.
Great seafood platter followed by perfectly cooked steaks. Our waiter was perfect too. Knew how to manage the wine we brought. Yes it's expensive, but it's also worth it.

Gibson's is truly one of the great steak houses in Chicago. The atmosphere is terrific and the steaks are out of this world. Service is extraordinary, and if you frequent this establishment one just might see a celebrity or two.
You will not be disappointed. Makes sure you allow enough time for a drink in the bar. Some of the older bar staff are fantastic with a wicked sense of humour

column3: Afternoon lunch before the Bears/Giants game
column4: Old school legit steakhouse. Strong drinks and great steak. Also pretty cool that's where The League on Fx hangs out. Great spot in downtown Chicago
Great Busy Steak house. The bar is where it's at. Ask for Paul the nutty Irishmen. The food is Awesome. We love it here
Long wait to be seated. People arrived after us and have already been seated!it is difficult to understand their system.

The steak was great, as expected! The crabcake was also very good. The service was "ok", the waiter seemed to be in a hurry for us to leave, which was a little annoying. But the experience was still worth it!

I make sure every time I'm in Chicago, the trip includes one visit to Gibson's. The food is always great, the atmosphere is noisy, energetic and upbeat. The Wait Staff is entertaining and attentive. Can't say enough good things about this Chicago legend.

Best martinis ever, generous servings and chilled to perfection. The food is terrific and well worth the splurge. The atmosphere is energetic and boisterous great for people watching. We make a point to visit every time we are in Chicago, give it a try.
Great steak, lobsters, and even fish abound. Try the planked whitefish in season. Local, fresh, and extraordinarily good. This was the 4th time back, and the quality remains tops.

column3: One of the best gathering places in Chicago
column4: Great bar scene, very good wine list, generous portions! Carrot cake is the MUST! A little noisy but the food!!!!
Great food, great atmosphere, great service, great dessert. Nothing else needs to be said. Well worth the prices, classic steakhouse.

column3: The perfect martini in a classic Chicago mainstay.
column4: A feel good atmosphere with piano music, great drinks and steaks that are killer. Save room for dessert.

column3: Perfect in every aspect of a great Chicago steakhouse.
column4: Wonderful establishment. Fabulous service. Great list of libations. Food that is outstanding. .. Great Chicago Restaurant. ...

column3: All that it was cracked up to be
column4: Unbelievable 26 oz Porterhouse grilled to perfection, Great fun and attentive staff. A true Chicago Steak House.

Took friends as a thank you for hosting us and was told by them this was the best steak house in Chicago. Although the service was excellent, my prime rib was quite chewy - and not what I expected when I paid $40+ for it!
This place was excellent from the beer selection to the lobster and steak. Every bite was great and had to walk for about an hour to keep from going into a food coma. Definitely coming back
I always have an excelling dining experience at Gibson's. The service and the food are elite! Don't settle for average steak when you could have Gibson's.
The food was excellent and high quality. The shrimp were huge and the lobster fantastic. My filet mignon was perfect and dessert was excellent. Amazing!
This is a very nice restaurant for grilled steak in Chicago, nice dining rooms, well decorated, in a nice city area. Service polite.

Went here on Wednesday 17/09/14 with golf trip from work had fillet steak which was terrific very busy place believe you have to book weeks in advance, lovely atmosphere staff very professional and pleasant, great time.

Excellent location in Chicago, great Service, delicious meat, very juicy and tasteful, a bit expensive, but it is worth it Side dishes are very good, expensive, a grat expwrience all together Dessert are huge and very good

Pricey but worth it. Portions are HUGE! Best steak we've ever had. Meaning of life cake, not to be missed. (Although we were eating it for several days, since the serving was enormous) Can't wait to visit Chicago again, just for Gibsons!
There simply is no finer place to eat steak than at Gibson's Steakhouse. The service is second to none the endless pictures of people who have dined there. A experience I will never forget.

column3: Everything is relative to Brooklyn, N.Y
column4: Being a native New Yorker, there certain places that reminds me of home, Brooklyn. This is one them. Classy place with, great steaks and seafood. In addition, this place has bathroom attendant like some of the old school joints in N.Y.

I generally eat at Gibson's in Rosemont but have to say enjoyed the one on Rush Street just as much. We ate in the bar. Enjoyed meeting both locals and visitors. Food and service excellent. Can't go to Chicao without visiting Gibsons!
Service was great, food was great, drinks were great!! What else can you say. If in Chicago, do not miss Gibson's
The service is unbeatable. Very attentive. One just has to look up and the waiter is at the table. I have not seen this type of old world service in a very long time.
As good a steak as I have had. Attended a wedding reception here excellent food and service for large group. Fabulous crab legs starter. Strongly recommended.

We went to this restaurant for my daughter's birthday, while visiting Chicago. It did not disappoint! The food and service was exceptional. Our waiter, Mo, provided outstanding service as well as great selections. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Had dinner at the bar, so fun! Food was amazing and Joe the bartender was the best of all. Will be returning on my next trip to Chicago!

column3: Finally made it... WORTH THE WAIT
column4: Had wanted to try Gibson's on previous trips but never made it until this trip. One of the best steaks I have ever had, wonderful atmosphere... love all the photos... excellent wine list, great bar and wonderful service.

We had lunch, which was served by one of the best, most efficient waiters with a great personality, that we have ever had anywhere. The food is excellent, the service is excellent and we will return upon our next visit to Chicago.
Very impressive restaurant. Must visit here in Chicago
Dining here was an experience in itself. And a pretty cool one. The steak was the best melt in your mouth steak we've ever had. Service was excellent. Probably won't return but glad we did it once.
We booked a table in the afternoon and got a table outside ar night, great location ! Wonderful steak too, we tried both the Filet Mignon and their famous Hamburger and they were excellent !

My husband and I were so impressed by gibsons we ate there twice prices are good service is great and the food just make sure your very hungry food portions are huge next time I'm over in Chicago Gibsons will be our first stop
Had the house special burger - twice! - sitting out by the street on both occasions. Great spot, great food!

First night back in Chicago after a few years and what a way to start. The old classic never ceases to Amaze! Shrimp appetiser, fillet main and strawberry cheesecake, all washed down with a couple of bottles of wine. Simply stunning.
We sat outside on a beautiful Chicago evening. We shared a 48 oz. porterhouse & a LARGE Australian lobster. Both were magnificent and Chad provided excellent service. We'll be back!

We had never gone to Gibsons before, but so totally fun! Huge martinis, classic steaks, fabulous service, great vibe. I can see now why people are very loyal to this steak house. Good couple time or with a larger party.
This was a group dinner. There were 100 plus people. Every dish came out piping hot and perfectly cooked. Both the steaks and the seafood. Everyone at the table had a great meal

One can't go wrong with going to Gibson's for a Steak dinner. The steak portions are large and so are the sides that are made to share. The waiters are great and overall a nice place to enjoy a good steak dinner at.

We both ordered the 7 oz Filet lunch special with mashed potatoes and broccoli. The steak was very good but the potatoes were definitely instant! Kinda disappointed from all the hype Gibson's received. All of the staff were very nice and attentive.

My husband and I LOVED their steak. Cooked to perfection. Giant portions, no need to buy separate meals, we split everything. Ultra helpful staff. Fast service. Lively atmosphere. Would definitely return, and recommend.
great service ,great steak . We didn't have reservation on a Saturday night but were able to get a table in bar. really neat atmosphere cant recommend enough.

Gibson's on Rush St, is the real deal. From the great martinis to the fabulous steaks and the incredible service; you cannot get a better meal with a vibrant atmosphere anywhere. This is my 4th time there and have never been disappointed.
Bartenders are rude and slow, but it's Chicago, expect it. Steak was cooked perfectly and had great taste. Not for those with a tight wallet, cheapest steak is about $45.

It doesn't get any better than this. Service is beyond compare. The food was excellent and pricing was appropriate. This is a special place and shouldn't be missed if you're in Chicago. Share the meal with someone as it is way too much food otherwise.

Great food served well in an appropriate atmosphere that makes this place a fun, if expensive, experience. We are heading back again later in the year to Chicago and will most definitely be returning for more of the same.

column3: Perfect for the Carnivore in YOU!
column4: Delicious! Our party of 4 loved our meals of Filet, Chicago Cut and Sliced Skirt steaks that were beyond good. Zack, our server was attentive and great sense of humor. Extra special was the gift of Chocolate Mousse Pie to end our perfect evening!
Food is beyond good, service is excellent. We met one of the owners hanging out in the bar. He later sent us dessert.
The food was delicious. The service wonderful. We always go to Gibsons whenever we're in Chicago. Can't wait for our next visit
Nice dinner. A great steak. My wife enjoyed the lobster. Combined with a bottle of wine and great service. A nice night.
I thought the steak was good. The potatoe was outstanding as was the bread. The banana creme pie was amazing.

Always one of my favoritre. A great steak house for dinner but it's also a great lunch brunch spot with a solid cocktail menu and lunch options. I enjoyed a half wedge salad and then a ribeye open faced sandwich which really hit the spot.
When I first saw the menu I was amazed at the price but the amount of the food and the taste justified the food prices.

Service was incredible!! Ate the PHENOMENAL Shrimp cocktail, Lobster Bisque, House Steak and Bottle Cokes.......all this in the patio watching people... with my BEAUTIFUL wife and Jesus in my heart....it just doesn't get any better!!!
They have a wonderful hamburger that is topped with fried cherry tomatoes. Delicious and great service.

Stopped in here with friends for drinks and appetizers. Very lively atmosphere, and a good crowd, no foolishness. Service was very good, and the food was tasty also. I would stop by again if I was in the area.
When in CHicago and you want one of the Best steaks going but don't mind noise, go to Gibson's. Excellent Prime steaks, pricey but worth it. But very crowded due to the quality of food.
Simply put, this was one of the best meals I've ever had. It's not an every day place.. perfect for special occasions. It's always packed, but so good. Their reputation is well deserved.
I love this place. Great service and the food its amazing. It is always packed so make sure to make a reservation or you wil have a long wait on line
Service, food, martinis - all excellent. Loved it all!! We will definitely come back on our next trip to Chicago.

From the french martinis to the amazing steak this was a great dinner. The prices were reasonable for also getting a salad with you meal which is rare in the world of steak houses. The waiter was a pleasure. Will for sure be back!

column3: great piano player but old people...
column4: starting to believe it is true they call it the Viagra triangle...ha ha average age was 45-50, great dirty martini though and also music form the piano player...so worth a stop to get the Chicago chic feel before heading somewhere else...
Busy atmospheric great location these guys,produce amazing steaks. Melt in mouth. Friendly staff seemed to be very archetypal chicago restaurant
We go here every December with about ten people, classic Chicago Steakhouse with servers who have been there for over 30 years and very nostalgic atmosphere. Food is great and dessert is a blast!

The company selected this for dinner and drinks . The portions were good and our serving staff was very attentive. Before dinner we had several apps that were all above average. Our steaks were cooked to perfection.
...where Gibson's really did well was on its shrimp cocktail. Loved its take on a cocktail sauce. And massive yet tasty shrimp. Great staff, in bar area and in restaurant.
Love this place! Always come here when I'm in Chicago. Great atmosphere and always friendly personnel
We knocked around rush and stopped in for a drink to chill and catch part of a Blackhawks game--fun bar to hang out in on a Saturday afternoon, good cocktails

This is a great steak house. The waiter does a terrific presentation of the menu. The food was spot on and timed well for our group of 6. It's noisy because it's a popular place. I would certainly go back again.
the bar are was very enjoyable with the friendly staff the great atmosphere and the yummy drinks they also have great piano music
The bone in filet was delicious, the service was great. The chocolate mousse cake feeds 7 people. It was huge. Very busy restaurant.

WOW food here is delicious. The porkshops are to die for, so tender and juicy and their deserts WOW so good. Good customer service a little on the high price but is worth every penny of it. I go there every week :)
Probably the best steak I have ever eaten. The service was great. The atmosphere was simple. If I come back I will be visiting no doubt.
Gibson's is a true and genuine US Steak house. I can truly recommend it for a Porter steak with spinach and saut√©ed mushroom's.
Love the large plate of meat servers bring to showcase before the meal. The service were food were both great. Great for special occasions!
Wonderful food and service. Very large steaks and good side dishes. Very expensive, so we only go for a very special occasion.
Perfect meals, steaks, fishes.Delicious chocolate mousse ( hmmmmm), real intelligent bar feeling for a stranger. So funny Michelle in women's restrooms.
Very Good Restaurant - Great steak specialy the chicago cut. Great Location, Nice Beers! Great Desert. Nice Coffee
If you love lobster tail and steak, get a filet each and split a tail. I went with a party of 4 and the tail was the largest and sweetest I'd ever tasted

column3: One of the best steak houses
column4: Whenever we are celebrating something Gibsons is always in the running for where we will eat. The steaks and lobster are great. The sides are huge and the turtle brownie ice cream is awesome. Its not cheap but you will be very satisfied.
Never disappoints---Gibson's is iconic----best in Chicago! It's always funny to watch the people as well---Old Chicago meets New Chicago---more fun than most steak house types!

column3: One of Chicago's best steak houses
column4: Just perfect from the appetizer to the desert. The steak is a must! Nice ambiance, outstanding service. A place you want to go over and over again.
Gotta love this place. Great pod, great service, great prices and big portions. You definitely get enough bang for your buck. Great outside view. (For dessert, I recommend the strawberry shortcake!)
Best steak in town! Chicago Cut is close but my first night in Chicago is a Gibson's night! BTW... the bar clears out by 10PM and the piano player is awesome.
Airport site cramped tables. Hard to walk thru . Less noise at a football game ! $40 steak over cooked. Many better in Chicago area . hard to beat Chop House or Gene & Georghetti's .

Fun atmosphere in a traditional steakhouse setting. Good people watching- good martinis, great place with friends, high energy and although there are many celebrity sightings, I've never seen anyone more interesting than awesome Chicagoans.

column3: An experience you can always count on
column4: Gibsons is consistent with it's good food value service and atmosphere It is expensive the lobster tail is fabulous a great place for a special occasion

I visit Gibsons Bar & Steakhouse every time I am in Chicago. Love the food and the classic Chicago atmosphere. If you're visiting during the summer time, make sure to sit outside for unbeatable people-watching at the so-called "Viagra Triangle".
Love the old Chicago ambiance and the service is outstanding. Food is delicious. You will be talking about this long after your visit.
Great steaks and drinks. Large sides and huge desserts (although this last time the cake was very dry). Good atmosphere

Every time, we have someone visiting, we take them to Gibsons and they are delighted by the atmosphere, the food and the size of the dishes. Steaks, BBQ Ribs, Salads are great. Desserts are out of this world and are for sure to be shared!
The filet melted in my mouth. The blue cheese scalloped potatoes had too much blue cheese for me, but still delcious. Will definitely recommend this restaurant.

Probably my favorite Steakhouse qawd not part of Landry's thank Gawd. Perfect for my need for little or no sodium. Perfectly cooked tender mouthwatering Filets. Better than many of the other Steakhouses I have tried
Get the Porterhouse Steaks with Fries and the Deserts are very good and It is one of the Best Steakhouses in Chicago
Came here on a business trip and enjoyed the place immensely. The steaks and wine list are amazing. The deserts are to die for. The restaurant is pricey but hey, you get what you pay for. Cheers!

Great advice from our waiter, not just for food, but for activities. The entire staff is exceptional. We enjoyed a relaxing delicious meal. Alaskan king crab, NY sirloin and filet. The Chocolate Mousse Pie is to die for!!! Thank you Gibsons

column3: What can I say that hasn't been said?
column4: Never fails or disappoints, awesome service, food and ambiance is pure Chicago Gold Coast! Not a vegetarian hang out, but honestly, our daughter is a vegetarian for 10+ years and she always gets filled up with their great sides. Just can't go wrong here.
Very Consistent ! Very Large portions. Enough to share.Very good.Really great steaks. One of my favorites.
Great food and a great experience. Gibson's topped off a great weekend with my son. Our waiter was a baseball nut and gave us ideas for a future visit.
My friend and I shared an appetizer and entree as the portions are sooooo big. Great food, great wait staff and the piano music in the background is fab!

Real busy place - bit manic to be honest. Good ambience and great location. Portions are generous. Shrimp was tasteless. Steak and sides top notch! Wine list extensive but pricey for what's on there. It's good - but there are better steakhouse experiences close by.

This place is one of the best steakhouses I've ever been to. Excellent atmosphere and amazing service. The steaks are top-notch quality. You have many options for steakhouses here in Chicago, but this one will not disappoint (in my experience). Can't wait to come back!
We went to Gibson's and found everything to be excellent. The service was great and the steak was not disappointing either. We will return in the future! Reservations are recommended!

I am on the South Beach diet and one of the things I can have and look forward to is a great steak. You can't go wrong at this steakhouse! The 10 oz. filet is the smallest on the menu, but ask the wait staff...More

I visited Gibsons twice in the past few months, once for dinner and once for lunch. The service, atmosphere, and food are all excellent. It is what the others in the area strive to achieve but fall short. I dined with my family for dinner (we have teenagers), and had lunch by myself in the bar and both times the service exceeded my expectations. We are heading there this Saturday once again, because it is the only thing I wanted for my birthday. If you go, order the crabmeat avocado appetizer!

Have you ever been some place that some states ‚Äú ..The best you have ever had?‚Äù and you think to yourself; ..‚Äúself, ...what the heck do they know about the best I ever had?‚Äù . Travellingabout with a food bucket list included the following items from Chicago: Chicago style steak, deep-dish pizza and a Chicago style hot dog. Gibsons bar and Steakhouse was described as one of those ‚Äúthe best you ever had‚Äù places. Failing to secure a reservation on a Friday evening, a telephone call with a plea brought an opportunity for an early table (5:30 pm). Upon a timely arrival, the piano bar was large, filled with happy patrons and looked inviting. We were escorted to our table and the experience began here. Our incredible server with only 22 years of service at this location (!!!!!) was in perfect alignment with the beautiful and upscale dining room in traditional colors of wood and lighting scenes. The display of steaks and seafood tableside with a complete narrative by our waiter made the dining selection amazing and memorable. A recommendation for the signature lobster bisque ($6.50) brought a deep bowl of a complex and light creamed soup with a hint sherry, truffle oil and lobster. Sadly, this is only available by the bowl and not the gallon. I was convinced I have not had any better Lobster Bisque ANYWHERE. I ordered the W. R.‚Äôs Chicago Cut (22 oz. bone in T-bone, $51.75) that was perfect for two people to share. The W. R. steak was requested ‚ÄúChicago Style‚Äù, charred outside, pink medium rare inside. As an addition, Asparagus with hollandaise sauce ($10.75) requested grilled, brought a large serving of perfectly grilled, jumbo stalks of delicious green and a well-balanced sauce. The serving staff continued to be ever vigilant without imposing. Upon arrival of the W.R. steak, our server stood by after asking if I would like to cut in to the steak to ensure satisfaction. This was an old-style, professional waiter/customer appreciation moment. The steak was PERFECT and smiles traveled around the table and left with the server being as happy as we were. This was a huge meal and worth every bit. Despite the offers of incredible desserts, this foodie was stuffed full of happiness as this remarkable dinner. After rejecting the desserts respectfully, the serving staff showed up with a slice of carrot cake and a candle for a quick birthday wish for me. How they knew it was my birthday I do not know, but a fine capper for what I am calling, my food nirvana experience. I will challenge this with a visit to the Chicago Chop House next month (look for the review) and recap the winner in a second visit in December. I give my highest praise and gratitude to the staff, chef and management of this Chicago icon. Almost every food and beverage server and staff should visit to see the finest professionals display their craft and lead the city on hospitality, food service and table service.

I've gotta tell ya, I've eaten at many of the best steakhouses around the country, and I can't think of a steak I like better than the filet I just ate at Gibson's. Outstanding. By the way, if you think you have room for dessert, you better be extremely hungry; their slices of cake are enormous.
We went to Gibson's and found everything to be excellent. The service was great and the steak was not disappointing either. We will return in the future! Reservations are recommended!

I cannot recall a restaurant with a more vibrant scene. The bar area in huge yet it was jam packed - at 930pm on a Saturday. The energy was fantastic. That carried forward to our table where we had a great meal. The steaks were great. So was the lobster bisque and the oysters. Best of all was being taken care of by Elvis, our waiter. If you are lucky enough to sit in his section you will enjoy the evening that much more.

We always visit Gibsons when in Chicago and it never ever disappoints, the last few days we have been there twice for lunch and it is faultless, the service is outstanding and the food amazing, always cooked exactly as ordered, the ONLY "complaint" is that there is far too much but it's so hard not to overeat as it is so delicious. If you have any room left for dessert try the key lime pie but only order 1 to share amongst four and then try to finish it (there were three of us and we could only manage half but they boxed the rest up for us to have with coffee later when we got back to our hotel. Have tried countless other steakhouses in the USA over many years but this is definitely the best and the only way to confirm that for the doubters is to go there.

We wanted to have an authentic Chicago-lunch and were given a hint of Gibsons. The atmosphere was rather elegant: most of the guests having tailor made suits and having a relaxed business lunch. The service was excellent even if we were just wearing jeans and t-shirts. The food was ok, but not so magnificent as you could have expected. Tuna salad was cold (as expected), but somehow too cold and not so tasty after all. I could visit again, but would definitely try something different.

we were a group of 30 people and each single person took another starter and main dish, but no problem at all for tis restaurant. All food came nicely together, all warm and very fresh! very good food quality, not only steak but also fish and other dishes. Affordible and good wine list. Maybe one small minus, it's located in the basement and so has no direct light, but the friendliness of the waiters and the great food compensate this. Absolutely a restaurant you need to visit!

column3: Some of the best steak in Chicago
column4: Great atmosphere, excellent food, service and all around fun place for a good meal. The steaks are always cooked to perfection, the sides are enough to split between 3, the desserts are as huge as your head. Would recommend for a date night, special occasion, or for out of town guests.

We had lunch late in the afternoon just as the menu was changing. The waitress was very accomadating and offered us a choice of either the lunch or dinner menu. The food was very fresh and very good. One of our best meals in Chicago!
Very good food, big portions. Meat is quiet expensive. Service is very good. Book ahead as the place is allways really crowded. Desserts are very big.

I travel a lot and eat in dozens of fine restaurants every year. This is on top of my list! Seafood platter was unbelievable, steak was perfect and the service was tremendous. I can't wait to get back.
This is an excellent place to get a steak in Chicago. Go early in the nice weather and sit outside for people watching and a great meal with great service.
Great atmosphere and as expected good food. Our waiter was a little bit pretencious. But apart from that it didn't spoil the business dinner.

column3: Great Service, Fun Location, Good Food
column4: Enjoyed our experience at Gibsons. They treat you like you are the only one they have to wait on and the food was great.

Honestly I've had better steaks, but the atmosphere in the Bar is the best. If I can eat at the bar, or in the non res tables in the bar, that is what you want to do. With the pianist banging out jazz classics
Gibsons is always amazing. From the service to the food, I've never been disappointed. It is my favorite steak house in Chicago!
A little pricey but worth every cent. Food, atmosphere and service was awesome! The filet is the best I have ever had. The dessert was wonderful and 5 of us could not finish it.

We'll my sister in law took us. We sat outside with a couple of drinks then dinner. Everything was awesome and the people watching was amazing. The only thing that was a pain was all the staff standing around outside on the curb.
This is a must stop whilst in town. The steaks are huge and so are the desserts. You might run in to a star or two. We did!

This upscale restaurant lives up to its name. We booked reservations 2 months in advance (highly recommended). The food and service were outstanding. I particularly liked the way the cauliflower was prepared. Scrumptious !! No problems sharing dished as the portions can be rather large.

The food in this friendly sports bar raised the bar on bar food. Puns intended. Seriously, the prime rib French dip was tender and perfectly cooked. The goat cheese and tomato salad was a perfect light lunch. Go, enjoy.

column3: Great meal at a Rush St Steakhouse
column4: Fifteen of us for a special meal. Excellent wines, intriguing lobster bisque, enjoyable salads and lots of choices of excellent steaks, well-prepared and served. Only frustration was the small entry and large number of people waiting. Can't wait to visit again!
One of the best steaks in Chicago. Filet Mignon or Sirloin both are wonderful. The music from the bar was a little loud if dining downstairs. But this did not permeate to the rooms upstairs.

One of the many steak houses in Chicago, but think one of the best around. A bit pricey, but top quality. Great location. A tourist spot but also for locals. Service and food and both tops here. Go for it..The steaks are perfection.

This is the place to see and to be seen in the Gold Coast neighborhood. And as we were just talking about how this place is always packed with good looking people and celebrities, we spotted Stanley Tucci and his Transformer sequel stars.
Phenomenal steaks and seafood. Happening spot in both the restaurant and the bar. First class all the way.
I'm not a huge steak fan, but the steaks here were delicious. We all had to take a moment and really enjoy what we were eating.

column3: One of the best steaks anywhere
column4: Excellent "old world" steakhouse. Old world charm. Wait staff is friendly and professional. Service is tops. Steaks are perfectly prepared. Steaks don't get any better than here. Highly recommended.

Great food and ambience and our recent visit there was made even more exciting by the fact the place was filled with Chicago Bear players both past and present!! We even caught a glimpse of a 1985 NFL championship ring !!! Good times
We had a fantastic steak dinner at Gibson's. The service was great. The food was incredible. The atmosphere was wonderful. It was so much fun to sit outside on a lovely late summer evening.
There is outdoor dining in the summer and so many great food choices on the north side of the river.

You are going to pay for the food but it was simply outstanding. I had the lobster and salmon and it was cooked to perfection. The portions were a lot larger than I expected and the servers were extremely attentive.

column3: This will get your red meat fix
column4: This will get your red meat fix. I love the dirty martinis and the Sinatra feel to the place. It is a little pricy but of course it's worth every dollar.

I have been dining here for years. Consistently delicious food and great service. They have their own meat rating from the FDA. Pricey but worth it. 'Clubby' atmosphere with an outdoor patio in the summer.

column3: Can't go to Chicago without stopping in.
column4: Awesome meal. Best steak in Chicago. Great taste and atmosphere. I love the sirlon. Get a reservation in advance.
I'm italian, I'm in Chicago for my honeymoon. I want somewhere real Chicago and it was so but... The meat is fantastic but the service...

Really enjoyed our meal here - great steaks and sides. Beware portion sizes...they're massive! We had one large order of steak and two sides between three people and it was way more than enough. Great food, service and atmosphere - would definitely recommend.
It is worth a visit to Gibson's for the steaks & to have fun looking @ all the signed famous people photos. The service was attentive, but their side dishes were a little disappointing.
Enjoyed the bar and the restaurant. Service was excellent. Steaks and sides were perfect. I will definitely come back . Must see place.
Great food and great service. If you don't mind paying $40+ for a great steak, definitely go to Gibson's. The sides were also delicious.
The gold standard by which other steakhouses should be judged. Consistently exceptional...there is nothing not to love except maybe the wait (which will be worth it).

My friends and I ate st Gibson's and had a great experience. Fantastic service, fun atmosphere in the bar. Steak was good, sides were good. The desserts were huge and delicious. We would go back... Hint... Eat in the bar.
Gibsons is an excellent choice if you are looking for a steak. Wonderful staff, knowledgeable servers, excellent location. You can dine indoors or out. Great choice.
Great Steakhouse ambiance. Love the lobster here. Love the fact that they arent cheap with their electricity and use their air conditioning well. This place is a chicago must !
A wonderful evening on the patio. Great service , great food , loved the music from the jazz quartet at the bar inside.
If you want a true taste of Chicago's "Chop House" history Gibson's is a must do. The staff are off the hook and the food the same. But make a reservation, the waits can be long!
The steaks are very good and people all over the world, go to Gibson. I wish I had some money right now so that I can eat and drink and get desert

column3: What can you say about this place??
column4: It's already been said. Great drinks, love the atmosphere, the salad was a little paltry but everything else was pretty good

We visited July 4th weekend and sat outside on the sidewalk cafe. We had a delicious breakfast and enjoyed the Rush\Division entertainment. People watching is great from this venue. Service was outstanding and it is in an excellent location close to Michigan Ave.
We had great service, they allowed us to split dishes at no extra cost and gave me a free birthday sundae with candle!

I've not had service like this! They are attentive,well organized.You choose your meat before the cook it and make sure it's cooked to you liking before they leave it on your table.Excellent food.Watch the dessert...they are known for their gigantic portions!

The service was great here and the food was good. I do think it is slightly overpriced. The deserts are huge. I don't think 4 people could finish one of their deserts. I would return to here but it wouldn't be a must for me.
Big portions and great food! I always get the lobster salad and my husband get the crab cakes. If there is a long wait you can eat next door at Hugo, same menu and same kitchen!

If you are looking for a Chicago steakhouse experience, this fits the bill...but an expensive bill. Portions are enormous so feel free to share. Just prepare yourself for a very heavy meal. A good meal...but heavy!

Strip, Filet, lobster tails and chopped lobster meat? Are you kidding me? Everything (including the big broccoli) is supersized. Service is great and the place is an original. This may be the best steakhouse anywhere. Save room for dessert.

Overall, the experience was average and the value for what you pay wasn't there. The two steaks had to be sent back as they were done improperly. The wait staff seemed over taxed. I would recommend Morton's next time.

column3: As good as it gets for steak
column4: Superb steak is to be had at Gibson's in Chicago. Pricey but worth it for special occasions. It is also conveniently located within walking distance of most of the major hotels.
You cannot go wrong with anything here including the chicken. Everything is cooked to perfection. Save room for dessert!

Stayed in Chicago for a long weekend & went twice. Outstanding service!!! Was very crowded when we were there. A server carried a bar stool across the restaurant so we could as all have a seat. Great steaks, amazing food, delicious cocktails

The service is incredible, the food is outstanding! Pricey, but worth every dime! Most steaks are large enough to share, if you are unable to take a 'doggy bag' home and when ordering a side dish, they are large enough for 2-3 people.

This is a fun place to go, but only if someone else is paying! If it were my money I would rather have a smaller but better steak (this was a good steak but not the best) Service was great, very buzzy atmosphere.
Wonderful atmosphere. Many rooms, well designed & laid out so that you can find a comfortable spot. Food was fantastic, service excellent. Hustling & bustling place. Fun times

column3: Upscale Steak House..high end of your budget but worth it!
column4: Great selection on menu...Calamari was great as an appetizer..Great service and wonderful selection of steaks..they bring them to the table so you can choose..who's who in Chicago eat at this location...you get the real feel for Chicago and the movers and shakers.

column3: Good, as always... consistently great place.
column4: Food old fashioned but good. Had the oysters and a wedge salad only, but tasted the meals of the other three friends I dined with. Good, consistent, great service, funny-huge mud pie.
As always the food and the service were wonderful. If you are looking for a great steak this is the place!!
Went with a group for dinner. Restaurants always over cater to big parties so I have nothing bad to say about my experience. Food was great, atmosphere was lovely. Thriving big name establishment!
The steak was as good as we had been told. Worth the price. Be sure and get reservations - always crowded.

This place continues to impress me. They absolutely live up to their reputation! Steak was delicious and worth every penny. The wine our server suggestions was equally as delicious. Everytime I come to Chicago, I come here and have yet to be disappointed.
This is one of my favorite restaurant's in the city. The drinks are fabulous and the atmosphere is electric.
First visit after many recommendations - meat was simply awesome [I had a Porterhouse] and the venue was lively, but with attentive service.

column3: Superb service - outstanding food- every time
column4: A consistently excellent restaurant. The wait staff are very well trained and are a big part of the whole Gibson experience. The menu has something for everyone! You won't be disappointed. I should add that it is a bit pricey.
My wife will not go to Chicago unless we go to Gibsons for her to get the sliders. I am more of a steak guy and believe they have one of the best Ribeyes in the country. Great service and great food.

Traditional old style Chicago steak. Not a chain that you could eat at in any city. We liked the front room near the window during the holidays. Great service and great steak. Relatively reasonable price for a steakhouse.
During a weekend with 4 Dutch guys enjoying the American way of steak. Good atmosphere and great service.

If you are looking for a steak house, this is a good one. The food was very good, the atmosphere is lively. However, the portions are gigantic, the service is OK but nothing better, and the prices are typically steak house high.
The food was tasty, the service was great! If you're in the area, stop in for a wonderful meal in Chicago.
loved everything about this restaurant, their staff are knowledgeable and the service was great. don't go here if your not that hungry as their portion was big.

Told the wife we would do it up right when in Chicago for the Big Ten Tournment. First class meal at Gibson's. And it was this place is where to do it up right. Great food, great service, happening place

Very lively, on a Thursday night. Packed in the bar, as usual, and fun atmosphere with many people having a good time. This is how I recall this place even 10 years ago. Martini was great, and so was the Porterhouse. Nice waitress very attentive.

Average dinner, expected more based on other reviews. Steak was over cooked the first time, second try was just ok. Expected more for USDA Prime. Peppercorn crusted option overwhelmed the flavor of the steak. Service and the atmosphere was good.

column3: Great food and a vibrant people watching atmosphere
column4: Always a great meal and a vibrant atmosphere The steaks and chops are cooked to perfection The seafood always fresh Cold salads Huge deserts I'm getting hungry again Is that possible Maybe an after dinner drink Enjoy

We enjoyed the Sunday menu at the bar. I had the open faced steak sandwich that tasted great and my wife had the Alaskan King Crab appetizer. Great wine by the glass selection and good people watching near the windows.
Dined here with 5 others - great bar and steaks out of this world - watch out for the vesper cocktail - strong
This is the bestest steak house ever there was!! I would definitely come back to Gibson's. Excellent Food Excellent Service!!
This is the place to go for great food and great atmosphere. The food and service were exceptional. It was always packed in with many locals that eat there, it's NOT only for tourists.

Been their last night thought the place was packed on a Sunday night but I got a booking on bo time the food is wonderfull and the aervice is fantastics a bit pricy I pais over 100$ but it is worth it
Stopped in for drinks and ended up staying for dinner. The men enjoyed delicious steaks. I tried the chicken noodle soup, which was average, and side salad, which was good. Service was excellent.
Great food and service! Wait staff was very helpful and prompt but not annoying. Food was extremely good and the atmosphere was warm and inviting.

the team somehow manages to handle large volumes of people with service as good as it gets. we had a lrage group, the waiter took all our orders without writing anything down, and everything came out perfect!
Good food. One of the "it" places to be in town to see local and national celebrities. The food is very good and the service is spot on. Good bar area and a fun place to be during dinner or lunch.

Great people watching, as it is a very popular place by locals and out of town visitors. The food was superb, great atmosphere and decor. The piano bar was great fun! We will visit this restaurant on our next visit to Chicago.

Ate in the bar because we did not have a reservation. It's was great, just before Xmas the place was hopping the food fantastic, the envirment better. Never get a table again, bar was just a lot of fun.

It has all you can ask for in a steak house. Great meat. Simple but well accomplished side dishes. Fine wine list to choose from and dedicated attention. There is no reason why dessert portions are made so big

column3: Best steak had in a long time.
column4: Went for a simple steak medium done. Was perfect with a side of asparagus and a touch of A1 sauce. Service was excellent and was able to get a table right away (was an early dinner mind you @ 5.30pm).

The steak and appetizers here are very good but I could argue that I have eaten equally good steaks elsewhere. The macadamia turtle pie has to be ordered for photo purposes, just crazy the size of it!
This will get your red meat fix. I love the dirty martinis and the Sinatra feel to the place. It is a little pricy but of course it's worth every dollar.
I love Gibson's. Best steak in Chicago. The atmosphere is exciting and live. The food is very good and worth the price. The service is great. Try it out!
Perfect service, great (and plentiful) food and an excellent place to people watch - the diners here remind me of characters from The Sopranos. Great restuarant - the vodka martinis are to die for!
This is the creme da la creme of steakhouses. Bustling experience, Chicago celelbrities, and huge martinis and desserts. Bring your appetite (and your checkbook)!
It is just your real Chicago steakhouse. Steaks are great as is the seafood. Deserts are huge too! It is loud, it's busy, it's just a great place to be.
One of my top three for steak in Chicago. The flavor is delightful. The interior is great and the restaurant is is in a fun part of town.

If you leave here hungry, it‚Äôs your own fault! This is Chicago dining at its finest. Amazing surf ‚Äòn turf, great drinks, decadent desserts and attentive service. Can‚Äôt say enough about this dining experience. We‚Äôll be back!

The ambiance is laud, and the tables are crammed. The service is professional. The menu, not extensive, but tickling. We chose obviously the steak, which was good, but not excellent. The wine list is comprehensive. Everything though is in to large servings and to expensive.
If you want the ultimate Chicago experience go here. Splitting or order is welcome, steaks are large. Perfectly cooked old school wait staff very knowledgeable.

column3: Great classic (but not cheap) steak place
column4: Have eaten here with family on Chicago trips for a few years now. Fantastic steak and food in general. Service good. Definitely not cheap. Worth it? Probably.
Loved all the pictures of celebs who have been here on the walls. The fillet steak was up there with the best. Fantastical experience can't wait till may so I can frequent this establishment again.
Great steak and great atmosphere! Make sure you get a reservation though as it is always busy. Service was very good also.

A must stop when in Chicago...The way you order your streak is the way it comes.This does not happen everywhere.Large portions,go smaller than you think you want. Arrive 30 min earlier to have a cocktail in the lounge.Its quite a scene.
Gibsons has one of the best steaks in town! I usually get the fillet, and it is one of the best fillets in town! If you want to get a steak and you are in downtown chicago, this is the place to go!
dinners here are well known, but don't miss for luncg- great selections, generous portions and very atttentive service. great people watching

Went there almost ten years ago and this time (July '12) was just as good! Delicious food. Loved the live music! The staff couldn't have been nicer. We got as much attention as a table of regulars sitting right near us.
Always busy, always excellent. Great menu and old school, professional service. You can't go wroing...if you can get in.
Classic, Chi-Town steak house. Not cheap, but fun with excellent food and outdoor seating. Best steak I've had in a long time and I frequent steakhouses on business!

column3: Get past the indifferent bar tender and poor service and this would be the best!!
column4: Shoddy and inattentive bartender is the only spoiler for this highly rated venue. The best steaks in the US beating dny of its contemporaries. Restaurant service impeccable.

Went to Gibson's in early August. What a great experience. When it's slow during the week they will bring platters out of their sliders and they are amazing! And Great Steaks the NY strip is awesome.great service.
