Delicious! NYStrip steak is the way to go! Great service and great location too! surrounded by other nice bars/restaurants... Nice crowd but not too crowded - definitely recommend it if you are looking for a nice steak dinner!
We when here for a great steak. And we were not disappointed. The food was all cooked as ordered. The service was top notch. The shrimp was very good. Did not do dessert but they looked great.
Post-marathon dinner. Fabulous steaks. Sides are huge, but of great quality. Very informative waiter. Not cheap, but well worth the trip if you want a special dinner.
Our lunch at Gibson's was delightful ! We sat outside, the weather was beautiful . We both had the lobster Cobb salad! Yummy! The wine was good and the server was pleasant . Give it a try!
I had the steak cooked well. A friend took me here... I liked it I would go again went I get the money...
The steaks were huge so the waiter was nice enough to let us share a meal. It was absolutely fabulous and I loved the atmosphere. Wine list amazing.
Great steak, a really busy restaurant so book early but don't go for a quiet, romantic meal go for the food which is fantastic and the staff really friendly and fun.
Return trip to Chicago and had to eat here again. As good as the first time, great steak, wine and company. Very busy even on a Tuesday night but they got us right in.

column3: The best steak in the universe!
column4: The waiters are experienced, loyal and committed to their vocation. We had what was simply what has to be the best beef in the universe.

If you want to "be seen", and see "beautiful people", then head here, to the heart of the "Viagra Triangle". If you want great food, head elsewhere, like Benny's Chophouse, which destroys Gibsons, and has better cocktails.

Steak was excellent. The service was very good. The ceasar salad was ordinary. The french fries were cold and not flavorful. Asparagus was bland and water logged. The cream spinach was good. We had a baby and they were accommodating.
Great food great service. Atmosphere was lovely. Oversize meals. Best steak I had in long time. Highly Recommended
Food is good. Big portions. Just not one of my favorites. I would still recommend. Had a long wait time. Our service wasn't that prompt.
loved the neighborhood and outdoor dining space. The food was delicious and well worth a trip here! A perfect place to people watch and see the horse drawn carriages go by
Trendy local in the downtown.very cool. The meat is fantastic and so potatoes and bernese sauce Very goog pleasure.
If you like steaks there is no better place to go in Chicago and the service is great! Steaks are done perfectly and everything is oversized
We love to take a break from shopping with lunch at Gibsons. The food is always outstanding. Eating on the sidewalk and watching Rush St. go by is a great way to spend a Saturday afternoon.
This is the place to go in Chicago for a great steak. The wait is well worth it but it is better to make a reservation if you can. The service was impeccable. Will return when back in Chicago
Had reservations but still had to wait. The steaks and side dishes were delicious. The steaks were cooked exactly how they were asked to be. No room for dessert but they looked really good.
Very popular steak house in an always trendy area on Rush. Worth the price. Great service. Perfect for special occasion. Expect a wait even with reservations if it is the second sitting.

column3: Great piano bar with excellent food
column4: The entertainment is outstanding. The crowd in the piano bar is fun to watch. The steaks are great and a bit pricey.
Plenty of steakhouses in Chicago but this is the best. Lots of activity and the desserts are exceptional if you don't fill up on a great steak

column3: My annual Birthday Dinner every year!
column4: This place is always so busy and crowded and you definitely need advance reservations but it will be the best meal you have in Chicago and the best service!!! My fav!1

column3: Great Food with Excellent Service from ELVIS
column4: Steak melted in my mouth! Elvis was a great staff member who was attentive, quick, and funny! Great Job!!

column3: good service, good food, reliable as always
column4: Loud, as all Chicago / American restaurants are, but quality food and friendly service in a good location.
I was suddenly hungry late at night and walked from the Sofitel Water Tower two blocks north and stopped here. The New York Steak was perfect and the ambience very comfortable.

The service and food at Gibson's is excellent. Try the capaccino martini....outstanding! I was there with an extremely drunk client, the the wait staff couldn't have been more professional for which I was extremely thankful. The steak I ordered was perfection! I will definitely return.
another of Chicagos great steak houses food is alway great and mealts in your mouth service is fantastic

My husband and I went to Gibson's on a friend's recommendation and we were not disappointed. We each had the fillet. It was excellent. Our waitress - I believe her name was Tammy -- was very friendly and helpful in making suggestions.
I loved everything about this place, it just has the best atmosphere! The steaks and the wine are fantastic!

column3: Wonderful Steaks and Service - never fails to surpass itself
column4: If you love steak you will struggle to find better anywhere in the world. Service is second to none and atmosphere is fantastic. Been many times and this is my first review -great to see such high standards being maintained !

Definetely you HAVE to go to Gibsons, best steak and staff in a Steak House. Prices are excellent for the excellent food they put out. Don't be fooled with other steak houses, this is THE place to go.
We loved sitting outside and watching Chicago pass us by while we enjoyed a drink and a snack.
Loved the staff, the food and the desert. Would go back to just eat there again.
Fantastic steak house. We had a superb meal. Lovely sides too. Even bought the steak knives

column3: DO IT! U won't regret it!
column4: Get yourself a steak!!...You won't be sorry!!! Awesome sides and desserts!! Waitstaff was incredible!!

column3: The place to go on Rush Street!
column4: Interesting atmosphere and great for a steak house. It's a manly place to go! The men love it and the ladies love going with their man! Food and service are the best. Good view of the neighborhood if you sit outside.
Outstanding service, excellent atmosphere, and ridiculous portions. Also great for spotting celebrities. If your only in Chicago for one night, go here!
Unbelievable martinis and steaks. The best in the business of great food and service
Gibson's far outweighs any steak house I ever visited. I thought Morton's steak's were good, which they are; but Gibson's taste is totally outstanding.

This place is a little pricey but if you want an excellent steak, this is the place to go. The side dishes are huge and they recommend that you share with another person. I recommend that you get the blue cheese dressing. It is amazing!

Best Martini's; Amazingly delicious and addictive Sliders; Phenomenal Servers; Gorgeous Gold Coast neighborhood; Fantastic people watching!!! It's THE place to frequent in my neighborhood and it NEVER fails to disappoint! A MUST-see! Enjoy!

column3: A little pricey but worth it
column4: Entrees about $20 & up but food is excellent, wine prices reasonable, and people-watching shouldn't be missed. In Gold Coast neighbourhood at Bellevue & Rush St. Beautiful Brownstones, gardens and close to Mag Mile & Lake Michigan.
This place is hopping. The bar is busy, they make a good drink. The steaks are delicious and the lobster is to die for. The surf and turf is Big enough to split.
Just completed my annual trip to Chicago and Gibsons. Don't waste your time on anything less than their "Chicago cut" steak with scallop potatoes. A truly wonderful experience.

Best steak in Chicago. The walls are lined in mahogany and adorned wih pictures of celebrities who have eaten there. Try the King Sandwich - biggest prime rib sandwich on the planet. Worth every penny here.

What a fantastic place..one of the best steaks we have had. I has the pepper steak salad and it was amazing...great service, location...and great produce... They know there steaks so don't go any farther..this is your place!
Best steaks in the city. Large & tasty steaks. Very flavorful. Highly recommended.
And yes I've been to the others - Morton's, Palm, Chophouse, G&G, etc., but Gibson's is my fav. Great bar, great steak and great sides. Atmosphere and location are wonderful too.
Went here based on a recommendation. Steak was subpar and not worth the extremely high prices. Atmosphere and service were very nice.
Ate there recently and the steaks are outstanding!

We had by far the best steaks I've ever eaten. Their beef is the most tender and tasty that I have ever consumed. The service is top shelf, but undoubtably, the finest steakhouse perhaps in the country.

column3: Phenomenal steaks, a little crowded though.
column4: T-bone was outstanding, baked potatoes were huge! The menu is extensive and has a wide range of choices for all budgets. The service was very good! Only downside was the tables are very close together! Oh and definitely book if possible!

Was looking for the ultimate Chicago steak experience and I wasn't disappointed! Perfectly cooked juicy steak and a double baked potatoe was all I could ask for. Very busy place so booking a table is definitely a good idea!
very expensive, average fare, average to slightly below average service by servers that expect above average tip regardless of service. It's just not that great and I've now been there 3 times.

column3: Dessert can feed a family of 4
column4: The planked whitefish was delicious and a great value. The porterhouse was also excellent but costly. Dessert brought in from next door, Hugo Frog's, was huge.
It is an area they dubbed "the viagra circle". Old guys with big money with women who are looking for a meal ticket. The food is good, stay with steaks. Its a in the scene restaurant.
Staff are great and have a unique way of saying happy birthday. We were there on a Tuesday at it was packed. Everyone knows this is a good place to eat.

column3: Not cheap, but excellent quality - go for the steaks:)
column4: Enormouse steaks, plenty of salad and sides, very popular venue.
It was good, but frankly if we had not been treated to dinner by a colleague there is no way I would pay 50.00 for a steak
Gibsons is a must when in the windy City, excellent steaks and you must try their Bookbinder soup the best soup anywhere. Great service, atmosphere and fun place to dine and have drinks.
The service was excellent, made to feel important.. The meal (Steak) was cooked the way I wanted it and tasted excellent.

column3: Many steakhouses to chose from but this was GREAT
column4: reservations are definitely needed. The service is incredible. The food was delicious and plentiful. Save room for the 5 layer chocolate mousse cake. Yummy. I love when managment walks around to see if everything is ok.

column3: A bit pricey but you can afford it!
column4: An institution but vibrant. The bar is consistently packed and the scene is well-heeled and grown up. A definite place to stop for a drink or to settle in for a while.
What a busy place, steaks are stunnning , with the prime rib being the daddy of steaks, service with a smile , great wine selection
24oz. pepper-crusted sirloin was the best steak I've ever had (med-rare).
Dinner and drinks at Gibsons -- outstanding food and service.
Just had lunch here while on a business trip to Chicago. The bill was nearly 40$ for lunch for two sandwiches which were the worst I have ever eaten. Glad we didnt choose this place for dinner.
Delicious food, great people who were attentive and the place was beautiful to be in!
This a quintisential steak house that stretches itself to make your meal personally attended to. We had delicious steaks and very attentive service. It is also very disabled-friendly.
This is a very nice steakhouse. However for the price, didn't think the food was worth it. Great service, but felt rushed the entire time during dinner.

Fun atmosphere, lively. Our waiter was outstanding. Incredible, large portions. Downside for me - waitstaff constantly banged me in the head all evening as they hurriedly passed my table - nothing short of rude.
My wife and I have travelled to Chicago 5 times and we never miss an opportunity to eat at this restaurant. The steaks have have always met our expectations. Truly an experience not to miss.

column3: Eat Great and See and Be Seen
column4: Terrfiic steaks, humungous baked poatoes and even larger desserts. You'll never know who you'll see inside as the photos on the walls will attest.

column3: Classy restaurant in a great location
column4: Excellent steak and seafood. Right next to Hugo's Frog Bar in the Rush Street restaurant district. Great service, food and atmosphere. It can get loud, so if you want a quiet, intimate night, I wouldn't go here.
Huge portions and top cuts of meats pricy but worth it

Situated in the heart of dining/shopping area in downtown Chicago, this is a bit of an institution. The choice of steaks is impressive and food is well cooked. Portions are huge especially dessert. We had 2 for a party of 6 and couldn't finish 1!

column3: Definitely worth a visit in Chicago!
column4: Really buzzy atmosphere, excellent food and great experience, highly recommend dining here!
Came here for lunch alone. Service was excellent but the best experience was their steak! I had a small portion and it was more than enough. The best steak ever.
Visited for a business dinner and enjoyed it very much. Good service.Food was excellent and abundant (portions are huge). Had steak that melted in my mouth. Great bar. location and atmosphere.
Good solid steakhouse without any attitide from the friendly waiters. Delicious NY strip steak and sides. Tables can be a little crowded. Ask for a booth.

column3: Top notch food - one of the best in Chicago
column4: Have been making Gibsons a regular stop every time I am in Chicago and it never fails. I also have visited the one in Rosemount - very good as well.

Go very hungry because the portions are enormous. One dessert can easily feed 4 people. Service is wonderful, as is the experience of picking your own steak or lobster from a tray, as are the steaks. Just be careful how much you order.
I enjoyed the crowd but almost nothing else. The waiter was intrusive and annoying. The steak was just ok, the fish not very good. Size is not everything. Big portions did not deliver good taste.

The 7 oz petite filet was fantastic. It came with mashed potatoes and veggie. I'm not a steak person but decided to try it anyway. It was fantastic. Very tender and juicy. The raspberry martini was to die for.
pettie filet, was the most amazing! I loved the service from everyone their. We had a great time.

Have never had a bad meal here. They go out of their way to celebrate special occasions such as birthdays and anniveraries. Great food and service when you want to splurge for those special occasions. Great choice when you want to splurge!!
loud, crowded and very noisy....don't pay much attention to reservations...but food was excellent
Don't waste your time with the others. Giant deserts, save room for carrot cake, one piece will feed whole table. Celebrity spotting sometimes.
Huge martinis, delicious steaks & seafood, great location! Super-fun people-watching; classic steakhouse environment. conveniently located near wonderful Rush & Oak Street shops.

column3: A chicago landmark, top notch, but there are better steaks in chi
column4: This place is about the ambience, you will likely see chicago elite and stars anytime. the food including steaks are very good. But, the best in chicago as people tend to claim. book really early days if not weeks out for a dinner rsvp
Steaks good but amazingly the best salmon I've ever had
Very attentive service. Great steaks! A famous Chicago steakhouse that lived up to it's reputation!
Always great steaks, come with an appetite. Feels old-timey, and the service is wonderful.
Best steak ever.. and watch out for desert.. come hungry!
This IS what a Chicago Steak House is all about. Yes it's loud and crrowded and everything is BIG but that's Chicago!
You pay way too much $$$ to be rushed so they can "turn over a table." The food is good but not worth the money considering everything else.

column3: The wait staff thinks its better than it is.
column4: Visiting Chicago today. The food was just Ok. While the steak was cooked perfectly, the cut of meat was marginal. The staff was arrogant to think we have not had better. There are MUCH better places to eat in Chi Town... Skip it!
Been going here for years! Best Steaks in the city...awesome seafood too. I highly recommend!!
The dinner was just perfect, very nice and helpful staff. One of my favorite in chicago!| even if quite expensive!

column3: Good steaks...an institution so you should go at least once
column4: This is an iconic Chicago Chop house. I love the steaks. It is a bit pricey but it was a good experience. Order the Chocolate Cake for dessert. It is HUGE so you probably want to share it!
We grabbed a light lunch and drinks at the bar in Gibson's. The bar has a fabulous lively environment and the food was excellent. The service from the bartender was also top notch.

A recent visit to Gibson's Bar & Steakhouse yielded one of the best steaks ever! However, I knew it was coming as it was not my first time there. Pricey but if you want the best you have to pay. I will be back!!!

column3: Want to see the posers come here. Want a great cut of beef go elsewhere!
column4: Steaks are good not great. Too many posers looking to be seen or see someone. The bar area is great, but that's about it.

We enjoyed an early dinner in the bar. Snagged a table by the window for a few drinks, a burger, a salad and a baked potato. Great atmosphere and energy of old school Chicago. Delicious food, excellent service.
It is pricey, but if you like steak, it is very good
A Chicago staple but very trendy and pricey...Not a huge fan of the Gold Coast area where its located.

We go here all the time. The downtown restaurant is great because if you like Fish, you can ask for the Hugo's menu and order off of there. The crab/avocado appetizer is absolutely amazing!!! This place is a Chicago staple and a definite must!!
While on the pricey side, Gibsons also delivers a great product. Very important to make reservations in advance as this is the place to be seen.
Great steak if you want to spend about $50 an entree. I think I remember the lobster tail costing $75
As good as or better than those at Mastro, Capital Grille, Smith n Wollensky.
Dinners were pricey but worth it if you want to splurge. Steaks were as tender as could be, portions were generous and service was excellent. The entire meal, from entree to dessert was delicious.

column3: Great city atmosphere. Over the top portions. Terrific wait staff. Food is good.
column4: A must go in Chicago. Gets you right in step with the Chicago vibe. Wait staff is very personable and willing to meet your every need. Food is average for high end steak houses.

Aged beef, large portions, excellent staff. This is a Chicago institution and for good reason. Regardless of wether you take clients or just a date, they will be impressed. Bone in "cowboy" ribeye of filet are both excellent choices. Bring your large wallet!
Being from the Texas Southwest, we know steaks! This was delicious! Service was quick and very good! We will return when we get back to Chicago!

column3: Great Food, Great Service, Very Crowded
column4: Make a reservation, this place is hugely popular. While it wasn't the best steak I've ever had, it was was up there. Service was excellent.
Great steaks in established Chicago Restaurant Lively atmosphere Joe the bartender is a legend
Old Chicago feel and atmosphere. Good steaks but pricey.

column3: Not up to past visits, and it wasn't even busy.
column4: Went for lunch with the family on Black Friday. Food was just okay. None of the six of us walked out happy with the meals, to be honest. I'd give it another try due to past experience but they were just off that day.
This is a great restaurant! I had one of the best steaks ever! Food, service, atmosphere is outstanding. Make reservations and enjoy! A must do restaurant in Chicago. I will be back!
If your going to chicago to take in some history... All you need to do is walk into this place and check out the walls. Great food, great service... It's a must.
Love this place. Great food and service. I loved their desserts!
Gibson's steaks are delicious....nice char on the outside, warm and juicy on the inside. The side dishes are equally good, and the piano bar is great.

Great food, one of the best steaks we had. Great bar scene and service. The location is a hot spot in Chicago and it had a very mixed growd. The buzz was correct with all the reviews and is a top pick in Chicago .
Best steaks ever. Tender and juicy. Restaurant not overcrowded. Service was outstanding. Highly recommended. Definitely worth a stop when in Chicago.
Often imitated....never improved....!!!! If you want to have a true Chicago experience this is the place to go.
The wine was affordable and good. We took the waiters suggestions and was totally pleased beyond measure.

column3: Bar was happening -- yuppy 30+ crowd professionals, restaurant excellent
column4: Bar was fun for older singles. Restaurant superb, as well as winelist. Had oysters on the half shell, fried calamari, salad, filet mignon (three sizes to choose from) crusted in pepper. Excellent, grilled to perfection. Pricy but worth it.
Food was outstanding. A little pricey. Most meals could be split between two people. Outstanding service.
On our weekend stay in Chicago we ate at Gibson‚Äôs and Ditka‚Äôs. Better steak at Ditka‚Äôs. Having said that there was nothing wrong with the meal at Gibson‚Äôs they were just disorganized.
Make sure to book as we did but we still had a lengthy wait...
Good steak, great service, authentic and time tested

column3: Great value, retro dishes and all around good food
column4: Great selection, big portions, delicious food with good soup and salad choices in addition to meat and fish. Classic almond restaurant chunky dishes which always makes the food and coffee taste better. Nice atmosphere too and great location. Service friendly.

Wonderful waiter Greg, very knowledgeable, friendly w/out being intrusive. Shared a huge steak at his suggestion, perfect amount and was delicious. Spinach was cooked very well. No room for dessert. Definitely worth the money.
Like a good steak this is the place. What else can I say!
The service and food were fantastic! The dessert portions are HUGE so be prepared to share.
Great steak, seafood, service at this Chicago steakhouse. Location is excellent. Get the surf and turf you won't be disappointed.
Loved the atmosphere, the food was fantastic! Sides were good but the steak was obvs the star.

The steaks were very good as was the service. I expected something a little more; perhaps my expectations were too high. I have had other good meals at steakhouses serving prime beef - nothing out of the ordinary when compared to those.
Big sides, great meat, good wine selection. We had a huge piece of cake that four of us left without eating all of it.
The steaks in Gibson's were excellent. Dinner for two, without dessert was over $200; costly but good!
book in advance and go around suppertime. You never know who is going to walk through the door. Great menu and very helpful staff.
What a lively restaurant with great food and a friendy staff.

column3: excellent !!!! my husband is still raving about his steak- best ever
column4: Carl was great ! hope you get to sit at his table !
What an experience!! Our server, Paco, was so knowledgeable and friendly! The food was truly amazing! Thank you for a great Chicago experience!
All you can ask for in a great Chicago tradition. Great steaks, good salads and sides and great deserts! Also don't miss the 1 1/2 pound lobster tail for an appetizer!
Great food and drinks. Have a drink at the bar and you will know everyone in twenty minutes. We talked with Mike Dytka - very cool! Steaks are great - almost too big. Bring your wallet.
Third time to Gibson's. Yes - it's busy. Yes - it's crowded. Yes - it's loud. But the food is absolutely amazing. Perfection!

Great restaurant with comfortable atmosphere. Server was efficient and knowledgeable. Food was great, especially the steaks. I don't know what they do to them but the french fries are a must. I would highly recommend this restaurant!

If you're looking for a classic Chicago steakhouse, this is the place. We had great food and service on our visit in May 2011. Make reservations! And for families - note that there is not a kids menu.
Top service, atmosphere, and food... you'll definitely need a reservation.
Place with great food and great atmosphere. We had great steaks and tasty whitewish. Will go there again when in chicago

column3: As good as it should be!
column4: Ate here several times in the '90s, never impressed. Saw it was rated very highly now, needed to take some business associates to dinner, and it was spot on. Great food, great service, great 'clubby-business' type atmosphere. Boy, did I look good!
Just put it on your list...it is one of the BEST restaurant's in downtown Chicago. Hands down!!!
Gibsons is my favorite steakhouse in the country. It was so good and the service was amazing. Highly recommended....just keep in mind that the deserts as HUGE so please share them with friends

You won't find a better bar atmosphere- vibrant, fun, good drinks. The restaurant is definitely a scene- great for people watching. The food is amazing- from start to finish, and the service is impeccable.

column3: We returned to an old favorite and loved it once more!
column4: We planned a business trip to Chicago and travel plans required a lunch and not a dinner at Gibson's, an old favorite. We were not disappointed. Steaks cooked perfectly to order. Food arrived promptly. Service was exceptional but not intrusive. We will return!

Steaks were great as I expected them to be. Service was terrific. Atmosphere was very loud and crowded. Side dishes were disspointing but the clam chowder (included with the steaks) was amazing. Will try Morton's The Original next time.

column3: This place is the real deal
column4: Perfect steak. Great service. Huge martitni. This is probably what Ruth's Chris was like before she sold out and became a chain. Very authentic, top notch steak house.
There service was outstanding but the steaks are just ok. If you love burnt charbroiled flavor for your steak this restaurant is for you. We did go to the bar after dinner and the bar scene was good.

column3: A lively place, but the steak was tough
column4: Gibsons is a local institution, a great, noisy place to people-watch. The food is okay, but not exceptional. The steak I had was tough and tasteless, but the veggies were great. The portions were obscenely huge. I'll try something else next time.

column3: Wonderful meal, wonderful experience. The wait staff was delightful. We had a table on the enclosed patio area - the...
column4: Wonderful meal, wonderful experience. The wait staff was delightful. We had a table on the enclosed patio area - the view was much better people watching than inside.
A great dinner experience at a fair price for the quality of the steaks, Deserts could feed a small city, and the bar scene was vibrant even on a Tuesday night.

For such a value the steaks taste like a thousand bucks!! Whenever we head into Chicago with the family we usually go here because of family-friendly menu. And like I said before the prices are hard to beat in the windy city.
In Chicago great steaks are not hard to find. I love Gibsons as an original with that Chicago atmosphere.

column3: A great steak house for a fab night out.
column4: This is a great Chicago experience. Wonderful steaks and great desserts! Always a good chance to see a local celeb or two.
Can be lots of fun.

Gibsons has wonderful steaks and huge desserts. The food is so good and the service is old school attentive. This is a great place for entertaining clients or a date. The bar scene is cool and the location can't be beat. Awesome!

Steaks good but not great for the price.My husband liked that the waiter brought the different steaks out on tray for us to pick the cut we wanted.Very large side dishes.Dress was casual to business dress.
i really enjoyed this restaurant. the service was excellent and steaks were to die for. best of all was the atmosphere.a trip to chicago would not be the same without visiting this restaurant

column3: I had better steaks at other city restaurants. The place needs to be brought back to the 21st century. Also, the crowd...
column4: I had better steaks at other city restaurants. The place needs to be brought back to the 21st century. Also, the crowd is bad...
GREAT Porterhouse NUff Said
great atmosphere, service ok
Will probably be packed and noidy, but great steaks and "surf n turf". And a lively bar scene to keep you awake late...

column3: very good steak everytime I've been there
column4: very good steak everytime I've been there

column3: Love the steak here, you're always guaranteed to see someone and the dessert is amazing.
column4: Love the steak here, you're always guaranteed to see someone and the dessert is amazing.
Friday is lobster bisque day!!
Possible to see someone famous!

column3: Excellent food and service, everytime we go there.
column4: Excellent food and service, everytime we go there.
Great meat!
great garbage salad

column3: I have no idea if this place is good, as it is such a scene. I found it all too overwhelming.
column4: I have no idea if this place is good, as it is such a scene. I found it all too overwhelming.

column3: Great steaks and excellent service. Come with friend because portions are big enough to share.
column4: Great steaks and excellent service. Come with friend because portions are big enough to share.
Went there now twice in the last two months and I think there flavor of the meat has gone down hill.
Always yummy!

column3: Cool to look at and be looked at, but the food, not so much. I make better steak at home on the Weber.
column4: Cool to look at and be looked at, but the food, not so much. I make better steak at home on the Weber.

column3: I just love a giant cake...
column4: I just love a giant cake with a steak knife stuck in it. Call me crazy.

column3: Great steak... Good place to take an out of towner..
column4: Great steak... Good place to take an out of towner..

column3: The carrot cake is bigger than your head! Scary!
column4: The carrot cake is bigger than your head! Scary!
Good classic steakhouse. Forget the big chain in the neighborhood.
Good food; Capital Grill is way better.
The #1 steakhouse in Chicago.

column3: I thought it was a little overrated, but good food nonetheless.
column4: I thought it was a little overrated, but good food nonetheless.

column3: Hard to say what I really like about this place. The food is probably better at Capital Grille or Morton's but the...
column4: Hard to say what I really like about this place. The food is probably better at Capital Grille or Morton's but the atmosphere is better here.

column3: loud. old scene. relably good, but not excellent, meat and potato food.
column4: loud. old scene. relably good, but not excellent, meat and potato food.

column3: I was underwhelmed by this place. While it was packed, the service was annoying, the food was good but not what I had...
column4: I was underwhelmed by this place. While it was packed, the service was annoying, the food was good but not what I had heard so much about. I am also not a fan of "Family Style" dining when it comes to steak.

column3: Great food, but misses 4-star rating due to self-promotion and favoristism shown to celebrities. Prepare to get...
column4: Great food, but misses 4-star rating due to self-promotion and favoristism shown to celebrities. Prepare to get bounced from your table when a baseball or basketball player shows up post-game.
Wrigley Cut...Mmmm

column3: Well I make sure I go at...
column4: Well I make sure I go at least twice if i am there for 5 days. It is hard to find people thats want go back its alot of red meat. A+

column3: Ok - a must visit if you...
column4: Ok - a must visit if you are in chicago - the steaks are great but the biggist win is the dessert...its big and tasty and always makes a good conversation piece

column3: Usually not a steak person, but this was excellent. Mushrooms were also delicious. Desserts were INSANELY large!
column4: Usually not a steak person, but this was excellent. Mushrooms were also delicious. Desserts were INSANELY large!
Good food but don't like the crowds
Overrated

column3: love it. gotta try the Margaritas! slice of heaven!
column4: love it. gotta try the Margaritas! slice of heaven!
Good vibe, very Chicago. Good not great.

column3: best of its kind in chicago; best martini
column4: best of its kind in chicago; best martini
Super expensive ....super gooood! totally worthy!
Good food. Huge servings. Packed.
We came as a large group and had appetizers and drinks in the bar. The maple bacon appetizer was the best The The main
Went for an anniversary dinner. Great food and great service. Try the lobster risotto as a side. Amazing. Ambiance was warm and inviting. Extensive wine list. Well priced.

column3: Always a nice place to have a cocktail
column4: A nice walk from near any place in the down town area and a good atmosphere to be in. Always a nice place to have a cocktail.

This restaurant had great food. I ordered a filet which was average but others in my party ordered meatloaf and a burger and they were both amazing. Good service, good food and a nice easy walk from the St Jane hotel.
Food was outstanding and portions were more then filling. The service was excellent and perfect for the setting.
I was served some of the toughest steaks of my life in this place. Ignore the Kobe award, Chicago has better

We had a very nice meal, filets that were done right. Our service was acceptable, but not exceptional. Wine selection good. Place is old school which was enjoyable. A little spendy but again, a solid meal.
This was my 2nd trip to Benny's for a Christmas party. The service was spot on, and the food was delicious. My wife and I look forward to coming back!
Louisa did an amazing job in providing a welcoming and attentive service. We loved everything we ordered. It was delicious.

Seriously good stakes at Benny‚Äôs. Noisy - in a positive way - atmosphere, people apparently happy to be there. Oysters Rockefeller, great and lobster-crab ravioli, superb. Very friendly staff. Didn‚Äôt really plan the visit, but truly enjoyed. Highly recommended.

Dinner at the bar. Bartender was extremely attentive and friendly. Steak was good but very small and no accompaniment. Pricey for the amount of food. Decent wine list. Would be a good place for a business dinner.
Had an excellent meal today at Benny's Steak (on Wabash). Couldn't be better. Had a Steak with Mac & Cheese side. Would recommend it to anyone.
One of the best steak houses in Chicago. Probably the best Old Fashioned I‚Äôve had anywhere. Carrot cake is the best.

This was one of our best meals in a decade. Benny's is a classic, old-school steakhouse--great meat, fine salads, intelligent wine list, attentive service. We will return again on our next trip to Chicago.
Our third visit to Benny's was as special as the first. Great service, great food, and atmosphere. A real gem of a steakhouse.
Wonderful bar, service and food. We always order from the bar menu, but you have to ask special or you won't be offered it. I don't know why.
The food and service are outstanding and your visit should be similarly fantastic! Just an increasingly rare "great" experience on all levels. The "off-menu" double-baked potato was especially good.
We have been at Benny's before but they always seem to raise the bar. Great oysters. They then follow with one of my best experiences with steak. There sizzle is there service which was over the top.
This is not a big chain restaurant but it made the steak so good! I like to so much because the portion is not too big and juicy.
Husband and I shared filet with a salad and 2 sides and 1 glass of wine and bill was still over 100$. Service was excellent and enjoyed the atmosphere
Great music and delicious food! The steaks were amazing. The service was excellent! It wasn‚Äôt crowded at all when I went.

column3: Benny‚Äôs. You‚Äôve never let us down
column4: The food is amazing. The service is amazing. The wine list is ...amazing 3 years in a row for our Anniversary and we absolutely love it.

I recently dined at Bennys chop house and it was excellent my server Christen was wonderful lovely personality definitely someone you should ask for. The crab cakes are the best in the city hands down.
What a great place. The bacon starter a must. Seafood tower amazing. What a choice of steaks. Can‚Äôt wait to return next year. Service impeccable.

The restaurant look is mid-high level, not very stylish. The Italian chef is a guaranty. Steak was very tasty, I guess the best we had in Chicago. Fish was good but not impressive. After all a good choice. Better than more famous names in Chicago.
Had a really good dinner this restaurant the food was out of this world and the service was really good definitely as I must stop my next time in Chicago
Food and service are excellent. 7 ounce natural fillet was cooked perfectly. Baked potatoes are large and tasty. I recommend the coffee after dinner.
I headed thier for lunch and have to say inhad a very good experience on both food and service side. The dry aged bone in Ribeye is highly recommended and was cooked as desired.
Made reservations based upon internet ratings. We were impressed with the steaks and service. Would go back there again as it was better than another steak house we went to a few days earlier.

Great place with a very comfortable setting was initially concerned it would be stuffy but it was classy and elegant yet still relaxing . Our server David was the best. The food was unbelievable. Thank you for the birthday celebration
Superb, attentive, warm, friendly service. Beautiful interior. Delicious food! While quite pricey, we would absolutely return.
Outstanding service, great, unique wine list with helpful suggestions, steak was enormous! The best though was the maple bacon appetizer, unbelievable!

Huge bar, live music, great food!! It is sooooo pretty inside too. Service is fantastic too. They have a little bit of everything in the menu. They have an awesome private room that would be a great private dinner.
The bacon appetizer was delicious. The gnocchi was excellent along with the bone in filet. Nice relaxed atmosphere with great service

Family dinner at Benny's. Third visit. One traditional steak, one natural steak (no antibiotics, etc.), one order scallops. All unreal. Relaxed, professional service. RPM has a more hip atmosphere, but wasn't quite as good and was more expensive (ate there last night). Love Benny's. Enjoy.

We had 16 people in our group. The wait staff was extremely attentive and accommodating. Everyone was thrilled with their menu selections and the tenderloin I had was the best steak I have ever eaten. Prices are on par with other top steak restaurants.

Had a good meal here - excellent steak, good sides in large portions, attentive (almost obsequious) staff. Expensive and too noisy to have a conversation. Overall enjoyable - about what you expect from a high-end steakhouse.

column3: Filet with Bone Marrow Butter! Yum!
column4: We had the whole experience here! Oysters and Grilled Caesar Salad were yummy. Also, filet with Bone Marrow Butter is awesome. Warm washcloths with lemon juice between courses for our hands were a nice touch. Dessert was disappointing.
i can't add more to about this place. The meat was simply amazing, the place is nice and we ordered a chocolate dessert a mix between a brownie and a cookie that OMG!!! Cocktails are good too.
Impeccable service and amazing steak. Not cheap, but well worth the money. Wait staff was knowledgeable and took great care of us. Steak was incredible!
Great food!!!! The bacon appetizer is awesome!!!! Atmosphere was very relaxing. Highly recommend Benny's

I am a big Gibsons fan, but a friend invited us here for dinner. From the minute you walk in the door the service is outstanding. While the restaurant is big, it doesn't have the craziness of Gibsons. Go there... its worth it.

We chose this location on a local recommendation and man are we ever grateful for the referral. Alexander our server was extremely professional as was the entire staff. The food was cooked to perfection, and desserts were obviously made onsite. Amazing! We will be back..

Great for a special occasion. Wonderful service - attentive but not intrusive. Steaks melt in your mouth and you simply have to save room for dessert - their Smores cheesecake is one of the best desserts I've ever eaten!
Best carrot cake I've ever had. Nice service. Good cocktails. The meat is on its point and the lobster macaroni is simply exquisite.
First time here, and the meal was outstanding. Steak and wine lists are five star! One of the best steakhouses I've been to in Chicago, and I've been to all of them.
Best dry aged cut of meat I've ever had. Simply stunning. Staff was fantastic. Atmosphere was great. Every time I'm in Chicago, Benny's is my go to place.

column3: The most delicious steak I've ever had
column4: Went with family, 6 adults and 3 children. Great service, delicious food, and amazing atmosphere. We all enjoyed our steaks.

column3: I always go here when in Chicago
column4: Super friendly staff. I always eat at the bar. Service is awesome and the food is consistently amazing.
I have found this restaurant from trip advisor's top list for Chicago. I would recommend anyone for both business and causal meals.
Great business dinner with extraordinary steaks in an old-fashion steak house with elegant interior. Expect tons of quality for a lot of green.
We happened upon Benny's once by mistake. Now, we make sure to make it a point to stop! Every meal has been amazing and the latest one was no exception!!!!!

Great steack and great wines: there few of them in the city and if you want to enjoy the real mid west american steack this is the place. Perfectly aged and great cooking makes the differences. the cocktails are great too
We love a great chophouse. Berns in Tampa, the original Palm, Craft in Las Vegas. Benny's beat them all, truly fantastic.
Benny's is the kind of place you think of when you talk Chicago chip house. Dark wood interior, aged steaks, professional staff and drinks with booze in them.

Great menu. Great selection. Great sides. Great atmosphere. These folks take their beef seriously. If you want natural, they've been it. If you want dry aged - got it. Staff did an excellent job with recommendations. All around super experience.
While a bit pricey, the food and service is well worth it. The atmosphere in the bar area included a pianist who ws exceptional. The food was very tasty and worth every penny.

Did I remember to tell you how much I love this place> Always a great meal and we entertain clients here every time we're in Chicago. Food is awesome, service is spectacular and did I tell you I love this place?

We had a party of six. Our waitress (and her team) provided excellent service. All of our entrees (both steak and seafood) and sides were great as well. I really liked that they had raisin bread as an item in the breadbasket.

We ate here on the recommendation of a Chicago resident while on a visit. Food and service were fabulous. I had the "natural" strip steak, which was probably the best strip I've ever had. Expensive, but worth it. Highly recommended.
The steak is delicious and the sides are both delicious and HUGE!! The brussel sprouts in bacon vinaigrette were great.

This was a very romantic and classy high end steakhouse. Delicious steak and the best part was the massive chocolate cake at the end. Excellent service. Despite problems with the wheelchair lift, the staff worked diligently to make it work.

Just had dinner at Bennys Chop House, had the rib eye and some vegies. The meal was fantastic and the steak cooked really well. Staff were pleasant and overall would recommend the Chop House to anyone who wants a great steak

Our party of 4 had a great meal. I had the 8 oz filet - it was delicious and perfectly done. We shared asparagus, mushrooms and the truffle fries (they were disappointing). The service was excellent - I will definitely return.

column3: One of the Best Meals Ever
column4: It is the best restaurant in Chicago. everything was absolutely perfect. Service was friendly and knowledgable. Food was phenomenal. This is not cheap! But worth every penny.
Bacon is a must!!!!!!!!!!!!Delicious steaks! Service is very good and very tentative! Wait was nothing (made day of reservations)

Excellent service, lovely fine dining restaurant, good wine, although a little pricey. Most of us had steaks, which were the 8oz fillets, and they were superb. One of us tried the chicken and raved about it. Very nice restaurant, but expensive, in every way.
This was an elegant dining experience. The server catered to our every need and want. The food was excellent and the decor was upscale. Great place for any occasion.
Food was top notch..... Steak was as good as any I had in NYC. Price was a little much but that's standard w a good steak restaurant. I would highly recommend if u want quality food.

column3: Excellent food and extensive drink menu.
column4: We were dining at the lunch time. Not too crowded. But the staffs waited us very well. The dishes were excellent in terms of both presentation and tastes. Highly recommended for their selection of Chop and Steaks!
The food here is fantastic. This is a personal favorite and our most frequented steakhouse. Their variety is good, food is well prepared and service typically appropriate for the venue.
Oh my, this is a beautiful restaurant and the food was amazing. Please try one of the very delicious steaks on the menu. The garlic spinach was awesome as well. Very friendly staff too.

We had an outstanding experience at Benny's! The steak was amazing & their wine list was very extensive! The staff very are knowledge and friendly. I will definitely return on my next trip to Chicago!

We enjoyed having the Thanksgiving Dinner at Benny's ($49 per person). The service was exemplary and the atmosphere made for a special occasion. I was somewhat disappointed in the tenderness of the turkey and the carrots seemed slightly undercooked, but the dessert was wonderful.
Went out to celebrate. Expense account place. Trouble finding bottle of wine under $100. Steaks n sides good. They must live on tourists n conventioneers!
We were looking for a first class steakhouse and were not disappointed!! The ambiance ,service,(thx Dan) and quality of our food was absolutely the best.!! We couldn't have picked a better place.
Visited for lunch. Hated that I went to early because this is a perf ct spot for dinner. Service was great! The bacon & maple syrup was awesome.
We didn't have time to stop in for dinner but we did go to the bar for lunch and it was fantastic! The burgers are huge and very flavorful, the atmosphere is really fun and the location is great!
Benny's has wonderful eats to go with the finest cocktails in the area. Order a chees board and you wont go wrong.

column3: Fun for a drink and an app
column4: Cool scene, great wine list and awesome apps. Didn't eat dinner but ate plenty while enjoying a glass of wine with my wife. Fun vibe and helpful staff.

We enjoyed our dinner, but more so enjoyed the top rate service. My fiance proposed to me here and they were perfect about checking in with us, giving us privacy and celebrating with a champagne toast complimentary. We will be back
Benny's is the best steak I've had in Chicago. Set in a nice high-end atmosphere, they offer quality food and great service. If you're in the area definitely worth a stop!

column3: able to order 1/2 glass of wine when we said we could not drink a full glass.
column4: The service was excellent, the steak perfect. We were seated on time for our reservation. Waiter helped us immediately, explained the menu and offered suggestions.
first of all the quality of the food is excellent; the service very kind and the decoration elegant; amazing wine cellar and selection of the best just perferct!

While we spent quite a bit here, the food and service were outstanding. The bone-in ribeye was melt-in-your mouth tasty and the sides were great (loved the brussel sprouts). Our server was exceptionally knowledgeable and attentive without being overbearing. Definitely worth another visit.
Wait for a year to visit this restaurant again and my favorite dish is their maple-glazed bacon. It tastes so good! I also tried their bone-in ribeye (18 oz) and I get no room for dessert.
Everything was amazing - food, service, drinks, you name it. Very timely and so delicious. Might want to be aware of what employees do on the bathroom.

Celebrated my husbands birthday there and SO happy we did! Impeccable service ( thanks David!) terrific recommendations ( stuffed baked potato best ever) Kobe beef unbelievable, banana cream pie best I've ever put in my mouth! Cannot wait to go back. Just fabulous
The atmosphere was fitting of a great steakhouse and the service was beyond compare. From soup, salad, entree to dessert, it was all good.
Fried onion rings were heavily battered and served well in advance of the steak. Dry aged steak was good. The one zinfandel was like a pinot noir, thin. Service was naive.
We had a great family dinner with wonderful food and service. The cream corn is out of this world! The steaks were fantastic and the kids meals were Nicely priced with many options for kids.
It felt like everyone else there was having a business meeting. Not an issue...just lots of dudes on expense accounts. Our Meal was nice. Pricey, but a good Meal.
The dining experience is wonderful. Walking distance to anywhere downtown and ambience is perfect. The food is excellent and worth it.

column3: BACON!! Order the Bacon appetizer--You will not be disappointed.
column4: Great Place to Eat...Very Friendly Staff who made awesome suggestions on and off the menu...And-oh-did I mention the food? Absolutely wonderful.Make reservations because you do not want to miss this little Chicago gem!
Went to Benny's for lunch. What an upscale place to eat. Sat in the Bar, the waiter was wonderful. You MUST order the Lobster grilled cheese. Might be the best sandwich I have ever had.
Delicious foie gras as a starter appetizer. Must try! Most extensive wine menu. Steak was prepared perfectly. Desserts were ok but nothing to write home about. Highly recommended!

Steak was good. Service was terrible. Would not go back with so many other choices. Waitress seemed unknowledgeable, and also seemed to hate everything, especially smiling. Also, the truffle fries were extremely greasy and unappealing. Cheers.

Benny's has great food and friendly, attentive service. It's a fancier restaurant with good classic dishes. I had grouper (amazing) everyone else had steak. My bf loved the dry aged ribeye. Sides were also very good, mashed potatoes were better then baked. Will definitely again.

An excellent restaurant when it comes to the quality of the food. The meal was outstanding. The service a little slow and off at times, and the prices probably exceed the value. Delicious over all though!

Delicious food at typical Chicago steakhouse prices. Excellent service. Dining room does get pretty loud when full. For something atypical in a steakhouse, try the Manhattan Clam Chowder. Don't be afraid to save a little room for dessert.
This is a great place. Service and food was outstanding. Loved the oysters. We where treated like kings. This is what fine dining should be
From the moment we arrived, the service was on point. the steak was cooked to order and the truffle fries were to die for. A very enjoyable experience

Went here for an early dinner. Recommended as an alternative to Ruth Chris and Morton's. Close to the Marriott at the Magnificent Mile. It did not disappoint. The service was excellent and I had a very tender fillet cooked just right.

column3: Excellent service and suggestions by staff
column4: Service and food were outstanding, price was more than we usually spend but this was a treat and we got our money's worth. I had a filet I could cut with a fork and staff drink suggestions were right on. Very welcoming.
Excellent service. Lobster bisque and veal were excellent. We visited another top local steak house and came away more impressed with our visit here.
Stumbled across Benny's while we were out walking and looking for a quick lunch. Restaurant is beautiful-good lunch and good service.

This was one of the best meals and great service EVER!. Our Server, Bar was outstanding. He explained in detail everything on the menu which we had questions about. Don't go to Chicago without a visit to Benny's Chop House.
In Chicago on conference - staying up the street (short walk) in the Trump. Needed to entertain another couple. We have
We had a very pleasant meal at Bennys Chop house. Very knowledgeable staff, great meat and fantastic wine - I would definitely eat there again.
Ordered the natural rib eye and it was delicious. The wait staff was very attentive. The service and quality of the steak made it a great dinner.

The steaks here are outstanding and the sides are equally delicious. While we are not avid wine drinkers, the selection is vast and we found the house cabernet sauvignon to be excellent. The service was also first-rate.
I had a very good experience at Benny's, the service was great and the food superb,they have a good menu and an amazing wine list. I will recommend this place to all of my friends down the office.
One of the best Chicago steak restaurants. Excellent personable service, steaks served perfect, and no blasting music.

Good atmosphere. Stopped by for Lunch. Excellent service. Nice cityscape from bar area. Good bread basket. Beef fine. Spring salad had inedible raw kale. Will return to try dinner. This is the average "very good" Chicago steakhouse. No discernible distinguishing feature.
Best steak and grouper ever! Server, Rachael was excellent. I would recommend the North Lounge area.
Benny's is a Chicago ICON. Lots of history, but best thing is the Steaks! Service is good , Wine list was good as well.

column3: Great food with a great atmosphere
column4: Outstanding service and food. Our group had a mix of filet's, rib eye and pork chops and all were great. Side items are sharing sizes and the desert portions are enough for several people. We were all overfull when we left.
Great Service, Excellent wine list. Wine pricing was fair. Very good food prepared as requested. Excellent steak choices. Sides to share. Would recommend!
food was great. Service perfect. My wife had the turkey I had the pork chop. Best chop I ever had. The dressing was particularly good

Primarily a steak house but lots of choices for those that may not eat or want meat. Pricey but expected since your in a city. If you have filet salad a drink and deserts expect $100 per person. Worth it. Great service

Great meal from start to finish. The bone in ribeye was recommended as the house specialty and it's also my favorite steak. It was excellent. Make sure you also get the bacon appetizer-awesome. Service was also attentive and efficient.
Good solid service. Bread is terrific. Steaks are good, but not up to great. Salads were very good. This place has food that you don't get everywhere.
Beautiful food and service. More expensive than your average meal, but worth it. Staff very attentive. Side orders of vegetables are extra, not good, but portions are generous and 1portion serves 2.
This is probably one of the best restaurants I have ever dined in. The staff were great and food was fantastic. The pork chops and lamb chops were the best we have ever had.
Unbelievable food. Wagyu filet was perfect. Sommelier selected a perfect wine for our taste and budget. Overall superb dining experience. WI'll go back again next time we are in town.
Enjoyable place for drinks, conversation and eating a good steak. Service is good. Employees really seem to be willing to serve Nice place!
The meal that I had here was fabulous. I tried the Australian cut filet and it was the most tender and melted in your mouth. Paul the waiter was seriously entertaining and made the meal.
Had two great dinners here in one week for business. Service, good and wine list were exceptional. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend them or go back another time.

The steaks were wonderful although I would not pay more to have the Wagyu. The natural steaks were wonderful. The sides were extra wonderful. Bacon, lobster Mac n cheese, corn, spinach--- cannot go wrong!! Best food in a while!

This was a top notch meal! Our table wasn't ready yet when we arrived, so we enjoyed a drink in the bar. Our waiter was a little over-the-top, but he was very nice, knowledgeable and attentive. The food was amazing and the ambiance was perfect.

Had a fantastic meal at Benny's. The steak was amazing and I would recommend going with the grass fed one over the standard USDA prime. The bacon appetizer is worth the money. Great service and a great atmosphere, highly recommend.
We ordered off of the dining room menu from the bar, where there was a grand piano and excellent entertainment. It was expensive but probably the best meal we had during our stay!

column3: great steaks and unbelievable homemade ice cream
column4: Service is great, stakes are wonderful, salads are excellent and the chef is one of the best in Chicago and will do anything for you to make your meal special

We enjoyed our last night in Chicago at this great restaurant. Steaks were the best we had for flavour and were perfectly cooked. Side orders included white asparagus. Service was friendly and efficient.
Great food and wine selection. Iced seafood bowl is incredible. Excellent service, truly a fine restaurant.
A very classic old world steak house which means its been serving quality food for a long time! Excellent menu options and a good variety of dishes to suit the non-carnivores in the crowd.
One of the best organic steaks I've had anywhere - and the wine list is flawless to accompany any pallet. The best meal I had in Chicago

column3: A Must if you're in Chicago
column4: This goes down as one of the top meals I have ever had. I had the 12oz NY Strip Steak medium rare. It was cooked perfectly!!! Sides were the truffle fries, mashed potatoes and asparagus with hollandaise sauce. What an expectional meal!
Just went to Bennys hands down best steak I've had in Chicago and I've been to all the great steakhouses. Great service, great food, great time.

Great atmosphere, great server, and great food. My wife ordered a regular steak, but I ordered the Austrailian Wagyu steak which melted in my mouth. We had a great Bordeaux wine that was recommended by the sommelier to go with our steaks.
The food is outstanding and the wine list is even better. This is the kind of steakhouse you expect to have in Chicago. The service was outstanding.

This is the best steak place in Chicago. We went to several steak places in Chicago the last few days and Benny's had it all! Our waiter, Tom, was on top of his game and the food and dessert was amazing!

column3: Great service and even better food
column4: Seven thirty Rez seated the four of us right on time. Service and attention was just right and the food was fantastic. All natural NY Strip m/r was cooked to perfection and the carrot cake dessert feed all four of us! Great experience, again!
Vendor hosted a dinner for us at Benny's. the food, service and atmosphere was wonderful! He stated this was where the local's dined....so pleased he chose to take us to his fav place. Will return!!
Everything was very salty! Strange but true! We went at a very early dinner, service was good. I wouldn't go back!
One of the best restaurants of Chicago! Well known for their Steaks. Friendly staff and good service!

Was given a couple of options for a "steakhouse" dinner one of the nights in Chicago, and the concierge mentioned Benny's. We tried it and loved it! The food was excellent and the service was above par. Loved this restaurant.
You want a good steak well you will get it at Benny's chop house. don't go anywhere else. Service is great.

First class food, service everything. Don't go here for the view or the atmosphere experience. Don't get me wrong, it's a really nice place but the food is the star here. We ate like kings and they treated us like kings.
We Ate here and I had Crab cakes and husband had lobster. Cooked very well, service was slower than we like, good choice of drinks.

Nothing to dislike here. Outstanding location, food, decor and service. I had a large piece of halibut cooked to perfection, but some at my table raved about their steaks. Would definitely go back there.

Very well done restaurant. Very warm greeting. Excellent waiter. Prompt and efficient but not at all pushy. Had excellent cocktails and nice and fair priced wine. Appitizers and steaks were first rate . Also a very attractive place to dine
This must be a Chicago institution. Excellent food and service and atmospheric decor and lighting. We will go back next time.
Top notch steaks are the main reason to go of course, but the service was really terrific too. It has a more intimate atmosphere than the hustle and bustle of other steak houses.

This was my second visit to Benny's while in Chicago. It has been incredible both times. The food is excellent and the service is top notch within a very comfortable atmosphere. I highly recommend this restaurant to all of my friends when visiting the city.
We had a large group. The waiters were very attentive. The was great. But no lent specials. Everyone in our group loves the steaks.

column3: great dinner, expensive but worth it!
column4: The shrimp appetizer, the steaks, the grouper, the deserts......... simply superb --- as was the service!
Server was a bit too talkative, but will definately go back. Food was great and located close to The Langham Hotel.
Been to Benny's two times and this was by far the best ribeye I've ever had. The house cured maple glazed bacon is a must have appetizer A little pricey but worth the splurge every once in a while
We started with delicious scallops and arugula on a bed of polenta. Amazing! Filet and bone-in strip steak were done to perfection. Hostess and server were gracious and attentive.

column3: Very pricey but tasty - usual steak house fare
column4: Live music in bar very nice. Great service, not stuffy. The food was very good though expensive and a la carte as most steakhouses are. Desserts enormous!

Comfortable atmosphere and an excellent server, Kelly, made for a lovely celebration evening. The food and wine were very good, and an after-dinner visit to the bar provided the perfect musical touch. Will return to this welcoming restaurant favorite.
Truely a remarkable evening and meal. Very pricey but hey...this is Chicago. The live music that they had in the bar area was fantastic.

My wife and I had a great dinner at Benny's. The service, food, and atmosphere were all very good. There was no one dish that knocked our socks off, but everything came out perfectly cooked and delicious. A safe choice for a classic Chicago steakhouse.

We had 10:30 reservations and were seated promptly and given amazing service. Cocktails were terrific, I had a superb Moscow Mule. Our meals (steak and lobster) were perfectly prepared and our waiter was personable and friendly. Will definitely return.

column3: Staff is the greatest of all times.
column4: We have been coming to Chicago for 27 years for Christmas. Our new favorite place. The staff treated us very well and as a bonus the food was excellent. Thanks for making this a great visit. Taking home thoughts of new friends.

column3: Great place for a holiday work party
column4: We celebrated the holidays with our company. Everything went great. Food and service were great and they catered to our every need. I have been here 5+ times and every time I have been impressed.
we had the filets with sides and the service was impeccable , great food and a wine list to die for. Great place to enjoy on any occasion.
Wow! Fabulous steak, intimate environment and incredible service. I had the filet mignon, and it melted in my mouth. I highly recommend this restaurant!

Another great recommendation from our concierge! Great dining experience. Elegant, romantic, attentive service and impressive wine selection. Filet was absolutely perfect! One of the best I've had. Highly recommend this place.
Excellent food and excellent service. Our waiter (Lee) was excellent. It is worth the money for the experience. I highly recommend this dining experience.

column3: Going back again tonight!! SO GOOD
column4: We were here in the summer and are fortunate to be going back tonight! I cannot wait! It is so good! My mouth is watering already. I know we will have a good meal and a wonderful evening.
Thought the service and food was excellent, very attentive staff will go again. We had a lovely meal in a very salubrious setting.
I liked the fact that you could walk in and get a table without a reservation. It was midweek and the food and staff were excellent.

Was unpleasantly surprised here. Service was above standard but the food was average given the myriad of steak houses in this town. Interior was traditional. Nothing in terms of food was really remarkable.

column3: Recommended by our concierge at the HardRock.
column4: We wanted a nice place for steak & Seafood that was not a chain. We found it in Benny's. Nice old building, not to big, good atmosphere and a wonderful selection of steaks.
Fabulous food, even better service. We will absolutely return. The best steak and lobster risotto I've had in possible ever.

Benny's is a good restaurant but a little pricey for what you get. I had a very flavorful ribeye but my wife's filet was nothing special. Some sides and extras were good but others merely average. Dessert was unimpressive.

I Wondered Around Downtown For A Time But My Suggested Favorites Were Booked. So I Stopped Here On A Wimm And Spent Two Hours. Piano Bar And Food Was Really Good, Not The Best, But I Would Come Back. Great City.
We dined at Bennys last night and it was a wonderful experience! The staff was fantastic and the steak was the best I've ever had! The creme brulee was also delicious!

everything was great from the appetizer to the dessert. Wait staff was perfect just there when needed. Had the special that night was fantastic. Have eaten at many Steak places in Chicago and will definately make this one of our regular stops when we come.

column3: A first class restaurant serving excellent food
column4: Although expensive the food was excellent - steaks perfect. Excellent surroundings and ambience However a minor criticism is that the service was a little pretentious. nevertheless a first class experience

Visited last night, the filet was excellent... Actually one of the best i ever had, desserts were awesome also. It was my first visit and i would definitely return. The price isn't cheap but expected in the area.

column3: Great place to eat in Chicago
column4: Waiters were friendly and great service. Great suggestion on the wine. Scallops dinner and the Surf and Turd was great. The Benny seafood salad was over the top. Can't wait to come back to Chicago.
We went to the bar after a party in the neighborhood, and the drinks were outstanding, including the draft craft beer. Great jazz band was outstanding.

Ate here on a business dinner. Food and drinks were very good. had the dry aged bone-in NY Strip and was very pleased although the cut could have been slightly more tender in my opinion. That said, very nice albeit pretty pricey.

We returned for dinner at Bennys and had another great visit. Our steaks were the best we have ever had. The service was excellent. We were surprised with the Benny's cabernet. We enjoy great wine and it was excellent. We will definitely be back.
Quite likely the best ribeye i have ever had! Which is saying something as that's my go to when I can't decide elsewhere. Perfect service, excellent wine pairing made for a great evening.
Seafood tower- get it. Artwork is done by man who displayed with Picasso. Service superb. Steaks are great, lobster outstanding. ** Must try chocolate souffle' for dessert!
Just what you would expect in a steakhouse - great meat (and salmon) and a good wine list. Nice sides too.
Steaks were great. Sides and appetizers ok. The wine list is a bit pretentious for the average diner looking to get a good bottle of wine with your meal.

I have eaten at Benny's a few times, and every time it is outstanding. This is a "special occasion" restaurant for me anyway, but worth every penny. The food is delicious, the atmosphere is great and the service is impeccable. Give it a go!

Incredible service that catered to our picky teenage boys. Pricey meal, but great choice for a special occasion. Dover sole was delicious, the bacon was decadent, and the 3 types of beef were fun to try.

column3: More than a great steak house
column4: Our group all enjoyed the meals. Steaks were great, Dover sole was really excellent. Slow start- service slow but then excellent.
Fantastic and large steaks but very expensive, service was good and food tasty. Would recommend a visit if you have the cash.
I are at the bar and enjoyed the live jazz. Oysters were good, chicken was fantastic, lobster Mac & cheese had lots of lobster, but needed some seasoning. All and all a very good experence.

Service was exceptional...started with the ladies at the reception desk...they had great personalities....beautiful restaurant....we had a great, fairly young waiter who was very knowledgeable about the steaks and menu....all in all a very good experience.
Our steaks were delicious and cooked just the way we requested. Tasty salads and sides. Good service. Nice atmosphere. Reasonable price compared to other steak establishments.
Food and ambiance good quality like any prime steakhouse, but the prices were high and the wine list prices were simply nuts. I know wine and this was the most overpriced list i have ever seen.
It was my second time over there, nice place in the heart of Chicago. Meat was really great and great choice of wines too. Waiter extremely nice ( even too much). Perfect place for any occasion!
Fantastic atmosphere and great foood. A memorable dining experience on my trip to Chicago. Would definitely return.

column3: A good restaurant with good food, big portions and very nice atmosphere
column4: We had a business meal here with a pre-set menu and the overall experience was very good. Very varied food, 5 courses, distinctive service and good quality, although not exceptional. Certainly worthy if you are around
This is the owner of Volate that has opened a steak house. If you like steaks and are tired of the chain steak houses then come here. Bennie and his staff are great. Located near The Donald's Hotel.

column3: Will go again but only for drinks
column4: Caveat: we didn't have steaks or a main course. We ordered several hot and cold sides and a salad. The spinach salad was way overdressed in balsamic. The lobster mac and cheese was poor. Maybe their steaks are great but not the appetizers.
Took a client to dinner at Benny's. The service was excellent as was the food. very wide selection of wine was available as well. The Chocolaty pudding cake dessert was to die for.
Service was excellent, correctly cooked steaks and nice atmosphere! The dinner music was great. All in all, a very pleasant evening!
First time to Chicago and looking forward to experiencing the great food the city had to offer and it did not disappoint!
Excellent location, steak, service, wine, and atmosphere
Ate here one night as hubby wanted a steak. Though it was good, he said he had better steak elsewhere. Service was very good but we wouldn't eat here again if in Chicago.
Way over priced. Food was good but service was slow. Waiter tried to hustle us, pushed us into higher priced menus items. This is a tourist trap!

Our hotel made reservations for us and we were impressed. The service is the best we have ever experienced, the food was outstanding, the atmosphere was amazing. We enjoyed our meal without ever feeling rushed. What an amazing experience.
Probably the best steak I ever had in my life. I wanted to pick up the bone and gnaw on it but we were dressed too nice.
Wonderful Steaks and service I must admit I had no room for dessert but they were so kind to bring a small slice .

column3: Best place to eat in Chicago!
column4: My husband and I ate at Benny's to celebrate our anniversary. The staff was very attentive, the food was amazing and the atmosphere was very romantic.
This is an elegant restaurant that serves absolutely delicious steaks. I had the 16 oz bone-in ribeye, and my wife the all-natural NY strip. Both were simply wonderful and cooked perfectly.
I know Steaks and I had one of the best steaks ever at Benny's Chop House. Service was great and I had the S'mores Cheesecake for desert. This is a must-stop for any Steak lovers who visit Chicago.
The place is close to work so it is convenient. The food offers many alternatives, the sliders are wonderful!!!
I brought some first-timers to Benny's for a show stopper meal. the staff was accommodating and the timing of the courses was impeccable. Thanks again!
Fillet mignon dry as well as their porterhouse..... wow....service great! location excellent. I had a lot better stakes at a lot cheaper restaurants. 320 $ two people.
Compares well with Lowry's, Ditka's and similar Chicago locations as well as most in DC or Las Vegas. Prices are not for the faint of heart. An enjoyable evening

column3: Overrated and less than average for the price!
column4: Pro's: the bartender makes a wonderful cosmopolitan, cozy dining room Major Con's: Charred tasting ribeye, server dropped a brussel sprout on my new dress
Very pricey but I was tired of walking... food was incredible and service as well. Steak Tartar excellent, mac and cheese was great.
Didn't care for their fishes, but dry aged steak really out of this world...
Amazing cornbread actually. Glad i went just for that reason. Good environment too.
personal, complete and attentive service. And what steaks, best ever!
The food was great, and the staff was very attentive (though the latter may have been because my date on NYE was so hot) :o)
I really was disappointed, and I do not say that lightly. I had to sent my steak back coffee was served cold. This to me is not acceptable at a property of this supposed quality.

If you are looking to impress clients with great food and service this is the place. The multitude of courses and thoughtful preparation time also allows for plenty of conversation time. The staff also know how to be attentive without being in the way.
Chef Jonathan & the Benny's Chop House staff are Top Notch! Not a Chicago trip without a stop or...two!

column3: Great food and wines by the glass
column4: This was our second visit and it did not disappoint. Steaks are excellent as is the service. Wine list by the glass is unbelievable.
I still can't stop thinking about the food from here. I dream about the lobster risotto! Great food, great wine, great service. Quite corporate atmosphere, well worth a visit for a special occasion
I brought a party of 20-great food, great space, great service. Sommelier was weak.
Delicious dry aged steaks and tasty tikal , an Argentinian wine! Do not leave the place without trying the nocqui! Yumm!

column3: I will remember this wonderful meal forever!
column4: We loved Benny's Chop House. The steaks were excellent, and the sides were delicious. Excellent service and a great wine list. It's not cheap, but if you are looking for top quality, look no further.
As soon as you walk in the hostess is welcoming you. The atmosphere is great and the food is even better.

Benny's is a magnificent steakhouse. Top-class service, the finest steaks available (cooked to perfection), superior service, tremendous ambiance... It is all there. A bit pricey, perhaps, but well worth it for a very memorable dining experience.
Excellent service and perfect steaks!

column3: What a wonderful new addition to the Chicago restaurant scene
column4: We love Chicago. Over the course of a year, we get here about 4 or 5 times. It is our favorite destination city in the country. That said, with all of the wonderful restaurants that downtown Chicago has to offer, we have a select few...More

On a recent trip to Chicago, friends of ours who live in Illinois told us they wanted to try a new place in town. They had heard lots of good things about Benny's so we decided to try it out. Boy are we happy we did! The service was fun and attentive, the food was over the top delicious (but pricey) and the atmosphere was perfect. My husband and I had the bone-in filet (cooked precisely as ordered) and our friends enjoyed the rib eye and the sturgeon (yes, at a chophouse!). We all raved about the perfection of each of our dishes. The mac and cheese, as well as the mashed potatoes were excellent. The selection of the wines were fabulous. Since we were visiting from California, we were surprised to see many of our favorite Napa wines on the list. We finished the evening with coffee and dessert and left extremely satisfied. Be warned, the price is comparable to other high-end steak houses but you will definitely get your money's worth.
Steak was awesome, dessert was amazing, service was fast, staff was polite, venue was Covid safe, & location great.

column3: The best steak I've ever eaten in my life
column4: Great meat, great service and great atmosphere. Expensive but highly recommended if you are a true meat lover.
Noele was so amazing!! So knowledgeable about the menu/food and so friendly. Thanks Noele for the amazing experience! :) will be back to request for her area!!! Great food
We ended up in a room without a view...with mediocre at best food. The seafood "tower" is not a tower and tasted like "dirty water". Will not return.
Excellent steak, nice servants with good service. Enjoyed the waterfront view a lot ! Will be back soon!

This place is a must visit. Had the Ribeye Steak for Two. Amazing table side service with flaming butter. The taste of the steak was even better. The smashed potatoes and creamed spinach was amazing. Service was great. View of the river was spectacular.
Steaks and Lamb Bby. Superb, the view is amazing, great dinner by the river.call for reservation.always a great experience.

It is right there on the river walk. Nice atmosphere and the service was very good. Food is not Espectacular but it still was a nice lunch experience. We order two main dishes and split it between three people, it was enough.
