Jesse did a fabulous job of taking care of our crazy group of 10 celebrating birthday, graduation and being together. The food was simply spectacular and the service above and beyond. A definite spot for celebrating!

This is the 2nd time we dined here for our Anniversary. The service was impeccable and the food was delicious, they got us a dessert with a happy anniversary. They never disappoint,we'll be back again.

Great place for meat lovers and others. Please take a look to the menu. For 15 $ you have a very large and delicious salad bar including on top of lots of vegetables ham prosciutto Smoked salmon...... Plus great service a must
Unlimited meat on a sword. How can you not love that. Food was incredible, and the service was outstanding. Had a great time, and will definitely be back.
Tge place is indeed good, especially food and meat. 2 cons - 1. the price 2. Staff regularly hurry up the customers to leave the restaurant, this makes all stay not comfortable.
It was my first visit and I was blown away. The food options were plentiful and the meat was the best I have tasted in a long time. Service was good.

My first churrasco outside Brazil. Great place. Good variety of sides at the buffet. Nice vines, just probably need to have more beers... but it's ok! We were 10 people, we eat and drink like hell and we were really satisfied.

I went Wednesday Dinner for my son‚Äôs graduation and just like always a great customer service, the food is always flavorful and tender specially the filet mignon. Thanks again Fogo de chao for making our Visit so special
Wonderful food and excellent customer service. Different types of red meat and birds. Salad bar is great with good cheese options and soup.
Service is first class. Salad bar is plentiful & inviting. The beef & lamb keeps coming. What‚Äôs not to like? Of course I will return.
On or about April 28, 2018, about 11 of my colleagues were treated to Fogo de Chao by one of our vendors. All I can say is I will be taking my mom and husband there soon.

I love this restaurant. I had the chance to visit it many times in several different locations, e.g., Orlando, Chicago (both branches: Rosemont and Downtown), and New York city. I usually enjoyed their food and their wonderful service. Try it and do not hesitate!
The food is amazing quality and the staff will do anything to make you feel welcomed! Renato, one of the waiters, is one of the best ones! Thank you for a wonderful service.

Had a good experience on Sunday Brunch, there is so many options on the salad bar , service was excellent they always make sure we are having a great time. First time on a Sunday brunch and We loved It
We love this restaurant! every time we go to Chicago we stop to taste this delight! It‚Äôs wonderful restaurant! And we love the caipirinha! A typical Brazilian drink! I recommend!
What a nice family dinner we had! Whenever we are coming to Fogo we are getting home satisfied for the food quality... I've tried many fogo around USA and the Chicago one is one of the best
Came here for my husbands 50th Birthday. The meat is wonderful and the experience is fun, but pricey
Went there last night for my birthday Food was good, service was excellent. Happy, friendly--just the way I remember Brasil. Recommend it.
lamb chops, picanha and rib eye were the best. make reservations as the line gets quite long. Always good to go to a churascaria although youll gain a couple of lbs right after
All you can eat brazilian style! I eat lunch and i must say that i loved this place! the Service was very good and the food was great!
Had a awesome time with my family on Christmas Eve, everybody was so attentive and professional thanks again for a fenomenal Time

Wow.. Great service great salad bar...nice place professional staff . The cuts of meat pork chicken everything was amazing ...highly recommended...but go there with a pretty empty stomach soich to choose from...again highly recommend it
We came here for an anniversary dinner and it was AMAZING, everything from the food to the costumer service from all the staff
The service was fast and efficient, but the food was good - not great. We have been to other Brazilian steak houses in Chicago that are better and with more options.
A great meal with my friends plus a awesome service that's a great combo for a perfect day, thanks Fogo.

I had been to the Brazilian branches of this brand and found the Chicago one just as good. Picanha cut in particular wad delicious and I got the famous first cut which in itself is already worth the visit.
we celebrate our anniversary here, everything was perfect our service was very attentive at all times.thank you For your hospitality. we had an amazing time
Our experience was great, the servers was very nice and we got a warm welcome at the door we really liked the restuarant. :-)
This place was amazing. The food was excellent and the service was outstanding. It is a very big place and a bit noisy but we had a very enjoyable evening here.
We had a group of 35 people and they helped us to stay in budget without compromising the quality or service. Everyone left happy and full.
My experienced at Fogo de Chao, was amazing they have really good salad bar. with some of the best cheese. I was impress by the service,very professional and i love the picanha my favorite!

We had so much fun at this restaurant. The food was plentiful and very taste. The salad bar was very good and the meats just kept coming, and very taste. I recommend this restaurant for group celebration or meeting.

column3: I was amazed with the quality, quantity, the service!
column4: Fantastic all around. Best steakhouse that I have visited. We truly enjoyed ourselves. The flavors of the different kinds of meats were amazing! I will be trying out this restaurant in Chicago in July.
How can a brazilian churrascaria go wrong? Fogo de Chao is great! Nice Place to go with friends or family, Lots of Wonderful things to Eat and a very friendly Atmosphere. Totally RECOMMENDED!
Very nice restaurant with a great variety of all kinds of meat. Unstoppable service and food to "death". A nice place to visit when in Chicago.
Fogo de Cho by far my favorite steakhouse in Chicago. Its always pretty busy for a reason all the many meats they are piling on and the salad bar is awsome. I would highly recomend Fogo

Stopped in for lunch. Valet was $10, lunch price was $33. Great options on salad bar, fresh & very well presented. The meat was perfect and there was never a delay in wanting more. Nice staff, great experience.
This 'all you can eat' approach is amazing given the choice. The meat is walked around the tables to sample alongside a huge choice on the salad bar. Service charming, great value.
Had a total meat fest - all was cooked to perfection and tasted fantastic. Good wine list and outstanding salad (but it was WAY more than salad) buffet. Will definitely be back

The meats are cooked to perfection. The waiters and waitress are a delight. The ambience and lighting for dinner is excellent. Music loud enough not to drain or have you strain for dinner conversation.
Had an amazing 5th anniversary dinner at Fogo. Such a great experience and amazing food. Try the bottom sirloin with chiles, you can't go wrong. Fantastic all the way.

column3: Dining In Style With Fantastic Food!
column4: If you'd like to experience a meal beyond your wildest imagination-- I totally suggest you to take the plunge! And come dine with "One of the Best" places around!

This Fogo has been consistent and excellent. It isn't as good as Avanida Paulista, S√£o Paulo; Ave. Bandeirantes, S√£o Paulo or Rosemont, IL, but it's terrific. Good food, great service and attentive staff. Hands down, fine dining in Chicago.
Such a nice place, with amazing food. We went for a romantic meal to celebrate a graduation. We left more than stuffed, and needed a nap before hitting the town.

This is my favorite place to go to during my visit to Chicago. The service here is outstanding and the food is amazing. It is pricy for dinner but lunch is half price and is the same. Amazing place to go and great experience.
This place is the ultimate indulgence. Come hungry and don't miss out on the sides. The large salad bar has some of the best options! The meat and waitstaff was exactly was we needed.
i love this place i used to visit there every year , i like the chicken and shrimps , i like the desserts as well , but it used to be busy and crowded
They will keep feeding you and feeding you until your belt bursts. Not recommended for international tourists, only Midwestern tourists that can eat 5 pounds of meat in a single sitting.

Good service. The meat was just OK. It wasn't top notch or seasoned spectacularly. So we were a little disappointed actually. you can fill up fast at a place like this, and we never got to experience many of the selections
Service was not what we have experienced at other locations. They were also out of many selections they usually offer. Not sure we will return to this location on our next trip.

column3: Very good value for you money !
column4: Aa all the other Fogo de Chao Brazilian Steakhouses around the U.S., the restaurant is an excellent value for the money you'll pay !! Meat served there is really great and service efficient. The only negative point might be the noise...
Love this place, the lamb is excellent! They have wonderful service. Reasonable price for all the foods they have, kids were half price:)
Great food! I have been to a few locations and all have the same quality meats. Love the side dishes that come with the meal. Bananas are a good palate cleanser.

column3: Great time, great service, great food.
column4: I was on a business trip with my best 190 friends. Fogo de Chao took great care of us and made sure we all had plenty to eat and drink. Mike was a great server.
Great service, lovely staff, Enjoyed every bit of my meal, definitely recommending to family & friends. Yes
The barbecue was so good! The staff was very friendly and we enjoyed a lot Brazilian food. I recomend reserve using website , because it was so packed in there!
love all meat you can eat,nice and neat restaurant, everything is good,the servers are very polite, and help you a lot.
This my 2nd time here and I loved it, it is a culinary experience that must be savoured. From the salad bar to the BBQed meat everything was very tasty I really recommend it
First time and the food was great. Can only go a few time I would gain much weight with such good foodüòç
A very unique steak experience,in a town with steak houses on every corner. Service from the staff and the quality of the food were fantastic.

Thank you all the staff, because hey made me feel that I was a VIP. The food was incredible, each bite was delicious. The signature drink is one of my favorite including the cheese bread. I will recommend this place to all my friends.
My wife, son, and I tried Fogo de Chao for the 1st time. We all loved it, and would go back. They have a great meat selection, and great capinrinhas!
Very good restaurant, highly recommended for meat lovers. Good choices at the salad bar and great servings of grilled meat. A bit on the pricey side.
Dinner was wonderful! The service was amazing and the food was out of this world. This would be a great choice for any size group.
Enjoyed the food. All meats were served hot and your choice of cut was offered. Enjoyed most of the meats and sides on the bar offered plenty of choices as well.
The meat is really good, so many different tasty options. Only thing I didn't really like were the actual food you go and get yourself, felt that it did not have such good flavor.

Great place to go with a crowd. Great drinks. Nice atmosphere and fantastic food. Salad bar to die for, and then the meat. Just don't eat too much salad. But it's really hard not to. It's all so good.
The food was excellent, and service is wonderful. Couldn't say enough good things, it is the meat lovers nirvana!
Very nice food, specially the Picanha with Garlic! Brazilian attendants and waiters, very nice treatment with the gests.

Wow!!! Great dinner. First time visit. Great food and unbelievable service. Meat was excellent. Salad bar very good. Dessert great. Can't say enough about the service, just amazing!!! Highly recommended.
If you want meat this is the place. Non stop meat kept coming to the table. Meat was great but the 'sides' and 'salad bar' where not all that good. But over all a over priced good meal.
What can i say . If you love red meat this is the place for you. If want your meat well done.. well this NOT the place for you. The unlomited salad bar which is exotic is awesome.

column3: Sub-Par Cuts of Meat, Quick Service
column4: Try it for the experience, not for the food. Non-stop service of meat, but the quality of cut was sub-par and expensive.
Wonderful experience that surpassed expectations. You must love meat! Great service and delicious. We arrived hungry, which is a must. I think I called it heaven a few times!!

column3: One of the best birthdays yet!
column4: This was a perfect birthday meal - every cut of meat you could imagine! The wait staff was very sweet and very knowledgable. Make sure you come hungry!!

The food was delicious and the service was wonderful! Our server, Gloria, was so nice, professional and attentive. The meat came as soon as we flipped our marker and was so well prepared! Note, this review is for the LaSalle location.

column3: Great Place for a BIG group!
column4: There were almost 20 of us and they handled us perfectly. Food was good, service was good and the salad was great! Have been several times and it is consistent.

Big fan of this place. If you've experienced it in other locations, you know the drill. Great options, solid food, and you get as much as you're able to handle :) Worth checking out at lunch, given it's half price.
The food was very good. We enjoyed the salad bar. The service was also very good. The only negative everyone in our group commented about was the noise level of the restaurant.
I've been to Fogo De Chao several times, a good place for business dinner or romantic ones......service is top notch and food is even better.
Salad bar has fair choice of options with good taste. Meat is definitely a good value for churascaria lovers. Overall good experience, will go back again soon.
They have variety different dishes which is a plus. The best part is you try all kinds of steak. Also fantastic service thanks to Jackie will be coming back!!
Going to Fogo De Chao was the experience of the lifetime! Patrick was extremely kind and helpful. The food was amazing and the service was excellent. My only choice for a steak house!
This place never dissapoints, it is my go to spot when im entertaining friends or out of town clients. The decor, service, and quality of the food always impresses!
Great service, excellent food,beautiful restaurant, no complaints will be back soon , again staff and worker's great service
What a place!!! Excellent food and non stop service.It is pricey though ($170 for 2 people with tip)
If you are a big fan of diferent kind of meats ,steaks and etc its a place for you ! Service is good and fast .Nice atmosphere and decor. Will be back soon !
The food was great, but you do pay for it. Great staff & a great experience if you have never been to a Brazillian Grill before.
We've gone to Fogo de Chao for years, so much that the manager, Paul knows my son by name. Service is great, food is amazing - just be ready to eat...a lot!

Finally made it to Fogo after hearing great things about it, and we were not disappointed!! All of the meat was cooked I to perfection. The Market Table Was stocked with choice fare! Can't wait to come back!!!

I have been to some Brazilian restaurants in Europe and USA and always been satisfied. This one wast top of the line very nice food and an excellent choice of vine and not at least a very friendly and knowledgeable staff.
Really good meat selection. Good service. The secondary room was too tight for seating....packed in like sardines. They need to remove a few tables so your not sitting right on top of another table.

column3: great place to go with a group
column4: went here with a group while attending a conference. Staff were great - food was tasty and well presented. The staff brought us some extra cuts as requested. Really enjoyed the relaxed way of eating. Would go again
Nice food ,but I think need little bit more for vegans ,maravilloso para quien come mucho ,excelente servicio only need show the price before starting
This Fogo de Choa was as good as all the other ones I have been. A few of the meats werent cooked enough, even being rare. Great location
Second time and its amazing you dont belive the service looks like a beautiful ballet whith an excellent cordination and the food increedible you must see it
This place was amazing and did not disappoint. Service was top notch! Would highly recommend. eat light on the salad bar.. it allows more space for the amazing meats.

The service and food were both phenomenal! Everyone from the host to the servers were spectacular and helpful. We have come her a few times before, and we never leave unhappy! Completely worth every penny!!
This is a fun place with a fantastic salad bar and delicious grilled meat. Pace yourself, as it is very easy to over eat and feel sorry later.
Never doubt - when I can - this restaurant is my favorite The endless salad bar is great and the "keep it coming" meat is the best of its kind. I took the lunch menu - same as dinner just $20 less
Non stop meat smorgasbord. The food is great. I guess it is reasonably priced. The resturant in Rosemont, Illinois is nicer

Brand Name Experience. I am over in love with this place.. Can't wait for my next amazing experience. The food is so amazing and the service is genuine. Making it a great place to take someone really special..My Husband
If you love Brazilian food, you must go! The food and drinks are great, the people are the best. You must visit!
Had the best time and experience here for my 32nd Birthday Celebration. The staff was very friendly and welcoming and the food was impeccable! Me & my family will definitely be returning soon!

I read mixed reviews, but this place is amazing. The salads were fresh. The atmosphere was very nice. The meat kept coming and it was all well flavored. All different types of meats. The service was amazing! I will definitely be back!
The food was awesome, but the service was better. Our plates were never empty. The variety and high quality of meat was surprising.

Was introduced to Fogo de Chao in Brazil and was pleasantly surprised to find the food and service just as good as in Sao Paulo. Come hungry as you will eat more than you want. Food and service is exceptional!

column3: Excellent food, make sure you go hungry!!
column4: Excellent food, the meat was superb and the salad bar was great! There was so much to choose from and everything was delicious I would reccomend.
A great place to dinne in with your friends and have the best steak ever. The service is amazing each time I come. Thank you all
I went to the Fogo de Chao in Orlando Fl, and it was amazing. Can not wait to go to the location in Chicago! Meat galore!
This was our first visit to the restaurant, it will not be our last. The service was exemplary and the food was amazing.
Food was great and reasonably priced for the quility of food. I have been to three fogo de chao Would definitely go back

column3: Great food in a lovely stating
column4: Terrific meat selection and a great salad bar at this steakhouse. What great tasty capirainis, you only need one ...or two or three .
Been there many times, the food still good but the service was a lot better before. Love the cheese bread and the top sirloin.
The place is really nice . Food delicious but Unfortunately, not everyone can afford That kind of place ...
The service was very good. The meat was ok. The sides were not the greatest. The potatoes were runny. The atmosphere was like a tourist joint. Been there, done it won't be back.
Parmesan pork roast and dark beer. My friends and family love to go to Fogo de Chao for a special occasion.
Excellent food and service. Lamb chops are great. Good place to go for work or play. The restaurant is a bit out of the way but it is worth the drive.
Made a reservation for 7 pm. Was taken on time to our table. Wait staff was well trained and did well. Salad bar is immense and the meat unlimited! Everything was very good.
I loved my experience and the services was outstanding. I be back soon! Thank you all for the great staff that you have.
If you've never experienced Fogo, you are missing an amazing experience. Service here is impeccable. Food is awesome.

column3: Huge amount to Eat and worth the price
column4: This was the second time I have eaten here, the first being in May. They have great food and service.

column3: you must visit this wonderful restaurant
column4: a superb restaurant providing an eating experience of the first order. Service fantastic . Great value for money.
We had a meal for our wedding anniversary and the good and service were lovely. Rather expensive but worth it!

What can be better. Great service, great meat, and a great salad bar. I know its pricey but its worth the visit to experience it. Just dont fill up on the salad bar and try as many meat varieties as you can.
one of the best places to enjoy all types of meats in one meal, decent salad bar, go hungry or it does not justify the price.
The food, of course, is great, but the service here also is consistently excellent. The manager, Paul, does a fantastic job and always makes us feel welcome over the 8 years we've been going.

Great place! I had just returned from my first trip to Brazil and was craving the churrasco experience. Very attentive service, delicious caipirinhas, and fabulous cuts of meat cooked to perfection. I will return soon.
Amazing food and excellent service. We were seated immediately with prompt and attentive service. There is a great variety of foods. Nice atmosphere.
This is a fun place to take a group of people. All you can eat meat and huge salad bar. It's going to be crowded and make sure you have a reservation.
We have visited there several times. Amazing cold bar for vegetables. Table side carving service was hit or miss. And some meats the sodium was so high.
One of the most tasteful restaurants in my life.the service was absolutely fast and perfect.the menu maybe was a little bit pure

The food was great and service was excellent as it is every time. The bartender made our time waiting before the meal very comfortable and we even went back after dinner and he made us some great after dinner drinks.

column3: Our children call this the "House of Meats".
column4: The most beautiful Salad Bar in the world. Brasilian grilled meats & fowl that doesn't stop. One price for dinner with salad bar and one for the entire experience. Expensive but no one leaves hungry including those with prodigious appetites.
The food is awesome here! Guys, make sure you come with your belt loosened so that you can enjoy the large variety of meats that are brought to the table throughout your dining experience.

A place like Fogo De Chao can be misleading, because who never has been there might think that is all about quantity....but here is just quality. Great meats, great atmosphere, great service. I can only recommend. Yes.....not cheap, but worths the price.

column3: Brazilian Churrascuria! Great salad bar! Tasty meats!
column4: This is a typical Brazilian BBQ. There's so much meat! All you can eat! It's big and noisy. Lots of groups. But, the food is amazing.
I loved everything: meat of excellent quality, great choice of salads, desserts. The staff is very good. A visit to the reastaurant leaves great impression! can't wait to visit it again!
Small portions from the burned and overcooked meat. Not a distinguished spicing. Not mentioning that one beer is 8 dollars, the other is 20. Salad bar is great. Otherwise extremely overpriced.

I loved this Fogo and I've been to the one in Rio which was fabulous. They had plenty to chose from although not as much as Rio but the staff was friendly and the caipirinha were just as good as the ones in Rio.

column3: Great experience, service and the food was great as well!!!!
column4: Servers where amazing, always there and around you quick to answer or make suggestions brining constant refills and meat option. Our group of 5 was greatly impressed and had an awesome dinner.

I went with a small group of friends. The staff was friendly and very quick to keep serving us. They always asked if we'd like to try any meat they had. The side dishes were tasty and the desserts were delicious !

column3: Awesome food and drink but expensive
column4: The salad bar alone is better quality than most restaurant food. The meat and Brazilian style steak house meal is unique and amazing too. Price makes it hard to enjoy except for the most precious occasions. Still the place is packed !

A party of 4 business travellers were treated to a feast of flavorfull variety of meats and sausages tastefully cooked to our personal specification. The wine selection is extensive. The location is quite accessible. Definitely a haven for hungry stomachs with some funds to spare.
Great Bresilian stackehouse with great salad bar with a large variety. Then the staff keep bring you different types of meat until you say uncle.
Great salad bar with a large variety. Then the staff keep bring you different types of meat until you say uncle (flip the marker to red)
Try to limit yourself during the buffet and focus on the meat: you have the chance to challenge your limits... Drawback: drinks are not included, not even the soft drinks
Great feed! Loved being able to eat as much meat as we liked! Very varied in meat and vegetable choice! A meat lovers paradise!

There are a bunch of people trying to copy the format but fogo is and always will be the best...everything they serve is top shelf and you never have to search around for anything and the service staff is phenomenal
Every time I visit this place it amazed me. The great service never change and gets better and better. I get greet by the manager like he is my old pal. Thank you all for such a great team.
A great salad bar, many cuts of meat and great service. What more could you want? How about a great mojito? Got that too.
Title say all , great assortment of all possible meats with great sides . I specially like fried bananas .
Amazing experience, beautiful salad bar where I ate all kind of vegetables, I did not eat meat but the smell was delicious. Thank you for everything.
I've never been in Brazil but I came down with a couple of brazilian friends and they told me it taste like home. The food was wonderful and I'd definitely come back

What can we say that we haven't said before. They all do a spectacular job! Paul and his staff really know how to make EVERYBODY happy!!! You never want for ANYTHING! We will be back just as soon as we can.

column3: Best Steak House in the entire USA
column4: Great atmosphere and superb service. Top cold Buffet, and Brazilian meat cuts at the table, by the "Gauchos". Don't forget to ask for "Picanha" and "Faldinha" the best meat cuts.
Fogo de Chao, while a bit pricey, is one of the best restaurants I've ever frequented. The atmosphere is classy. A great place to have an intimate dinner or enjoy an evening with a group.
Wow is a powerful word when talking about this place, Fogo De Chao is an amazing place, We can't wait to go back,
Extra large portions of meat, chicken and a salad bar with many choices. You might need a nap after but you will be satisfied. Go for it!
Love to come to Fogo de Chao for an intimate date night. The service is always fantastic and allows us to have a great night, but always with service nearyby if needed.
The food is amazing. The service is good. And, the restaurant is fun. I always leave full, content, and impressed. Highly recommended
Great food and service, a little pricey but you get what you pay for. Make sure you have a reservation, or you will be waiting a while. We love fogo and this was a first time at the Chicago location.
Always taking of your dinner Attentive Make you feel welcome The food is always good freshh Love pan of yuca!
This place is amazing with good food and a great bar. The staff treat you like family and it has a cozy environment.
The salad bar would be enough for a meal. The meats were all well cooked and great flavour. If did not get the cut your looking for just ask for it.

column3: a great place for meat lovers
column4: The Fogo is a Brazilian steakhouse. I can say that it is really similar to the restaurants operated in Brazil. Great food for those who love meat, very good service. I'll defintely come back.

It's kind of the buffet Brazilian food. The beef is the best. you can choose the level of grill meat (well done, medium, rare...) Close to downtown and the subway station. The waiters have very good attitude.

column3: This is the real Brasilian steakhouse!
column4: Been here a couple times on business, always a huge favorite. Compared to the places I've been to in Sao Paolo, it's difficult to tell the difference!
I was there and the meats were really good and i can't wait to go back again, the salad bar was all what i was inspecting, this restaurant is really such a comfortable place.
While visiting the city we found this great place. Thank you to all the staff for the great service and food. I loved the Gauchos and the drinks.
Fancy meat? This is the Chicago headquarters for meat delicacies, in an all-you-can-eat experience with great sides and an original Brazilian experience.
The salad is very good with tons of options. The options of meat are endless, I really liked the Parmesan crusted pork loin. Service was outstanding, highly recommend
This place is great. They make you feel like you are in home. The food is amazing and the salad bar is excellent. Thank you all the staff for a great service.

This place was great option. I'm sure I will be back to have this amazing steak. The host was very friendly. I will let my friends know if they can have an amazing place to take their significant other.
Always go for lunch and every time I go the service and food is better and better. I'm im love with this place.
I have never received such a good service at a restaurant before. 10/10 for service and 9/10 for food.

column3: As always - great night in Chicago
column4: Never had a bad meal here. Brought a "first timer" to the red/green pucks. He was amazed. We both left painfully full - ask for the filet mignon - it's the best. Salad bar is top shelf also.

You will never leave hungry. I am full for days. The highlight of the experience was the service. Great wait staff and will definitely take care of you and feed you a lot! Garlic beef was my favorite and great salad bar.
Great Salad Bar, and then the revolving skewers of meat cooked to your liking. The parmesan crusted pork is divine. Pricey, but a much better deal at lunch. Not as crowded as it used to be.

Great salad bar, many very fresh selections. All of the meats were excellent and were perfectly prepared. Very tasty desserts as well. Nice wine list - several of my favorites. I did miss the grilled pineapple that one of the other chains have though.
Worth every penny!!!! The best service I have ever had in my life and the most amazing food. I am not a meat eater and I still ate lots of food and had a great time.
All of the details are perfect. Impeccable atmosphere, flawless service and of course unforgettable cuisine. Love the salad bar selection and wide variety of meats! Definitely go!
Perfect date night !! I over loaded on the salad bar ... Definitely gonna go back do the meat first then the salad bar yummmmy and the servers are Awesome!!!!

We had a business lunch and all my invitees were delighted with the Buffet choices and steak. Excellent food quality, great personalized service which I have seldom seen at restaurants. Its a not-to-be-missed restaurant when you are visiting Chicago.... A "Must-Go"
Eating best cut meats with reasonable price at well decorated restaurant. Salad bar is also great, friendly and helpful staff. You will become fan of Brazilian steakhouses after Fogo de Chao.

if u feel the need to a variety of beef styles this is the place to visit. Very overpriced but u can eat all you can of beef chicken, shimps, salad bar, cheese etc the atmosphere is great. Service is also fantastic.

I'm Brazilian , so maybe I'm biased, but the food was really lacking authenticity . The meat cuts weren't cooked to perfection, were unsalted, and the salad bar was poor, only 3 hot food options. I have had way better for that price point.

Very tasty meat as much as you can eat! Quit busy most of the time. Not really cheap with 50$ pp + drinks but it's worth it. Tip: For lunch it's only 30 $! Don't no many restaurants where the food was that good!
Food was excellent again and service fantastic. Fixe prix is reasonable consider all you can eat meat and expansive salad bar, but be aware that drinks and dessert are a la carte and a bit pricy.
Great steak & meats, fantastic salad bar, very good service. Was something we will do again... Need reservation.

Very good execution of the Brazilian beef and more, all you can eat, model. The servers are eagle-eyed and if your disk is turned the wrong way they will be at your elbow constantly. A good buffet of salads and sides. Lovely room. Go hungry.

While it may not be the best for vegetarian's. It still has an outstanding salad bar. Great food. And then comes the meat, and meat, and then more meat. It is soooooo good. As is the service and prices. I love this place!
The many steaks are phenomenal, go there hungry. Dinner is kinda pricey but a good splurge. Good business dinner.
Fogo de Chao recommended by our hotel that was a perfect recommendation and will recommend to everyone very welcoming stuff delicious foods nice place what else we can have it
Fogo de Chao knows how to put on a feast. My daughter can not go to Chicago without stopping by. Never had a bad meal. Too full when I leave. :-)))
Any place that serves meat on a weapon is amazing, and the food they bring is so delicious it's unbelievable. I'd recommend avoiding the salad bar, because the meat is worth waiting for.

Wauw... This place is absolutely amazing. Fantastic saladbar with endless fresh options and much more wellprepared meat of all kind. Very friendly waiters serve and Cut your choise of meat right at your table. I'm coming back for sure the next time I'm in Chicago...
It is like none other restaurant I had ever been to. The food was excellent and the service fantastic.

I've been to the Fogo de Chao twice before. It was always a nice experience. The different meats were full of flavor especially the picanha, my favorite one ! I love their salads and all the sauces. The buffet is spectacular. Too much choices !

column3: Great tasting meat. Excellent salad bar
column4: Went with colleagues. Varieties of steak which are very tasty. Salad bar is very good. One of our colleagues was a vegetarian and he had salads by paying half price. Found the caipirinha in the bar very good.
This was an amazing dinner! If there is a long wait time to sit, it is well worth the wait! Have recomended to many friends who visit Chicago.
Nice place to have dinner with friends. Service is excellent. Food is good. Tiramisu was awesome. We had fun. Location is good. Safe surroundings

Brazilian meat buff√©! Great taste, crispy vegetables and good service with Gauchos (waiters) running around carving grilled meat from skewers upon signalling with a red/green sign handed over to every patron. A must see!

The explosion of delicious flavors in my mouth was phenomenal. My favorite was the house specialty which was absolutely amazing. Loved the variety of options on the salad bar and the service was fantastic - attentive and friendly.

column3: This is becoming my annual treat in Chitown
column4: Always a safe bet to take clients. People eat as much or as little as they want and as and when they prefer, always seems packed with diners creating a great atmosphere. This is a great concept for us entertaining large (or small) groups.
Incredible churrascaria ! Great salad selection and amazing Meats ... Had a great time here.. I think Fogo may just have the best salad selection of the lot

If you like good meats and you have not yet tried Fogo de Chao you need to check them out. The food is excellent, and the service is fantastic. We came here to celebrate our 46th anniversary and were certainly pleased with the experience.
quick serving, good value , and being full is guaranteed . The meat is fresh and served hot. Definitely will visit it again

I love this place, first because it's ALL YOU CAN EAT and second because I'm a big carnivore. I was also very impressed with the buffet, good mozzarella and parmiggiano, fresh veggies... I can't wait to go back!
Wonderful restaurant with the best meet ever and outstanding service! In a nice part of the city Chicago.
As always the food was fantastic. The staff at this Fogo is awesome and doesn't try to rush you. More food than you can imagine.
I ate too much...my stomach actually HURT when I left. It was soooooo good! oh wait, they have a salad bar????
I had a customer one time tell me about this place . So I tried it out and was I blown away with the service the staff was very kind. The food was amazing. Now it is a little pricy but worth it !

I've eaten at Fogo De Chao a couple times while visiting the Chicago area. It's always wonderful. Best Brazilian steakhouse I've been too. Great atmosphere and location. Service is amazing and you don't leave hungry. Highly recommend!!

This is a place that knows exactly how to prepare a steak, in fact, many types of steaks. And, there are many types to choose from as they deliver to your table as you want them as long as your coaster is set to green.

This is a place you have to experience now less than once in your lifetime. What an incredible selection of steak and you get to try it all until you surrender! Well worth the price and a true steak paradise.
The meat is prepared superbly, the service is impeccable, the manager even stops by to ensure all is well, skinny martinis are divine and the salad bar is AWESOME! A great place - worth the price!

Meat lovers, this is your place. Awesome food, excellent service, delicious salad bar and the meat, oh my, the meat is fantastic. The meat is not as salty as in Brazil, it is just the way I like it. Just love it.

column3: Great service and very good food!
column4: The salad bar was great with many original options. Their wine list is also good and the wines are not too expensive.
First of all: salad bar is excellent and you can get in the trap to eat to much before the meat. Now, meat is tender and delicious, I prefer this better than Texas de Brazil.

Excellent, Excellent, A must if you have the $ and time. The food is excellent and I ended up eating more than normal so I could try a little bit of everything. The staff was friendly and catered to you.
What an amazing dining experience, fantastic salad bar and continuous grilled beef cuts, Lamb, Chicken and Pork. Turn your disc over to red when you've had enough.
Loved it, never eaten so much meat! Waiters are all friendly and kept ensuring I had what I wanted without pestering you, the house special beef was my fave. Would really recommend.
All-you-can-eat Brazilian Steakhouse. Excellent salad bar. All kinds of delicious meat. Very nice atmosphere. Great service! What else can you ask for?

Staff was great food was good had my fill of meats drinks where a little weak and pricey spent $200 for two people for dinner and drinks probably will be my last time here because of the price other then that food was awsome
My best place of all time!!! Been there many times. Best ever grilled steaks! Wide variety of cuts! I highly recommend this place, must visit!
food was very good. Too much meal. I looked around and there were all men eating there. Nice to look at but such a heavy meal for a women
I took my boyfriend here on a date night and we both loved it. The food was amazing and the service was great. Definitely a must for dinner in Chicago.

column3: If you are a carnivore this is your place
column4: Not a place for a romantic date. This is for people with love of red meat. They do a very good job with lamb which is not that easy to find in western countries.

column3: One of the best Brazilian steakhouses
column4: Took a client here. Food was excellent. Staff was very quick and professional. Excellent selection and food.

This was our first time here. We went to celebrate my husbands birthday. We had a great time. The food was great the staff was fantastic. Very charismatic and attentive. This is the true definition of customer service.
you should visit fogo for dinner rather than lunch, its well worth the extra dollars! go there with an appetite and the salad bar is on point
The food is great but there is a lot of hustle and bustle and little ambiance. Would try lunch instead of dinner because it is a zoo at dinner time on weekends.

column3: Been to Atlanta and other Fogos.
column4: This one is not as good as other Fogo de Chao's i have been too. Lots of others in Chi town to choose from.
Fogo de Chao is a great and very interesting restaurant. Been there with a group of friends, and we weren't able to walk after we were done. The meat is great and we had a fun time.
The food here is great. 16 cuts of meat and great sides. The drinks are over priced and watered down. Service is just at good. Great for special occasions and if you are visting the city.
Go hungry and will leave with a stomach ache. An AWESOME stomach ache! They will feed you more meat than you will know what to do with, and the meat comes on a spear and is cut off with a sword!
May be a bit pricey, but the meat just keeps coming. A great evening out or client entertainment place. Just don't fill up on the salad bar

All of the food was excellent quality and as much as you could possibly want. Also the waiting staff was incredible. They knew what you wanted even before you realized it yourself. I would definitely recommend!
This place had awesome food and a fantastic salad bar. A little pricey but you do get what you pay for so there was absolutely nothing to complain about as far as the taste and service went.

Our office had a Christmas get together there on Sat Dec 15. Great salad bar, service was excellent as was their never ending serviings of mouth watering fantastic selection of grilled meats . Dessert was a great Turtle cheescake

column3: How much fun was this place?!
column4: Wow, am still full from eating here two months later! Go easy on the salad bar for starters and don't forget to turn your mat to red to avoid instant overeating. Marvellous meat and a great fun evening with amigos. Can't wait to go back!
Texas de Brazil - Fogo? TDB? Fogo? Flip a coin. You couldn't go wrong. Maybe an edge to Fogo. I like the salad bar a smidge better. Too close to call.

column3: Wonderful Brazilian menu. Don't go there unless you like to experiment and are hungry.
column4: There was too much to eat. It was hard to stay on my diet when I went there. The food was very good.
If you love roasted meat this is the place! Everything is superb. Also, the choice of salads is fantastic.
Service food and value just as I remember it from last year. The cocktails, salad bar, meat quality and quantity and the papaya creams keeping me returning.
Love this place. Have visited in other cities as well. Quick, clean service, the salad bar is just as tasty as the neverending skewers of meat. It's a marathon, not a sprint.
Great service and fantastic food. The salad bar is huge, but save room for ample quantities of great meat.

Great atmosphere, excellent service and phenomenal food! They have a rich salad bar and once you're ready- they start to bombard you with excellent meats. i also had a caipirinia that was great... Make sure you come hungry!
It is good, however, Braazzas also provides shrimp for a cheaper price. Fogo de Chao is just a little fancier and nicer restaurant.

At first you would think that this place is just a regular brazilian steakhouse, but once seated you'll enjoy everything of this unique culineary experience! Make sure to have good space in your stomach ;)
I have eaten here several times with large groups and have been taken care of very well by management and the severs. Best Brazilian Steak House in Chicago by far.
It is a fun place-the salad bar is outstanding and the service exceptional. The food quality was way better than you would expect from similar sized restaurants.

I lived in Brazil and this is the real deal. The original flagship restaurant started in Sao Paulo. Go if you love meat! It is truly amazing and the salad bar makes this place complete. Pricey but worth it!
We love here its clean and delicious meats, try wings they are awesome!
Chain...not that great...they kept bringing the same four meats and the salad bar was below par. I go to rodizio all the time in jersey to authentic brazilian places and this doesn't compare.
Wonderful and a lot of it! Bring your appetite! It is an all you can eat restaurant with a huge variety of options and great salad bar. Great for large groups of people to share food and fun!

column3: Bring your appetite and your wallet
column4: Great food and service but pricey for an average night out. The iced tea does not come with free refills, by the way. Salad bar outstanding and desserts are great.
Try it !!! The meat is fantastic and perfectly cooked. Try picanha and let me know if you liked. I had the same just in Rio.

fantastic experience for a Brazilian steakhouse...waiters walk around with skewers of meat...just flip your card over when you are ready for more...excellent salad bar and the meats all taste like they just came off the grill...must experience it!!!

column3: Great Brazillian restaurant when you need a meat-fix!
column4: Incredible meat selection, with never ending quality sides of a few varieties of potatoes, banana, and salad bar. Best value is to go for the lunch 11-2 and save almost $15/person.

Fogo de Chao hands down have the best customer servic/top notch service. Great Salad Bar for "vegetarians" and lots of meat for the "meat lovers'. The Lunch Buffet is the same as dinner cheaper price. Be prepared to be Pampered during your dine experience!
Be prepared to eat and stay away from the salad bar its a waste of stomach space. Very good food
The caipirinhas here are great! The meat just kept coming and it was all very delicious. Not sure if it was worth the price, but that's more personal opinion.
The meats needed more salt! Chimishurri was tasteless and watered down!
If you are willing to pay the price, this place is awesome! Incredible service! Incredible food!
You must eat here to understand the 5 stars.. the food, the service, the atmosphere, the location.... it simply doesn't get better than this one!
We had a party of 9. The staff was EXCELLENT and gave great wine recommendations. The food was perfect. Well worth the money if you want a nice meal for a special night.

Great service, delicious salads, endless amount of well cooked meat. Really worth it. The dessert (chocolate cake) was great too. If you are a meat lover, don't miss this place. If you are on a diet, please don't go.

column3: Great food. Lots of meat, but many varieties to pick from.
column4: Wonderful place to spend evening with a big group of friends. The food just keeps on coming.
Great food, premium salad bar items. Excellent cuts of meat. Wonderful customer service. Be prepared to spend some dough. Well worth it for a special occasion or a once and a while treat.

I had a very enjoyable experience in this Brazilian steak house. Huge salad bar, friendly and helpful waiters, various cuts of beef; bacon wrapped turkey; lamb and sausages, big choice for wine. TIP: Remember to book a table in advance :)00
Brazilian Steakhouse with a great salad bar. Very enjoyable experience and my daughter said the lamb was the best!

Everything about this place is nothing short of amazing. Fogo has the most attentive servers out of any restaurant I've ever been to. The salad bar is huge and has a great variety. I tried every type of meat served and loved every piece!

column3: As always a very very nice churrascaria
column4: Service is really good. Quality of salad bar and of the cuts of meat is really good.....
You can eat and eat all these differente types of meat, sausages; chicken until you are stuffed. Very good "calpiri√±as"-. The chocolate cake is delicious
Outstanding cuts of meat cooked to perfection every time. Great salads as well. Overall great service Lunch is 35$ and with drinks you will spend at least 50 $ per person. Strongly recommend it.
You must arrive hungry. They bring a variety of meats around to the tables, until you've finally had enough. The sides, and the salad bar, are good too.
What a fantastic salad bar! And then you move on to the meat! A fun time and a great experience. I found most of the meat a little salty but then I don't use much salt in my cooking.

column3: Meat lovers cannot miss this restaurant
column4: Great Brazilian churrascaria with an amazing salad bar. If you go at lunch time you get the same food for almost half the price!

This was the first brazillian steakhouse in Chicago and in my opinion is still the best. The salad bar is SOOO good, but you can't fill up here or you'll miss all the delicious meat they have to offer.
Been to many Brazilian steakhouses in NYC and other cities and this is by far THE BEST one i've ever been to. Great food quality, service and ambiance
Great food and fun atmosphere for all! I recommend this for a family night out!

column3: If you like meat you'll love this place
column4: Love the quality of meat in this restaurant.Visit this place whenever visiting Chicago. Salad bar is great. Have been visiting this place over the last 7 years and the quality has been the same over these years

Visited the restaurant with three friends and couldn't fault the service, setting or what was on offer. Everything was cooked to perfection and as soon as you turned green the staff were at your side. Would I go again? Defintely.
The food was great but the per- person price was much higher than other similar establishments that we have been to.
Best brazilian restaurant ever! Really good food and excelent service!
Great service, very nice red wine list and amazing food.

column3: Go easy on the salad bar...
column4: ...so that you can fit in more of the sides and meat. And the bread rolls! Really delicious. The service was great! I can't wait to go back to Chicago just so I can eat here again.
This was my second time here it was wonderful food ...Staff was great ...Food was good ....Selection was outstanding .....Will go back...

column3: Love it.... It's all about the meat here.
column4: They bring by these slow roasted scurs of meat ... It's all so tender and awesome flavor. It's pricey but a special experience. Treat yourself!!

The food is great. It is pretty darn pricey, but it is a unique experience. Have some meat first, before you fill up on salad. The salad bar is excellent, but you're paying for the meat. Service is also superb.

column3: It's like an on/off button for tasty goodness
column4: The food here is amazing, but the service is even better! We were so well taken care of. The wait staff was very helpful and attentive, it really made the dinner over the top! All expectations were exceeded and we'll definitely go back.

column3: Come hungry! Leave with empty pockets!
column4: Vegetarians, stay away! A unique concept for a restaurant; one flat price gets the unlimited salad bar and all of the choice meat you desire. Don't waste stomach space at the salad bar despite its beauty and freshness. It is expensive!

column3: Not really my kind of thing.
column4: Not really my kind of thing.

This place is definitely one of the best restaurant in Chicago. The meat is very good and weel cooked. Service is excellent. Salad bar is very variety. Just love everything and had a wonderful time there. Best value.

column3: If you love meat, a lot...
column4: If you love meat, a lot of meat, this is the place to go! The salad bar has all the accompaniment you might want to break the meat feasting.
Out of Brazzaz, Texas de Brazil, and Fogo, Fogo is definitely the best one.
the food and variety were excellent. It's pricey but worth it for something special.

column3: For meat lovers - it showers you with meat, and it is soooo good you cannot keep the card down.
column4: For meat lovers - it showers you with meat, and it is soooo good you cannot keep the card down.
ate here on my trip to chicago and was very happy indeed. have been to brasil many times so know exactly what is good and not so good..........this restaurant was very good. go there

column3: A LOT of food. Go starving! Great salad bar but you will be too full to enjoy it!
column4: A LOT of food. Go starving! Great salad bar but you will be too full to enjoy it!

column3: good salad bar... way too much food. another reason America has a weight problem
column4: good salad bar... way too much food. another reason America has a weight problem

column3: Great even for a vegetarian! (Really...the salad bar is fabulous)
column4: Great even for a vegetarian! (Really...the salad bar is fabulous)
for meatmood

column3: I'd give it more stars, but I was too stuffed to remember.
column4: I'd give it more stars, but I was too stuffed to remember.
We took our daughter here for her Sweet 16 Birthday Dinner!! We had a very good dinner and the customer service was great also. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.

column3: Just incredible, you won‚Äôt go wrong!!
column4: Just an outstanding venue! Great outdoor seating. Food quality, service and menu was excellent! The best French Onion Soup I ever had, excellent Prime Rib, Fantastic Fudge Cake. One of the best meals ever...Enjoy!

This steakhouse is an absolute must if you visit Chicago. Exceptional food and impeccable service. The view is stunning and the overall vibe throughout the restaurant is top notch. We celebrated my daughters 21st birthday here and they made sure everything was perfect!
Fancy steakhouse with fresh organic steaks and nice wine list. My favorite dish is filet mignon. Also try to get table if possible close to the window, the view is stunning.

I love food and high quality service. This establishment was hands down the best I have ever been to. Not only is the food on point but the whole staff, managers included, work together to make sure your dining experience is one of a kind.
Fabulous service and food, couldn‚Äôt fault this restaurant. Can‚Äôt wait to return, best steak in the USA

I had a Christmas office party here and luckily we skipped the starter , the mains were huge! The steak and sides were excellent. The ambience and service were superb. One of the best steakhouses in Chicago.

The atmosphere and the location are amazing. The steaks are good, but the seabass was phenomenal. The wine selection is good and the staff are very very helpful. Great place to people watch and enjoy the view.

column3: Steak and View are Hard to Beat
column4: This was probably my favorite restaurant in Chicago as it had almost everything you could ask for. It was a bit expensive but worth the rare splurge.

column3: If you're looking for a great place
column4: Chicago Cut has it all. Great location with great views down the Chicago River. Great food from their Steaks to their Fish. Hard to beat in atmosphere and ambiance. All the Servers are friendly. Have been here a 1/2 dozen times already. Always good.
This restaurant had the most fabulous view of the city over the river, ever! The staff was terrific! The menu was perfect! And oh by the way, the food was prepared perfectly!
Fabulous view, great service and superb flavors for meat and fish lovers. Wine choices are very good. It is rather expensive but good.
One of the best steaks I‚Äôve had. We were here with a business group and one of the founders came in and gave us a wildly entertaining ‚Äútour‚Äù of the menu. Awesome location with food to match.
Great food with great service. They were out of the prime rib at 8pm which I think is weird but whatever. All the steaks and fish were fantastic. This place is very good and I would go back.

column3: Can't say enough about the place!
column4: This was our first time visiting Chicago Cut and we can't say enough about the place, the location is great, while the food and the service are outstanding. It's a must when you are in Chicago.
not only do they have great steak but their tuna tartare is Excellent service was superb patio was not open yet

We are always happy with our food and service at Chicago Cut! The steaks are great and I get the scallops which are delicious. The service is attentive and the view of the river is beautiful. It's a solid place to go for dinner!
The service and food was exceptional, The location overlooks the River walk, As soon as the renovation of the terrace is complete it will be tough to get a more enjoyable dining experience!
I visited this restaurant with my boyfriend and their food are delicious! I enjoy the french style and drink.
The service was not good, it was INCREDIBLE! Fantastic food and they did cater all our needs and wants! Very very good Steakhouse

Just dined at Chicago Cut. First time at this restaurant. The steaks were very good and the service outstanding. The tables are very close together and the restaurant is very loud and felt crowded. D√©cor and ambience are average.
They treat you very nice here and the food is quite good. You can taste the quality right away, service is very attentive and the menu quite varied. A place to go back to for sure.
I have eaten here about 3 times. The Filet and Porterhouse are absolutely amazing. Great taste and texture. The service is second to none. The waitstaff is like having Butlers wait on you.
Everything was outstanding: the atmosphere, the food, the view, but specially the service! Thanks for an amazing experience.

column3: great ambience overlooking river, excellent service, great surf/turf
column4: Came with long-time friend. Had salmon poke and tuna tartare appetizers which were amazing. Yellow fin tuna with mushroom was awesome. Service was amazing, very tasteful. Expensive. $250 for dinner for two each with two drinks. Spent 3.5 hrs though. Would definitely go back.

Too noisy to communicate with any, seriously overpriced, cremated steaks and a wine list which is absurd. You have to plat with an iPad to make a selection. Asking for a recommendation I do not recommend

Met with friends and this place could not have been better! The food was amazing and the atmosphere was electric! Crab cake was delicious as was the risotto. Our waitress was helpful and very attentive to us. It was worth every penny.
Great restaurant! Impeccable service , knowledgeable staff and fantastic food. Of course the meat was tops! Will definitely return!

Sent dining experience well worth it!med a little out of the way BUT service and food was just excellent. Also had background music which added to the overall ambience. A tad pricey but for an excelle
Great place , spacious and with a beautiful view of the river. Excellent food and particularly the beef, nice drinks and friendly service.

column3: Great steak with a view to the Chicago river
column4: Lunched at the Chicago Cut, outside on a beautiful autumnal afternoon. Perfect weather and a delicious filet mignon. Service was great. On the expensive side.
Took some business associates out to dinner . Fantastic views and amazing food! The service was spectacular and our waiter Steve was very helpful

column3: Very good steakhouse on the river
column4: Lots of choices for steak and chops, Also good seafood for those preferring something other than steak. Excellent service for a knowledgeable wait staff.

column3: Great Steak Classic Steakhouse River View
column4: Excellent steaks with seamless service. It's basically one large room, so it can get loud when it's busy. The view of the Chicago River is a nice bonus to a great meal.
Even vegetarians and seafood lovers can find something excellent to eat at this restaurant. I had a wonderful time with friends and family there.
Excellent view, superb service and the portions were huge! Pricey, but worth it for a special occasion.
I go here every month for a business breakfast. Service is always very good and the breakfasts are always good, though a bit on the pricey side.
Excellent Restaurant. I never had a steak that taste that good, The service was impeccable and attentive, The best restaurant in Chicago

column3: Good food, but outdoor seating and service could be better
column4: We sat outside (it was a gorgeous evening). Beautiful views of the river. The outdoor furniture was not in good condition. The layout was too busy, table too close to each other which made service slow and unpleasant. Food was excellent.
The trio lobster tails were succulent and the crab legs were plentiful. The lobstercargot is a must to try!! You won‚Äôt be disappointed. You have to get a table outside along the river. Very nice.
What a treat to drink and dine here. The space is beautiful and the food, especially the lobster escargot is divine. Super friendly staff, great service and wonderful food. I will be back again.
Excellent dinner in the private room. Delicious lamb chops followed by 14OZ stake, with great service

We had a great lunch at this traditional steak house of Chicago ‚Äî everything was excellent ‚Äî prime beef, salad, wine, dessert and Rodney‚Äôs great service. To be perfect only a lower pricing was missed.

column3: Steakhouse yes, great cuts? Don‚Äôt know
column4: I had dinner here for the first time with an old friend who‚Äôs a local in Chicago. The steak was dry, and charcoaled and I don‚Äôt know why they serve it like that.

Our team visited this restaurant while in Chicago recently and except for the overwhelming noise level in the dining room, the visit was fabulous. The food was perfectly prepared and flawlessly served, exactly what one would expect from an establishment like Chicago Cut.

My first visit to Chicago and I was amazed at the fabulous eating choices... Chicago Cut was great from the moment I walked in...service was fabulous, and the food was tasty , and attractively presented. I would highly recommend this restau
I was there to celebrate with my best friend my birthday, what an amazing restaurant and service, food exquisite and wine the best!!

I truly enjoyed this place. The host was very polite, the bar Ia waited at for my table had a great selection of everything....and the view I had from my table was exceptional. The steaks have a lot of flavor and the tuna was outstanding.

Two stars for the location and the ambiance at Christmas. They cram the tables in so there is literally no room to move. The food is mediocre at best. Waiters are arrogant. There are much better choices for the money.

An excellent experience, a fantastic restaurant in the center of Chicago where you can enjoy delicious foods and wines. It is located in a fabulous area with great view. It is an expensive restaurant, but it deserves all its money!!!!! A must for Chicago!!!
My friends and I enjoyed our dinner at Chicago Cut. We shared the 26 ounce rib eye and 4 different sides. The corn was our favorite. Then we squeezed in dessert besides.

We dined on a busy Friday night during the holiday season. I agree with others who say the place is lively/ loud. It is. Our food was perfect although we overordered sides. Nimo, our server, was really wonderful

In my opinion one of the top restaurants in a city that has many.. The lunch menu is exceptional...Even breakfast is an option for those of us to get up real early and commute to the city.. Great, exceptional steaks

Having been here numerous times, this was one of the better experiences I've had at a top steakhouse. They were very gracious and generous with our kids(15 & 11). The food, as usual, was excellent. The service, which isn't always great, was very good.
Wine was fabulous dinner was good but the service was outstanding. Thank you Brian for taking such great care of us. Beautiful spot make a reservation early.

I attended a business dinner here. The service and food were excellent. There was a large wine list and we ordered bottles that everyone rated highly. The steaks are done to perfection and the sides are good as well.
Great setting, wonderful service and delicious good. I had the "Holy Grail" Prime Rib which was wonderful. The others had the filet Mignon which was very delicious.

Had a wonderful lunch of their octopus salad which was preceded by a bowl of their butter nut squash. Both absolutely incredible. Can't wait to return and have their steak! Owen was an amazing server.
Great steak, appetizers outstanding, had bone in filet. Cooked perfect. Wine selection great. Very expensive, but i felt worth it. If love a REAL steak, come here.

column3: If you're looking to kill a vampire - they have the steak
column4: I went there (again) for a business lunch. The Delmonico ribeye is to die for (pun). They cooked it perfectly. The sides are great. Service is efficient and location is great.

Chicago Cut is still one of my favorite places for a good steak. Their service is great, the staff really know their menu, even when you hound them with tough questions about where their beef comes from. I'm drooling as I write this.
We went here for brunch. I had a Bloody Mary and the traditional ham and eggs. It was delicious! Service was great as well.We sat outside and had a great view of the river.
It was good .. great service . The location was great. .. the staff friendly and helpful . Food was cooked to perfection..

Steve was our waiter and was not only knowlegeable about the various steaks but explained this eleqouently. It is very expensive, but the steaks could not be better. Huge baked potato. PEI oysters--the best in my opinion.
Last minute dinner reservation. Exceeded expectations. Dinner and service was excellent. Recommend the filet and lobster.
We made reservations for 9 and arrived 20 minutes early and they were still able to accommodate us. The prime rib was to die for üòç there was also a great wine selection!! Very romantic setting

column3: If u want to IMPRESS someone come here
column4: The view from the patio is amazing. The bone in filet is cooked perfectly. The Brussel sprouts are amazing. The wine list is top notch. The service is tailored to make you feel like they've known you for years. Go there.
A real Chicago steak house. Right on the river with both in and outside seating. Inside can get a bit loud. Food was delicious and service was excellent. Sides are big enough to share
Petite filet, Truffled scalloped potatoes, Brussel sprouts, mixed mushrooms... We ate out on the Terrace, it is a lovely view. Wendy was an awesome server!
We had to wait our reservation and when seated, we were given a complimentary mushroom stuffed with lobster. The steaks were tender and service was great.

I had a great steak Thank to jonnhatan He was great and the ribeye was great I like the place and will visit again So so far I have been to to four steak house in Chicago and Chicago cut hits number 2
This is one of my new favorite steak houses in Chicago and there are many. Nice table with business contacts. Special attention and service. Special beers and wine. Everything to like.

Start to finish, from the expertly prepared steaks to the luscious desserts, the attentive staff, gracious owners and the picture perfect setting, we had an exceptional experience! Thank you! We will return!
Best steakhouse in Chicago which says a lot. Always packed and serves food late. Popular spot for local sports teams and celebs. Dry aged ribeye is amazing. My wife also loves Tristan Tails

These place become one of the "most visit" restaurant in Chicago. It offers a spectacular view with great service and food!, from the drinks at the bar to the great variety of deserts. Congratulations to management and staff!
We did not care too much for this place. I ordered the Salmon salad and the Salmon was raw and I asked for it to be well cooked. My husbands steak was real fatty.

Had a business lunch here. My first impression was the ambiance, the restaurant is bright and open. Lunch was incredible. We split the bacon and lamb appetizers. The best part was the Filet. The service could not have been better.

We had breakfast here recently and it was delicious. The steak was tender and full of flavour, and the poached eggs were cooked to perfection. Delicious freshly squeezed orange juice. The breakfast felt like it was good value for money.
Five of us ate there last night for a business dinner. Service is always good but it's a bit loud and the ribeye is $67. Spendy but delicious. The lobster was a little lacking.
The food is just wonderful. Tables/seats are very narrow. Very loud. Very crowded. Very good service.
Wow what a restaurant. Top food and great wine menu. Had the Bolen Merlot which was an amazing experience! What a drop of wine... will buy some more when I am back home.
Very high quality food and service. Some of the best steak I have eaten. Each and every person on the wait staff was top notch. We would highly recommend.
Our private dining room was excellent and the service was top notch. The food was equally as good. Would return here in heartbeat. Not cheap but not terribly expensive.
My son and I traveled to Chicago to celebrate birthdays. Excellent Service and wonderful food had by all.
This is my all time favorite steakhouse. Remarkable service and outstanding steaks. Try their crab cake too. Perhaps the best I have ever had.
Went to Chicago and our Concierege recommended us to go to Chicago Cut Service was great and the steaks were better. Wide selection of wine and steaks to choose from A definite must when in Chicago

column3: Wow..excellent service and classy wait staff still exist
column4: Had dinner at the Chicago Cut Steakhouse; excellent service and wonderful atmosphere with a river view. The food and wine pairing was wonderful. I felt like I was in a old movie classy restaurant. I highly recommend the food, service and location.
I believe this was our third or fourth trip to Chicago Cut. We absolutely love this place. Best steaks we have ever had. Service is top notch and atmosphere is wonderful.
Au gratin soup worth the money, not as salty as most and a little sweet. Steak was cooked as requested. Nice evening, staff very attentive. Andrew made the evening fun for us

column3: the best steak house i have been in the USA
column4: best steakhouse in chicago for the type of atmosphere I like old fashion decor great service I cant say anough good things about it.

If you lack conversational skills, you won't need them here. The noise levels are deafening! If you've been packed onto a train during rush hour, you will feel right at home in this restaurant. The food was good but we will not be returning.
The food was unbelievable, the service was top notch, the price was a great value. Thank you! We will be back soon!

Visited with my friend last evening. The meal was excellent which was the Delmonico steak, truffle scalloped potatoes, wedge salad, and creme br√ªl√©e. Talking is a bit difficult with the noise level.

Oh my gosh, these prime, dry aged steaks are to die for. The New York Strip was one of the best I've ever tasted. Service was superb as well. If you are looking for an excellent meal in Chicago, this is it.
Absolutely incredible steakhouse! Service impeccable and quality of steak the finest! Dessert beyond comparison! Dining outside on the patio overlooking the river...priceless.
Had the most wonderful dinner here this evening. Beautiful n view, fabulous menu and the pea soup was just amazing would not hesitate to recommend this restaurant from Irel d and further afield

Great restaurant for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Excellent location in a very convenient location near Wacker Drive and the Chicago River Walk area. Great wait staff and the food was excellent. I will return.

Had their Bone-in filet. It was OK/good but nothing special. First time I have seen fat in a filet. Ruth's Chris is better at a lower price point. The sides were small and also nothing special. We sat outside and it was quite romantic.

All 4 of us had the 6 oz filet. PRIME, very very good. Whipped potatoes and creamed spinach as sides. Key lime pie and some chocolate cake. Service could not have been better! Dinner for 4, just over $400.

Just randomly walked in and got the best steak in my life. Be aware of the large portions. I accidentally ordered enough food for 2 people. But hey, the homeless guy on the way home became very happy.

column3: Good service, good food but overcrowded
column4: No problem with steaks or other food - service up to scratch, patient & helpful with my demanding friend and staff worked real hard. The place was however overcrowded, recommend 10 tables less in main dining area would sort.

Had a fabulous experience at The Cut. The food was fabulous , the Chateaubriand was spectacular and cooked to perfection. The side of corn a must. The service friendly and engaged and sitting by the River on a warm summers night - perfection.

column3: THE BEST steakhouse I have ever experienced.
column4: My 'thing' when traveling is to seek out the BEST high-end steakhouse. I have experienced Chicago Cut twice now, and have not discovered anywhere better. The bone-in filet is top notch. Always great service, atmosphere, and one hell of a meal!
This experience was amazing, the wait staff made it even better. The steak was wonderful, as was the sides. Really expensive, but I enjoyed the experience.
Hands down! All occasions. All seasons. Outstanding food, service levels always outstanding. Can't think of a better place for those from out of town to experience.

The food was very good but had wait over thirty minutes past our reservation and they tried to have us sit outside (hot and raining) NO Anyway the food was good and the waitstaff in the bar were very good. Very loud restaurant
If you are looking a great steakhouse and a table alone the riverfront, then the Chicago Cut is the place.

We ordered the burger made with off cuts of 8 week aged beef. The burger was over cooked, but they split it two ways beautifully. No dispute the beef was deeply delicious but over done and cool. Waiter was great.
$640 for four, good steak and lobster tail combos, many waiters, good service, request table overlooking Chicago River.
Dinner and service was superb. Todd our server was outstanding. Lots of celebrity sighting. Great atmosphere.

This restaurant is indeed a special cozy and fancy place! Elegant, casual and dine atmosphere, good service (server Marco is very professional and kind), great beef and just price! It's definitely a place to return!
Excellent steak dinner with good service. Place is a bit noisy and the tables are a little close together.
We went for brunch on a Saturday. Service was excellent, and the food was wonderful. We will be going back for sure. We sat out on the patio watching the boats go by.

The place is nice, the tables have to little space between them that is hard to even go to the restroom. The food good. The steaks are good the desserts are not that great. Expenssive as any steakhouse.
Best steak I ever ate. Special way of preparation result with delicious experience. From that time is difficult to be satisfy with European steak.

Delicious appetizers but the porter house steak and rib eye for 2 were bland and undercooked! It was rather disappointing for such a popular restaurant that has impeccable service and a stunning view of the city!
great service, great food, convenient. the only negative is that valet takes too long. great experience overall. classy place, prices aren't too outrageous (for lunch)

Had a client luncheon here, and the food was good but not great. We ate steak and fish plus the prerequisite sides and it was not special. For the price we paid, I expected better food. One more thing...this restaurant gets very noisy.
Great atmosphere, great style, great food. I was there with friends. We had a great time, friendly service and the steaks are amazing and sooooo tasty.

Lovely dinner in Chicago Cut. Porterhouse was beautifully cooked and there was a really nice atmosphere in the restaurant. Rodney our server was very helpful and there are lovely views if you have a table close to the window.
Had great expectations. Service was OK but not great. Steaks were very well, but the menu was below our expectations. Would repeat anyhow.
Really great food and service. The view was amazing. My 7 year old raved about it being one of the best steaks he had. A true gem in the city if you're a steak connoisseur.
Incredible food and flawless service. Steaks are the best we've had and the service is absolutely amazing. Very attentive and personable.

column3: You can put Chicago Cut up there with any Steakhouse in Chicago!
column4: Just amazing! Staff is wonderful. Friendly and knowledgeable. The Nueske Bacon is a must have appetizer. I had 10oz Center Barrel Cut Filet. Fantastic! The Truffle Scalloped Potatoes were tremendous, along with the Crab Mac ‚Äòn Cheese. I already cannot wait to return!
Quantity and portions good. Well aged Angus Ribeye. Nice wine selection and impeccable service. Expectations met.

column3: Second Best Steak I've ever had.
column4: There is not a better steak in Chicago. I lived on Michigan ave. for 18 months and tried most of the famous steakhouses in Chicago. This was the best one that I went to.

I went here to meet a friend of mine for dinner. There was nothing but people in suits & I was told everyone here was on an expense account which I was not. I felt that it was very highly priced for moderate food. I...More

My wife and I went to Chicago Cut for a date night. It was a gorgeous day so we sat outside on the patio. Everything was great from the staff to the cocktails to the steaks themselves. A very solid service all around and what better to go with it than wonderful views of the Chicago river and surroundings.

Friendly and helpful service bordering on the formal side of things. Several of the table were very pleased with their food but mine - on the bone rump - was disappointing. I normally like a rare steak but given the expected size I went medium rare. However the meat was very chewy and sinewy indeed rather than marbling melting in the mouth and the fat on the outside had not rendered down. Would expect more for a $60 piece of meat. I can only think something went wrong with mine; I would have said something but group environment did not lend itself to that. Given past reviews I guess it was an anomaly.

column3: Beautiful spot on the Chicago River but...
column4: Last night we celebrated our anniversary with our children at Chicago Cut. The restaurant is on the Chicago River and the massive windows give way to a beautiful views of the city. We had a cocktail in the bar until our table was ready. The bar is great with lots of tables and cozy places to sit. The main dining area for the restaurant is a massive room giving the feel of a banquet center (a sea of humanity).
