The perimeter of the room are only four top tables and larger groups are seated in the center area. We had requested a cozy table but instead our party of six was seated on a main walk way with other guest, waiters and staff bustling by.  We ordered wine and a few appetizers to start. I requested small plates and we would share the various appetizers. They arrived already plated with a portion of each of our selections on six plates. Not everyone wanted every appetizer. I chose not to mention my disappointment. Our waiter immediately showed up and wanted our main course selections. I requested that he return later so we could enjoy our appetizers and mentioned that we were not in a hurry. Before I could finish the appetizer our table was being cleared. Again I mentioned we were not in a hurry.  The appetizers, entrees and side dishes we ordered we presented nicely. The crab cake appetizer was not the best. The delicate crabmeat was overpowered by too many red peppers. The sides are very small serving intended for one person. I personally had the lamb chops and they were excellent.  If you are looking for the traditional old style Chicago steak house this is not my favorite. I also suggest not driving to the restaurant because the valet parking is very unorganized. Take an Uber or LYFT.

column3: Second Best Steak I've ever had.
column4: There is not a better steak in Chicago. I lived on Michigan ave. for 18 months and tried most of the famous steakhouses in Chicago. This was the best one that I went to.

column3: Excellent Late Night Food and Service
column4: We returned to Chicago Cut Steakhouse late in the evening after the opera, wanting a late night snack. The service was attentive and warm. My hamburger and fries were marvelous. The Caprese salad hit the spot. Wonderful breadbasket. Drinks extremely well prepared. The Breckenridge whiskey exceeded expectations. View of the Chicago River and the elevated trains traveling over the bridge is iconic.

Arrived as 3 and waiting for 4th. Wouldn't seat us even though there were only 4 tables occupied. Then when 4th arrived a few minutes later took us to a table next to one of the 4 occupied ones, and where one person had pushed so far away from their table they were blocking one of our seats. Hostess didn't seem to care, but we asked for a different table, which was next to windows---very nice. Food good with large portions. Waitress was excellent. Large portions. Very attentive without being intrusive. Did I mention large portions.  If the arrival experience set a better feel, this is easily a top restaurant and being on the river--will have a great Spring through Fall view.

I'll start by saying I WILL return. The service was exceptional, excellent location, decor and view. The lobstercargo app was so good! The steaks is where 50/50 came in. My bone in prime was astounding. Cooked to perfection at medium rare. My sons medium filet was rare. Returned to be cooked to order and came back a charred mess. They promptly removed from my bill and apologized profusely. No ones perfect, I understand and don't hold this against them. The a la cattle sides of scalloped and whipped potatoes were delightful. Drinks were poured heavy and they do bourbon right with large sphere ice. Dessert was complimentary and very good as well.  An "almost" perfect meal, maybe next time as we will return based on service and the majority positive experience with our visit.

column3: Another Chicago jewel and a "Cut above the rest"
column4: We love to enjoy fine dining when we visit Chicago and this restaurant is one of the BEST Each time we visit Chicago we choose another great place to eat this time it was Chicago Cut Steakhouse We read a lot of reviews before selecting a place and every review was right on for this one From the polite and courteous person we spoke to when making a reservation ,the easy cab ride and convenient location,and walking in we were greeted like family. The decor was luxurious and nothing but class. We were seated in a very timely manner. The staff were professional and offered great advice on the huge wine list and food specials available. The steaks were PERFECT,as was the fresh fish. The portions were more than sufficient for any body's appetite. We were celebrating a birthday and everyone made it even more special. The prices were comparable with any great Chicago restaurant and we will be back here again for sure. A big thank you for everyone at Chicago Cut for a wonderful dining experience.

We came here for a family meal to celebrate an early Christmas. We were blown away by that amazing staff. The food was beyond amazing. 3 of us had the filet which was to die for. The other two had the 32 oz prime rib and said it was the best they've ever had. Also, had the Mac and cheese side and really enjoyed it. For dessert we had the chocolate cake and loved every bite. Really a nice restaurant for a special evening
We don't get steaks in the UK like you get in the US. Probably the steak I had here was the best steak I've had in my life and am ever likely to get again. Quite Extraordinary.

Business lunch offered steak, seafood, salad and sandwiches with most offering generous portions. Service was excellent. Atmosphere elegant with windows looking over riverfront. Food was good but not enough for a revisit. Prices high expected for downtown Chicago,
Unbelievable Cajun Steak. A must place to try if your in town. Always busy and good atmosphere. Great selection and you will not leave hungry.
CC came recommended as serving the best steaks in the US. We found it to be exactly that. Superlative in every way.

Loud, corporate type of steakhouse. But the food is excellent. Only thing is that it is very expensive. Appetizer portions are a bit sparse. But the quality is outstanding. It's worth a trip but be aware of what you are getting.

We were visiting Chicago for the weekend and were able to get a reservation. The place was packed, but that sat us on time. I had a great Manhattan. My steak was cooked perfectly. Service was very good. Great steakhouse.
Extremely friendly staf huge wine list good food must try crab avocado salad. Meet was juicy and tasty. Whenever i come back i will visit again
I eat the best burguer in the USA at moment . Our waiter was very helpful and the view of the river was beautiful, I recommend.
A typical and expensive Chicago steakhouse. The food was great and the service was very good as well. Go in the summer and sit outside to enjoy the river5
We reserved a table in advance as we knew this restaurant gets busy. We were very impressed with their steaks, would highly recommend!

A wonderful meal in stunning surroundings with a great view of the river. We visited as part of my daughters 21st Birthday celebrations and were not disappointed. Great food, great atmosphere, great views and exemplary service. Treat yourself !

A great restaurant should be loud with people enjoying themselves with great food and wine and service and not afraid to talk and laugh. This place excels in all those areas and I would recommnd it to anyone visiting Chicago, especially if you're Irish!
Hash browns cooked like mom's steaks perfect. Wine nice and chilled. Service like you are important to the place.
This place is noisy and very pricey. Would never go back. We had to ask the people in the table next to us to move so we could get into our chairs.
Great place for dinner..... The service was fantastic ( thanks Dana)....and so was the food. I had the ribeye and it was cooked to perfection. Nice place to meet up after work.
This place is great. If your looking for a good quality steak, look no further. Extensive drink list as well.

column3: Nice dinner for our first night in town
column4: After walking all over town our first day in Chicago we decided to splurge on a nice Chicago steak dinner. Very nice place, was crowded but we didn't have to wait. Great service, good food.

We ordered these yummy lobster cracker appetizers which were fantastic! Then the bone in rib eye which absolutely melted in your mouth. By far the best steak Gwen has ever tasted. Two thumbs up to this fantastic Chicago steakhouse :)

column3: Great Place for a Special Occasion
column4: Wonderful steak house. One of the few places where you can get Crystal champagne by the glass. Extensive wine list. Happening place that was very crowded even during the week. Worth it for a special occasion.

column3: Great outdoor dining with fantastic view!
column4: We have been to this steak house many times and the food has always great. The view of the Chicago River and high rises add to the upscale dining experience. Best wine list and martini's too!!

column3: Anniversary dinner with a great view!!
column4: Awesome view of the Chicago river and we had our 2 year anniversary dinner here. Service was excellent. Bone-in ribeye was amazing!!
Really good place right on the river. Very lively on a Wednesday night. Super service and the food was also very good. Go for the filet on the bone, you will not be disappointed.
The entry were good, but the most important thing that was the T Bone came out overcooked, i didnt enjoy it. Also the check was 500 plus tip for 4 persons.
We go here for business as well as personal. We live downtown and really, this is by far the best service and steak experience of anywhere.
Great food, better service. Best lamb chops I have ever had. Highly recommended for any occasion. Will be back again very soon.

column3: Very good steak in nice location
column4: I had some time to kill before catching the train home, a big hangover and the need for steak. This place came to my call! It's pricey but worth it if you want a guarenteed excellent steak.
Ambience was nice! Steak was dry and service lacked character! 1100 dollars not well spent in my opinion! 4 out of the 5 people at the table complained about the dry steak!
The food was excellent and the wait staff were courteous and professional!!! Great view of the city and the river!!!!

I have been here twice, one with a friend and one with my girlfriend. Both times were spectacular. Really professional and friendly staff. I actually feel like I got what I paid for; good food and service.

column3: Skirt steak and view were amazing!
column4: Great service, awesome view and amazing food. I enjoyed this experience and will be back soon! It was a bit difficult to locate though.
We had an excellent view eating dinner along the river. The service was top notch and it's definitely one of the top places for a business dinner or to celebrate an event.
I'm normally put off by very attentive service staff, however our waiter was charming and offered great menu advice. Sat outside in the warm with a lovely view. Delicious food!
Dinner for 16 and it was all outstanding. Best steak in Chicago. Great atmosphere and service. We all had a great evening.

+ Really awesome steak, sides and desserts + Try the truffle salt! (I can't do without it since then) + Huge selection of wines (wine list on ipad) + Stylish interior + Great location on the river + Professional service
We loved Chicago Cut! They treated us like royalty for my husband's birthday! Food was excellent and service couldn't have been better. We will be back!!
Wow a wonderful place for breakfast and the outside view does not get any better. Right on the river a fun place to dine and watch all the river traffic and hustle of this great city

Excellent location with a great view of the river, very reasonably priced brunch. This steakhouse is quite pricey for dinner. Nice selection on the menu, plus you get a free mimosa or bloody mary to start and two free beignets and homemade jam to start.
Always crowded but the staff are very helpful and pleasant. Food was incredible! Great view of the River if you can get a table on the patio. We were not able to but still a great time.
A US10 worth wine plus a US10 worth beff was charged by US 150. Be far from this resfaurant. Quality: reasonable. Place: beautifull.. Receptivity: unfair.

column3: Expensive but must have the Lobsterscargot!
column4: Great food, great service, great location! Definitely best steak house in Chicago along with Gibsons. Better location and broader menu. All round a really great spot for lunch and dinner. My go to place in Chicago!
It was a business dinner in early June. I had the prime filet and was melt in your mouth delicious. The wait staff was superb. Good wine selection.
Excellent steakhouse with incredible staff. Atmosphere is great and the location is right on the river.

Food was excellent. Steaks are a very good size and very tasty. Excellent selection of wines. Service was very good. If you are on a budget then this is not the place for you. $200 average price for a meal for two.
Try double cut stake here. Nice place to come along or with friends to talk and enjoy the meat. Wine only from California, don't expect Chianti:)

column3: wonderful place to eat..Rodney made experience even better... excellent
column4: have to go with potatoes with truffle oil..must share soon much food..go with Rodney recommendactions can't go wrong
The waiter and the bone in Tenderloin was the two highlights. Perfectly executed and perfectly cooked.

column3: A great meal, with great service.
column4: Everything about tonights meal was on point, though a bit cramped, their service and food were absolutely delightful. They had a great steak selection, scotch was ample, and everything was really just very well done.
I thought the food was typical and prices were above average. The one thing that did stand out is if we were sharing a dish, they would portion it out prior to serving it to you.

column3: Yes, I'm talking Chicken at a Chicago Steak Joint!
column4: A 'school nite', there WAS a Blackhawks playoff game, a packed place, and an almost recession going on... but was my dinner good!
Great food and good service. Yes you have to get a steak. Everyone was very happy with what they got. BTW my steak was cooked perfect.

Food is good, not outstanding for the price. The service is what you are paying for. Hard to carry on a conversation with everything that is going on around you, but is entertaining. Definitely not a romantic dinner atmosphere. Excellent wine list.

column3: Beautiful location, delightful meal, but very loud
column4: Great food, great wine, very nice location, but this place is loud and crowded. The filet is excellent, but the sharable vegetables and sides are wonderful.
Food was incredible. Started with oysters, salad, and then steak. Staff was fantastic. Best food in Chicago.
Went to breakfast here durning St. Patrick's weekend. What a great treat. The food was excellent and the service top-notch!!!! Thanks Margo and Louie üòÉ

column3: There are better steak houses in Chicago
column4: This was my third visit to CC. It was so so. The setting is great, but the steak failed to wow. In fact it was bad. I suggest Morton's, Del Frisco or Benny's as better choices with consistent quality.

column3: The night we got in engaged
column4: Amazing experience, from the staff, to the food, and our course, the abiance. Location is near a number of great attractions. This was amazing night with my man.

This is the best steakhouse in Chicago. Everything was great from the French Onion Soup, the Filet, the Mac and Cheese and Asparagus sides, and Chocolate Cake dessert. The ambiance is energetic and the wine list is great.

Best Steak in the city! Love this place! Amazing view of the city, great service, wonderful food! We eat here quite a bit and have never had anything we regretted. Steaks are incredible. Chocolate cake is out of this world! Highly recommend!!

column3: Superb steaks, beautiful view, and outstanding service
column4: This was one of the best steak dinners I ever had in my life. Everything, from the appetizers to the coffee, was perfect. People in our table ordered different cuts and they were all perfectly executed. I strongly recommend this restaurant.
On the river or overlooking it. Very good steaks the service that should come with it. Had eight people at our table everything when off smoothly.

This is my new favorite restaurant. Everything is excellent here! Appetizers to desert to after dinner drinks were amazing. Service just right. Attentive enough without hovering. Try the bone in filet. It's hugher priced, but for that special meal, this is the place!

Absolutely loved this restaurant. We asked our hotel concierge for the best Steak House and he suggested Chicago Cut. Fabulous service and sensational food. I always find the USA has the best steaks, but this is the best of the best!!
Steaks are amazing, as are other lunch entrees. It is a "power" place to be, where the elite gather. Yet, everyone who comes is treated like royalty and the food is truly fir for a king or queen.
Not only was the filet I had the best steak ever, the lobster-cargo was outstanding! The restaurant is attractive with a nice view and the service was impeccable.
Excellent food. Went there for lunch. Sat next to the river with great view. No complaints. Prepare for expensive tab, it is a steak house.
We had a great brunch here. Very reasonably priced, good view over the River and exceptional service. Would go back again.

column3: The Place to be in Chicago...
column4: Chicago Cut is a quintessential steakhouse. Period. Amidst the hustle and bustle, the restaurant is energetic , vibrant and speaks Chicago. David and Matt are top duo.
Lively but not overwhelming atmosphere. Great food and wine selection, something for everyone. The staff was very helpful. And the iPad wine menu display is fun to interact with.

This is probably one of very 'IN' places in Chicago. Food was excellent, meat perfect (never eat in my life so tender steak), service perfect but for European coming to USA it is very difficult to understand why portions are so, so huge!!!
Great wine list also...excellent service and views. Probably the best cooked steak I've had in a while. I like mine cold in the middle and they did just that...
Simple high price, matched wine perfectly with mid rare ribeye perfection. They have one of the best martini mixologist in the area!

Had breakfast here... very good. The pecan pancakes are phenomenal. The waiter was very attentive to our needs, and even went so far as to help us "tourists" with suggestions as to a good pizza house.
We went there for dinner & were seated outside - it was PERFECT! Great food, excellent service (Thanks to Mark) & the steak was rapt he absolute BEST! I will definitely go back -
We went here, and was just decent. Nothing to bad to say, but just did not think it was worth the money. Just think in a town with so many options, needs something to differentiate.

column3: My wife says the best steak ever
column4: Sisters, wife and niece. My sisters birthday was celebrated in style at the Chicago Cut Steakhouse. We all loved the food and atmosphere

column3: If this place is the grail
column4: Then our wait person Jordan is Indiana Jones. Amazing prime rib, killer personal and friendly service. Atmosphere is louder and more lively than your typical place making it perfect for unwinding after business and not feeling like everyone else around is eating after a funeral!
Chicago Cut has by far one of the best and most peaceful views of the river from its patio. Great place to grab lunch and enjoy the outdoor patio while you still can.

Great table on the patio overlooking the river and skyline. Serive was friendly, helpful, and not rushed. All the food and drinks from the appetizers to the deserts were awesome! My steak, a bone-in ribeye, was large, delicious, and cooked perfectly!
Too loud for conversation, pretentious and rude serving staff. I can get a well-prepared steak in a calmer, kinder atmosphere. Pass on this overrated place.

Steaks were great... don't go for anything else. Salmon was over cooked even though it was ordered Medium-Rare, was close to well-done. But this place is known for steak and you won't be disappointed.
Food and service was top of the list. It's a steakhouse and it is Chicago so it's not cheap BUT you do get what you pay food. A really good meal.

This place was recommended by the concierge at our hotel and it didn't disappoint. The food was exceptional, so was the service and the view and area was amazing. Great atmosphere all around and first class food. We will be back for sure.
We had a very nice dinner at Chicago Cut Steakhouse and got a very good Ribeye and will suggest to go there and try it yourselves. Fantastic place.

Food was fantastic but most of all the service was excellent. The prime rib was great and the bone-in filet that my wife has was great. If you like a quiet dinner go early, because it does get very busy later.
Absolut marvelous steak. Juicy and cooked to order...no really. I say medium and I got medium. Excellent service and normal prices for a highclass steakhouse. Would definatly come back.
Great Food , service, and view! Steaks were very nice as well as the Cocktails!The quality of food and service justifies the price!
Sensational!!! great food and great service!!! We will return when we are in the area. Thanks again!
For the most classic steakhouse in Chicago this is a must stop. Prime steaks and seafood makes this place a standout. Classic everything here at Chicago Cut Steakhouse. I love this place!!!
Nice food and excellent flavors. A bit crowded but was ok. I think the waiter can pay some more attention to his customers. That's all folks!

This place has nice cuts of meat, but atmosphere is comfortable and without pretentious attitudes. Had the bone in filet, good quality wet aged. Wine selection is decent, service is exemplary. Blackhawks seem to hang out there.

There are so many restaurants in Chicago that I was surprised that this one disappointed me. The stake was a little dry and I ordered cream spinach and this was the only thing that was good. This place is always crowded and for sure overpriced
DELISH! Can't wait to go back for dinner. The restaurant itself is just beautiful and the view is fantastic. Dinner at night will be perfect in the summer!

Ten of us enjoyed the Easter Brunch and hospitality yesterday. The food was delicious and the service was fantastic.The waitstaff was attentive ,professional and friendly. I will go back for a more intimate dinner in order to try the regular menu.
Really good food here, has to be a steak. These are very big so no need for starter. Likely to be 100 dollars a head
Sat at the bar and great service by the bartenders. Food was extremely overrated. Manager refused to turn off CNN and turn on national champ game so I left.
We stopped in for drinks and appetizers on a Friday night. The staff was nice. Drinks cold. Food was Awesome!! Prices are steep but worth it.

column3: When you need the locals best spot in the city
column4: If you need to close a deal or impress the in laws this is THE spot, food amazing, best view not on a roof in the city!, staff is ritz Carlton standards - this is the spot you go when everything Has to be PERFECT
The steak was prepared perfectly. The service was excellent (wonderful host)! Great place for business meetings, dates and going solo, as I did!

Husband and I both enjoyed our filet mignon. Cooked very well. Service was top notch. View and Ambience were wonderful. We did not like the Scalloped Potatoes. They were oily and had a spice that did not pair well with the streak.
The food, service and atmosphere here are the best around. Prices are on the high end but it is worth it.
The steaks are not cheap but the quality is super.The staff is fast and gentle and te service very efficient. We have been there first time long time ago and now the service is still very good
First class steakhouse, with USDA Prime meat absolutely great tender meat. Sides were wonderful as well, service quick and friendly.

We celebrated our 1st wedding anniversary at Chicago Cut Steakhouse. We loved it! The food and service were excellent! We were seated at a table overlooking the water. Beautiful view! I would highly recommend this wonderful restaurant.

column3: Solid Steakhouse with high noise level
column4: Upscale modern on the river. Excellent steaks but very high noise level in crowded inside dining room. Pricey.

column3: Brilliant meal next to the river
column4: Had a Porterhouse Steak and it was incedible. Sat next to the river at midnight, fantastic cityview. Very romantic. Had 23 degrees celcius. Fan-tastic!

column3: great food but not for those that like a quiet meal
column4: Extremely good service, great steaks and a complimentary cheesecake with a candle for my birthday. Went Friday night and the restaurant was packed and very lively. Not for those wanting a quiet romantic meal but the food was first class

We ry a steakhouse on every trip we take and thus one is up there in the top! Amazing service paying attention to evrry detail is only highlighted by the delicious food. We sampled seafood and steaks as well as the huge sides... All great!
Great location, great food and exceptional service......loved it! They have private dining also, exceptional wine list and great menu selections.

We were very impressed with the quality of the food and the service. The waiter recommended the bone-in filet--it truly was one of the best steaks I have had. I look forward to eating there again when I next travel to Chicago.
We had a large group and sat outside on the deck. Amazing views. The seafood appetizers were great. The steak was good but not great. Had some great Far Niente Cab with dinner.
This is a great steak place! It is the place to get wonderful meat and wine, and the view is unbelievable!!
Amazing service. Warning, the meat is huge and the sides are meant to be shared. They say a side serves two.... More like four people.

Came here with my family to celebrate father's day. It was a perfect day to sit outside and enjoy delicious food and enjoy a great view of the Chicago river. Would recommend for a special occasion or just to enjoy great food and atmosphere.

column3: One of my most memorable dinners!!!
column4: Excellent ambience, lovely food and most amazing service!!! One of the most memorable dinners I have had....They have an excellent menu...and the sides are too good! Yum yum!!!

column3: Excellent place to eat on the river
column4: Food and service were great. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Some of the best customer service I've received in the city. Wide range of prices to fit any budget.
Wait staff is spectacular and the prim rib is to die for. Will definitely be back when I'm in the area.

I had bone in filet last night when in town for business. Incredible. You can BYOB wine for $25 corking fee. Great atmosphere. Outstanding service. Favorite steak joint ever and I've tasted a good amount of them. Mushrooms were awesome as well.

Usually do go in for steak houses, but went here for brunch. What an outstanding surprise! Great food selection, presentation, quality, and service. Beautiful setting. Convenient. Best lobster roll ever, including all of Maine! Just a real restaurant pleasure.
This is your classic boisterous steakhouse. The food and the service were both excellent. But the thing that sets Chicago Cut apart, is the fantastic view of the river while you dine.

column3: lovely lunch by the river with super food and service
column4: Had a superb lunch with the family sitting next to the river admiring the water traffic and the chicago skyline , steaks were cooked perfectly and we had great service .
This place is special, fancy, energetic and cool in one sitting. Our meal was delicious. The service outstanding, for a special occasion, go!

Just went for drinks at this fairly new place on the Chicago River. It's buzzing. Loud, boisterous, fantastic service, great drinks, appetizers really good, and just a ton of energy. That is what Chicago gives you, and Chicago Cut has it.
Delicious and mouthmelting steaks, correct service, nice wine list . But the noise level is incompatible with a top tive restaurant, they need to do something about it

column3: AMAZING OUTSTANDING BEST FILLET MIGNON STEAK I HAVE EVER EATEN
column4: no words to express how good and tasty were our fillet mignon steaks. i had one and ordered a second one. does one need extra words. go and order it now-add it to your must list eat and enjoy

column3: One of the top steakhouse dinners I've ever had
column4: Service was top tier. They were very accommodating even with our large party (13). I would recommend coming here to anyone looking to get a real taste of fine Chicago dining.
Service was excellent and the food was good. Really expected the steak to blw me away but it just didn't. As someone already said it was a bit loud.
I went for a dinner with a workmate. Food was nice, ambiance a bit noisy for my taste; too many people yelling at the same time. Service very attentive; a bit prizy.
The service at this steak house is really outstanding , i love the fact that it has more options than just steak , there is a great bar area and it has the best views of the river .
I'm a meat lover and the the filet mignon is one of the best I've ever had, tender and delicious. Food and service was fantastic!
I have the Strip Steak, and it was excellent. My only complaint is that it is soooooo very loud in the restaurant. It was so loud, my girlfriend and I could barely carry on a conversation.

Delicious rib-eye with a great wine pairing. I don't even remember what else I had - does it matter? One of the best views in a Chicago restaurant is here. The wine list comes to your table on an iPad.

This is the only place where you can eat a perfect steak. Ask for a medium cooked Chicago cut bone-in filet or bone-in rib eye with one of a brand red wine and you will never forget this heavenly dish ever. God bless t-bones...

column3: One of the best restaurants ever!
column4: Impressive! Great atmosphere,staff and service is top and professional. Food is amazing. The rib eye was one of the best ever with the Oscar sauce! The scallop potatoes were the best I have ever had. Cocktails and wine were superior.
One of the best meals I've ever had. The Seafood sampler dish was insane, filet was perfect, sides were incredible including the mashed sweet potatoes. Go here if you want a good steak and more!!!!
The restaurant is wonderful with a fantastic view if the water. It is very busy so plan ahead to get reservations. The bar area is first come so try to grab a table there. Great food and service.
Great location by the river, excellent service and magnificent meals. Extensive wine list. Always crowded so a reservation is suggested.

column3: Best in the city. Top 10 US steakhouses
column4: No wonder USA Today listed this restaurant as one of top 10 US 2012 steakhouses. We tried 2 different steaks and loved them. If you do go, get the corn as a side. Also, most nights a reservation would be required.
We had reserved a large table to be with our small family, we had been very well received, I had eaten crab and it was excellent, excellent value for money

Nice atmosphere, good service, & delicious Stone Crab ü¶Ä. Stopped in for a quick bite in the bar while exploring Chicago. Ordered the seafood salad along with an order of stone crab. I would easily order both again.
My Number one go to spot in chi town, you must visit Joes you will not be disappointed. The food and service is always outstanding
Excellent as always. Perfect martini and delicious food. After enjoying time in the city., we stopped for a fabulous early dinner. The staff perfectly explains the menu and are always courteous.
The menu is widely varied for seafood, crustaceans. . But not great for broiled tuna . Need more interesting choices and dressings for fish when steaks and crustacheans are not options.
great slightly noisy atmosphere, excellent steaks, great wine selection, scrumptious crab, excellent service and a good crowd pleaser.
Food & service are great Only downside is that it is expensive I go for special occassions Great key lime pie & kids chicken fingers ( adults lice them too)
Got us in without a reservation, only had to wait a short amount of time. Excellent ambiance! Very impressed with the staff and our server was outstanding! Will definitely be visiting again!
What a night! From start to finish the night was great. Got right to our table at our reservation time. Food is stellar and service is top notch! Will be back again!

column3: One of the best places in Chicago
column4: We always have great meals here. Everything is very consistent food and service wise. Always friendly and professional. We have never had a bad meal. Highly recommend.

Its a little hard to describe the experience, as it seems to be ok but not good or special. However you will go back as you know that things (food and place), will be as expected: Informal, not expensive, just ok.
Great bar area, great service and food. went with a big group and had a wonderful time. Would recommend for a nice dinner
Have been going to this restaurant with family for over 15 years. Never a bad meal, great atmosphere, waiters who know their jobs well.
Everyone liked their food‚Äî if you like seafood, Joes is the spot to go. ;) ‚ù§Ô∏è Anything from the raw bar, I highly recommend!
Make sure u dont miss this lovely and delicious venue! To top it off the key lime pie is a hit! Welcoming service and friendly and helpful staff.
Love the Stone Crab and Joe always has them. Service is outstanding. We always sit in the bar and great place to people watch.
Typical chicago establishment. Nothing stands out, crab bisque is ok but the stuffed shrimp was in desperate need of flavor and or seasoning. I won‚Äôt be returning
Food and service are always excellent. Favorite is Ribeye steak. Cooked to perfection and great quality. Impressive wine selection.

column3: Excellent Restaurant When Someone Else Picks Up The Tab.
column4: It's over the top as far as cost but excellent quality food for a Surf and Turf dining experience. Top notch service as you would expect for the college tuition that you drop at the end of the night.
Excellent seafood and steak restaurant just off North Michigan Avenue in Chicago. Top-notch service, decor and food. You pay a little more, but get much more in return.
Love Joes- service food always consistent and top notch. Pricey but worth it. Great for business lunch or dinner. Fish always fresh. Key Lime Pie best in Chicago only place better is Florida Keys.
Never disappoints! Had the 12 oz filet, and it was perfect! Chocolate fudge pie for dessert was exquisite. Never a bad meal at Joe‚Äôs.
Reservation needed. Food is amazing. Had delicious crab legs! Service was great. We were celebrating a birthday and they offered dessert with a candle
You can't go wrong eating at Joe's. Great food, wine, service. It's the perfect place for a special night out.
Great place to get stone crab claws when in season. Steaks are great most of the time. Great place to have dinner and drinks while chatting with friends

Joe‚Äôs has the best seafood in Chicago. The atmosphere is good for business or with friends. We‚Äôve hosted numerous business dinners in the private dining area and the food and service has always been top notch.

One of the finest restaurants in Chicago. Terrific diverse menu. Wonderful seafood & the best steaks in Chicago. Their fried chicken is amazing. Deep wine list. Deserts are amazing. Try the Key Lime pie ! Very professional & friendly staff.

Crab Bisque was good..would have liked more crab in it..lots of different breads to choose from..Crab cake was excellent..Steak was good..Stone Crab really didn‚Äôt have a lot of flavor..was expecting more like King Crab taste for $90..But we tried it..Great wine selection and desserts!
Literally my favorite place to eat in Chicago! Amazing food, great experience! Recommend to everyone visitng or living here!
Always a great experience, and most since I get to travel on the carb season!!! it¬¥s a must while I¬¥m in Chicago

Absolutely superb in every way, the setting, the service, the ambience, the food. The price seemed a little high compared to where I am from, but not excessive by LV standards. It was my 'last night' meal and gave me something to remember.
The waitstaff was excellent - Paula helped us choose one of the best dinners! The decor was tasteful and we lingered over dinner. What a great experience
Amazing! The snow crab legs are amazing. Service was perfect. Nice atmosphere. Pricey but worth it. Great dessert!

Returned to Joes for a seafood snack. Oysters were outstanding, although a bit pricey. Enjoyed a seafood salad that was loaded with lobster, shrimp, and scallops. Service is great. Make reservations a couple of days in advance if it‚Äôs the weekend. Great venue.

column3: One of the best in chicago
column4: Had a GREAT meal with my wife there always very consistent with everything food and service they know what there doing there. Loyal workers there order anything your heart desires. Never had a bad meal there. Would like to go more often.

column3: Great atmosphere, excellent steaks and sea food
column4: One of the traditional steak houses with serving always first class dishes of best quality. Good choice of wines.

I was here for lunch recently with a friend. Service was professional and we were not rushed. Food is always consistently of good quality. I would recommend for diners wanting a quieter atmosphere with classic steakhouse items and service.
Went for cocktails and appetizers in the bar. Love the atmosphere and food was great. Always worth a stop by!
I'm going to Joe's for more than 10 years. The maitre is the best in America. The food is the best in Chicago
Took my wife for her birthday. She was completely wowed by the food, servers, atmosphere. From the stone crab appetizers to her filet and the key lime pie dessert, every mouthful was a treat.
Meal was fantastic with great and knowledgeable service. Pies are amazing, especially the peanut butter one!

We had a great lunch. We ordered select size stone crab. They also have a special sauce for the crab. It was very good match. The Branzino fish was a lovely taste! Home made Pumpkin pie was light and delicious.
The place is very famous, and it deserves. The seabass was really outstanding. I would also recommend the crab cake. Service is fantastic. Not cheap, obviously, but worth it.

column3: Nice atmosphere for a lazy lunch
column4: Nice atmosphere for a lazy lunch while it rained out. Clam chowder was not great, but ribeye sandwich was very good.
Service was great! Food was excellent as usual. Very helpful with us bringing 2 toddlers! great mix of steakhouse and the best stone crabs!

Love this place so much - for its consistent quality and impeccable service. Was probably way to excited to learn there was one in Chicago, so had lunch with a friend on a busy weekday. Seafood is really amazing and always excellent.
Whether fish or steak is your desire this is your go to place. Old school at it‚Äôs best. Attentive service in a dynamic atmosphere
Great ambiance. Good food. Relaxing place to be. Affordable oyster specials. A Chicago classic. Sit in the bar area. Faster service and more relaxing.

column3: A Must restaurant to visit if you love Steak or Stone Crab
column4: One of the best steaks I've experienced in Chicago as well as the only place to have delicious, large Stone Crabs.
The food was great; service was impeccable! Very "old school" restaurant; waiters in tuxedos, white tablecloths, etc. but we really enjoyed the dinner
As always, Joes does not disappoint. Food and service both great. It‚Äôs a bit pricey so use for special occasions.

column3: Great restaurant for the company holiday party!
column4: The last few years we have held our office holiday party at Joe's Seafood. They do an excellent job providing us a private room and the food and service is at the highest level! I would strongly recommend Joe's Seafood for this type of function
I attended this restaurant as a surprise birthday dinner with my family and friends. The food was amazing and the staff was so accommodating.
Always popular fine dining location. Family friendly and group friendly. Or great for a date night as well.
Great food. Great service and phenomenal drinks. This is one of my favorite places to eat at and its always simple.

column3: Joe's is the place for surf and turf!!!!
column4: The steak was aged and fixed just the way I like it. Medium rare and my steak was which was just delicious!!!! The wine pairing with the meal was spot on. Bold red wine from California.
The food is superb! Also I have Celiacs and the staff is extremely well trained and were able to tell me the exact ingredients and allowed substitutions as necessary.

Service is outstanding. Staff is knowledgeable regarding the menu and are very attentive. Crab bisque is one of the most delicious that I have ever had. Crab claws were fresh and tasty. I only wish that I lived closer!
Yet to have anything but an exceptional experience at Joe‚Äôs. The quality of the food, service and drinks have been consistent every time we dine here. Please open more locations.

column3: Best meals include the best waiters
column4: The wait staff at Joe‚Äôs was extraordinarily friendly and helpful. The best meal we had in Chicago! What was also informative was the way our waiter served a nearby young couple with three energetic young children. He must be a fellow grandfather.
I love this restaurant, I love their food and I love the atmosphere here!! Classic look, impeccable service..the perfect spot for a classy night.

Sublime service by Mary. Seated spot on at the reserved time of 8.30pm at a lovely table, despite very busy night. Crab cakes that Emeril would be proud of. Fabulous jumbo prawn cocktail and Mahi Mahi fish. Key lime pie was well, divine.
Very authentic America restaurant, food was very flavorful, the place bring you back to the 50th. I love it

We lucked up and were able to walk in and get a table (I would suggest making a reservation). The service and food were amazing. The crab cakes were very meaty. The lobster and crab was cooked perfectly.

Great food. Great ambiance and old jazz music. Feels very Chicago. Staff in formal dress. The maiter-dee, was very helpful with a member of our party on a scooter even with a packed house. Highly recommend.

This is one of the best meals I have ever had. The service was ridiculously outstanding. My food tasted amazing. My husbands food was fantastic. It was well worth the price tag, which was actually really reasonable all things considered.
Food is good, but not as good as it should be considering what you are paying for it. Stone crabs are a fad that has to go. It's a total gimmick.

Excellent experience at Joe‚Äôs in Chicago. Excellent food, staff and service. Everyone was very accommodating the minute we arrived, with no reservation by the way. My wife had a disability scooter and the staff took care of all her needs.

We had great seafood and steaks here. Be sure to get dessert - key lime pie was divine. Excellent service. We went on a Wednesday night, and our table wasn‚Äôt yet ready at the time of our reservation. It was very crowded and busy.
Wow what a meal! They fed a private group of 32 of us and a packed house and everything was amazing! The staff was fabulous and was seem less in everything they did!
Best king crab I ever had. Simply delicious. High quality food and ingredients. Great ambiance. I highly recommend this restaurant.
This is the best steakhouse in the country. Amazing food and impeccable service. Everything is perfect!

Had a business lunch in the area. We decided to go to Joes. I wanted a light lunch so I ordered the fish tacos. Excellent. Fish was great. Always a great lunch and dinner spot. A short walk to Michigan Ave shopping. Enjoy
You are welcomed like a queen at this place. Loved it! There are waiters all over the place. They watch you but in a discrete way.
What a great experience. All the food was fresh and top of the line. We had the filet mignon and it melted in our mouth. The service was fanatic also.
Delicious king crab legs and stone crab claws. Jodette was our server and she was fantastic. Would highly recommend.

column3: Pretty good food and great service
column4: Above average food, great staff and a wide selection of food types and wine. Enjoyed the experience.

column3: I love Chicago but now I found this place I can't wait to return I LOVE JOE's
column4: Appetizer's, meal just everything the Chocolate Martini. Was here on work travel and I can't wait to return to this location or to try the one in Las Vegas.

This place was very pretty, nice, and fancy. It was extremely overpriced and not a place for small kids. I did find out that I don't like stone crab.... Lol I would not go back simply because of the food was so expensive

We had a fine time at Joe's. Seating was almost impossible to be had, so we sat at the bar. Service was more than acceptable and, although the restaurant is exceptionally busy and noisy, we still had a fine time.
We ate dinner here with a group of 4-couples. Everything from the service to the meal was top-notch.
Very nice friendly atmosphere. Food is great especially the crabs. We definitely go back to this restaurant again when we are back in Chicago!
Friendly and confortable atmosphere. Excellent food.known for its crab dishes. Efficient and friendly service.
This place is really awesome from the reception to the atmosphere and the food. It made an unforgettable experience and memory from our chicago vacation. Prices are above the average but worth it
Great selection of premium seafood. I never had a bad meal there and top choice of seafood. Always a great dining experience.
Can't go wrong with anything, stone crabs are awesome, their steaks were delicious. The drinks were just right and great selection on dessert. we shared them.

It's a Chicago steak and seafood house that knows Chicago. Great room, solid service and a price point that can work for all. Go ahead and split or share - no judgment here. Service is truly one of the best in the city. Just enjoy!
The visit was very good but not exceptional. Great service, food ok, but very very expensive.better places to spend your money.
Delicious food, no matter what! It‚Äôs quite a tourist location but it has so many great items on the menu that we love bringing people to it. It will be costly.
On my recent visit to Chicago we went to Jes‚Äôs. The drinks and seafood were excellent! Super service...who could ask for more! ‚ù§Ô∏è
A great place to power lunch with clients or friends. Bar seating if you don‚Äôt have a resi is a great option! Best seafood salad!
Love, Love, Love this place! Stone Crabs are a must for any seafood lover and Joe‚Äôs delivers in a big way! Great meal, excellent service and fantastic atmosphere. A must when in Chicago.
Excellent food & service! Loved the crab. The seafood was very fresh. I recommend highly and will return.

column3: One of the best Steak houses in the city
column4: Always love eating at Joes. The service is always great. Wait staff always feel like they are very experienced. They always give great recommendations Food is top notch to match service and serving size is a good value -

From the front desk to the table, everyone is super nice. It was my friends birthday so we went to Joe's. Loved the food, see the pictures and just see what I'm talking about, everything is fresh and tasty. Would return right now!
One of the better places but costly One place I try to visit once a year the bar and the seafood tower ate the best Especially when you add the stone crab claws

The food is excellent. Lots of good seafood selections, everything is always so fresh. Great steaks too. On top of all of that the service is over the top. Save room for the Key Lime Pie, the best ever!! Guaranteed culinary experience!
staff very attentive and service great. Food was well prepared and elegant presentation. Stone crab excellent but expensive

On occasion, it is pleasure to enjoy a good cocktail during a Saturday shopping trip. Joe‚Äôs was perfect. The Bloody Mary rim seasoning was developed by the in-house bartender and made the drink delicious! Don‚Äôt settle. Enjoy Joe‚Äôs for all occasions!
Restaurant is fabulous. Service is great. Book your reservation early. They can get very crowded Seafood is very fresh and it‚Äôs a fun atmosphere too
We was 3 of us and had a great time there! The food , the service and the people are outstanding good! We had oysters, steak and seafood platter! All of them was super nice!

column3: Superior Service and top notch food
column4: There were no complaints from our table! We were a bit under-dressed for this place (first time visiting DC and this restaurant) but we were treated great and the food was fabulous. The Coconut Cream pie was the best I ever had, bar none!
Once again, Trip Advisor does it: better than expectations, and Danielle recomendations where the best: wild Sokeye salmon and stone crab with the Revolution local beer.Thank you!!!
Had a delicious dinner with the family. The restaurant is not as good as the original but a nice option in Chicago
Had a fantastic lunch here with a good mate. Alaskan Crab, Sockeye Salmon and key lime pie. All outstanding, and the service was outstanding. Would go again in a heartbeat

Arrived early for pre theater dinner. The place was quiet. By the time we left it was booming. Our waiter was friendly, knowledgeable, and efficient. We all had salads and some variety of fish/seafood. Everything was delicious. Service was excellent. Drinks were good too.

This is our 2nd time to this location. Was here on business for the National Restaurant Association Show. Nice job on this occasion. Crab, lobster both excellent. Scallops delicious (maybe a bit small). All good. Fun evening. Expensive, but good.

We stopped with the family at this great steak house. They also have great seafood options. The menu has many options and all looked great as we could only taste some. The service was very friendly and quick. The taste of steaks were really good.
I don't think there is a better place for seafood specialties than this one..I come here at least once a month
This is my go to for amazing food!!! Great variety and even veggie options. Servers were all prompt and pleasant. Great work everyone!
Went for dinner & this is a really nice place. Food is top notch, though the price is also. We really enjoyed our visit and our meal. The key lime pie for dessert was also outstanding.
Best place in town, best server I‚Äôve ever had in Louisville. She was so sweet and very helpful... I would recommend this to anyone

column3: Delicious food that happens to be vegetarian
column4: The vegetarian Reuben is absolutely delicious, even to a meat eater. Classic veggie options and veggie versions of meat classics. You will be very satisfied
From drinks to appetizers to entrees to desserts to service and atmosphere our experience was super incredible a great way to celebrate a special occasion

column3: Steaks and Sea food at it's best
column4: My wife and I have been hear twice now and found the steaks outstanding and the sea food fresh, very good service. If you looking for one of Chicago's best, this is it.
Great service, great food, good with the kids (8&12) and have a kids menu - my son said it was the best steak he‚Äôs ever had!

Visited 2x recently for lunch. Great experience both times. Bartenders were friendly and informative about food choices. Stone crabs and shrimp cocktail were both superb. This place distinguished itself in both service and the quality of the food.
Great experience ! The food and service are awesome ! If you have doubts about the dishes , the waiter can explain you so well , the ambience is so cozy and elegant

Made a beeline here after having stone crabs in Miami a couple of years ago. It didn‚Äôt disappoint. The crabs were utterly delicious and the sea bass was just sublime. Dessert was key lime pie. It doesn‚Äôt get any better. Two thumbs up!

I don't come here often but every time I do eat here, I am pleasantly surprised at how delicious everything tastes. It is crowded and loud but with great company and tasty food, you don't care, it's quite enjoyable and the staff is superb! Always!!
They exceed our expectations again! The service and the timing of food was perfect. Delicious entrees - perfection.
Seafood and steak with professional wait staff and delicious desserts! Every visit is perfect! Sometimes have to wait even with reservation.
Joe‚Äôs has phenomenal food and excellent service without breaking the bank! Joe‚Äôs is a must go to if you‚Äôre in the Downtown Chicago area!!
The best meal we had during our recent trip to Chicago. Great waiting staff who couldn‚Äôt do enough for us, and the steaks and seafood were sublime.
Celebrated our 10 year anniversary. Everything from the service and food was great! Great atmosphere and awesome hospitality.
Great place to get Seafood especially King crab - Banana cream pie is to die for - two thumbs up - Service is usually above par. The waiters always have great suggestions.
Awesome food! My husband and I go here because it's the best. Anyone visiting Chi Town *must* go here!
Joe's is so great, the service is super professional, and the food is very high quality. This place is the real epitome of class. You just can't go wrong with this place. I can't wait to go back.
love the seafood salad, fresh, tasty and perfect! Sitting in the bar with an excellent glass of wine makes for a great lunch or snack any time.Service is speedy and attentive.

column3: Great place to take a client
column4: The food and the service was remarkable good. I will most definitely go back with my wife so she can enjoy too
Really a class operation. Food and service is excellent. Makes for a very special dining experience...either lunch or dinner. Reservations mandatory.

column3: Best Seafood for a great price
column4: They have a nicd variety on their menu just in case you go there with someone who does not like seafood. However their seafood is amazing and service is exceptional!
They always amaze me with the consistency and quality of their food. The lobster bisque is the best I've had.
We love Joe‚Äôs. It‚Äôs a special place with great food. It‚Äôs probably over priced+ but you‚Äôre in the heart of the City and it has never disappointed!!

column3: Stone Crab is overrated, but an excellent restaurant nevertheless.
column4: Very very professional. They definitely know what they are doing. I turned up midday without a reservation, but place was avaiable u in the foyer, if not in the main restaurant room. Reservations are recommended..
My sister recommended this place and it was great. The steak was flavorful and so were the potatoes. Nice wine selection and rge service was great. Well deserved 5 stars.
The food was fantastic. Best crab cakes ever! The desserts were fantastic too! And don't forget the calamari...the best! The service was also great. We reserved a private room.
Very good food , with good service , the oysters and filet were superb . We visited several steak houses in our visit and this was the best overall.
Once won't be enough, everything was spot on. Deserts are huge, 1/2 slice is more than enough for 2.
Nice place and really I enjoyed there, they have a large selection of seafood especially the crab an lobster which is very delicious.

My family and I ate here . Really busy, bustling restaurant.My daughter loved the stuffed Mushrooms, My son had a great steak, I had Steak and lobster which was superb Had a bottle of Miner from Napa Valley that was good too Worth a visiting
Staff are very friendly, great food & very relaxing atmosphere on the waters edge of the marine. A favourite place to visit

column3: amazing brunch! pricey but worth it!
column4: amazing place for brunch! it was pricey but definitely worth it! for sure will go back again, will advice not to eat a few days before and stuff it all in!
High end quality dining!! You certainly pay for what u get. Everything is so fresh, fresh, fresh! You will not be disappointed.
Great food . Wonderful service . Great for special occasions . Joes is great for lunch or dinner. The waiters are terrific. Always a great experience.

column3: Had a great birthday celebration at Joe's.
column4: All parties enjoyed the food, atmosphere and service. Word on the street is their fried chicken is amazing. A little pricey but we will be back. This is a Lettuce Entertain You restaurant so you can't go wrong.
We love Joe's Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab especially for lunch. Great food, great service and great atmosphere.
Once you get a reservation to Joe's your in for a treat. The menu offers a variety of delicious entrees that won't let you down. Service is superior, maybe too good. You'll enjoy your visit!
I have eaten here a couple of times and have always enjoyed my meal. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll be heading back with family in the future.
The restaurant is outstanding for any type of occasion. Everyone in our party enjoyed their meal and ambience.
I love the Rib eye steak... the drinks & crab legs are incredible. I love to go back as much as possible.
We had a family lunch and drinks at Joe's on Christmas Eve. The atmosphere was very warm and inviting, and festive. The service was great, as was the food. We were all happy. Great wine list.
The food was outstanding. Cooked to desired temperature. The staff was very friendly. The peanut butter pie is to die for.
Waiters were fantastic, food was even better!!!! We were only in Chicago for 3 days, and wanted to hit a variety of places to eat, but it was so good, we went back for a lunch and another dinner.
Lively and fun with amazing service, delicious wine selections. Sea bass was amazing as well as scallop appetizer. Stone crabs were fun to try although not my favorite on the menu.
What a great place to have a romantic meal with my spouse , good good food !! Always on point with service and meals
I‚Äôve been coming here for years every time I‚Äôm in Miami and it‚Äôs always great! Best stone crab claws on the planet and the service and ambiance is the best. Don‚Äôt miss it!

The food was great, best in Chicago. Ambience is great servers in tuxedos. It is pricey but you feel like it was worth the price. They do move you along so you don‚Äôt always feel comfortable sitting too long.
This place never disappoints. Exquisite cuisine, lively bar and restaurant...service is top shelf. Make a reservation!
The ambiance was amazing and the service was exquisite the entertainment was eye catching and the food is the best!

Joes always provides and outstanding dining experience. From the time you walk through the doors you are treated with courtesy and professionalism. The food is outstanding and the atmosphere is lively. This is a must do when we visit Chicago.
This place rocks! Top notch service, and delicious crab cakes! I love sitting at the bar, great people watching.
Joe‚Äôs is our first choice for a nice dinner in the city. Excellent seafood. Excellent steaks. Excellent service. Family friendly. Hard to beat!
Everything was a ‚Äú10‚Äù firm the atmosphere to the service to the food Can‚Äôt wait to go back this year Will recommend to friends ‚úåÔ∏è
As always joes is consistent with excellence! Professional service like at joes is hard to find, unpretentious and relaxing try it!

We spent the afternoon at the Chicago 360¬∞ and the dinner at Joe's Seafood was a perfect continuation of an amazing day in Chicago. I suggest to try any option of the menu (not just only crabs. My preferred dessert? Boston Cream Pie , unbelievable!

We went there around 2.30pm on Thursday it was packed! Reservation needed! Great seafood and service, cocktail hour was great! Grilled seafood platter was yummy! Will be back tomorrow with reservation!

column3: Fantastic place with great food & service.
column4: Honestly not difficult to see why as I write this review this is the no 1 restaurant in Chicago, food, service and venue all excellent, the stone crab was off the scale. On the expensive side but well worth it.
Great food, great ambiance, friendly service. Pricing is very reasonable. Every time we go we are having fun and enjoying the ambiance.

Excellent location, service and incredible stone crabs. This restaurant is sophisticated it's a perfect place to celebrate or just relaxing this a one must stop. I highly recommend for either business or famy and friends.
Excellent food and superior service. Stone crab is perfect and the menu is full of other great choices.
Found restaurant through trip advisor and booked in advance which is a must ! Bit of a wait at the bar but no hardship! The service and food were great and a really great atmosphere
First time that I had visited Joe's Stone Crab was actually in Vegas for my mom's Birthday. Did a reenactment this year, service was awesome & food was great!

column3: Quite possibly the best steak in Chicago
column4: I read good things about this place - skeptically. One look - one bite - erased that. Top 3 steaks I‚Äôve ever had. Great service too.
Nobody beats Joe's for Stone Crabs, OG service, and just plain old great evening out. Been going to this place for years and it never disappoints.

column3: Its Not Joe's Miami, but it is excellent
column4: Food, service, and ambiance are excellent. Great spot with a terrific vibe. A lot of fun and great people watching. It lacks some of the charm that Joe's Miami has, largely because it is not OLD and worn, but same quality in food and service.
Steak, seafood, or service. This place was da bomb. Go there for a special occasion. The steaks were awesome.
One of our 2-3 favorite streak houses in Chicago. Not cheap but they don't try to nickel and dime you, and the service is awesome.

When Joe‚Äôs opened in Chicago years ago, it became our first choice in restaurants. As restaurant owners, we appreciate the fine waitstaff and consistent excellence in all food quality and bar service.

It's a bustling dining room, but the service was top-notch. The steaks were wonderful. We had trouble deciding on the dessert so they brought both after we ordered. It's a bit pricey, but you definitely see the quality.
Absolutely a great spot for a special occasion and if you can afford it regularly you should be going more often. Known for their seafood, but their steaks are soooooo good too!!

column3: Great ambience, awesome staffs and food!
column4: We didn't really planned to be there, just googled and were able to find table without reservation. Two of us tried same menu, Alaskan crab and it was amazing! Will be back again when in windy city!

Had a lovely dinner here with friends. The crab is amazing and service was great! Side dish portions are quite big, we had 2 side dishes for 3 people and it was way too much. The drinks are also really nice.

Really tasty seafood and very friendly and attentive staff. We had the set lunch menu and loved it although a dessert AND a separate key lime pie was a big ask at the end!!! A must place to eat when in Chicago
An older wooded panel setting that has been update with modern touches. Excellent food----Steaks, Seafood and other well prepared dishes. A little noisy but, I think that is part of the ambiance.
Just a place you have to be, amazing crab from the Joes farm, the king crab and the tomatoe salad are exceptional. Service is tip top and the atmosphere makes this a great place

Since the original Joe‚Äôs Stone Crabs in Miami is probably my favorite restaurant of all, Joe‚Äôs Chicago does not disappoint. The food is excellent, of course the Stone Crabs are amazing! The service is outstanding and I highly recommend.
First time here! Absolutely wonderful!! Highly recommend the seafood pasta. It‚Äôs a must in Chicago. Denise was our waitress and was absolutely spectacular! Thanks Denise!!
Shopping stopped for a roast beef sandwich and made in front of you and very good! Blue cheese is added so had it heated then added tomato, pickles, lettuce. A great sandwich for eight dollars!
Perfect professional service, great ambiance and wonderful fresh seafood prepared at its best. Normal portion so that you don‚Äôt leave the table hungry.
This was my best experience in Chicago. Nice food, good service, interesting wine list. It seems to be a typical place to go. O recommend and I would come back.
Wonderful lunch and good value. I love their seafood but I do find the evening, beginning at 4 pm too loud for folks my age (senior).
Needed a late night place to eat on a Thursday night. Crowded but sat right down. Had drinks, shared the seafood salad which was fresh and not over filling. Our waiter Charles was great!
A super busy but good restaurant. Staff is customer friendly and the food is awesome. I go for seafood but steaks are chicago yummy too.
The crab was sweet cold king crab ,salad with peanuts was delicious , the desert was out of this world.
Visited Joes in September with colleagues from out of town. Everyone loved the food, atmosphere and service. Great way to end a long week!
The food was fabulous and the staff went above and beyond to make our night enjoyable. It‚Äôs wasn and inviting. Savor every bite it‚Äôs worth it!!
The waiter was just so full of himself it was hard to dismiss the behavior. The good was good but the prices are way out of line. This is really a tourist/convention territory. Locals stay away.
Food is good and pricey but well worth it every dime. This fine dining at it best. The crab legs were excellent.
This place is a Chicago classic. It's a little kitschy but that's part of the appeal. Food is consistent and good. Lobster bisque is always a good bet.

Being from the burbs, we don't get into the city often. But when we do, one of our favorite places for special occasions is Joe's. Very nice, friendly service and pleasant atmosphere. Nice menu with plenty to choose from. Surely we will come again.
Superb Seafood and great service. My favorite Chicago Seafood Restaurant. Fresh seafood just like you are living at the coast.

Looking for THE crab? This is the place! Order a bottle of Champagne. Go for some Oysters as precourse. Do their Stone Crab (whatever size), fill up with a Riesling during the course, and wrap it up with a EspressoMartini! A perfect mealüòâ
Great experience at Joe‚Äôs Seafood. I strongly recommend this restaurant in your next visit to Chicago.
Nice place you et good litlle but this place diserve ll the manny the staff is great the food is good the place is nice so 5 stars
Great waiter. Excellent selection. And the food was incredible. Highly recommended. One thing to know in advance: it‚Äôs very expensive.
Attentive service, amazing steak, seafood tower which impressed, deep wine list, excellent starters and desserts. Everyone in our group thought Joe‚Äôs was a hit. Reason why it is ranked so highly.

Oh my goodness! The food was amazing! The seafood tower was phenomenal. I got the Dover sol which was to die for and my husband got the dry aged steak which he said was phenomenal as well! I would definitely come back!
We sat in a crowded bar and the service was ok, but I think because the restaurant was so busy. We did enjoy our food and wine, fun atmosphere!
Food was great. Excellent service. Our server was number one. The atmosphere was wonderful, full of energy and vibes.
Oyster medley was terrific and the salmon was cooked perfectly with a nice presentation. Nice extensive wine list. Wait staff professional and helpful.
Joe never disappoints. Their steaks are alway grilled perfectly. The seafood is equally fresh and something to look forward to. Please try them while in Chicago.
If you lean on dining here, make your weekend reservation far in advance.. it is very crowded. The staek and seafood are delicious especially the stone crab claws. The drinks divine. Highly recommend

column3: Best combination of seafood and steakhouse in the city
column4: It's not the iconic Joe's in Miami Beach, but it's very close. Great for celebrations! We typically get the medium size claws and save room and money for the madagascar shrimp.

Won‚Äôt matter if you‚Äôre looking for meat or seafood. It‚Äôs all here. One of the best bone in filets I‚Äôve ever tasted. And for the seafood lover the best crab claws outside of their flagship restaurant in Florida.
Atmosphere is delightful, staff is more than accommodating and the food is simply amaaaazing! Steak and crab cake is out of this world!!

It was a special occasion-Birthday-- Fresh Lobster cooked to perfection, and their signature dish- stone crab. Appetizer of jumbo fresh shrimp. Caesar salad. Nice compliment of creamed spinach and baked potatoe. Great selection of wines. Also a very nice choice of desserts.

Excellent food and drink. Kind of pricey but great for that special occasion . Stone crab is the house specialty when in season but the rest of the menu is superb. Would not visit daily but should try at least once.

This place is top-notch. It's expensive but worth it for the experience. The service can't be beat. They treat you like old-school restaurants did, back in the good ole days :) Also, the food is exceptional.
I don't think you can have a bad meal here. Though a tough place to snag a table or bar seat, it is always worth that wait.
Service and food were high quality and well worth the money. This was a group dinner and everyone enjoyed themselves. The restaurant is not overly noisy and everyone enjoyed their entrees.
Had good food and will go back again. There were two couples and all the food was served hot and fresh
The food, atmosphere, and service were great. Visited for a work function and the filet was cooked exactly how I like it. Make sure to get reservations as it seems to be busy quite often.
Expensive, awful, terrible restaurant. Please don‚Äôt come. Don‚Äôt lose your money eating here. Worst place on town.

Excellent service, food, and overall experience. No wonder Joes is rated so highly. We had an extravagant lunch and spent more than we should but didn't mind as our waitress, Goda, made the difference.
Joe's is an exquisite restaurant with great dishes. Wait staff attended to every request. Dishes were delicious with ample portions. A bit pricey, but worth it.
Joe‚Äôs has always been my most favorite restaurant in Washington DC, here‚Äôs even better. Flawless service.

I really enjoyed this restaurant for the whole snapper experience. The fish as well as the presentation was very fresh and tasty. This is now my favorite restaurant.When i don't travel i always go there to have some nice food.

Stone Crab experience was great. We had the stuffed shrimp and seafood grill, they were delicious. Fried asparagus was perfect. Luckily we had room for half desserts, excellent key late me pie and apple pie A must visit lunch or dinner
Had lunch at Joe‚Äôs following recomendations and it was great! Had the manhattan clam chowder and Alaskan halibut! Service it‚Äôs very good.

We visited for a business dinner after a colleague who had visited previously suggested it. The stone crabs were tasty as was my branzino. Everyone enjoyed their meal as well as the impeccable service. I highly recommend a visit.
If you are in the area and want to top shelf seafood and steak house, Joe's is not to be missed. The food is always awesome and the service is impeccable.
We had a business team dinner here and it was fabulous. Fantastic food and service and don't forget dessert.
this is the real deal, wonderful food, professional waiters, friendly bartenders, it has it all. try the dover sole split it and have some sides. you wont be sorry

Wonderful dinner. Filet was excellent, perfectly cooked. Wait staff was expertly trained. Everyone greeted us and said thank you when we left. Very nice atmosphere, where we could actually hear each other. Definitely would visit again.

Joes never disappoints!!! make sure to book a reso for dinner.The restaurant does tend to get packed and hard to walk in. Bar is always lively and has the best espresso and cucumber martinis I've ever had!!!

column3: ALWAYS our first stop in Chicago!
column4: This is ALWAYS our first stop when we arrive in Chicago...we sit in the bar area (for lunch), have a bloody mary, shrimp cocktail (the best) and the tenderloin sandwich. Love it!
We were a group of 4 for dinner. We all ordered something different, all metals were exceptional and service was great. Will be back.
This is an "INSTITUTION" that you should not miss! The restaurant carries and serves the same high quality as The Joe's located in Miami Beach, Florida.
There is nothing g about this restaurant to complain about. It is first rate in every way. Service meets the highest standards and the food is fantastic. It is a wonderful place to go.
Nothing like a good steak. Nothing better than a good steak, prepared well. Nothing as great as a good steak, prepared well, with great service. Joe's is all of that.

column3: One of my favorite banana cream pie
column4: The food is always solid and spot on. But make sure you save room for dessert. The banana cream pie is to die for. It comes with foster sauce and it's very satisfying.

column3: Anywhere but Joe's. Sell them all and provide the contact information for the employees.
column4: The help all try... this place has a structured menu that was assembled by the BEAN COUNTERS Used 2 B...

column3: Pricey and a bit loud but wonderful food and servicce
column4: Great food and service. Pricey but their King Crab is the best I have had. Our party of 6 all enjoyed their meal. The service was attentive and helpful. Crowded and a bit noisy but all in all a nice evening and we would return
It was late at night and had to sit at the bar but we would definitely eat there again. Very good food and decent service.
The meal was excellent, wonderful waiter and staff. We took my Mother there for Mother's Day - great time. She was happy, which made me happy
Always try to make time for a lunch or dinner stop here. The food is fantastic, the atmosphere and service excellent. They have a great lunch menu that lets you try all the best items for a bargain.

column3: Dinner with my wife We had a very good time the service was great the food was great
column4: Excellent seafood and steaks were like melted butter very good Service was great everybody was friendly and the food was outstanding
The location is super, choices of seafood amazing and fresh delicious meals. Love it. Being in the Midwest its not cheap though.. but good
Was in Chicago for business. Had a free evening and followed Trip advisor as I normally do. Had a great experience. Very good steak. Nice salad and all in all good experience.

We loved Joe‚Äôs in Miami and have not been disappointed here in Chicago. Great seafood, ordered the grilled seafood platter - high quality super fresh products. All sides were delicious, Key Lime pie ...loved it! Great service, relaxing atmosphere. Definitely recommending !!!
The absolute best steak I‚Äôve ever had. Also ordered the oysters which we‚Äôre phenomenal. Service and atmosphere was great! Would def go back.
Great place just off the Magnificent Mile. Great wine list and service. I'd highly recommend the Florida stone crab.

Just as I remembered from a few years back. Excellent food and atmosphere. Professional waiters/staff. Denise was great. Expensive but worth it. Save room for or start with dessert bc they're that good.
The staff was wonderful and the food was delicious. It‚Äôs a restaurant I will go to again. It‚Äôs not a place for everyday but I would go there for special occasions.
Excellent crab legs. Service as usual, 10 out of 10. Had a relaxing Sunday afternoon getting our fix of crab.
The staff is great and I can't say enough about the food! Steak and seafood is my first choice, presentation was awesome as well.
Excellent seafood bisque and stone crabs a bit pricey but worth it on special occasions. My wife and I went for dinner and lunch.
Try the Madagascar shrimp if they are available. You won‚Äôt believe what your seeing and tasting. Great service and wine selection.
You can't go wrong here. Best, Fresh Seafood and steaks and fried chicken are also to die for! Yes! Go to Joe's for Fried Chicken!!
Good place to go in downtown Chicago for seafood. Decent ambiance, good selection, and great service.
But very, very expensive. Yes, there are too many tourists, conventioneers and suburbanites, but the steaks and seafood are best in class.

I haven't been to Joe's for more than a year an lately visited again for a business dinner. The food and service were great as usual. You'll find the best king crab legs in Chicago at Joe's. Glad to have gone back
A great old fashioned seafood and steakhouse great food and very professional staff. Highly recommended
We came here as a large group and the service was excellent and food was wonderful. Pricey, but that's expected at this level.
We had a really ‚ÄòOld Chicago‚Äô experience concerning the atmosphere and a fantastic culinary experience! A must in Chicago ! Sara and Luca
We ate here for our anniversary weekend. They offered us complementary champagne and deserts for our anniversary. The entrees were excellent. Definitely a place to eat at while in Chicago.
Pricey but totally worth it. Get the Dover Sole, it‚Äôs amazing. Also got the hash browns and a porterhouse for 2. Cooked perfectly. Mary, our server, was terrific.

This is my favorite place in the City. Great bartenders and staff. The Tuna Tartar, Sea bass, Scallops and bone in filet are our favorites. Save room for dessert the Havana dream pie is well worth the extra time on the treadmill!!

column3: Excellent hostess great service and decent food
column4: Out hostess was what one expects from American service. Top notch. Food was tasty fresh and reasonably priced. We got a free key lime pie which was icing on cake. I have been to one in miami. Chicago one oozes more class and finess

Fantastic. What a surprising find! This place is 5 minutes from my hotel. Affordable price and fantastic meal. It was amazing to learn that stone crabs can grow their claws. The soup is unique - tomato-based clam chowder.
Really good food enjoyed the food All of us Enjoyed I will recommend an extra appreciation for the service

My husband and I usually make this one of our go-to restaurants when we‚Äôre in Chicago. It‚Äôs an easy walk from our hotel and wonderful food. We went for a late lunch and then stopped in again after Theatre. Wonderful!

This was a business meal for 8. The wine and drinks were good. The service was top of the line. The food was right on for everyone and this includes sides and main meal. There is no question I would go back
Great clubby steak and seafood restaurant, which offers Stone Crabs when they are in season. It is pricey, but the quality of service and cuisine are first rate. It is a wonderful place!
Joe‚Äôs has great food! Everything we tasted was good. Wait staff is so friendly and fun!! My go to spot every time I visit Chi!
Unbelievable service, quality and selection of food. Energetic, fun atmosphere. A must for down town dining!

Just in for a late lunch and ordered Branzino, sauteed spinach and two glasses of white wine. All very much OK but the waiter kept pushing for extras throughout, from appetizer through dessert and coffee. It detracted from an otherwise nice lunch.

Busy place with top class food. There were no tables available but we got a seat at the bar right away. The crab bisque was beautiful, followed by a superb filet and king crab. The King Crab Louis salad was another winner.
