column3: Fine dining in a downtown setting
column4: Excellent menu choices, professionally served. Feels like you‚Äôve stepped back in time when fine dining was a special occasion.

column3: Busy, Busy, But Good Food & Service!
column4: Enjoyed the food, but weekends are very busy. Our waiter was very helpful in seeing that we were seated eventually at a booth instead of a table.

Top of the line high class steak and seafood but just wait until you experience their charming and witty wait staff. The servers are all very classy conversationalists that add just as much to the experience.

column3: Always a great trip to Joe‚Äôs
column4: Always awesome. Love the buckets. Your choice: shrimp, fish, crab, lobster. A few different ways to prepare the seafood. The buckets have corn and potatoes, yum!
Our waiter was so informative as to how the food was prepared we were eager to try multiple menu items. All were delicious if not better than advertised! Great experience Joe‚Äôs! Will be back soon.
I have been here a few times and is one of my favorites places to take friends from out of town! The stone crab is amazing!

Excellent food and service. Pricey but definitely worthy it . Steaks are extremely good - my husband‚Äô s favorite . Boston Cream Pie is a must . Recommend making reservation as place is quite busy even on a week night .
We go to Joe‚Äôs in Miami and this is close to that place. Food is perfect. In season the stone crab is wonderful. And our favorite is Keylime pie. Takes us back to Florida.
Joe‚Äôs menu is that of a typical seafood restaurant- at lunch the steak sandwich is fabulous as well!!!!
My wife loves the Dover Sole. i love the crab legs. Service is excellent. Plan ahead. Reservations are not easy to get.
Amazing spot with some of the best stone crabs and steak in the city. Wine list is very nice and has a wide variety.

Very nice atmosphere, great location, the entire staff was awesome, food was great. Appetizers, Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms, and Ahi Tuna Tartare was awesome, The waitress was very helping in making decisions with our decisions as well. Steak was cooked to my perfection.
Always a great spot to celebrate a birthday, host a dinner party or hanging out the bar. They have a few private rooms for special events. The food is always on point and the service is excellent.

column3: Still one of my all time favorites!
column4: Great service and excellent food. This place never disappoints. Definitely treat yourself to a cocktail with dinner.
Definitely a must in Chicago! Delicious food and great service! Will definitely go back again and highly recommend to others!
Birthday dinner for my sister, she really enjoyed the crab legs. We had amazing service, great food and atmosphere. Highly recommend it!

First time in Chicago and this is the first meal we ate. Service and food were outstanding. Party of ten and no one disappointed in appetizers, entrees and dessert. Definitely recommend this place. Well worth the money.
Good quality food and service. Popular restaurant for dinner. Seafood is fresh. Good place to dine for locals too, but weekend can be too busy.

We were 10 people so had our own private party. Service was great and food was very good. It‚Äôs quite noisy so if you are looking for something a bit more quiet, this probably it‚Äôs the best choice for you.

As usual, the waitstaff were super attentive, and the food was pretty flawless. We had steak, lobster and crab and all were delivered exactly as described in the menu. No delays, no issues with food temp or how well the food was cooked.
If you like a variety of seafood, Joe's is the place for you. The seafood is fresh and the service was great.

The food is excellent and the drinks are good too. Always busy but a great dinner place for steak and seafood. You really can't go wrong. Just be ready to spend a little extra on the family, but look at it as a treat!

column3: Great restaurant with top notch service!
column4: Chilean sea bass is delicious. Fried chicken is wonderful too & the lobster bisque soup is so tasty.

column3: Go for the snow crab and the sea bass
column4: My office is near Joes which is a dangerous thing! The snow crab is delicious; I also recommend the whaler appetizer (seafood tower) and especially the sea bass‚Äîit‚Äôs like buttah! The service is as amazing as the food.
From the time we walked in until we left it was a great experience. Food was delicious. Staff was attentive. We enjoyed everything from the appetizers to the main dish. You can't go wrong!!!
The food is super amazing. The corn and potatoes are a must have..but the crab...I am getting excited thinking about it. Amazing food...Amazing service.
So delicious! Seafood is awesome, steak is amazing, and desert is fabulous! Went twice before theatre shows, and we were not disappointed.
This restaurant is our family favorite for special occasions. The steak, fish, crab, etc. are all excellent all the time. Can't go wrong. Most highly recommend.
Stone crabs was delicious I prefer warm but my husband cold. Nice clean place.Highly recommend!! Florida stone crabs is The Best!
Unbelievable service, quality, selection. Energetic fun atmosphere. A must for down town dining. Always crowded but great bar to have a drink or 2 before seated.

column3: great city vibe and complete culinary experience
column4: We came to Joe,s right after the opera performance. Welcoming atmosphere and prompt and attentive service along with fresh sea food and well executed beverages made the whole experience so complete. Consistency of this establishment is truly remarcable

column3: Joe's for Crab Can't Be Beat
column4: It's clubby, very professional wait staff who present you with totally delicious food. IF you like all things crab--head over there. Make reservations well in advance--weekends are crowded. It's a little pricey--but I think the value proposition is sound.

Waiters in tuxes, but jovial atmosphere. Favorite of pro athletes. Fish preparations that are always excellent, very tasty sides, and irresistable desserts that should not be missed, as they taste as good as they look. They even offer half desserts, so you can try two!

column3: Consistently outstanding seafood, every single time, year after year
column4: Many of my best meals have been at Joe's over the last 20 years. Wonderfully fresh seafood, always perfectly prepared and elegant atmosphere.
The atmosphere of this establishment was superb. The staff are extraordinarily professional and carry themselves with very confident respect for their patrons. The food was unbelievable.
Stone crab was disappointing service was good slightly noisy but doable.some what crammed.i would not recommend
My friend ate the stone crabs and said they were fantastic. I had a steak and key lime pie. Beyond delicious and the service was perfect! If you want a reliably good meal, check this place out!

Great service, super fresh seafood, nice atmosphere. It‚Äôs quite fancy and the atmosphere isn‚Äôt very loud or exciting but makes for a good setting to enjoy your food. Had the grilled seafood platter, great lobster and scallops! Big servings! Would happily recommend and return.
Stone crab was disappointing service was good slightly noisy but doable.some what crammed.i would not recommend

On business, had 14 for dinner at Joe‚Äôs and unfortunately only 10 showed. That didn‚Äôt waiver the great service of Colleen and team Joe‚Äôs! Amazing meals - covering just about every corner of the menu. Steaks, seafood (including crab claws), salads etc. All the guests...More

My husband and I just celebrated our anniversary. We decided to go to Joe's to have a late lunch. We requested and were accommodated with a quiet corner booth. Our server, Ryan, was absolutely awesome. He was attentive and well informed, warm and friendly. The food, as usual, was delicious. We had the tuna tartar (always a go-to), filet, New York strip and asparagus. All were cooked to perfection. The service is always top notch; the atmosphere is delightful and we will continue to return. It is just a lovely place to have a meal - lunch or dinner - it's always a treat.

We went here for a drink and some appetizers before going to the Blues Festival this weekend and enjoyed the experience. My wife had a scotch on the rocks (nice scotch and bourbon, etc list) and I had some wine. We shared the crab cake and Joe's chopped salad. Th food was very good, but as expected, expensive. The service was good, as was the atmosphere.

column3: So busy you have to walk sideways to make it to the restroom!
column4: I guess if you like crab, this is the place. I tasted it and confirmed the fact,it was average and if this was supposed to be special, I can continue to pass especially at the cost of this plate. Now onto GREAT waiter, one of the best. Despite the crowd, we had a quiet corner table ( guess you need to get there at 4:15 like we did (with reservations) Dinner was good and each of us enjoyed it. Would I recommend, no, but as you walked sideways and had to move around waiters to exit...nobody needs my opinion....

This is always on our list when we visit Chicago but it's always too full by the time we realize we want to go. We got lucky that there was a local sports team playing that night and we were able to get a table on the day of.  We were there with another couple and our 18 month old son. He was well behaved based on his standards but still threw a few things here and there the staff didn't mind at all and actually seemed like they enjoyed having a baby in the restaurant. I wouldn't normally recommend taking young kids here but we had no other choice as out of townies.  The food is amazing, we had so many different things from the menu because we wanted to try them all including the Chicken which was great. Anything seafood including the stone crab is amazing, you can order anything and not go wrong. Definitely will visit again when I'm back in Chicago.
My friend ate the stone crabs and said they were fantastic. I had a steak and key lime pie. Beyond delicious and the service was perfect! If you want a reliably good meal, check this place out!

At 5:30pm on a Thursday, this restaurant was already packed with no open tables. I happily sat in the front area of the restaurant along the side to people-watch by myself. I enjoyed The Whale appetizer with a sampling of chilled seafood and medium sized stone crabs (larger sizes available). I didn't expect to, but ended up having wonderful conversation with ladies sitting on either side of me who were also dining alone. My tip for you is that the seafood salad and pies are available in half portions, though it is not mentioned in the menu. They must be known for their pies...I tried half a slice of coconut cream pie with a cappuccino and it was very tasty. My meal, with ice tea, was very pricy so be prepared for that, but the food was delicious.

column3: still high food quality, service not on the same level
column4: Very good bar service in the foyer, like always excellent quality of the srandard dishes, especially the alaskan king crab which is always a highlight and the signature steaks. Service was not on the same level, they forgot the dessert from two of us - maybe intentionally because it was 11:30 p.m. - but they could have told us.

Great service, super fresh seafood, nice atmosphere. It‚Äôs quite fancy and the atmosphere isn‚Äôt very loud or exciting but makes for a good setting to enjoy your food. Had the grilled seafood platter, great lobster and scallops! Big servings! Would happily recommend and return.
Awesome spot for lunch. Service is Excellent, ambiance very nice. Clean throughout. Little pricey, but food is awesome. Recommend the steak salad, best i ever had. Location is perfect too.
It is a little pricy but worth it. Oysters are fresh and delicious. I would also recommend the lobsters. Stone crabs taste good but I wont order it again, its a bit overpriced.

Loved everything about Joe‚Äôs! Excellent service from our fun and helpful hostess Kaleen, beautiful stone crab claws and seafood platter and good value for the quality of food we had. Plus lovely atmosphere and old-worldly charm....Chicago is so lucky!
3 business associates. All had different items. All exceptional. Service amazing. Joe‚Äôs chop salad incredible. Grilled halibut fantastic. Lyonnaise potato amazing. Just a fantastic meal.

column3: Great seafood, friendly staff, amazing pie
column4: Everything we ate here was wonderful and our wait staff was friendly and helpful. It is pricey so make sure you look at menu/pricing before you go. Loved it

Came here for lunch on the last day of our Chicago trip. Crabs were very fresh and highlight of the meal. Crab cake and beef sandwich were also good. Crab bisque was disappointing and tasted like grocery store variety. Overall a good but pricey meal

column3: Delicious food and generous portions in River North
column4: Having read the reviews we were not disappointed. A wonderful seafood lunch (advise preceding it with a long walk as portion sizes are generous). Shrimp de jonghe and colossal lump crab cake particular highlights. Would entirely recommend.
This is one place we repeat whenever we are in Chicago. You absolutely cannot go wrong with the stone crab, fried asparagus and key lime pie!!!
An excellent restaurant. Good food, great service and a nice ambience. The crab claws and jumbo cakes were absolutely fantastic. A decent wine list too. Highly recommended.

Great Food. Great Service. Great Ambiance. Maitre'd, bartender, server, bus boys... all so very attentive. Well worth the drive for us from western burbs to Joe's. We dine here at least 4X a year. Never disappointed!

column3: Seafood & steak at Joe‚Äôs Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab - Chicago.
column4: Great seafood & one of the best steak you can taste in Chicago. Service was also good with friendly and professional staff.

Reservations required! Service was excellent! Terribly noisy! Proximity to other diners - and hearing every word of their vulgar conversation and our inability to have conversation definitely made the evening just average. Won‚Äôt dine there again.

Make reservations- a top quality restaurant. Enjoyed steak as wll as seafood. Excellent service. Made reservations but went on different day-they were kind enough to fit us in. Atmosphere was really top notch.
Ordered rib eye! Superb and grilled to perfection. Also the service staff was very accommodating... I will come back and try the stone crab!

Simply an amazing meal in a great atmosphere. The stone crabs are everything , the 1 pound Alaskan crab was delicious and the 24 ounce bone-in rib eye was perfect. Just a great meal, though expensive, totally worth it!

Went because it was highly recommended, and with good reason. Food was out of this world! Menu is pricy but everything worth it. Steaks, seafood, and more. Stone crab is a must. Good atmosphere. Very busy when I went. Well worth it though!
Really yummy place to eat, on the expensive side but worth it. The grill tomatoes are to die for. We will be back!
Everything from the stuffed mushrooms for an appetizer to the peanut butter pie was superb! The lobster tails and stone crab were phenomenal!

We went here for lunch, 4 of us and our server Goda ( sorry if it is spelled wrong ) was excellent and very professional. We enjoyed our lunch very much and especially the key lime pie desert. Thank you

Chicago is and always will be in my heart. This restaurant will always be on my Chicago to go to dining places. Great for business dinners or date nights. Food is scrumptious and staff was very accommodating and friendly!

Truly enjoyed nephews birthday celebration with family. They have an awesome atmosphere. The seafood is delicious. They had my nephew ride a pogo stick around the restaurant. Delicious dips and great seafood a must have experience.
Really nice restaurant, upscale. You have to valet your car but it's downtown Chicago. Great steaks and seafood. Large portions and great sides.

Every Christmas Eve a group of 10 of us come to Joe‚Äôs for dinner. It‚Äôs always fabulous excellent service delicious food and first class. We have been doing this for 8 years and already booked next year.
Had a wonderful dinner, good ambiance. Short Uber ride to the Loop for sightseeing or a River Walk in the River North neighborhood.
This is one of my favorites I will come here every week if I could , I love this place ,.. Fenomano food good service good vibes and the most important thing staff always on point...
The food is always consistently great, impeccable service and lots of energy I the restaurant. Perfect for celebrations, business dinners. $$$$.
Awesome very nice atmosphere food was very good service was really good I would definitely recommend it to any and everyone

We've been going to Joe's for more than 15 yrs. This is my husband's favorite restaurant. Excellent steaks, seafood, sides. Service is the best. We go often in the summer for their delicious seafood salad.
Among all the dry aged steak I have tried in town, this is one of the best. Excellent service and good wine menu. I haven't tried anything else but the steak
Nice restaurant in the centre of Chicago. Pleasant service, good food and nice ambiance. Really looking forward to be there next time we visit Chicago.
Joe‚Äôs Seafood, Prime Steak and Stone Crab is expensive but worth the price! I recommend the filet and Alaskan King crab legs.

Joe‚Äôs Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab is the perfect restaurant for a big night on the town! Stone Crab is amazing, salads unique, various fish dishes interesting, steak great, and desserts delicious! One of Chicago‚Äôs finest, classic restaurants!

Always busy but if you can snag a table in the front bar, you are still assured of quality service and food. The seafood salad is outstanding as is the seared tuna. Can't beat the steaks and save room for the Havana Cream Pie. Delicious.

stop already why write a book service is great food good omg no no no no no no no no no I refuse to write a book a few words is golden good food good service so buy advertisement if that's what you want
other than the crowd you can always count on the service and food being going there for more than 10 years for special occasion since its sort of pricey
OMG, Joe‚Äôs did it again service was great and the food again and again was cooked to precision. Our table had the ocean sea bass, cooked to perfection steak, and fried chicken.
Everything was perfect! The meal, the service, the cocktails! The ambiance is comfortable and relaxing. It is perfect for special occasions or a romantic dinner for two! We'll be back!
Our favorite restaurant both in Chicago and Las Vegas. The food is great. The atmosphere is friendly, and the staff is always wonderful.
Between the menu items, the taste of the food and the service, this is consistently my favorite restaurant in Chicago

At Joes the bone in ribeye is excellent! The sides are also available in halforders ( not mentioned on menu) but Jennie‚Äôs potatoes excellent It‚Äôs always busy but if you request a quiet booth sometimes your lucky& we were Always a winner!

Was Leary of this place compare to Ruth Chris or Morton‚Äôs. What a pleasant surprise, this place was perfect.Food was delicious, clean, nice staff , waiters.I would definitely place this joint along with arc or Mortons.. It‚Äôs pricey but you get what you pay for
the food was very good. the atmosphere was very nice, very subdued....not loud. We had an enjoyable and wonderful. We all loved it.
Great wine list, service is 4-stars. A plus, try the ribeye steak sandwich, you will not be disappointed.
The best crab legs in Chicago. A bit pricey but so worth it. The atmosphere was warm and inviting. A perfect way to spend a Saturday night!
It is hard to put it into words but since I have to in Chicago it is the BEST fine dinning for miles around from the minute you walk in the door
This was my 1st time to this restaurant and the food is very good especially if u enjoy seafood as much as I do.

The atmosphere, the waiters and the food were perfect . The crabcakes never disappoint, they were amazing as always. I can‚Äôt have lunch or dinner at Joe‚Äôs without having a piece of their perfect key lime pie so worth every calorie.
From the moment you walk in, until you walk out, and everything in-between, you will be impressed! Keep it up!
Joes has the best stone crabs and side dishes. The service is superb and the atmosphere is very romantic yet vibrant
Tonight was my second visit to the restaurant. The service was slow. The short ribs were fatty and overpriced (and small). They weren‚Äôt a great value. It was disappointing.
My wife and I had dinner Friday evening. Fabulous meal and service. The way things should be! Great fish and sides. We each had 1/2 piece of pie, Key Lime and Peanut butter. Wow! We'll be back.
Visited with friends for dinner. Had filet Oscar which comes with a steak and crab. Both were very tasty. Great service as always.
Celebrated my birthday here a few years ago. I remember good being very good. Crowded and always busy; but worth the wait,

The food was absolutely delicious.The steak was tender and juicy, the lobster was perfect. It was a little pricy for the portion. We went New Year's Eve. The atmoshere was great and they gave free Champaign.
Excellent service and delicious with a great atmosphere. Gives a nostalgic kind of feel that links well with the city.
Reliably excellent food and service. Highly recommend to anyone wanting a great meal. You will not be disappointed..

Joe's is a classic and always always delicious! The stone crab and crab legs are out of this world. The steaks tender and juicy. Sides are served family style. They have an extensive wine list. Don't forget pie for dessert
Food is consistently good as is the service. The bisque is one of my faves. Love the pies for dessert too.
We make an annual trip to this place & it doesn‚Äôt disappoint. Great food, great service. We have came with a group & and were seated in party room.

column3: Great spot for fish or beef
column4: Had a great holiday lunch the food and service were excellent. I had the price fix lunch. Good value I thought.

column3: High end steakhouse with family atmosphere
column4: Fine dining. I recommend king crab legs and cocktails. Excellent service all around. Reservations are a must as this place stays packed.
A very cheerful place to visit for some holiday sipping and tasty appetizers. A good business crowd and great conversation over Christmas cheer.
The best service I have had in years. The stone crab is fantastic!! warm atmosphere I highly recommend....
The fine dining restaurant franchise eatery in the Streeterville neignborhood was just what I hoped it would be and more.
This place never disappoints. The service is of the highest caliber in the city, and the food the same.
What a great place for a special dinner. Loved all the great seafood. Sides were also wonderful. Close to everything. Will definitely go back again.

They don't have "& Stone Crab" in their name for nothing. You definitely must try the stone crab! I have dined here a few times but never tried the stone crab until this trip. Won't make that mistake again. Great food.
Best place downtown. Excellent service, great food, great atmosphere. Our waiter Frank was THE best, knowledgeable, timely and very attentive. We will forever done here whenever in Chicago.
Food was superb. Our waiter, Tim, was outstanding. Everything he recommended, we would order again. Look forward to visiting again.
when in chi town this is my favorite restaurant reservations a must and do well in advance nice wine list great service terrific atmosphere food never disappoints

column3: It‚Äôs all about the Stone Crab
column4: Make a reservation - this place is always busy because it‚Äôs great. The stone crab is always a hit - make it your meal. They offer other dishes, all good - always worthily.
Great place to eat for special occasion. They make their coleslaw right at the table. The best i have ever had and their stone crab is also great
We came for dinner last week. Everything was amazing!! Our server was very attentive. Definitely make a reservation so you can get in. You won‚Äôt regret it!
My family of ten came here for dinner and had a delicious meal. The service was impeccable. Although pricey the food was very good.
the food was great, the Dover sole was excellent, It was nice not to be rushed.A special occasion was being celebrated. Waiter was friendly and knowledgeable about the menu. I would come back.

Wonderful! A slab and sides to satisfy the whole family. They do some really imaginative things with steak and potatoe. The specials are worth seeking out since the waitresses don't always point them out.
Loved it! Service and entrees were unbelievable! Great place for dinner, not too loud but relaxed and cool atmosphere.
Lucky to get a table with no reservation for 4 tired tourists. Collen, our server, was professional and enjoyable. Food was great.

We come to Chicago about once a month and have never been here before. It was amazing! The atmosphere is perfect, we were told it‚Äôs always extremely crowded. Make a reservation before you go, the bar area is very small!

Excellent service. Great food. I love Joe's especially when Im with family and friends but not on a date. This restaurant is bright, well lit, packed, always crowded and loud. So if your looking for a sexy intimate place this is not it.
As a frequent patron, myself and guests have always enjoyed excellent food and service. Highly recommended.

My employer loves this place. We have been having our last 3 Christmas parties here. Never get tired of this place. their food is delicious. Great atmosphere as well. Their staff is awesome. It is right off the Magnificent mile.

column3: Where the food is Delicios and the service is attentive!
column4: We‚Äôve never had a bad meal or bad service at Joe‚Äôs! The waitstaff is top notch and the food never disappoints!
Went for business dinner. Excellent service. Very lively. Had the true Dover Sole perfectly prepared. Even had a wonderful Pumpkin based desert. Highly recommend.
The food is excellent especially the crab cakes. The ambience is wonderful. The service is excellent as well. I have been there countless times over the years.

Great Service, and food. What else can I say? Great Service, and food. What else can I say? Great Service, and food. What else can I say? Great Service, and food. What else can I say? Great Service, and food. What else can I say?

The food was absolutely delicious. I believe the fried chicken was the best I have ever had. The steaks were cooked to perfection. The sides were very generous. The wait staff was very knowledgeable. The atmosphere was very energetic.

From the time you walk in you are made to feel important. Customer Service was excellent. Even with the place being crowded, they still never dropped their high standards. Drinks and food were excellent. Would definitely come back.

column3: Best service and king crab legs!
column4: Food is amazing (king crab legs are a must! Great oysters and appetizers)and service is top notch We will definitely keep on coming back!
We took my son and his friend here for his birthday . The stone crabs were excellent . Service was great too . I would highly recommend for special occasion dining.
A solid place amongst nice stores and other restaurants in the River North area. I like their seafood salad. I also like it bc it‚Äôs only a few blocks away from where I live!
I am a total foodie and I would put this restaurant in my top 10. Service was amazing and the food unbelievable. I had the seafood grill platter.
This is a great place to eat in Chicago. After dinner, treat yourself or your party to the key lime pie. It's wonderful.

One of our favorite restaurants in town. The food is consistently good and the service is great too. Although many items are expensive, one can find some items that are less expensive so worth trying. Also they are very accommodating. Just ask.
Alaskan King Crab Legs worth my weight in butter! Although I asked them to take the chill off (and serve warm), the staff obliged and then I gorged!
We really enjoyed the WHOLE fried fish. It was so tasty and very generous large portion. I would highly recommend this a d the oysters.

We very much enjoyed our special occasion meal here. The steaks and seafood were done perfectly. It was stone crab season so they were very fresh. The room is a bit noisy and somewhat a crowded feeling but the staff are very attentive. Definitely recommended!
Started with fresh East coast oysters YUM. Then on to Caesar salad to share, everyone enjoyed. I had the filet (12 ounce) cooked perfect MR. DOVER SOLE great. Great dinner with family. DO IT

Enjoyed a great meal at Joes. Upfront bar/lounge allows for easy access to cocktails while you wait for table service. Wine selection was great. Crab was great, taste very similar to dungeness crab from pacific northwest. Steaks were done nicely and side dishes didn't disappoint.
One of my most favorite places in Chicago. Fine dining, elegant interior and a really nice and attentive staff. Food is absolutely delicious.
The dry rub ribeye with the bone in, 5 stars. Service, 5 stars. Pure Chicago class, Miami done right!
First time visit to chicago location but food and service was excellent. Unfortunately I was a week early for the freshest claws, season opens oct 15. Ones they had were great anyway.

6 of us had dinner here. Service great. Wine list spot on with awesome selection. I had the stone crabs/oysters. Awesome. Also had chilean sea bass. Perfect. Great time, dont miss this place if in Chicago

Old fashioned and great service but I honestly thought the food was no more than good and a tad expensive for what was on offer. Very busy early evening therefore well liked by many but personally wouldn‚Äôt rush back.
The sea food and the steaks are amazing but one other thing are the starters and the potatoes which are amazing, and dessert? The lime key pie is the best I‚Äôve ever tried.
Good Steak. Romantic but super over priced. Good Location. Make sure to reserve before you go. Service was ok. Nothing spectacular.

column3: Best crab claws and crab cake ever
column4: This place was incredible . Top notch service from our delightful waiter Danny. The food was unbelievably delicious. Call early for a reservation. Best meal in Chicago. Score!

This is a deluxe experience in a traditional steak and seafood restaurant. The food is of high quality and the ambience is luxurious. You don't go here for innovative and creative food. You go for impeccable execution of classics.
Went to Joes for my mother in laws birthday. As always never disappointed. Fantastic service and food. The specials offer new choices so you can keep going back. Great wine selection as well.
Service and food spectacular! Best crab claws i ever had. The portions of side orders are family size and the drinks are potent.
From soup to nuts the dining experience is amazing. Classic old school service and vibe. Great Steaks and seafood. never had a bad experience
This place is expensive but you may taste good steaks. Burgers are also very tasty and they cheap compared to steaks.

welcome is great...very polite staff and friendly...they do their best to serve in the best possible way...we had grilled tomatoes filled with spinach and topped with cheese and they're so delicious...stone crab that are always delicious...another great experience...it is highly recommended
Excellent, as expected. We went on a Monday making reservation, and it was completely full! Very good, fast and professional attention. And spectacular food
Enjoyed oysters on the half shell, crab, and a nice glass of cabernet. It was?all God but a bit spendy.
Kind of the place to dine at whilst visiting Chicago. Lovely fish dishes and the meat...well it is Chicago after all....bloody good. Go there.

Great food, great service. Visited 3 out of the 5 days we were in Chicago. Steak tartar is the BEST! Pairs perfect with their martinis. Late lunch us the best deal in Chicago. Server's remembered us on each subsequent visit.
welcoming classy. service is great. team is friendly. as for food i had one if the best meat ever. if ur in Chicago don't miss it

One of Chicago's best seafood restaurants in the downtown area. The Crab Claws are a must have as a main course or an appetizer. In addition, their steaks and fish filets are well prepared main courses. Enjoy the experience.
Joe's is one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. The food is absolutely wonderful. You will never find better crabcakes anywhere. Everything they serve is terrific.

Our most impressive restaurant of the weekend. We had stone crabs, steak, Chilean Sea Bass, King Crab for entrees and several appetizers as well. Excellent service, great wine service, e celebrate food and desserts. An not imagine a better evening.
I took the crab stuffed shrimps and the crab bisque with Rioja Wine are over priced. Good food highly recommended
What a great steak, wine and service! Fantastic place to enjoy real Chicago steakhouse atmosphere. Even if it is quite expensive it is worth it.
We go for lunch and do the special and order a side of claws for and appetizer. Steak is always as well as the service.

I've been to better steakhouses, but not by much. First class. Waitress Nada was exceptional. Steak was perfectly prepared. as were the sides. My only small complaint is that the fried green tomatoes were prepared using an Italian seasoning. That should have been disclosed somewhere.
Nice gluten free menu. Prices are comparable to other steak houses. We had crab legs and scallops. Both dishes were amazing. Great service. We would definitely go back.
great place to dine in Chicago, really expensive, service really good but the guys in the front desk are not so welcoming

This was a very busy restaurant especially for a Wednesday night. It was hustlng and bustling but the food was excellent (Filet Mignon and Lobster Tails) and the service was personal and prompt. A fabulous evening.

column3: Just when you think you had great steaks elsewhere
column4: The VERY best steak I ever had. Forgot Morton's of the Steak world. Literally melts in your mouth. I didn't really care for the specials [sides] but this is my new go to place when traveling here.

Great restaurant. Having a kids menu was a plus. The crab legs were sweet, full of meat and delicious! The restaurant itself felt somewhat cramped for space, but luckily we were given a booth in the corner. Attentive staff. We will return again!

Booked for 5:30 pm table was ready when we arrived. Server was very knowledgable about menu. Made recommendations on appetizers wine pairing and side dishes. All were excellent. Provided a complimentary dessert. Great value for a first class restaurant.
We found this restaurant thanks to tripadvisor, the quality of the food was amazing ! If you go, do not forget to ask for bread !
We did a private room for dinner as part of a Chicago bachelor party. Food was amazing, drinks were flowing, staff was on their game!

column3: Always a Solid dependable high end dinner.
column4: Always busy, a bit pricey, but always a special place. Seafood and steaks always prepared perfectly. A creative wine list that wait staff is very familiar with.
I went to Joe's Seafood for a stake, but there are not to many options for meat. The stone crab is a must try.
Went here for dinner based on the reviews. Was pleasantly surprised by the cost and impressed by the quality. Steve was an awesome waiter and his suggestions were spot on!
I've been coming here for 14 years and it never disappoints. Excellent service, crowded, hubbub, steak, chowder, key lime pie melange.
One of the best steaks I ever had, 1lb of juicy tender meat! One of the best places to hit when your in Chicago, I def recommend it with a cold one. Keep up the Awesome work!
Stone crabs were a treat, service was great, my fillet was a little more done than I'd ordered but still very tender.
Excellent Food and Service! Had delicious fresh gazpacho. Corn is great. So are baked tomatoes. And of course - stone crab! Waiter was incredibly attentive without being the least bit intrusive.
The service was excellent. Best steak I've ever had. The Joe's steak seasoning is on point. Great place for a romantic dinner
Food at Joe's is always fantastic. Me and my girlfriend shared scallops, king crab legs, and stone crab

we had carry out but let me tell ya! ,,,,class class class..... location location location!!!! empeccable crab biques,so delish i can not spell right, lol the lobster and shrimp are first quality!!! simply out spoken service the atmosphere say polished!! what a gem!!!
Went for a quick supper after arriving in town about 9 pm. Quick service in the bar area. Great bisque, Oysters Rockefeller, and a lemon drop martini for a late supper.

column3: The classic dishes are still working
column4: like always excellent Food, not Gourmet but classic dishes perfectly cooked with the usual experienced Service. Always worth a visit.
Came in for a quick steak. It was very loud... unpleasantly so, so we left without ordering. Atmosphere at front desk unappealing.
It's an expensive restaurant, but I like seafood dishes, so everytime I come to Chicago I go there. I think that if you want something special and with a variety of meat or seafood, that's the place.

We had a wonderful meal here. The food was amazing and the steaks cooked to perfection. My kids have peanut and treenut allergies and they were very careful about everything. The service was amazing and took a team approach. I would definitely eat here again.
I do not frequent this restaurant, but every time I do the food and service are always great. Good drinks too.
We dined at Joe's last night.. Both my wife and I had great meals.. The seafood salad is way worth the price.. very good.. The service was great and the overall bill was reasonable..
As always, Joes remains one of the premier restaurants in Chicago. Service was outstanding, and there were no surprises with the food. Just prepared perfectly.
This restaurant had both reservation fine dining and open seating available. The food was expensive, but well worth it. The service was fantastic even though we were in the open seating area.

column3: Best part of the food journey on our vacation by far.
column4: Great service, perfect mixed cocktails, the most amazing seafood. Worth every penny spent. Stone crab, amazing, the mustard dip, wow. Who knew, crab with mustard? Ahi tartar, so fresh, so light, wonderful. Crab bisque, so wonderfully creamy.

column3: What fun! A step back in time
column4: Classic steak house. Our waitress, Denise was fantastic. Food from the salad thru dessert was outstanding. Word to the west coast people - share sides ..... portions are midwestern not west coast size !! Highly recommend on many levels. Food service ambience
We enjoyed Joe's Seafood in Las Vegas and tried it in Chicago. As expected was a wonderful dinner. Especially recommend the seafood platter it was phenomenon!
Very nice place, waiters were very attentive and food was amazing. I had the halibut, would recommend. Also the Key Lime pie was excellent.
we ate here for dinner during the week, it was quite crowded but we had a reservation and they took us right in. We had drinks and an app and desert. Everything was top shelf.

Enjoyed dinner for five at Joe's, one of our favorite restaurants in Chicago. It's pricey, but the service is great and the food is excellent. Can recommend the NY Strip, Filet Oscar, and Filet of Sole. Don't leave without having the pie. Worth it.

If you want top notch stone crabs, or fantastic steaks, this is the place. Great apps and sides. The BLT salad is excellent. You must have the hash browns...done perfectly. Great service. Reservations well in advance are a must.

column3: One of the best Restaurants in Chicago
column4: We really enjoyed having dinner here, king crab quality is excellent, you must try the crab cakes, tuna tartar, and all of the fish are amazing.

column3: I finally got to try stone crabs!
column4: And they were delicious! Actually everything we ordered was great. The service was fabulous and prices were in line with what you would expect.

Wonderful wait staff, fine dining, delicious food. Be prepared for the price that comes along with high end restaurants and beware of the very small closet-sized ladies room. Five stars because of the food and stone crabs!

Good food steaks are delicious But very noisy and crowdy Service is very good and the staff is friendly If you are in chicago you may pass Need reservation and all guests should be present in order to be seated !!!

Really enjoyed our visit. The service is great, and the atmosphere feels like something out of a 60s movie. Tuna tartare and bisque were amazing starters, and the steaks are beautifully prepared. Highly recommend...
22.95. Fish and chips. Worth every single penny!! Three generous chunks of perfectly fried fish. Unexplainable crunchy texture. Amazing. Simply amazing!
Nice restaurant. Tasty food, charming location, but the service was slow and not particularly efficient. Recommended restaurant in Chicago.
The steak's were phenominal, service was exceptional and the price beat most other highly rated steakhouses. Highly recommend this restaurant for ambience and a great meal.

column3: A g o o d place
column4: We came with no reservation. They coild find a slot 5 hrs shead. Luckily, we caught a vacant table in the entrance. Our host was lovely and beautiful. Ordered all the Bone In 14" Filet. Exceptional.

column3: One of the Best in Washington
column4: Hands down, this restaurant is fabulous. The service is first class but the food is even better. The crab bisque is over the top...best we've ever had. The Halibut & Branzini were cooked to perfection.

column3: Fun to sample the crab claws
column4: This was our favorite meal on our Chicago trip. Really good oysters rockefeller and shrimp cocktail as appetizers. We both ordered the crab claw special, which was good and interesting. We'd definitely go again if in Chicago.

column3: A great copy of the original
column4: I grew up eating at the original Joes in Miami Beach and I am one proud member of the local fan club and chicago is very good and you would do yourself a favor by going there
I ate at the bar and the staff was so helpful in letting me know what was what. Great ambiance and vibe to the place and live music.
Incredible restaurant and I highly recommend it. This is one of my top two restaurants in Chicago! ***It's a must!***
An excellent classy choice for great service and good! You cannot go wrong with this choice. Substantial portions and must!
very nice atmosphere, beautiful interior, life music. delicious food. it was very easy to made reservation. not super busy place.
Excellent food and service!! We have been here about a dozen times !! Always excellent that's why we keep coming back !!
Great time out with friends. Service was awesome and the food was absolutely fantastic. Stone crab is the favorite, but all the meals were great as well.!
Decent drinks, good seafood, great service. Casual. Hard to reserve last min notice. Space is tight! Guy next booth tried to squize in his seat and almost fell on my doggie bag. I would go back soon
Excellent service and great seafood. I only wish that they will consider change the specials more often some times they have the same specials for months.
So fresh and delicious! The waiter most definitely was very perceptive and was super friendly. Very classy and pricing is reasonable considering the type of food ans service that is provided!

column3: Excellent food and service at Joe's
column4: Whenever I am in town, Joe's is always on my list of must visit restaurants. Consistently great food and service. Best in Chicago!

What a great dinner!!! Ordered the filet mignon and it was delish! Also ordered a side of fried asparagus and that was also delicious. For dessert it was a slice of delicious key lime pie. The bartenders were super friendly. High recommend it.
You simply cannot go wrong with sidecars and stone crabs! I absolutely enjoyed my experience here. The staff were attentive and the food is always second to none.
great ribeye bone-in, thick and juicy, done at perfection with nice charred crust. one of the best. fresh stone crab claws as starter. just wow.
One of the best places to eat seafood in Chicago. Great food and service make it a favorite place. Definitely recommend

Friend and I ate here and we were very satisfied. Our server Frank was very helpful. The bone in Halibut special was excellent and ahi tuna was excellent. Had shrimp and grits side with red eye gravy which was excellent. Highly recommend.

column3: Treat yourself - delicious food, great service
column4: Wonderful seafood in a sophisticated decor. Great service just added to it. Would recommend the crab legs and artichokes.
Enjoy being in a private room with a group. The main room is so noisy. Food is excellent. Service was great.

column3: Nice food, service can be ameliorated
column4: Food was good, prices quite expensive but fine for the kind of restaurant. Service can be ameliorated, particularly while serving drinks and wine.

This is a nice restaurant in downtown Chicago. Great service. The food was very good, although some of the steaks and seafood were on the pricey side. They have a gluten free and vegan menu as well. They also have a gluten free desert.

They fly in the best seafood here - the Stone Crabs are amazing! We ordered the medium size and they were pricey but worth it. Service was impeccable and the atmosphere electric. I can't wait to go back.

column3: Best Steak ever and fab atmosphere
column4: Service and food are amazing... Yep it's not inexpensive but as part of a trip to Chicago, if you are planning a special meal then this is the place to go.
Excellent 24 oz. ribeye steak and crab legs for dinner this past weekend. Excellent service and environment.
This is the place to be. From the wonderful wait staff to the delicious, fresh stone crab you can't go wrong with this gem. Whenever in Chicago it is a must have....

HUGE fan of Joe's Chicago and Las Vegas and again my visit was a complete homerun. Possibly a grand slam... Food perfection, amazing service, and the drinks were excellent. If you like steaks, seafood, and a great time...PLEASE go to Joe's!
I had the seafood platter and it was exceptional. Some of the best I've ever had. It is a very busy place. Overall, the staff is attentive.

column3: Great way to end the day!
column4: Great food, great service and great atmosphere! This is a really nice place to go. It had everything you want in a restaurant to wrap up a day of meetings!

column3: We always take my parents here when they come to town
column4: A very special place. I proposed to my wife here. Superb wine list and outstanding beef. The service is first class.

The dinner is quite good and the server is really nice. It's not amazingly great though. We have tried quite a few seafood dishes there. With the same price, we can probably get better in other places.

Fabulous food served the way it should be served. Servers are knowledgeable, unpretentious, interested in your experience...the works. The food is the best you will find anywhere. As always, can't go wrong with the crab.

column3: Our foreign guests were amazed, so were we.
column4: We had a business dinner here in one of the private dining rooms with guests from Germany, Japan and the UK. The whole thing couldn't have gone better. The service and food were flawless. Expense account dining done right.

For arriving late in the evening was pleasantly surprised that they were able to fit me in and despite being tired enjoyed one of the best steaks I have ever had, Would recommend the Stone crab.. service was excellent
Every time we set our dates for a Chicago visit, making my reservation at Joe's is the first thing I do. They have a great menu, with the best seafood in the city.
Three of us are here and all enjoyed our dinners. I had the seafood platter and liked the variety. Will go back.

column3: Rather routine, good quality food; typical of Chicago
column4: Like so many famous Chicago places, this restaurant was a bit of a let-down. Nothing wrong with it but not memorable. Also noisy - too many hard, reflective surfaces..
This is "do not miss" while in Chicago. Great food, great service. Fantastic crabs and oysters. I's on the expensive side, but worth every single penny.

column3: Great seafood and great steaks-and real crabcakes so far from the sea!
column4: We were in a group, ushered to a spacious back room through a large Saturday night crowd to a nice cocktail hour and dinner. Tasty salads, peppermint ice cream with chocolate sauce-what's not to like?
Absolutely wonderful!! Had the Stone Crabs and steak. Both were delicious. Had lobster bisque to begin with. Always great. Definitely one of the best restaurants in Chicago
Love going to this place...fabulous steak and seafood. Perfect for a group, couple or business lunch/dinner.
Nice meal but way too expensive. $300 for three with no starters, no deserts and an average bottle of wine. Just not worth the money.
Food is just wonderful for Lunch or Dinner. If you want a seat for either..go early otherwise make a reservation. Seems like they are always booked or fills up fast. Service is spot on as well.
Perfect points on service. The food was perfectly prepared. Nice wine selection. Oysters were amazing and had some unique touches on the plate. Do not skip the Key Lime Pie!
Food is excellent for both Lunch and Dinner. We went just for dessert and without reservations enjoyed our sweets at the bar. The bartenders where very personable which added to the experience.

I ate there with a group from work. Overall the experience was pretty good, but based on the reviews, I expected better. The staff were excellent, but the food good, but not great. Overall, I was happy with it but expected more.

column3: Just found my new favorite. Crab Stuffed Shrimp!
column4: Been here numerous times always very good service. However I just found my new favorite. Crab Stuffed Shrimp! Also enjoyed the Sea Scallops.
The service and food is spectacular. It's worth going in a group if possible so you can share all of the great appetizers and sides along with steak and crab legs.
Had a great dinner with some old friends great crab and steak. Great service and friendly atmosphere. Recommend it.
Often ask to be taken here for my birthday or anniversary. Food is fresh, crab delicious and so are steaks.

This restaurant never disappoints! I love going here for special occasions.... Is so awesome for seafood in Chicago every time.... Seafood and steaks....consistently done well all the time! Excellent service.....
FOOD IS GREAT TOPPPP NOTCH. TRULY consistently outstanding Service is stellar. Expect to pay for what you get.
I asked my colleague to give me a Chicago feel. Boy he hit he nail on the head. I loved the place, the feel, the atmosphere...the experience. I will recommend it for travellers and locals alike.

Professional service. They offer very fresh sea food choices with delicate cooking method. Steak was nice with good portion. The atmosphere of the dining area was warm with nostalgic decoration. Great place to visit in Chicago.
Wow, had a marvelous dinner here. Tim was our waiter and we ordered the Whale, crab bisque and John Dory fish. Everything is first class!!

We celebrated our anniversary with an early dinner. Service and food were fabulous. Sea bass melted in your mouth and filet was equally as tasty. Crab claws were delicious! Never disappointed at this establishment!
Joe's never disappoints! The atmosphere, food, and staff are top notch. Order the whale as an appetizer and you will not be disappointed.
We didnt have a reservation so we sat in the bar area. It was a very busy but we were well waited on and had a great dinner. The food was excellent. Cant wait to come back to Chicago and eat a Joe's.

If you like seafood and lice the midwest then you must go this place (if you can afford!) before you die. The entire dining experience there can become best of the best. You must try the crab there - phenomenal.
One of the best crab meals we've had - it was a work dinner which usually means a more formal setting, but this place helped lower all boundaries as pieces of crab were flying.
i eat here every year on my birthday. terrific food and service. the beef wellington is excellent as are the crab claws.
Just popped in for a quick lunch and was blown away by the food and service , Karen our server could not of been more helpful and great fun to chat to .

column3: A big price fOr an average experience
column4: We had a big group (20) there for dinner this week. Food was good, but for $200 per person it did not feel like reasonable value. Think they are living off the name a bit too much
Good food, I enjoyed eating in this restaurant. The food and server are great. Will be back to have the shrimp. Work on service.

This is one of the best seafood restaurants in Chicago! The high energy atmosphere makes for a theater of dining, with excellent food quality. While this is not a restaurant for the faint of wallet, it's pricey, and worth it.
Excellent location and the price was right. Sat in the bar area. Great service!!! Fresh seafood excellent preparation!! I will come back.
Good food, I enjoyed eating in this restaurant. The food and server are great. Will be back to dine here again.

Over and over and over I have been coming here for years. They do nothing wrong, ever, service, food, crazy good. Worth the money, for a special occasion.....or not. Believe it or not try the fried chicken, it's ridiculously good.
We had a very good dinner. Service with impeccable . I would call it fine dining.....my husband and I both had fish which was very good!

column3: very nice food at affordable price
column4: Big restaurant specialized in sea food that is excelente. My wife ordered The Alaska Combo that was excellent. I've ordered the Stone Crab that was very good as well. Good wine. Waiter Dan very efficient and courteous.
Highly rated restaurant that will not disappoint. We came here and had drinks and Oysters and were great.

column3: overrated restaurant with excellent service but mediocre food
column4: The staff here is very attentive. Unfortunately, the food is way too drab; even the dessert is not delicious (way too sweet for me).
Outstanding! Dover sole, crab, oysters were all amazing as was the service...thanks Mercedes! Hands down one of my all time favorite meals!
Very nice Restaurant in downtown Chicago, a little crowded and loud. Friendly staff and great steak perfect at the point. Really good food!
went there couple weeks ago with family. And I am really picky on seafood. But really surprised, that's the most excellent seafood I've ever had in my life.
Had lunch with a friend. Service was excellent. We had the stone crab lunch which include hash browns , cold slaw and desert. All was very good service was excellent. Not inexpensive but very good .
Eat here every time we visit Chicago and it never disappoints, food and service faultless, the only downside being the seriously overpriced winelist

Great wine list. Great French dip. This is your typical upscale steak and chop house, along with some seafood, that will not disappoint. The service was professional and efficient, as well as knowledgeable and helpful.

column3: One of the best restaurants in the USA, let alone Chicago !
column4: Outstanding seafood fare, best crab cake in Chicago, even the fried chicken is excellent. Sides are great and the Key Lime Pie is vintage ! Eating at a high top in the bar area is fun too !
Awesome service, awesome variety, great food and atmosphere. Try the Dover Sole (real dover sole from Europe, not the Pacific type) and the large crab claws. Highly recommend this restaurant!
My Daughter and I went on a Sunday night without having booked. We managed to get a table in the Bar to eat. Despite how busy it was the service was good and the food great. Well done
We had a wonderful experience at this iconic restaurant in downtown Chicago. I can't wait to go back and do it again!

column3: Good food/ best key lime pie
column4: Still a great place to eat. Very good seafood and steaks within a nice setting. Have to say I go mainly for the Key Lime Pie, of which I have found no equal anywhere.
And my expectations are always high for Joe's. Just a wonderful place with excellent food, fine atmosphere, great staff.

column3: Great place, great food, great service!
column4: Was invited here by friend¬¥s the day before Chicago marathon. Best dinner we had in Chicago over the 6 days we stayed. Excellent fish and impeccable service.

Ate here with my family for a birthday dinner. Was very pleased with our experience. Staff very friendly and takes time to make the dinner special. Excellent options- steaks, seafood and even some sandwiches. Nice bar area to wait in. Definitely make reservations.
everything was simply perfect. the crab is the best ever, meaty and delicate. key lime pie the best also. 5 stars without hesitation.

We visit Chicago every year and try new restaurants. Joes seafood is a place we will visit again. The service was great and we loved the atmosphere. The meal we had was one of the best we've had at many seafood restaurants. See You's again!!

Our waiter Aaron was superb he actually listed one of our dining companion's food allergy and brought that to the chef. One of the best NY Strip steaks I have ever had. Madagascar Shrimp were like grilled prawns and were phenomenal.
Just finished our dinner of dover sole that was delicious. Joe's does a terrific job with this dish and add the tomatoes and just about heaven on earth.
This place makes amazing fish. The salmon was fantastic and so was the Sea Bass. Perfectly cooked and delicious meal. Service was excellent as well
Went to Joe's for business dinner. Wow. The food was fantastic. I really enjoyed Joe's. Everything was delicious and I will definitely return.

As always the restaurant was packed. We were seated within 15 minutes of our reservation time. The service was terrific and as always the food was great. Their banana cream pie is to die for. We will definitely go back.

column3: Great food and good customer service
column4: This was my first time at Joe's and would go back again. The atmosphere was great. Our server was very friendly and helpfull. The service was excellent and fast. I had the Ahi Tuna filet, it was one of the best I have ever had.
Went with a hungry group prior to chicago marathon. We had steak which was awesome. Salads were great. Bronzino disappointing It was dry and tasteless. Stick with the meat.
Great ambiance, wonderful music, we had an hamburger and a salad and they were both vey tasty, with a Pinot Noir glass. The service was great! A very nice experience after Chicagos marathon!
High quality of service. Very good kitchen. Only problem with small hall. Weekends to find a table is almost impossible. Very good for business meetings. U will meet a lot of sharks of business there
Too noisy, very good food, a reservation y definitely required. Crabs were awesome. Is a very good experience. Meat is as good as seafood.
next to marriott magnificient mile totally crowdy and very noisy however good food (steak and seafood salad) quickly served

We made the reservation weeks before we went , we were seated late. Acoustics are horrible, it's very loud. We were hoping for a quieter dinner and would be able to converse with one another. The stone crabs were delicious.
Had a wonderful dinner with a fantastic atmosphere!! Tons of food. Would go back again in a heartbeat!

I went in there to eat the Alaskan king crab, it was great, and the best part is that you don¬¥t even have to crack it yourself, which takes a lot of effort and if you are not an expert, it can take long.
The dinner was outstanding. The dessert was just as good. The service was very attentive. A must when you are looking for a special place. GO YOU WON'T BE SORRY.
The Alaskan Crab-on ice- is a must !! The formal ambiance with the playful attitude of Joe's personnel renders a wonderful experience. A fact clear in Joe's popularity in spite of fierce competition.
Visited Joe for a special celebration we experienced excellent service and simply awesome food. Order "the whale". You won't regret it. Filet mignon was superb.
An eclectic group of people met in a private room for dinner. The food and service was excellent. The main dinning area can be a bit loud and busy but the food is so good it's worth tolerating.
Another delicious meal in Chicago....the sole was unbelievably good..and their Moscow mules are real good!
As an avid purveyor of restaurants there is no other restaurant that has so many wonderful choices of the best food from appetizers to desserts. A Very special place.
My family and I would have to church with some friends from out of town we had three tables and we had to wait a while but it was worth it it will definitely visit again soon .
I don't care what you order, your meal will be a taste sensation with first-class service and a fun atmosphere! It's worth the money! It's s great dining experience.

Excellent service. Our waitress was very friendly and the food was amazing. I mention when I made reservations that we were celebrating my husband and son's birthday, so at the end of our dinner our waitress surprised them with a delicious dessert with a candle.

column3: Our favorite steak and seafood restaurant
column4: Pricey, but so worth it. Best Bloody Mary I have ever had. Steak and seafood are delicious. Nothing exotic but really good food.
Sometimes when you can't get into the hot new steakhouses, this is always a solid backup for a really great steak. Of course the seafood is great as well, but for me I go for a filet.
Everyone expects the seafood and steaks to be excellent an they are very good. The sleeper on the menu is the fried chicken followed by excellent key lime pie. Great service!!
I have not been at Joe's for awhile but whenever I have went there it is always a great experience. Good food, good service and great atmosphere. I have never been disappointed there.
Nothing better at Joe's than stone crab claws (when they are in season)! Colleagues plan business lunch for this time.

column3: Great place for lunch after Nordstrom 's
column4: Bar area is always active and had light lunch menu to follow shopping at Nordstrom just across the street! Good service and food. What else could you ask for.
This is a great place for seafood and steaks! Great cocktails, great service! Definitely worth a visit!

We are at several great restaurants during our Labor Day weekend visit to Chicago- but of all the delicious food and excellent service we experienced, Joe's was the best! Everything was perfectly cooked, served with friendly and informed perfection.

Alaskan king crab legs were oh so succulent. They were cracked by the wait staff and this made them incredibly easy to eat and enjoy. The roasted corn side dish was delicious. Highly recommend reservations. For crab this restaurant cannot be beat.

Loved the stone crab, filet mignon and lobster tail. The seafood was super fresh and the filet mignon was top quality! The jenni mashed potato was amazing because it had asiago cheese and bread crumbs!
Had lunch with a friend with great service. The salad and bread were very fresh and tasty. Highly recommend the bloody Mary's.

I am so in love with this place - the fish & steaks were all incredible. Our server Charles went above and beyond and was so lovely and helpful. It is not cheap at all but it is well worth it. An incredible meal out.
Atmosphere, host, sever, and food were all outstanding. Took my wife there for her b day dinner and the food and service was perfect! Great place for seafood üê†ü¶Çüêü
Had the seafood salad and it was very fresh and tasty. Great place for lunch and not that expensive in fact very reasonable. No reservations needed

column3: One of the BEST Steak & Seafood Restaurants in Chicago (-:
column4: The food is delicious....the staff is always courteous and very professional. A great place for couples or your entire family

column3: always excellent with great food and atmosphere
column4: I love Joes. I feel welcomed no matter how busy they are. the dining room is beautiful and full of energy. Menu full of interesting choices although i usually order the seafood said---with Louis dressing. Waiters do an excellent job.

A highly recommended place to celebrate any ocassion. Great loop location. The food is fabulously delicious. The ambience is wonderful. The service is extraordinary. A little pricey but it is worth every dollar you pay.
My wife and I had dinner here last Saturday to celebrate our first anniversary and it was perfect. The stone crab are always outstanding, and the service is impeccable.
The food is great here, fresh fish. I had the king crab legs that they serve on ice. I have never had them this way but really enjoyed them. Highly recommend.
One of the best restaurants in Chicago! Wonderful service and amazing food! During stone crab season, Joe's is a must. But if you're a meat lover, their steaks are divine.

column3: pricey and food can be inconsistent
column4: i've had good meals there but i've been with people who didn't. Also it is very pricey.Good atmosphere. easy to talk. good service.I've liked what I've had there but nothing you couldn't get elsewhere for less money.
I never had a bad meal here. they have the best manhattan clam chowder!! no joke. fried chicken is great also. great steaks.

Awesome food. Excellent staff. Top notch service. My clients are always impressed when I take them here. I enjoy the stone crab claws to start. Excellent selection of seafood and fish. And the steaks are tender and mouth watering.
Such a delicious place! As a big foody and that just means I love all kinds of wonderful food, this place is soooo good! Well worth getting there to check it out!

column3: High class experience with a high class price
column4: The food is definitely high quality and the service is impeccable. The menu offers a wide variety of seafood, steaks, etc. The place is always crowded even during the week. I strongly suggest you make a reservation.

column3: Going 6 years in a row by Christmas time and always good!
column4: If you plan to go, made a reservation it's airways crowd. The fillet Mignon is 5 stars, as well all the side dishes.
Great place to eat. One of the better places in downtown Chicago. Make a reservation for best seats.
Believe it or not, great steak here... I enjoy the whole concept, great service, great choices of fish and cool atmosphere with seating layout.

column3: One of the best restaurants in Chicago.
column4: This place is the Best. Pricey but great for special occasions. Service amazing and food fabulous. You will never have a bad meal here. Don't be surprised if you run into a famous person while dining. Remember not cheap!

Joe's Seafood, Prime Steak and Stone Crab in Chicago is an excellent restaurant. The food is fabulous, especially the stone crabs! The sides are very good too. The service is excellent and we really like the setting of the restaurant. We highly recommend Joe's Seafood!
Simply the best seafood in Chicago, Miami, Las Vegas, Washington. Stone Crab's can't be beat. Fresh, crisp, visual and delicious!

After watching the air show we just went walking and found this place. Our waiter was Dave and I can't say enough on what an awesome experience we had here. The Chilean Sea bass was the best! Great food and great people!

One of the best dinners we have ever had. Fish was excellent. Ambiance very cool. Service out of this world. Our waitress was amazing. Food - oysters, scallops, lobster was excellent. Book early to get in. Still hooping at 11:00 pm. Highly highly recommended.

The seafood is excellent and if that is not your thing, the fried chicken and steaks were great too. This place is great for a business lunch and dinner for any occasion. Service is excellent and Jimmy is a true professional host.
Wonderful fish and service. The food was excellent and the fish was prepared well. The peach dessert was also good.

Took my son and daughter in law here for his birthday. I had advised the restaurant about his birthday. We had excellent service. Great food. It was my first time eating stone crabs. They brought dessert with candles and comped us. A real celebration dinner.
We went here on a Tuesday night and the place was very busy. Everything we ordered was perfect. I had the ribeye and it was the best meal I ever had in my life.
Best food, Best service.... best everything! Our server, Steven, was great. The oysters are amazing!

The food here was good. But what made our experience so amazing was our server! Denice was first class. She was not only knowledgeable, she helped us enjoy the entire dining experience. If you dine here, I would suggest requesting her as your server!
Joe's Stone Crab is one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago! Great food, fantastic service, but make sure to make a reservation because they are always busy!
We were there for dinner. The waitress was friendly and the atmosphere was good. The food was ok but not outstanding

This was our favourite meal during our Chicago stay. The food was excellent, especially the quality of the steak and the fresh stone crab and oyster. Yummy! The service is very formal and professional and although a little pricy, worth it for the food
We love Joe's. It has a great atmosphere and even better food! If you are in Chicago make sure to make reservations! You won't regret it!!

The best crab legs ever. Excellent. The bone in ribeye was also very good along with the deep fried asparagus. Not sure the steak was worth $57. Wait staff was excellent. Will definitely put it on my short list for Chicago Restaurants.

Every time we are in Chicago Joe's is a must. We had oysters, branzino and the dover sole. We were celebrating our son's birthday and Michelle our server made sure we had a wonderful celebration she brought 3 cakes for him!

Joe's is always consistently very good! Professional & friendly wait staff in tuxedo's, really sharp decor and, most importantly, really good fresh seafood and well prepared cocktails. And, the prices will not ruin your day!
We booked a team dinner in May at Joe's and they did a fantastic job. We had a party of about 20. The events staff and the waiters were first class.
Filet Oscar was absolutely perfect! Topped it off with their peanut butter pie - totally sinfully delicious. Would go back in a heartbeat/

I visited this place first in miami south Beach...then two weeks ago in Las Vegas and now in Chicago...I usually have joe's stone crab with mashed potatoes on the side...they're always delicious...I'm going back soon...I like their welcome and excellent professional service...highly recommended
Typical Chicago businessman steakhouse with terrific house salad dressings and sauces. Good service, good food, nice ambiance.

Pretty much the same as you would expect. Find Shaws..?much better and has live usic, plus they have sushi and after you can walk across the street to London or Trump.... both have an outdoor bar patio......awesome

We were in Chicago for my birthday and a friend recommended Joe's. An outstanding experience! Our server, Steve Bovard, was on it! So friendly and accommodating. If you want a truely delicious dinner and a great dining experience, go here.
We had lunch here on a busy Saturday. My wife had the Tenderloin and I had Alaskan Salmon. The food was great and the service was beyond excellent. I will definitely go back.
Food was excellent, room too crowded and loud. Our waiter was without personality which made the evening challenging. Enjoyed the company and food.

column3: Not One Bad Item on this Menu....And, what a selection!
column4: I eat here as often as I can when in Las Vegas and my hometown of Chicago. Service is impeccable. Food is AWESOME! If you can get in or there's a short wait, by all means, GO!
Joe's Seefood is a great place to be if you look for great steaks and seafood. It is a bit crowded so it make sense to get a reservation in advance.
My experience (as always) at Joe's was excellent. The food was great, service was "above and beyond". If you don't like seafood then you must try their Fried Chicken dish!
I was really pleased with this restaurant the service as well as the food was outstanding.The ambience was perfect for our celebration...classiness, but not stuffy. Ideal for that special enjoyment.

The best steaks in Chicago!!! Steaks made to perfection!! Great selection of wine and beer. The crabs are also great!!! Service is fast and courteous!! Desserts are out of this world!! Next time in Chicago I will return.

My nephew came in town to celebrate his birthday and to attend a concert. We chose Joe's. While there was a line, we were able to secure an excellent table and was provided top notch service. The food was fantastic.
Food was great. The portions were generous. Service was attentive. The hostess seated us in a private corner. We were comped on a anniversary desert. I would go back.
This place is better than advertised and it was highly recommended! My friend had the famous stone crab which was delicious. I had the best salmon I've ever eaten in the US. Outstanding.

Food is outstanding, staff is extremely good friendly and engaging, not pushy about ordering or time spent. Great bar and wine list, somewhat expensive but expected for a Chicago downtown restaurant. Easy to park with valet service.
It was delicious. The waiter was AWESOME. SERVICE was excellent. Can't wait to visit again, SOON!üòÜüòÅüòÄ
Joe's introduced my daughter to crab, lobster and oysters. And there has been no looking back! Simply outstanding. Perfection on every plate.

As always, the food and drinks were fantastic. For cocktails stuck with the staple, Gin Martini best in the city. Tried something VERY different for diner and went with the fried chicken. It was Fantastic !!!
The seafood, steak and service are top notch. It's a little pricey but worth it. One of the best restaurants for seafood in Chicago.
My family always chooses Joe's as the place to celebrate any birthday, anniversary, graduation, for anything else. Service is always perfect, food is always great, drinks are always delicious.
Very good seafood especially for a seafood lover and connoisseur. The stone crabs are great. Ambience great. Pricey however worth it

column3: Cramped Quarters, but Really Good Food
column4: The tables are very close together, making it impossible not to hear your neighbors' conversations, but the food is worth it. Both the seafood and the steaks are top notch. Service is excellent. This place is always crowded, so make a reservation in advance.
Always like coming here. Fun atmosphere, good service, good food & great for any occasion, especially date night.

We were sitting in bar; ordered drinks and food and then manager came over a put a " reserved " sign on table and said we had to get up.....even server was amazed at poor service.. We left and never will go back..
We love this place for the food and fine service. It is expensive so we save it for special occasions.
crablegs, geat service, ambiance...all outstanding, strongly recommend. loved the history, good salads...not cheap
Such a great dinner! Our waiter was so helpful suggesting wine and creating an appetizers combo the whole table would like. The sockeye salmon special was divine! Can't wait to go back!

column3: Loved everything about this white tablecloth experience!
column4: Food was AMAZING. They held our table as our flight in was amazed. Best crabs, oysters and STEAK! Walk from anywhere downtown.
On the night we dined, it was very busy. Reservations are a must for dinner. The cocktails are very good and so are the steaks. The service was excellent!
We booked a private room (minimum 15 persons). Top service. The food is outstanding. I loved the ahi tuna, could cut it with my fork. Would go back!!!
I thought food was ok . Sorry, stone crabs not worth the money. Good location and Service was very good. But Not planning on returning.

Joes is one of our favorite Chicago restaurants. Reservations are a must as its a very busy place. The food is excellent and you never feel rushed. I had the salmon and it was cooked to perfection. We come here whenever we get to Chicago.
One of the best seafood ( specially stone crab) in Chicago . A little expensive , but everything was satisfactory . Looking forward for my next visit to that great place.
From crab claws to ceviche to salmon, this restaurant has an array of menu offerings coupled with an excellent wine and beer list. Reservations required after 5pm.

column3: Good Food prices out of line
column4: The food and the service was excellent. The prices were way out of line with other fine dining establishments.. In any event we enjoyed ourselves. The place was crowded and congested.
I have eaten crab legs at many restaurants in the city and I always make the comment _ not as good as Joes. They are perfect everytime I eat there. Great side dishes and desserts. Worth the trip.
Such good seafood, and washed down with a key lime margarita or glass of white wine, it just doesn't get any better...

The steaks are very, very good. The stone crab claws are imported directly from the SouthBeach location. The service is top-notch. Every part of the meal was great. Reservations are definitely needed as it is very busy.
My "go to" restaurant for out of town guests. Great service. Great food. Steaks, seafood, whatever. Pricey, but never disappointing. Don't forget to end the meal with the key lime pie.
This is the best for fresh seafood. It old school with white linens and attentive professional service.
It's always good. John & Bret are always very helpful to my every need. We never know what to order as everything is good, so we usually order several items and share after the crab claws and shrimp
This is one of my favorite restaurant. I look the lobster bisque soup, scallops. Great service. A little bit dressy.
Service and food were outstanding! Will definitley return next time I am in Chicago. I highly recommend the crab stuffed shrimp from the lunch menu
Excellent food. The steaks are superb. The sides are sumptuous and the portions are more than generous. The service is very good. Always a wait for a table even if you've made a reservation.
What amazing restaurant. We had lunch . When we arrived we were greeted quickly at sat now. When servicer arrived we advised we are in a rush . No problem . Food was amazing and great quick service
Atmosphere was amazing and food was delicious. The whale app was a perfect starter. Definitely coming back when in chi town.
Great service, very friendly waiter Best crab ever... So good! Nice wine list Good atmosphere We had a great night!
Everything was amazing from my wedge salad to my surf and turf and glass of pinot . I was alone but never felt it my server was very attentive and everyone around me had good vibes going.

Everyone was happy with their meals. I ordered the crab stuffed shrimp and mac & cheese. The shrimp was good but the Mac & cheese was boring, nothing note worthy about it. Too expensive for me to visit again.
