Typical Joe's seafood eatery. Very busy place. Make reservations. Excellent food and service. Usual seafood menu items.
Nice ambiance and good attention. Try crab cakes, the "whale" and the famous dish Stone crabs. They come with sauce and lemon. The flavor is so fresh!

The very crowded (and popular) Joe's Stone Crabs lived up to its reputation with wonderful food and service. The Stone Crabs were every bit as good as they are at the original restaurant in Miami. Sides were plentiful and thoroughly enjoyable.
Food in Chicago bar none. The shrimp cocktail is almost as good as Gibson's. The driver know were mixed well. The scallops were perfect.
Great fresh food, wonderful service and lots of atmosphere. All fresh and nice preparation. The staff is very attentive and accommodating
Simplemente delicioso, crab cake, Seafood Platter, fried oyster, fried calamary, everything is great !!!, and dont forget a Matilda Beer !!!!
I was a bit disappointed...maybe because I expected too much after reading TA reviews of this place. Nothing was bad, but I'd look for another seafood eatery if that's what you are hungry for.

Attended a business dinner, ordered the ribeye. It was just average. No real flavor. Had the just greens salad and it was good, as was the 4 cheese Mac & cheese. Peppermint ice cream at the end was refreshing.
As much as we love Stone Crab we could no buy it at those prices. We opted for the petit fillets. All six of us had a wonderful steak. No opinion on the seafood. Great service as well.
the best stone crab in Chicago. I made a reservation about a month ago to take 2 clients for dinner. They enjoyed every minute of it.

Food and service come together and create this special place in where you feel sorry to eat just one course. The seafood menu is so diverse that it takes a lot of time to decide what to eat. Coffee was great too.
A Classic restaurant to Visit in Chicago, The food is always great, we order the Large Stonecrabs and were delicious. We made reservation and didnt wait for the table, we will be back for sure.

We had the Crab Bisque and the Manhattan Clam Chowder. Our rule of thumb is if a restaurant knows how to make great soup, everything else probably follows suit. We also had the crab stuffed avocado. Delicious...
We love this restaurant. Service is always great!! The food to die for and we always walk out with a great smile on our face. Even the kids enjoy it! Lunch is more reasonable with kids.
This restaurant is the benchmark for fine seafood. It is so good. Every single thing we tasted was fresh and delightful. The service is very friendly.

column3: Excellent service and food in a corporate environment
column4: Generally good food in your typical corporate chain like environment. Excellent appetizer assortment including calamari (overbooked) stuff shrimp (overcooked) and stuffed mushrooms. Boring mixed green salad. Excellent crabcakes and good New York strip. Great key lime pie.

column3: Lettuce Entertain You Strikes Again with Joes
column4: Come for the crab and stay for the crab cakes. Joes does is right with a delicious slate of traditional favorites suitable for everyone. With great views of the river.

Super service. Incredible atmosphere. Well worth the time. Had an incredible meal with my wife. Highly recommend having a reservation and take your time to enjoy all that is offered. The service staff was great and very accommodating.
great service great food. our waiter was so nice that because it was cold she gave us hot towels. i suggest the stone crab

The only reason this gets a 4 from me is because the reservation lead time is SO ridiculous, but there is a reason I guess. Great food better service. Book at least 3 weeks ahead of your trip, but try it.

The seafood here is excellent. Had the Manhattan Clam Chowder and chopped seafood salad. All ingredients were fresh and came with a nice presentation. Would recommend if you are looking for good seafood.
One of the best places in the world to have king crab. Both atmosphere & service are excellent. A must if you visit Chicago.
My husband had bone in filet mignon for the first time! AMAZING! I had the stone crab claws. So delicious & sweet. Service was attentive.

column3: Classic american steaks and seafood of best quality
column4: If you want classic american steaks and seafood of best quality in classy surroundings and top service from friendly hosts
I had my birthday dinner with some friends here. We ordered the King Alaskan Crab legs and steaks. Everything from the service, food and ambience were awesome!
Appetizers and meals were great. Fresh and tasty. Service was incredible. You must make a reservation to be seated.

Over the top service, host, server. Can't wait to go back! Everyone was on top of it. We thought the food preparation, the explanation of the menu and our wine and cocktail was selection was a ten plus.
A very nice selection of steaks and seafood. The food was excellently prepared and very generous portions, although a bit on the pricey side.

column3: Favorite place to eat in Chicago!!!
column4: I experienced both dinner and lunch at Joe's Seafood. Outstanding seafood and service!! Dinner reservations highly suggested! Not so hard to get a table for lunch!
I ate at one of the high tables in the bar which has full service. The food was excellent including the trout dish that I had. The apple pie with ice cream was homemade style and excellent.
We ate here for a family celebration and it was wonderful! The food, the service, the ambiance were all absolutely superb. Oysters, shell crab, Lobster - all was sublime.

We love this place. And their steaks cooked to perfection. And their lobster tails melting in the mouth. And great great crab claws... Service is always good. We only dislike the fact that one has to make their reservations far in advance.

This place is expensive, but worth it. The stone crab and steaks are amazing. Everything you eat here is top notch. While it's noisy and crowded the excellent staff make you quite comfortable. Worth a splurge.
Amazing food and table side crab is the way to go. Also people don't think of it for steaks but they do an excellent job with meats too. Highly recommend you giving it a shot.
I generally stay away from "chain" establishments but Joe's is an exception. The seafood selection is excellent as is the food. Service is always good and for a chain, the value is not bad.

column3: Don't go to Chicago without going here!
column4: We stopped in for lunch without a reservation and were able to get in with no problem. The food was fantastic and the service was excellent! We will definitely go back upon our next trip to Chicago! You can't go wrong!
This resteraunt is an upscale Chicago Seafood and Chop house. Given I am from south florida, I am somewhat jaded and favor the florida place.
Can't go wrong here! Best stone crab ever.. also great service and fun atmosphere. Not cheap but well worth the price! Love the bartenders too...

Excellent place! Great atmosphere, great service, amazing fresh seafood. Went in on a busy Saturday night, sat at the bar, enjoyed every minute of it! Martinis are great, oysters and ceviche outstanding!
Jumbo crablegs are a MUST. We had that and oysters rockefeller as appetizers. The lunch filet mignon and sea bass. The peanut butter pie, the perfect ending!
What a great venue, prides themselves in the heritage and still makes age old trusted recipes. The Crab Cakes was simple divine - light and flavorsome

Came with some colleagues expecting some good seafood and was very happy with the selection! Had the clam chowder and more king crab than I could eat. Won't go into much detail, but mostly ate shellfish and was very satisfied with my meal. Highly recommend!

Lots of hype about this place, but the food was mediocre at best. I may be spoiled from eating seafood in coastal towns, but expected better for the prices. Big, busy, loud and crowded if you are into that.
Delicious Crabs and Steaks a place you shouldn't miss everytime you come to Chicago. Conveniently located in downtown. I have been here many many times and there is nothing like it.

Great restaurant, great food, a lot of variety, great service. You will not be disappointed. Great location next to Magnificent mile! Sometimes its a huge crowd, so prepare yourself to wait. Recommendation are must. Hope you will enjoy. .especially the fresh sea food.

My girlfriend and I visited Joe's in the middle of January for her birthday and it was phenomenal. The food, the service, the presentation, the location, and the ambiance... everything was outstanding. I can't wait to find an excuse to go again.

column3: One of the best meals I have ever had!
column4: I took my daughter to Joe's as a congratulatory dinner for getting her bachelors degree and starting law school. It was perfect.
Great steak, great oysters. Falls in line with the great steak house of Chicago. Very busy on the weekends reservations needed.
This place is great. I was only here for lunch...but from door to check my experience was perfect. Mahi taco was straight from heaven. Waiter (), spot on. I WILL come here again. You should too

I had been told about this place at a business meeting during the day and we were lucky enough to get a table. The service was excellent the atmosphere was great the food was very good, o good recommendation would go back.

Wonderful experience! While the restaurant was packed, I appreciate the fact that we could still visit with our friends and the noise level was not a problem. Service was very personable, knowledgeable, and first class. Food of course was amazing! Perfect!
Great atmospheric place really liked this one. Very nice friendly staff the food selection was extensive and what I had was lovely Highly recommend this listing

column3: Always Great Food & Service. The Best Place in Chicago!
column4: Can't beat Joe's....it's hands down the best steak and seafood restaurant in Chicago. We can't wait to go there tonight. As a local we love eating there or just getting take out....favorite place! And we love the South Beach location too!!
Honestly the food was not bad ,but we were expecting more quality and better plates presentations. The price is a little high for the quality of the place

I've stopped into Joe's a few times for lunch and it really exudes class and sophistication. The steak sandwich on the lunch menu is the best I've ever eaten anywhere and the crab cakes get two thumbs up as well.

I was in a group of 10 people - we arrived late afternoon - no reservation. Luckily there was free space available -so we got in. Food was excellent - service also. Try jumbo shrimps -and steak of course... .

I don't come for seafood or steak. I prefer to sit at the bar, have a cocktail and a snack and watch the action. The wine list is great, the bartenders are wildly entertaining and the service is impeccable.
I love stone crab and Joe's is the best this side of South Florida. Joe's does it right with fresh crab and all the great sides to go with it. Yum!
Absolutely the best meal I have had in a while. My filet mignon was delicious. They have a great wine selection. Our server did a great job.

For a special night out, this is the place to go. Although we have sat in the dining room for exceptional food and service, our favorite place is sitting at the bar. Great tasting appetizers and friendly outgoing bartenders.
Great food and service. Booked a private room for a business luncheon. The food was so good! The Sea Bass is amazing! They accomidated every request! Loved it!

column3: The Best Lunch in Chicago Town!
column4: Went to Joe's for a later lunch. Wife had Prime Filet with Mashed Potato & Grilled Tomato. I had the Stone Crabs with Grilled Hash Browns & Cole Slaw. Elegant, Upscale, and good value as the lunch includes the sides.

This place has really got it's act together!!!! If you are looking for a really memorable dinner this is the place to go. I went with my wife and both of us enjoyed everything, we cannot wait to go back!

Don't think about it...and don't wait...make your reservation now at Joe's. Yes, it's expensive and perfect for a special occasion...or not! The service, ambience, food and presentation of the food sets a new standard. I always enjoy Joe's and always look forward to going back

column3: I love the bar scene here!
column4: The restaurant is great but I really love sitting in the bar at a table having drinks and bar snacks though you could order a full meal at the bar as well. We had an enjoyable evening and the service was great!

We hosted a large group of 25 in their boardroom private dinning area. Everything was outstanding. The food in all categories was over the top. I will continue to make this a top pick for Chicago. The best seafood and streaks!!!!
Joe's is one of our favorite restaurants in Chicago, The bone in Filets are amazing, the Madagascar shrimp are delicious, and the Stone Crabs phenomenal!
Been many times and it never disappoints...from the atmosphere to the service...This place truly has it down...Best food and service mixed with a great vibe....love this place!

Joe's is large, noisy and expensive: with drinks and dessert, our bill was more than $400 prior to the tip. But the food is exceptional-the steaks are great and the stone crabs are spectacular. Service was terrific too.

Clubby electric atmosphere. Reserve early...the stone crab claws are the star of the show, but the steaks are "Chicago worthy". Great salads (BLT Wedge) and other options included the second mortgage seafood tower. The desserts are a fabulous finish.
The food and service was excellent despite the throng of guests. The steak was perfectly done, the service was accomplished. What more is there?

column3: The service and staff great, but the food...
column4: Very nice ambient. We were yesterday . The service and staff was fantastic; but not the food. I ordered filet mignon medium well; was tender but was salty and some parts were overcooked. My husband tried the marinated skirt; was good, but not excellent.
We enjoyed a birthday dinner with family of 4. Seated within minutes of our reservation time. Service was great! As well as ALL the food and drinks we ordered. Would be hard to top this dinner.
We visited Joe's today and the food was delicious and the staff were great and very attentive. We will definitely come back when in Chicago again.
Strongly suggest the fry oysters and the New York stake medium well. Mr. Hank the waiter he is so wonderful - if he will not retire until your visit

We've visited this Joe's as well as the one in Vegas many times. This is one of those consistently great restaurants. I highly recommend getting the South Beach Peach - its the best drink Ive ever had!
We had eight people with us and no one was disappointed with what they ordered. The food was fresh they brought it out in a timely matter and everything was prepared surperly .
Pricy but they deliver on the promise. The entire group (11) walked out satisfied. Food is extremely good (obviously including stone crabs) & the service was even better.
Had a great dinner at Joe's. The king crab was excellent and the "through-back" ambience is a hoot. Our wonderful server, I believe her name was Denise, made the evening even more enjoyable.

Had the grilled seafood platter, was also served a complimentary bread basket and finished it off with a banana cream pie. Scallops, prawns and lobster all nicely cooked, dessert a good sized and very sweet portion

column3: Just as good as in Miami
column4: Great for the stone crabs had a great meal have an expensive wine list . Enjoyable experience but have eaten better in other parts of the world. Make a reservation or arrive early.
it's October 16th and Joe's begins to do what what it is known for Stone Crab. a must if your in town. not cheap, but worth the splurge one or twice a year for the experience
Fabulous lunch yesterday in Joe's. Food, ambience & attentive service. Had a great time, thank you Dave who looked after us so well! We had a good time!

More than I expected. Thought it would be a little more casual but the wait staff was more than attentive to every detail. Stone crab was good but expensive. Ahi Tuna was excellent as well as the Salmon and side dishes and wine.

I am a repeat visitor, as in 40-50 times. Great service and always great food. Don't miss the Alaskan King Crab legs, Fried Chicken (ask for honey), and the Prime Strip Steak (no bone). Don't forget to have dessert.

column3: Good food but a bit expensive
column4: we had good time and quality of food is very good; but probably the prices are a bit expensive. Wine list very rich and service impeccable

If you want a solid meal, perfectly prepared Joe's has a lot to offer. Steaks and fish are good quality cooked right and without any attempt at fusion. The place has a good Chicago steakhouse look and vibe. The service was truly outstanding.
A totally fun and delightful dinner! Excellent service, delicious food. Try the Sole! They're very busy so expect a wait or get in early.

Wonderful dinner; great portions; very professional service, dressed in tuxedos; my Dover Sole was perfectly filet at table; juicy and tender, perfectly prepared. They deliver what their prices promise. There are less expensive items on the menue.
Food was great. Stone crabs are very good to try. Amazing Alaskan king crab. Hard hard hard to get a table. Reserve early or tip the hostess.
Amazing restaurant with amazing service. I had the dover sole which is wonderful! Highly recommended!
Fantastic restaurant. There was a 2 hour wait when we tried to get in so booked for the next night. Birthday celebration and it was a great place to go to celebrate.

column3: No reservation? Sit at the high tops in the bar!
column4: Bring your wallet and go for the crab claws! Pricy but good! Wait staff is attentive and will not rush you. Very good dining experience. Great for special occassions.
Came here with my wife before and had a lovely meal, would love to come here again and would without hesitation if I could afford it! Best meal in the city!
Wow, i love stone crab! This place has incredible food and very good service. We showed up with more than reserved and the accommodated, very good overall.

column3: classy & nice place for a special occasion
column4: Excellent place to have a great meal. It's a la carte as in Ruth Chris or Morton's. If you can afford it, it is well worth it! It's a bit pricey for a family with kids.
Great food , fabulous service and priced like any other premium steak and seafood restaurant Seafood grill entree and key lime pie are memorable

We were a "walk-in" and rather than waiting more than a hour ate at the bar. Service was amazing and seafood platter excellent. Also had mac & cheese and it was excellent. If you are in Chicago don't miss Joe's

column3: Good choice but not the best
column4: This is a traditional steak and crab place. I was disappointed with service and attention by staff. It was busy and we ate in the bar so that may have contributed to the so-so experience.

We had a reservation booked for 6.30, even during this earlier booking the restaurant was buzzing. The atmosphere, service and dining experience was second to none. This is a truly amazing restaurant.

Joe's in Miami Beach is awesome. Joe's in Chicago is not. The appetizers were average, the stone crab claws were OK, the filet was good, and the sides were OK, but not up to Joe's Miami Beach standards.
this place is a must, food is great, service great staff is the best, shout out to Jimmy, Amy, Dana, and the whole crew. see you in December.

column3: Great place to dine in Chicago
column4: This is one of the best meals I have ever had, the service was unbelievable and the food was wonderful. Do not skip dessert here! This is an experience!
When planning our trip to Chicago we were told Joe's is a must and they were absolutely right! The food was amazing and our waiter Matt was wonderful. I highly recommend the king crab legs too!
Joe's is a classic "Place you keep coming to". We keep coming to because although quite expensive it is never disappointing.

Can't say this place was the best ever, but our waiter was exceptional and very knowledgable of the oysters that we ordered. Talked us into a bottle of their Sauvignon Blanc, and the rest was history.
Had a birthday lunch with my wife and it was truly great. The scallops were terrific and the seafood platter was wonderful. Service was over the top!
We love the throwback decor and swing music. The crab cakes and wedge salad make an unbelievable lunch. Pricey but worth every penny. We love to eat at a high-top in the bar for lunch.

We had reservations, but had to wait about 10 minutes on a long weekend evening. The food was very high quality and tasted great. We (2 of us) had the Whale and split a steak. Bathrooms are clean. The place is loud.
Great stone crab, very popular place. I just got a seat at the bar given how jam packed the restaurant was, the only one. Helps to be know person I see. Yall go dig in and enjoy!
Best steaks, good seafood. Try the Prime Rib, you wont be disappointed. Order a side of the pepper sauce, its so good.
Had dinner with my husband here upon recommendation from a local - awesome rec!! The food was amazing but the service made the evening. Our server Frank out did himself. Don't pass this one up!!

This was our first time a Joe's and it did not disappoint. Great service beautiful restaurant. The service was perfect. We left our order up to our server and she recommended the hard and soft crab and both were amazing. Would go back for sure.

Amazing! Great atmosphere, a little hustle and bustle, but very classic. Our waitress was informative about our food and the restaurant history. We dined on our time schedule, and was not rushed. Food quality was impeccable.
Expect polished waiter/waitress and very good food. It's on the pricier side but good service and great food differentiate a restaurant and make it a good "value".

Food's nice, service is great, location is convenient. Was a bit expensive, but the whole experience was worth it. Our waiter, Mr. Hill was also very friendly. For seafood lovers, the stone crab is a must-try.
Great food, great service, excellent menu and good ambience. Our first visit, but we will g back for sure
Went there for a business dinner. Everything was excellent. The stone crab claws were especially great, as was the service. Definitely will be back.
Visited with my gf and her parents and it was fantastic!! We had a reservation and we didn't wait at q. Service was superb. Prices above normal but worth it
While I am not a seafood lover, this is my favorite place to eat. They have the best steak I think I've ever tasted.

The sea food was delicious and our waiter was amazing. Had great input on the menu and his recommendations were right on the mark. I had the Dover Sole and it was perfect. Expect to pay premium prices, but it's worth it.

Huge menu, good size portions and good quality food. I had the Shrimp de Jonghe and Ahi Tuna main and thought it was excellent. Cappuccino and seasonal berries for dessert were also good. Can't go wrong here, but it is pretty expensive.

Great place we went there for lunch and food was very good. A little pricey for lunch but they did have lunch specials that looked really good but we did not get any we ordered off the main menu. Side are al a cart.
First meal visiting Chicago. Great service, but crab wasn't as good as expected. Probably because end of season for stone crab.
Fantastic seafood, great atmosphere. Jeff, our server, is himself the definition of exemplified service. This location is a must stop for a romantic getaway. Make sure you ask for Jeff!
Hosted a group of 20 in their private dining room. Outstanding service, presentation and quality. Nice wine list. Megan in particular did a fantastic job!

column3: Beautiful restaurant for an upscale, delicious dinner
column4: Delicious stone crabs, steak, breads in a warm, upscale atmosphere. The service was impeccable and the food amazing. The drinks were well made and strong.
I love the king crab. The service is the best I have experienced anywhere. Such knowledgeable wait staff!!! I don't go to Chicago without stopping here!
Me and my wife were treated very well here. The service was excellent. The waitress recommendation was great. Drinks were strong.
was recommended by a friend and hence booked a table via "open table" while sitting at the architectural tour of Chicago. Superb food and excellent service. Deff a place to eat at in Chicago

This place is. Off the charts.....we had such a great experience. From the bread right down to the mouthwatering desert. Service was impeccable. What a treat........it made our trip to Chicago that much more memorable.....

column3: Came for the steak, loved the crab
column4: Our group of six ordered Alaska crab legs. The table side preparation was fun to watch, and made it easy to enjoy. Sides are ample, steaks done to perfection. You won't be disappointed, there are choices for everyone.

Service, Ambience, Food. Everything about this establishment went above and beyond our expectations!! The freshest most delicious crab I've ever eaten! The most knowledgable server! Wonderful atmosphere! Should be very high on anyone's list when visiting Chicago!

Had a wonderful lunch experience at Joes. The restaurant if vibrant with a comfy and welcoming feel. The food was wonderful and the staff was happy and welcoming. We would return there every time we visit.

What a fantastic place - Interesting never had crab cold, they recommend eating the crab legs and crab claws cold - say it retains more flavor that way. Fantastic dinner, place was packed - make sure you make reservations
Place looks nice and a lot of people! I tried Kings Crab Salad and was delicious! Very nice restaurant to visit in Chicago! Good location and price is fair!

If you want some of the best food and service in the country, here is your place. Come for the stone crabs and steaks, big secret.....try the fried chicken, it's unreal. Huge waits go early or late to avoid or make resos far in advance.
Dinner and service could not have been better. Lobster tail melted in my mouth. Stone crab was wonderful. Nice wine list.

This is the happening place in downtown Chicago. The beautiful 20-30 business crowd loves this place! The bar was packed with them! The stone crabs are NOT to be missed! Soooo moist and yummy! Service was also exceptional!

column3: Took my aunts out for mother's day at this restauratn
column4: the people were were very nice and the food was excelent and we tried different things on the menu that we had never had before and it was excellent.
There are many nice fish and meat choices at the resturant. There is a bit of a clubby feel to the resturant as well with lots of regulars who frequent the resturant.

Joe¬¥s is always great, however in our last visit we had the most amazing waitress EVER. If if you go to Joe¬¥s request LIZ to serve your table and be assured you will have a great experience. Thank you Liz for a memorable time.
Everything here is first rate. Outstanding service and food. From the bread to salads to the seafood, the food is top notch and consistently good.
The service here is on point. They are very friendly and helpful. The food is always just right. Gets a bit crowded, so make sure you have a reservations. The key lime pie is a MUST.
Love everything about this place - atmosphere, food, drinks. Oysters Rockefeller are amazing. Definitely would recommend.

What an amazing dinner experience!! The waitstaff knows how to give you a first class evening. The food was simply incredible! Mac and cheese was the best side and the steak melted in your mouth! Yum!
Great bar, always too busy for drop ins so reservations a must. Plan on spending a lot of money, in my opinion overpriced for what you get. Eat at the bar is best options. Noisy happening place.

Terrific food. The service is always beyond exceptional. Our server Frank asks, learns and uses his customers names. He was there when we seemed to need him and were left alone when we didn't. Best server ever.
not cheap by any sense of the word but fantastic. Can't miss. Our most visited restaurant in Chicago. A great steak house.
Calamari was great. Fried shrimp was ok. Stone crab was good. Atmosphere was just ok. It was overpriced. This was our most expensive meal in Chicago. But not our best.

Had walked in hungry but the wait for a bar table was well worth it. Staff was attentive and recommendations were great. Crab cake was awesome. Lobster bisque the best one I had in Chicago. Steak was perfect. Must visit

Have the bone in ribeye absolutely excellent the service was excellent I've been to lots of really good restaurants in the Chicago area absolutely the best service I've had and excellent food great spot

Exceptional Menu and Service. Always busy for a reason. A pleasure to have Dana behind the bar steadily busy and engaging. You won't be displeased with the menu. Stone Crab in season, Oyster's Rockefeller and any Steak are great selections. Wine list is terrific.
The staff food and wine jut outstanding. Very close to Langham hotel. Need to book which an indication of popularity

My friend who is pesketarian took me there. I can sey anything bad food was good as well the way it looks as well the staff was nice. If I could afford more often I would eat ofter there. The crabs are the best
Better than the original Miami beach spot. One of the best steaks in Chicago, and amazing seafood as well
We ate in the Oyster Bar Room, which was casual. The food was excellent. I had a seafood combo and some soup. The atmosphere was neat.
This was one of the best meals I've ever had. Stone crabs were perfect and the service was very good. It's a fun atmosphere great for a group of friends.

column3: Appetizers, steaks and desserts were amazing
column4: Calamari was perfectly prepared and 24 ounce bone-in steak full of flavor. Ordered one of each dessert and shared them family style - a tremendous ending to an epic meal.
My wife and I dined here for Dinner. It was awesome. We had great wine; Oysters; steak; Salmon; Fried calamari. Steve our waiter was the best, he accomodated us on every request.
Decided to visit here as it was well recommended I was so happy I visited here the staff was great and the food was perfect in every way portion size was great and presentation was even better

We had reservations for 5 and arrived 30 minutes early. We were seated right away and the service from that point on was fantastic! Food was even better. Would highly recommend Joe's when you're in Chicago!

column3: Nice restaurant to visit while in Chicago.
column4: We had made reservations for dinner and arrived early. Seated within 15 minutes. Great choice in seafood, steak, fish. Wonderful wine selection. We had a very nice dinner.
Took my parents there for their 60th wedding anniversary and loved it, pricey but the food was worth it.

The food was perfect. From the bread selection, appetizers, entrees, and desserts everything was presented well and tasted wonderful. We even received a complementary key lime pie slice ( which was delicious). Overall I wold highly recommended Joe's for a special night out.
Not gourmet - go here for large portions of heavy food, a la Joy of Cooking. A nice space with beautiful dark wood panelling, good service - maybe a bit pricey for the quality
The crab and lobster was phenomenal! I really enjoyed our dinner and highly recommend it. Our server was great and answered all of our questions. I would definitely go again!
If you like sea food this is the place to visit, Family atmosphere, Great service and excellent Food,
The Food and service at Joe's Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab is incredible!!! Probably the best restaurant I go to, I have never been disappointed here! A must visit if in Chicago!
Nice place. Service was good. Food was good but over rated. Found it to be very expensive. Many better places in Chicago.
The meal was absolutely fantastic. I did not want to stop eating. I had the seafood combo. The scallops just melted in your mouth and the crab legs were so sweet and succulent.
The service was outstanding and the food was excellent. All personnel were courteous and very personable. Can't say much more.
whatever you order from Joes is top notch. from the stone crabs to the lamb chops to all the sides and the salads too!

column3: Awesome Stone Crabs outside of Florida
column4: Excellent Service,great food, good pricing all in an enjoyable atmosphere. Friendly and courteous people and nice yet not too loud music.
Truly an outstanding seafood restaurant. Everything was fresh, and prepared wonderfully. The service was absolutely above and beyond any of the other restaurants in the area.
Had a wonderful meal and excellent service as we inhaled stone crabs normally eaten in Florida - great tuna tartare, delish sides, and fun festive atmosphere

We popped in on an afternoon for a late lunch. Everything we tried was just delicious. We especially loved the creamy mac & cheese, the shrimp coctail, and the amazing sweet potato with maple nut butter. Yum. I will eat here again!

My wife and I went here during restaurant week and the service and food was amazing. Old school charm with great dishes. Had the surf and turf and the steak came out just right. Would definitely recommend this to others!!!

I ordered skirt steak, should have gone bigger. However, the steak was delicious. My boyfriend ordered a Chilean Sea Bass and he and I both agreed that it was the best chilean sea bass he and I ever had. Highly recommend.

column3: Worth a double visit during one long weekend,
column4: Awesome sandwiches, great atmosphere. Everything we tried was excellent! Worth a trip back to Chicago jus for the food!
The atmosphere was really nice, excellent service and the food was amazing. The crab and lobster were so flavourful. Would definitely recommend Joe's and would visit again.
The crab is good, but server cold..not my preference. The fried chicken and Mac n Cheese were great. Key lime pie good too! Pricey, but the atmosphere dictates it,

Excellent service followed by a delicious seafood expereince. The stuffed crab was amazing and even the appetizers spinach stuffed mushrooms were so good. The price was fair service was excellent and the food was amazing, definately going back next time i am in chicago
I visited joes for my birthday and I was so impressed from every detail the food the service and the atmosphere I can't wait till I'm in Chicago again just to visit here

Wow. We loved this place. Splurged and had the bone in filet and Dover sole. We shared and both were spectacular as was the banana cream pie. Our granddaughter had fried chicken and it was really good too.

We had an incredible dinner - seafood was fresh, steaks were cooked to perfection and oh so tender !!! Service was impeccable - the server even apologized that they let me finish my water before they could re-fill my glass !! THANK YOU, GREAT JOB

Superior food, superior service, fabulous menu, bring your wallet. Portions are generous; bring your appetite. Terrific wine list; some wines won't break the bank. Save room for desserts - enough to share. Reservations are a must.
The meal is outstanding beginning to end from appetizer dessert. Yes, you have to have their dessert!

The place was very full at night. We were planning to eat in but we really had to take it out. The food was awesome, both chicken and seafood platter were excellent. A little bit pricey but ok by its location, I guess.
Three of us went there for dinner to celibate our anniversary. Love the crab and steak. Nice service. The best part was the jumbo shrimp!!!
I've been here a number of times and it is always consistently delicious. Great wine selection and staff is worthy of a sixth star.

column3: My favorite place for a special lunch
column4: The food is delicious and the service is professional. You can have a leisurely lunch and never feel rushed or hurried along.
I was here with a large business function. Friendly, knowledgeable servers and great food. I highly recommend the crab cakes if you do not want to ‚Äúwork‚Äù for the Stone Crab. Nice wine list also.
We had a huge plate with crab, lobster, shrimp, saint jacques and oysters, then tried all the fish and i must say everything was absolutely delicious

This place had fantastic atmosphere and one of the best meals we had in Chicago. The service was excellent. We had crabs to start and grilled halibut to follow and was delicious. We wouldn't hesitate to go back
I had the King crab legs with stone crab for dessert and a Sancerre to go with it! It was so amazing! I could go weekly! I highly recommend it if you're in the city
what can I say? Just amazing‚Ä¶first went there 20 years ago and it is just as good as I remember. Just get the stone crabs!!
Had a fine lunch with the dining professionals at Joe's. Superb in all areas. Reasonably priced for the quality. I strongly recommend this restaurant.
The only thing would have been eating these stone crabs on a beach. I had been wanting to try these but the Miami one was closed when I was there. Mustard sauce is a great compliment

We go here for special occasions, birthdays, or when we want excellent seafood and service. Staff is attentive, food is excellent, portions are decent, and desserts are fantastic too. Always consistently great.

From the moment we sat down, we were treated like royalty. Complimentary champagne, fantastic menu. Hubby had the halibut and I had the scallops. I can close my eyes and just vision those wonderful scallops. Yum!! Complimentary Anniversary dessert was scrumptious, great service, great food!!
As first time diners, our waitress was able to answer all our questions about their extensive menu. Service was quick yet not rushed. Will go back on our next visit to Chicago.
Some of the best seafood around. Bone in ribeye was wonderful as well. On the expensive side, but well worth the $$. Service was great.

They were able to easily accomodate my gluten free diet, and everything was absolutely delicious. We made reservations several days in advance, and were seated about 10 minutes after our reserved time (9pm on a Friday).
We ate in a private room-menu is extensive and the seafood was great. Service was super. Ambiance is amazing. The place is crowded.

One of my all time favorite restaurants! Try the Dover Sole - it's amazing! Also had crab legs both hot and cold - excellent. Crab cakes are a must as well! Great service, great menu, all time fab restaurant!

Even though I don't eat fish the food here was great, friends who had the crab said it the best they'd had and worth the money, lovely ambience and good service, if we'd been in Chicago longer we'd have gone back.

My husband and I went here for dinner and thoroughly enjoyed it. We weren't terribly hungry. For an appetizer my husband ordered stone crabs and I ordered a crab cake. They were both great. We shared the Dover sole and crispy Brussel sprouts. Amazing meal!
Great restaurant; very expensive but worth it. I had a stone crab as an appetizer and the glazed sea bass entry with a sweet baked potato (side dishes are ordered separately.) Wine was great too!
I ordered king crab legs for an appetizer and a small lobster for dinner. It was great! Vegetables are huge!

column3: Expensive but shorter lines than in Miami
column4: Good lunch with stone crab special. Nice salad and hashbrowns to go with it. A bit pricey but it makes a special lunch if you have reason to splurge a bit.
Went here with 2 adult children and girlfriends. Food was very good service was good too . The shrimp and filets were cooked to our liking

Our server, Steve Kelly, was great. He helped us chose our meals and even had my steak cut for me!!! Since then I've taken my daughter, sent my brother and his date and will be going back very, very soon.

We had really great experience at Joe's. the best seafood I have ever had in the US so far. the lobster tail was good and the filet mignon was sooo delicious. It was small portion though and little pricey but all worth it!
Excellent food and friendly and attentive wait staff. Steak and lobster tail were the best I ever had and I've been to most Chicago steakhouses. Sides are fantastic too!

Joe's is really excellent in every way. The service is outstanding, the restaurant is decor is top notch and the food is always delicious. We've been here many times and never have had a bad experience.

column3: Get the bisque and the coconut cream pie!
column4: Reliable place to get a good meal. A bit overrun with day visitors at times. The crab bisque is great but you really want to make sure you get the coconut cream pie. Certainly big enough to share, but you might not want to.

Very high quality of the food and service. Very fresh ingredients. Professional service. Late hours for lunch any day of the week what makes it a great place for business lunch or the weekend. Many seafood choices including salads.

For great Ahi Tuna Tartare, Shrimp Cocktail, Steaks and more, Joe's consistently delivers. The Key Lime Pie is also a must. Their house cab, the BonAnno is a perfect representation of Napa with Rutherford, Oakville Crossing and St. Helena fruit.

column3: Can't go wrong at Joe's...if you can get a table!
column4: A staple for excellent dining. Love the white coats and the details. Fantastic Steaks, Seafood and more. Love family style veggie. Classic and updated! Again, you can't go wrong at Joe's....that is, if you can score a table.

column3: If you like seafood... That's a place!
column4: Among the best crab cakes of downtown Chicago! Perfectly steamed stone crab and king crab legs! We had excellent advice for the wine. The service quality pairs perfectly with the high product quality.
Tried it all!! My scallop entree was delicious, my husbands filet was also and the "Stone Crab Claws" were awesome. Service was excellent and atmosphere was fun. Fantastic evening.
We had the pleasure of being served by a happy and knowledgeable server and enjoyed the best crab cakes ever!

I visited this restaurant twice and both times they overcame my expectations. From service till the quality of the food everything was excellent. I can not tell what was better steak or fish. For sure I will come back.
One of my best dinners ever!!! Came with my wife For anniversary and we had both seafood and steak and the quality was superb!!! Service was remarkable!!!
We stumbled upon this restaurant and had a great meal and awesome service. The staff was on top of everything. It was First class service.
If you have a couple of hours to kill for a table this is the place. Thats a warning. The wait is long. The food is good.
Always a pleasure dining here. Upscale food and service. Superb seafood. Excellent wine selection. Little noisy. Great for large groups or business meal.

column3: One of the best meals ever in Chicago
column4: Probably the freshest seafood in the Midwest. The service was fantastic. The tuna appetizer was amazing. Book a table a few days in advance. When all other restaurants we visited were 50% empty, Joe's was bustling. Great wine list. Pricey...

we had a very nice time here. the food and service were excellent! stone crab, shrimp cocktail, oysters Rockefeller, filet Oscar, it has it all. Pricey but you know it's going to be so just enjoy. Oh yeah, the key lime pie was terrific!!
Elite and exclusive venue in the city center. Always quality service with smiling faces. No surprises here, you will find what you expect from a tasteful dinner.
Food average. Expensive. Waitress very good. Found hair in piece of pie. Did replace pie. Should have been compted. Atmosphere very nice.

I was skeptical of chilled King Crab Legs.....BUT, these were so good, it was insane! I could never eat them another way again. Great wine selection of Oregon Pinot's. Pricey but totally worth it! Great Chicago atmosphere, LOUD!
We loved our dinner at Joe's, The steak was awesome the stone crabs were delicious, Our server Erin was spectacular! We had a great time!
This is the place to go for stone crab claws. Their food and service are outstanding. Getting a reservation is hard to achieve. Its worth the effort for a flawless meal and excellent service.

column3: Joe's; The higher standard for Chicago restaurants for years.
column4: We are here several times a year for years never disappointed. Food,service and style all classic. A very busy well run establishment never compromising.

We love Joe's seafood and the atmosphere of the restaurant but above all we love the food. Try the crab legs and you'll know what I am talking about. No restaurant compares to Joe's Seafood quality!!!

Went to Joes with s group of work colleagues. The place was buzzing and packed full but we were seated quickly and treated like royalty. Service was excellent and the food was amazing. If you visit Chicago you must visit Joes

First time in this place. I visited the one in Miami Beach and I knew this had to be good. Food was perfect and delicious. Service was excellent and dessert was really good. Overall excellent place to eat with family or business.
The service is excellent and the food is very good. Time to be seated and waited on was unusually fast, even though it was very busy.

column3: Great place to stop in Chicago
column4: love the menu and the service. Can never go wrong with this as a choice. A little pricey but worth it.

Great staff, extremely friendly and attentive. The stone crabs are really good, a bit expensive for the quantity though. The mains were really good (Dover sole), and the sides not bad at all. Key lime pie is to die for
Used to be our goto restaurant with great food and portions. Over last year or so quality is down portion size down especially fish and chicken. Better places to go to in area.

column3: Great night for a special occasion
column4: Good and service is excellent. Loved the sea bass and banana cream pie. It is expensive but if your celebrating something this is definitely an option or an great option all the time if you have that kind of money :-)
I visit Joe's 3 times per year. The service & food are always top notch. Consistently excellent service & food.

Perfect spot outside Northbridge Shopping. Wonderful food great atmosphere eating in the bar area is great for people watching or sneaking a peak at a game. Staff is terrific and they know their food!
Dined here with my family. Servers were excellent, the seafood was all well prepared: crab legs, lobster, shrimp.
Best fried oyster you'll try in Chicago along with the pound of crab legs.. Any food you order, I promise you'll be satisfied..
we went here for lunch and stone crabs - they were excellent as expected. My husband got the aged ribeye dip sandwich and it was the run away star of the day! Wow!
Went here for our anniversary and my wife and I really loved it. The food was excellent and the atmosphere was top notch.
You cannot go wrong here, I have had most things on menu and everything is excellent. Good atmosphere
I know everyone raves about the stone crab legs but do not miss the dover sole, it is one of the best I have eaten
The king crab entree' is amazing! So is the Irish Coffee. The bartenders are so nice and a hoot to watch as they prepare great drinks. You get your monies worth for sure!
If you like crabs, this is the place to go. Always same good quality food, ambiance and service. Always a must for me when in town.

I love king crab legs when they are served chilled and pre-cut and this is what I got at Joe's. It was a pleasant experience. Make reservations or you may be waiting a very long time. The service was very good.

column3: Good food in a loud and big environment
column4: I like the food, excellent meat, and a big sole cooked to perfection, also excellent the key lime pie and the Apple pie, but the place is overcrowded and loud. Price is a bit high, but in line with similar places.

I am not a big fan of seafood but I would eat at Joe's any day. It really can't get any fresher and the jumbo shrimps are great. Actually everything I have had there from starter to desert have always been fantastic. Good value also.
My friends and I went to the restaurant in October. The dry aged steak is fantastic, but the seafood is just okay.
This is a great place. Food is excellent and they did a great job servicing a large party at a time when the restaurant was very busy. Steak is excellent.
Very good. Always so crowded...good for business, bad for those who have to wait. Food was good... The Key Lime Pie was the best part of the meal.

column3: Alaskan King Crab a meal to savory
column4: Out of this world , fresh , sweet , savory alaskan king crab ‚Ä¶.still dreaming about it a week later ‚Ä¶I would def. return and recommend this restaurant ‚Ä¶fresh and fantastic !! Huge huge huge crab legs ‚Ä¶.amazing , so good‚Ä¶will be back !!!

column3: Great food but crowded and very loud
column4: The food was fabulous, and the service was great. Reasonably priced for what you get. The environment was very loud, making normal conversation very difficult. Come here for good food, not an intimate evening.
Service was wonderful and the food was even better! We had a large group and we were seated promptly and everything was top of the line! Highly recommend the steak and crab legs!
Get the stone crabs--you won't be disappointed. Sides are great, too, and the service is down to earth but very attentive.

Joe's is one of the best steakhouses in Chicago. It's always a great meal with great service it's a can't miss for a great meal. Reserve ahead because they are really busy and walking in could lead to a long wait.

I had a recommendation for this restaurant and it fully met the high expectations which I had in advance of our visit. The food and service are just great. I would recommend it to any steak and fish lovers.

column3: Rei do king crab vermelho do alaska
column4: The alaska red king crab is wounderful! I ordered steamed O king crab vermelho do alaska eh fantastico !! Pedi no vapor üëçüëç

column3: Birthday dinner great service and great food
column4: Went here because it's my boyfriends favorite place. Steaks were amazing! Our server was so attentive and super helpful. Seated on time and everyone acted very professional. Great food and atmosphere. Always a great spot. Doesn't disappoint!
This one of the most amazing meals I have ever had! The food was awesome. The service was some of the best ever. I would definitely go back again and again!!!

The Alaskan crab and steak was excellent as were the stone crab claws. Excellent wine list This is a buzzing venue Bookings essential Only downside is the lack of space or tables and chairs for a drink whilst called to your table
just returned from Vegas... this restaurant is by far the best steak and seafood house in the city.. the service is also great
Loved it so much I enjoyed both a lunch and dinner. Service is excellent and the food follows suite. Great experience!
The food is truly delicious- I have never had a bad meal. Plus the service is top notch. A great place to celebrate special occasions.

column3: A bit pricey but very much worth it!
column4: Very elegant and wonderful dining experience! The seafood here is always fresh and prepared superb! They have the best Ribeye steak I have ever eaten! Also, they have wonderful martinis!
You will love the service, food, and fantastic staff. I would highly recommend ordering a pie to go and take it to a work function as I did with the coconut cream pie!

column3: Busy and full of energy even at 11pm
column4: Came for a quick bite after a show. Was very enjoyable. Great food. Great service. Great choice. Will come back.
always good food! Great wait staff! Ling Crab legs were FANTASTIC! one should try their fried chicken - delicious!

my wife and I have eaten at JOE'S several times.FOOD is great/service is impeccable.GREAT dining experience every time.QUALITY food/service always.WE always have an order of STONE CRAB AWESOME! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS RESTAURANT!

We decided to try this restaurant for lunch as it was right outside our hotel. It was terrific. The food was great and the service was superior. We all ordered something different and everyone said how good it was.

The food and service are the best. We have never had a bad meal. The only problem is getting a reservation on the weekends....it has become nearly impossible and because of this we don't go as often as we would like. Highly recommend!
Consistently great food and great service. Sides are terrific to share and great desserts too. A great place to bring out of town guests!
Was there for a work-related dinner. We had a separate room in the back for us (about 20). Food was great and the service was too. The salmon was amazing.

column3: One of my favorites in Chicago
column4: We had a group of 24 in the boardroom and the food and service was great. When you order the seafood platter they serve portions to each guest. This is much classier than the standard towers set in the middle of the tables.

As always Jose's serves great food. My wife and I asked for items on the menu we have not had before and all was great. Drinks were very well prepared. The experience was truly outstanding thanks to Denice, our waiter, a delightful lady.

Had our son and daughter in law's rehearsal dinner last weekend. Nicole couldn't have been more professional and Bridget the room captain was most accommodating. Pricey but perfect!! Great food, comments from guests were stellar.
After a long day of travel, this was an oasis. Excellent seafood platter. They fixed it part grilled and part fried. Try the fried artichoke too!

column3: The crab bisque was first class
column4: Loved the food, especially the crab bisque. Our friends had dined at the Joe's in Las Vegas and they thought this was just as good.
The food is simply gorgeous! We had Seafood Platter and Stone Crabs for around a hundred bucks. The crabs are soooo nice; you have to taste it!
We had an excellent meal - one of the best - you need to book .. this place is full full full ! I recommend the lobster tail Stone Crab is a little overrated .. Excellent food and service
Staff was excellent, great service is expected at this place and they won't let you down. Ribeye was prepared to perfection, and the keylime pie was as close to kelime in Savannah as you will find.
Although the crabs are served cold, they are seasoned well and very taste. The price is very affordable and the service was wonderful.
It was my second visit after 7 years. My first impression was very good so we gave it another try. The interior was classy, sevice was sharp, seafood was excellent. Must try the stone crab.

Excellent steaks, excellent seafood. Make sure to get a reservation and be prepared to eat in a relatively loud dining room and pay handsomely for the eats. Expensive but somehow feels worth every penny.

If you are looking for food heaven, you'll find it at Joe's. Perfect steaks and deliciously prepared seafood make this steakhouse feel as if it was pleasantly plucked from NYC's finest. Service was impeccable and it couldn't even match the food.

We went in because we were staying at the hotel across the street and seafood sounded good. We had Stone Crab claws for the first time. WOW! The service and all the rest of our meal was excellent also.

column3: If you are a King Crab fan go there!
column4: Don¬¥t waste your time with any other dish. They serve the best King Crab legs.Deserts are very good.

column3: Not easy to find but worth the hunt
column4: Having sampled Joe's in Las Vegas we decided to hunt this one out and weren't disappointed. The staff were really attentive and helpful and the food delicious.
Excellent lunch. Service terrific; attentive without hovering. Pricey, but terrific food. Seafood salad very good. Dr. Bob's turkey burger, with avocado; french fried sweets; delicious. Recommended.

Joe's Seafood is best known for its Stone Crab. The restaurant began in Miami on South Beach and low has locations in Chicago and Washington DC. The Chicago location provided the best service I've experienced in a large restaurant setting.

This restaurant came highly recommended and didn't disappoint. The crabs and seafood were superb and the service was faultless. We had a little wait for our table and the tables were tightly packed together but the experience was worth it.

Hot, fresh, really good flavor. Companion's burger was too raw but returned in perfect condition. Staff went the extra mile to make sure we were satisfied. They even sell a half piece of pie. Just right.

Although Joe's is part of a restaurant chain, originally from Miami, the service and food feel like unique. The scallops with pork belly and the king crab paired with white wine were absolutely delicious- I highly recommend this restaurant-

column3: Very good stone crab and top-shelf service
column4: Enjoyed a very satisfying lunch. Crab is their forte. Creamed spinach was yummy but not special. Hash browns were completely unremarkable. Side salad was very good as was the breadbasket. Very refined and attentive service. Delicious crab. Pricey.
Joe's is always a good idea. We had the stone crabs which are always great and fresh. Even the french fries were crunchy and fried to perfection. Don't miss it if you're in Chicago or Miami.
Great seafood and steaks. Service was top notch! Upbeat atmosphere. Reservations recommended! Centrally located.
Every time we visit Chicago we dine at Joe's. It is consistently great. Staff is always friendly and accommodating. Had a great seafood salad for lunch. Burger is always good.

column3: Too expensive and service is average
column4: I ordered crab and soup. The soup was very salty and the crab does not have the taste of crab I expected. The service is average and expected to get more than 18% tip. Not worth the money.

If you're wanting typical American seafood and beef,then this is the place to come,where tradition,service,and good portions all combine to give us customers even more than we expect,assuming,like us, it's your 1st time there. Fantastic pure crab cake,and a portion easily shared,then a prawn dish,coated...More

My husband and I were visiting Chicago recently and heard about Joe's from my parents who have been to the ones in FL and Vegas. The seafood and steaks were to die for. Steve B., our waiter, answered all our questions and was attentive to our needs. You definitely need a reservation as the place fills quickly. A bit on the expensive side but well worth it. Not a place you can go do all the time but definitely worth going to.

We went here for the first time and thought this is how a restaurant should be for our meal is one that we will remember for a long time and Charles our server was probably the best server that we have had the pleasure to serve us. They have a bar waiting area so you can get a drink and pass the time until your table comes up and I would advise everyone to call and make a reservation. I would say anything you order here will delight your tatesbuds and have you coming here again once you arrive back in Chicago.

My family and I stopped in for a late lunch on a Friday. The menu is extensive with a wide range of food choices. They also have a section called classics, which is three courses at a reduced cost. All of our meals were very good, from crispy fish tacos to filet mignon to lobster bisque. As far as must tries; Joe's cole slaw prepared at your table, spinach stuffed mushroom caps, lobster bisque, key lime pie and peanut butter cream pie. The final cost for four of us, with no alcohol, but four deserts and 3 lattes was $135.00.

I have been to the Joe's in Vegas. This was better food and service than there. Our waitress was great !!!! It was my birthday so she brought me a free key lime pie. I had the fresh catch, it was one of the best piece of fish I ever had eaten. I eat seafood often. The salad and bread was also great.  Joe's is a great place. It maybe a little pricey, but it's well worth it.

i had great expectations for this place. From the moment I stepped in, I was impressed with the decor and service of the front desk and waiter staff. The wine list and menu offer a great choice. The wine list is extensive and offers a wide choice for all budgets. The appetizer was great. But at the end of the day, one lives and dies by the main dish. The main dish was sole. I tried it to compare them to my wife's sole dish that is virtually the same. The difference being that my wife's is better. The sole dish was bit flat on the flavor profile and dry. It was good, but not great. And at a place like this, one expects great.

My husband and I were invited to a birthday celebration here, and we're very glad to try this excellent restaurant. Think classic clubby seafood and steaks and try their cold stone crab claws, which were delicious. There are several complimentary bread options, quite tasty. I try crab cakes at every seafood place, and these were excellent, no creative sauce, but tender, flaky, and delicious. The special watermelon and feta salad was a delicious refreshing option for a summer dinner. My husband loved his ribeye. Male family members all loved their steaks and we women all loved our seafood. Save room for the pies, which are fantastic and can be ordered in half slice options. My favorite was the Key lime, which had just the right balance of tartness and sweetness, followed by the banana cream. Havana, chocolate, peanut butter, and cherry were also popular at our table. Service was excellent and prices reasonable for Chicago, but not cheap. We would return.

column3: food was excellent but way overpriced
column4: The food was excellent, service was excellent, but honestly even the best steak and crab legs can only be so great. Our bill for 4 people was 400.00 and that included only 2 glasses of wine. I cannot say anything bad about the place, only that I wouldnt go back due to the expense. I could hav bought a weeks worth of groceries for the same price and I honestly felt guilty for spending that much on a meal.

Went here for the espresso martinis once & for a fabulous lunch during this trip. Our lunch was an assortment of small plates & several were special ordered to accomodate a vegan so we could all share. Everything came as ordered & never felt like we were being to picky. Everything we ate, was delicious!

column3: Too expensive and service is average
column4: I ordered crab and soup. The soup was very salty and the crab does not have the taste of crab I expected. The service is average and expected to get more than 18% tip. Not worth the money.
Will definitely be back. The Dover Sole was amazing. The staff was great!!! Make reservations far in advance.
The staff were great, the ambience was wonderful and the food very good but pricey when you consider that all the sides are priced separately.
A group of us had a private room at Joe's. It's a restaurant whether you fancy seafood or meat. The service was first class and they have a very good wine selection
Went with group of 25 people. Food was excellent and so was the service. All meals served at same time and done perfectly.

column3: Wonderful!! Truly felt we were in Chicago by the atmosphere!
column4: The decor is Chicago thru and thru! We started with Ceviche and wine. I had a Petite Filet so tender. Everyone at our table left full and happy. Our Server(s) were exceptional. We ended our meal with their Key Lime Pie. Yum yum!
Everything that I imagined it would be & more. Service was top notch & food was right on. We will be back!
This was a group business dinner. We had the seafood assorted appetizer and also surf and turf for dinner. Service and food par excellence.
Great stone crabs and Alaska King Crab. Service was impeccable at the bar and at our table. I highly recommend that you put this eatery on your list while in the Windy City
I highly recommend this Chicago restaurant. We had a rehearsal dinner there and I couldn't have been happier. The event coordinator and the staff are excellent and the food was incredibly good.

My wife and I have been going to Joes for years. Love sitting at the bar to have dinner. Bartenders are very friendly and accomadating. Steaks are great! Love the in-season grilled corn off the cob!! Stone crab appitizer is delicous...

column3: One of the best of many culinary experiences in Chicago
column4: I had an early dinner here and was amazed by the quality of food and wine selection. Probably one of the best Bone in Ribeye's I have ever had! Service was exemplary and atmosphere was perfect.

just a great stop while you are shopping on the Mag Mile , original American food, but also great seafood, we enjoyed the seafood salad, crab, lobster, scallops very fresh and tasty, and the service is excellent...
This restaurant is simply delicious! We ordered at least 6 courses and everything tasted out of this world! I strongly recommend if you have one restaurant to go to in Chicago, go to Joes!!!
The place is very busy - reservations a must. We had the steak, sea bass and stone crab. All were to die for!

Business dinner - 5 of us. From the staff to the service to the quality of the food and wine Joe's was a fantastic evening. Everyone enjoyed their meals. We we not rushed and probably sat for 3 hrs. Highly recommend!

I went to a private event in this restaurant. The food was good although many fried dishes were offered. The dessert was great: a delicious lime pie. The chadornnay was perfect and harmonized with the crab. Good restaurant in town.
It was a very convenient location from my hotel and I was advised that I need to have reservation but luckily I managed to get a table. I really enjoyed the crab cake and enjoyed the cocktails
Great ambience. Good menu. Very good service. Had the best New York strip ever. But shrimp cocktail was not up to that of Gibson's.
If you want great seafood or a steak with fantastic service, this is the place to come. Never had a bad meal here.
The scallops here are the best. Really superb stone crab claws. Fresh, firm, delicious. everything is awesome here. Incredible steakhouse with excellent service
Couldn't get a table. Sat at bar- service excellent!!! Crab cakes delicious! Seafood platter excellent ! Have to eat here when in town!!! Repeat customers!

column3: Holy Moly What A Great Restaurant!
column4: First class restaurant. Great atmosphere. Fantastic service. Incredibly good food. Treat yourself to this fine eatery. I know I will go back. Soon!
We have eaten a few times at Joe's in Miami and loved it but this one in Chicago was awful: the crabs frozen, the service slow and forgetful, super expensive and loud.
We went to Joe's because our relatives went there in Vegas. It was fantastic. The chowder mmmm. We enjoyed the atmosphere and service.

Joe's reminds me of a classic American restaurant - traditional wait service - excellent steak and seafood. The Stone Crab is a must. They even had Peppermint Ice cream. Reminded my group of Christmas!
service, menue, and food were simply the best. The waiter was excellent, he knew his F&B and therefore you got really good advice and one sensed that he was not giving you false info.

When stone crab in season, it is excellent. The atmoshphere is fantastic and the staff is very courteous. Try the lobster bisque and share the salad for the table. You will need reservations most days, and it is part of the Lettuce Entertain You group.

Beautiful place, fancy and well dressed people,... Prices are ok, food is great, specially the lemon pie! Service is also remarkable, great place to have a special dinner! Make sure you make reservations!
Was in town for business and planned a month in advance to have dinner at Joe's. Glad we did. The crab cake, Halibut, Crabs were perfect. I would recommend Joe's to anyone and everyone--Great food.
The crab claws were delish, as expected, the service was impeccable and the place was booming. I couldn't recommend it more highly!
Solid restaurant. Steak and Seafood, sides served "family style" and homemade deserts (keylime pie!) Busy place - good buzz to it.

Never had the steak but the stone crab was great and the atmosphere is of a classy old school white cloth table seafood spot. I had the Whale which is there sampler love it. This is a pricey place so be prepared.
Best food, variety, people buzz, service (usually). And the desserts. Wear elastic waist pants. A repeat, repeat, repeat and I am a local

Prices are high but worth it! The food is good quality food! Split the appetizers and try as many as possible. Sea food and steaks are amazing! Desserts are great too. You can't go wrong with anything here!

column3: too loud, too crowded, two expensive
column4: when i found out all stone crabs are frozen, my heart sank. i'll live without it. too many other great steak houses. i'll stay with locally owned, thank you. n

column3: A PIECE OF SOBE in CHICAGO
column4: Stone Crabs ? YES, Joe's invented them. Beyond that, the BONE IN RIB EYE....don't miss it. Frequented the original, down in SOBE, for decades, then the Joe's in LV while living there. Now I am glad to dine at JOE's Chicago while living here.
Top drawer seafood, including the famous Stone Crab. One can't go wrong here...The service is excellent and the ambiance is quite pleasant. On busy nights can be quite crowded.

column3: Hands down one of the best in Chicago
column4: Reservation Only is the way to go, or you may get lucky and find a seat at the bar. Joe's is hands down one of best in Chicago. Great food, service, cocktails and valet parking, worth the Price!
We shared a meal at Joe's Seafood. Their seafood is fresh and can accommodate large groups. Many tasty items on the menu and the desserts rock. Hard to get reservations.
I have been to a couple of different Joe's. Florida and Chicago. Always good. Go for the Florida Stone Crab Claws!

column3: Great Stone Claws and Prime Steak
column4: Joe's is one of my favorites, both for large functions and small dinners. You can't go wrong with the Stone Crab Claws combined with a Prime Steak!
Be sure to make reservations well in advance, it is definitely worth it! Spinach mushroom appetizer was great as we're the scallops and steak.

Great service by Mike. Everything about our experience was wonderful. The best wedge salad I've ever had. The crab legs and bone-in ribeye were top notch. Chicago has a lot of great restaurants but this one is at the top!

I love love love love love love love Joe's. Period. Stone Crabs are amazing, everything here is amazing. Its not outlandish prices either if you only order what you can eat. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Stopped in for a quick late night eat and had some delicious Oysters Rockefeller and stone crab. All the food was great, so was the coffee, and the complimentary bread. The atmosphere was neat, and staff was friendly.

An absolutely great restaurant. Great service, great location, great food! I've eaten at the main restaurant in Miami Beach and this location is every bit as good. Don't miss this place if you're a stone crab fan!
We love to return to Joe's for the beginning of Chicago Restaurant Week‚Ä¶starting with stone crab claws and ending with a divine dessert‚Ä¶perfect escape from the Chicago cold to the Florida coast!
Known for its seafood (especially its trademark stone crabs), Joe's also offers one of the best steaks in Chicago. Be prepared for a pricey meal, but you will not be disappointed at how great it is.
You will not be disappointed at Joe's. The steaks, the seafood, the service, are all top drawer. Yes, it is expensive, but at the end you will feel it was worth it.
Food is very good no matter what you eat. great service, friendly staff. Can't beat it. Make reservations to get a table. Expensive but well worth it.

We were unable to get last minute reservations on our quick trip to Chicago but luckily we were able to pick up a take out order which was fantastic as usual! Joe's is a staple in every Chicago trip we make!

The food at Joe's is wonderful and the servers are wonderful too! My favorites are the Stone Crabs and the tasty pies which are available in 1/2 pieces which helps me save me from myself. i would recommend this place to anyone -pricey, but yummy!
Extremely popular and hard to get into, Joe's always delivers a classy upscale experience with excellent food.
Excellent food, setting, service. Be prepared to pay accordingly. Special event type of place. Location convenient to Michigan Ave and the Loop

Went with colleagues. Had Steak and Stone crab combo which was excellent. Been here 2 years ago. Felt that the service was not as good as the previous visit. Cannot fault the taste of the crab or the steak though. Will happily visit again.
This is simply the best all around place in Chicago. Great location, great atmosphere & energy, great service from professional staff, and just the consistently best food for miles around every time.

Atmosphere was great, waiter extremely knowledgable, food was good, but not the best ever. I think Filet Mignon at my local steakhouse is just as good if not better. The Alaskan King Crab legs were Excellent, but very pricey.
Great food and great service! It comes at a price, but it's well worth it! Great seafood and great meat quality!
Excellent location, good atmosphere, staff friendly and marvellous menu. Food prepared to a high standard , really enjoyable experience, would highly recommend.
Excellent food. We went without reservation and eat at the bar. Just one waitress for all the people on the bar so she was very busy and had to wait a lot forbthe menu and to order.
The food was amazing and the service by the wait staff was the best ever. Loved the entire experience
The food is always excellent, this is our go-too place when we are in the city. Wish they had a restaurant in the north suburbs so we could go often.

Went to Joe's with a group of 6 and had arguably the best dinners any of us have experienced. Very fresh creatively prepared dishes with very attentive friendly service for such a busy restaurant. I highly recommend.
Typical awesome meal and service. Waiter recommended a Piot Noir - Elute which was excellent. Not our first time dinning here and not our last.
Everything was amazing!!! Calamari, crab, filet mignon all soo good best place I have ever ate hands down!i will deffenitly return here, plus the service was great
I had very little time to eat so I ordered a lobster cobb salad. To my surprise it was fresh and delicious! It was accompained by lobster bisque which was the also great:). Lunch in 30 minutes!

Had Lunch here last week, we were 4 and really enjoyed it. Stone crab were a bit small, the Alaskan King crab was fantastic, and the veal oscar was out of this world. Would highly recommend it, was a very good lunch, great service.
Please be hungry before you go here. The steaks were so thick and juicy. That was not the last visit for sure. The stone crab was so pretty to look at; I almost did not want to eat them. But I did!

column3: The crab claws are still tickling my tastebuds.
column4: Grabbed an early meal here and was not disapointed!! GREAT service, the crab claws tasted so good!!!!
We dined with six other couples on a busy Saturday night. The food and the service were wonderful. Choose this place for a special occasion but don't expect and romantic quiet atmosphere.
Went here while visiting Chicago. Service amazing. Food great. Quite pricey but very well cooked. Lots of wines available but at a premium. Wonderful place for a special occasion.
The service was great and the food delicious. Pricey but worth it. Reservations need to be booked well in advance and the restaurant is quite crowded.
Had a great meal here for a family birthday celebration. Excellent steaks. Outstanding service. Highly recommended!
Good but very old school. Food is sort of bland and the prices are too much. Nice atmosphere but just too much.

column3: The best steakhouse in chicago downtown
column4: I really recommend it as a steakhouse, order the Fillet Mignon with lobster tail. "Thumb up". It is a bit expensive but it worth paying for delicious food.
Very expensive place to eat, but the food is so good. I had the fish (mahi mahi) tacos and my husband had the grouper.
The food is just good, not excelent. That night no stone crabs which is the most important dish of the place. Service just good.
The service was great! We had fresh king crab legs, and also steak is excellent. A definite must go place in Chicago

Regularly visit Joe's whilst in Chicago. Service is excellent and they serve great food and bar has personality. Only difficulty is bar is first come first serve and can get a little crowded. The shrimp & crab are well worth it. Highly recommended.
Expensive but well worth it. If you are a serious seafood person, you must try Joe's. The Alaskan king crab legs are to die for. There is not much to say. GO THERE!
This was our second trip to Joes. It is amazing. Food is fantastic and service even better. Highly recommend for lunch. Try the Louis Salad and must have the stone crab.
We felt we were being rushed in order to seat other waiting guests. Crab claws were dry and not the best quality. Waiter not helpful at all.

column3: Get there in time for the lunch special
column4: Service is excellent, food was yummy. They have a couple of lunch specials that include a potato dish, vegetable dish and a slice of pie. I hope to go back.
Dinner for twenty on the mezzanine. Good representation of beef, seafood, and crab. Exceptional wine menu. Timely and excellent service. Looking forward to my next visit.

We went with a group and they put us in a private room, which worked very well. The crab cakes are as good as I've had in Maryland, the mashed potatoes are excellent. The desserts are all very good and the service was great.
Joe's Seafood was a wonderful place to eat with co-workers and their spouses. I highly recommend the bisque. Another recommendation is the appetizer called "2nd Mortgage".
It is expensive,but if you are celebrating or looking for a fine dinning in Chicago this the place. A long history and the best service with a straight forward presentation.

In my opinion the best seafood in the Midwest. Try the chilled king crab legs very good quality and amazing customer service. The place is pricey and really hard to get a dinner reservation during prime time.
A+++ restaurant. Be sure to make reservation. Quality service to match quality food. Be sure to check for specials.

This is our favorite restaurant in Chicago. We never visit the city without a stop at Joe's. Ate there last night and as usual, it was fabulous. Great fresh seafood, wonderful steaks, Excellent service!
Delicious crab claws. Great drinks . Delicious mac and cheese. Okay coconut cream pie. Very attentive service.

column3: So good we came back for lunch.
column4: Joe's key lime pie is so good I order it delivered online from Miami. Top notch service at reasonable pricing. Good wine menu, fantastic seafood and steaks, and KEY LIME PIE! Make sure to mske a reservation well in advance for large parties.

We were there on a Sunday evening and it was buzzing!! Big room and if you're looking for great steaks in what can only be the US of A it won't disappoint. We really enjoyed it and were glad we booked in advance

column3: Great Lunch at Joe's Seafood Chicago
